anya-e0805n0:14: Tattha jinasāsanādhigamassa akkharakosallamūlakattā taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ abhidheyyappayojanavākyamidamuccate.
anya-e0805n0:16_0: Yo koci lokiyalokuttarādibhedo vacanattho, so sabbo akkhareheva saññāyate. Sithiladhanitādiakkharavipattiyañhi
anya-e0805n0:16_1: atthassa dunnayatā hoti, tasmā akkharakosallaṃ bahūpakāraṃ buddhavacanesu, ettha
anya-e0805n0:22_0: Akkharā api ādayo ekacattālīsaṃ, te ca kho jinavacanānurūpā akārādayo niggahītantā
anya-e0805n0:22_1: ekacattālīsamattā vaṇṇā paccekaṃ akkharā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – ā i ī u ū e o, ka
anya-e0805n0:22_2: kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha
anya-e0805n0:22_3: ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti akkharā.
anya-e0805n0:23_0: Nakkharantīti akkharā, a ādi yesaṃ te ādayo. Akārādīnamanukkamo panesa ṭhānādikkamasannissito,
anya-e0805n0:23_1: tathā hi ṭhānakaraṇappayatanehi vaṇṇā jāyante, tattha cha ṭhānāni kaṇṭhatālumuddhadantaoṭṭhanāsikāvasena.
anya-e0805n0:25: Ivaṇṇa cavagga yakārā tālujā. Ṭavagga rakāra ḷakārā muddhajā. Tavagga lakāra sakārā dantajā. Uvaṇṇa pavaggā oṭṭhajā. Ekāro kaṇṭhatālujo. Okāro kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo.
anya-e0805n0:28: Ṅa ña ṇa na mā sakaṭṭhānajā, nāsikaṭṭhānajā cāti.
anya-e0805n0:31: Karaṇaṃ jivhāmajjhaṃ tālujānaṃ, jivhopaggaṃ muddhajānaṃ, jivhāggaṃ dantajānaṃ, sesā sakaṭṭhānakaraṇā.
anya-e0805n0:32: Payatanaṃ saṃvutādikaraṇaviseso. Saṃvutattamakārassa, vivaṭattaṃ sesasarānaṃ sakārahakārānañca, phuṭṭhaṃ vaggānaṃ, īsaṃphuṭṭhaṃ yaralavānanti.
anya-e0805n0:33: Evaṃ ṭhānakaraṇappayatanasutikālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0805n0:34: Nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato;
anya-e0805n0:44: Tattha tesu akkharesu akārādīsu okārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – a ā i ī u ū e o-iti sarā.
anya-e0805n0:45: O anto yesaṃ te odantā, dakāro sandhijo, saranti gacchantīti sarā, byañjane sārentītipi sarā.
anya-e0805n0:48: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – a i u-iti rassā.
anya-e0805n0:49_0: Lahukā mattā pamāṇaṃ yesaṃ te lahumattā, mattāsaddo cettha accharāsaṅghātaakkhinimīlanasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0805n0:49_1: kālaṃ vadati, tāya mattāya ekamattā rassā, dvimattā dīghā, aḍḍhamattā byañjanā. Lahuggahaṇañcettha
anya-e0805n0:49_2: chandasi diyaḍḍhamattassāpi gahaṇatthaṃ. Rassakālayogato rassā, rassakālavanto vā rassā.
anya-e0805n0:52: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – ā ī ū e o-iti dīghā.
anya-e0805n0:53_0: Aññaggahaṇaṃ diyaḍḍhamattikānampi saṅgahaṇatthaṃ. Dīghakāle niyuttā, tabbanto vā
anya-e0805n0:53_1: dīghā. Kvaci saṃyogapubbā ekārokārā rassā iva vuccante. Yathā – ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho,
anya-e0805n0:53_2: sotthi. Kvacīti kiṃ? Maṃ ce tvaṃ nikhaṇaṃ vane. Putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja.
anya-e0805n0:55: Dvinnaṃ samūho du, tasmiṃ dumhi. Saṃyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusañño hoti. Yathā – datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.
anya-e0805n0:58: Dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. Yathā – nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo. Garukato añño “lahuko”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n0:60_0: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā aḍḍhamattā akkharā kakārādayo niggahītantā tettiṃsa byañjanā
anya-e0805n0:60_1: nāma honti. Vuttehi aññe sesā. Byañjīyati etehi atthoti byañjanā. Taṃ yathā – ka
anya-e0805n0:60_2: kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha
anya-e0805n0:60_3: ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti byañjanā. Kakārādīsvakāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0805n0:63_0: Tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ kakārādayo makārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena
anya-e0805n0:63_1: vaggā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa,
anya-e0805n0:63_2: ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggā.
anya-e0805n0:64: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavaggacavaggādivohāraṃ gatā, vaggoti samūho, tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti vā pañcapañcaso, mo anto yesaṃ te mantā.
anya-e0805n0:66_0: Akāro uccāraṇattho, itisaddo panānantaravuttanidassanattho, aṃiti yaṃ akārato paraṃ
anya-e0805n0:66_1: vuttaṃ bindu, taṃ niggahītaṃ nāma hoti. Rassassaraṃ nissāya gayhati, karaṇaṃ niggahetvā
anya-e0805n0:69: Idha avuttānaṃ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:71: Yā ca pana parasmiṃ sakkataganthe, paresaṃ vā veyyākaraṇānaṃ samaññā ghosāghosalopasavaṇṇasaṃyogaliṅgādikā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.
anya-e0805n0:72: Parasmiṃ, paresaṃ vā samaññā parasamaññā, veyyākaraṇe, veyyākaraṇamadhītānaṃ vā samaññātyattho. Payujjanaṃ payogo, viniyogo.
anya-e0805n0:73: Tattha vaggānaṃ paṭhamadutiyā, sakāro ca aghosā. Vaggānaṃ tatiyacatutthapañcamā, ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ghosā nāma.
anya-e0805n0:74_0: Ettha ca vaggānaṃ dutiyacatutthā dhanitātipi vuccanti, itare sithilāti. Vināso lopo.
anya-e0805n0:74_1: Rassassarā sakadīghehi aññamaññaṃ savaṇṇā nāma, ye sarūpātipi vuccanti. Sarānantaritāni
anya-e0805n0:74_2: byañjanāni saṃyogo. Dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅgaṃ. Vibhatyantaṃ padaṃ. Iccevamādi.
anya-e0805n0:78_0: Loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṃ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṃ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:78_1: sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṃ, dhanā me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā, asanto
anya-e0805n0:78_2: ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṃ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:80_0: Sarenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ, sahayoge vā, sandhitabbe sarasahitaṃ pubbabyañjanaṃ
anya-e0805n0:80_1: anatikkamanto adhoṭhitamassarañca katvā sarato viyojayeti sarato byañjanaṃ viyojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:82_0: Sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṃ papponti. Lopoti adassanaṃ anuccāraṇaṃ. Ettha
anya-e0805n0:82_1: sarāti kāriyīniddeso. Bahuvacanaṃ panettha ekekasmiṃ sare pare bahūnaṃ lopañāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:82_2: Sareti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamī cāyaṃ, nimittopādānasāmatthiyato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne
anya-e0805n0:82_3: sandhikāriyaṃ na hoti. Lopanti kāriyaniddeso, idaṃ pana suttaṃ upari paralopavidhānato
anya-e0805n0:82_4: pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha sattamīniddese pubbasseva vidhi, na
anya-e0805n0:85_0: Sararahitaṃ kho byañjanaṃ adhoṭhitaṃ parakkharaṃ naye yutte ṭhāneti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:85_1: Ettha yuttaggahaṇaṃ niggahītanisedhanatthaṃ, tena “akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādīsu
anya-e0805n0:86: Lokaggapuggalo, paññindriyaṃ, tīṇimāni, nohetaṃ, bhikkhunovādo, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṃ, dhanā matthi, sabbeva, tayassu dhammā, asantettha na dissanti.
anya-e0805n0:87_0: Yassa idāni, saññā iti, chāyā iva, kathā eva kā, iti api, assamaṇī asi, cakkhu indriyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:87_1: akataññū asi, ākāse iva, te api, vande ahaṃ, so ahaṃ, cattāro ime, vasalo iti, moggallāno
anya-e0805n0:87_2: āsi bījako, pāto evātīdha pubbalope sampatte “sare”ti adhikāro, idha pana “atthavasā
anya-e0805n0:87_3: vibhattivipariṇāmo”ti katvā “saro, saramhā, lopa”nti ca vattamāne –
anya-e0805n0:89_0: Asamānarūpamhā saramhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. Samānaṃ rūpaṃ assāti sarūpo, na
anya-e0805n0:89_1: sarūpo asarūpo, asavaṇṇo. Yasmā pana mariyādāyaṃ, abhividhimhi ca vattamāno āupasaggo
anya-e0805n0:89_2: viya vāsaddo dvidhā vattate, katthaci vikappe, katthaci yathāvavatthitarūpapariggahe,
anya-e0805n0:89_3: idha pana pacchime, tato niccamaniccamasantañca vidhimettha vāsaddo dīpeti. “Naye
anya-e0805n0:90_0: Yassadāni yassa idāni, saññāti saññā iti, chāyāva chāyā iva, kathāva kā kathā eva
anya-e0805n0:90_1: kā, itīpi iti api, assamaṇīsi assamaṇī asi. Cakkhundriya miti niccaṃ. Akataññūsi
anya-e0805n0:90_2: akataññū asi, ākāseva ākāse iva, tepi te api, vandehaṃ vande ahaṃ, sohaṃ so ahaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:90_3: cattārome cattāro ime, vasaloti vasalo iti, moggallānosi bījako moggallāno āsi bījako, pātova pāto eva.
anya-e0805n0:91: Idha na bhavati – pañcindriyāni, saddhindriyaṃ, sattuttamo, ekūnavīsati, yassete, sugatovādo, diṭṭhāsavo, diṭṭhogho, cakkhāyatanaṃ, taṃ kutettha labbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:95_0: Bandhussa iva, upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca, jina īritaṃ, na upeti, canda udayo,
anya-e0805n0:95_1: yathā udake itīdha pubbāvaṇṇassarānaṃ lope kate “paro, asarūpe”ti ca vattate, tathā
anya-e0805n0:95_2: “ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā”ti ito ivaṇṇaggahaṇañca, “vamodudantāna”nti ito uggahaṇañca sīhagatiyā idhānuvattetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:97_0: Ivaṇṇabhūto, ukārabhūto ca paro saro asarūpe pubbassare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṃ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:97_1: Natthi savaṇṇā etesanti asavaṇṇā, ekārokārā, tattha ṭhānāsannavasena ivaṇṇukārānamekārokārā honti.
anya-e0805n0:98_0: Bandhusseva, upekkhati, upeto, avecca, jineritaṃ, nopeti, candodayo, yathodake. Kvacīti
anya-e0805n0:98_1: kiṃ? Tatrime, yassindriyāni, mahiddhiko, sabbītiyo, tenupasaṅkami, lokuttaro. Lutteti
anya-e0805n0:98_2: kiṃ? Cha ime dhammā, yathā idaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā. Asarūpeti kiṃ? Cattārimāni, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:99: Ettha ca satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe kvacikaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato idha na bhavati – diṭṭhupādānaṃ, pañcahupāli, mudindriyaṃ, yo missaroti.
anya-e0805n0:100_0: Tatra ayaṃ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, paññavā assa, tadā ahaṃ, yāni idha bhūtāni,
anya-e0805n0:100_1: gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva, bahu upakāraṃ, madhu udakaṃ, su upadhāritaṃ, yopi
anya-e0805n0:100_2: ayaṃ, idāni ahaṃ, sace ayaṃ, appassuto ayaṃ, itara itarena, saddhā idha vittaṃ, kamma
anya-e0805n0:100_3: upanissayo, tathā upamaṃ, ratti uparato, vi upasamo iccatra pubbassarānaṃ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:103: Saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci dīghabhāvaṃ pappotīti ṭhānāsannavasena rassassarānaṃ savaṇṇadīgho.
anya-e0805n0:104_0: Tatrāyaṃ, buddhānussati, sātthikā, paññavāssa, tadāhaṃ, yānīdha bhūtāni, gacchāmīti,
anya-e0805n0:104_1: atīto, kikīva, bahūpakāraṃ, madhūdakaṃ, sūpadhāritaṃ, yopāyaṃ, idānāhaṃ, sacāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:104_2: appassutāyaṃ, itarītarena, saddhīdha vittaṃ, kammūpanissayo, tathūpamaṃ, rattūparato, vūpasamo.
anya-e0805n0:105_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Aciraṃ vata’yaṃ kāyo, kimpimāya, tīṇimāni, pañcasupādānakkhandhesu,
anya-e0805n0:105_1: tassattho, pañcaṅgiko, munindo, satindriyaṃ, lahuṭṭhānaṃ, gacchāmahaṃ, tatridaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:105_2: pañcahupāli, natthaññaṃ. Lutteti kiṃ? Yathā ayaṃ, nimi iva rājā, kikī iva, su upadhāritaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:106: Lokassa iti, deva iti, vi ati patanti, vi ati nāmenti, saṅghāṭi api, jīvitahetu api, vijju iva, kiṃsu idha vittaṃ, sādhu iti itīdha parassarānaṃ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:109: Pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṃ pappoti. Caggahaṇaṃ luttadīghaggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ, taṃ “cānukaḍḍhitamuttaratra nānuvattate”ti ñāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:110: Lokassāti, devāti, vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṃsūdha vittaṃ, sādhūti.
anya-e0805n0:111: Kvacīti kiṃ? Yassadāni, itissa, idānipi, tesupi, cakkhundriyaṃ, kinnumāva.
anya-e0805n0:112: Adhigato kho me ayaṃ dhammo, putto te ahaṃ, te assa pahīnā, pabbate ahaṃ, ye assa itīdha pubbalope sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:114_0: Ekārassa padantabhūtassa ṭhāne sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti. Akāremeteyesaddādissevāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:114_1: vidhi, yanti yaṃ rūpaṃ, e eva anto edanto, ādesiṭṭhāne ādissatīti ādeso. “Byañjane”ti
anya-e0805n0:115: Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo, putto tyāhaṃ, tyāssa pahīnā, pabbatyāhaṃ, yyāssa.
anya-e0805n0:116: Kvacīti kiṃ? Te nāgatā, puttā matthi. Antaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Dhammacakkaṃ pavattento, damento cittaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:117_0: Yāvatako assa kāyo, tāvatako assa byāmo, ko attho, atha kho assa, ahaṃ kho ajja,
anya-e0805n0:117_1: yo ayaṃ, so assa, so eva, yato adhikaraṇaṃ, anu addhamāsaṃ, anu eti, su āgataṃ, su
anya-e0805n0:117_2: ākāro, du ākāro, cakkhu āpāthaṃ, bahu ābādho, pātu akāsi, na tu evātīdha –
anya-e0805n0:119: Okārukārānaṃ antabhūtānaṃ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti. Ka kha ya tasaddādiokārassedaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:120_0: Yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo, kvattho, atha khvassa, ahaṃ khvajja, yvāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:120_1: svassa, sveva, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ, anvaddhamāsaṃ, anvebhi, svāgataṃ, svākāro, dvākāro,
anya-e0805n0:121: Kvacīti kiṃ? Ko attho, atha kho aññatarā, yohaṃ, sohaṃ, cattārome, sāgataṃ, sādhāvuso, hotūti. Antaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Savanīyaṃ, viravanti.
anya-e0805n0:122: Paṭisanthāravutti assa, sabbā vitti anubhuyyate, vi añjanaṃ, vi ākato, nadī āsanno itīdha maṇḍūkagatiyā “asarūpe”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:124: Pubbo ivaṇṇo asarūpe sare pare yakāraṃ pappoti navā. I eva vaṇṇo ivaṇṇo, navāsaddo kvacisaddapariyāyo.
anya-e0805n0:125: Paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhuyyate, byañjanaṃ, byākato, nadyāsanno.
anya-e0805n0:126: Navāti kiṃ? Pañcahaṅgehi, tāni attani, gacchāmahaṃ, muttacāgī anuddhato. Asarūpeti kiṃ? Itihidaṃ, aggīva, atthīti.
anya-e0805n0:127: Ati antaṃ, ati odātā, pati ayo, pati āharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti etaṃ, itiādi itīdha “ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā”ti yakārādese sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:130_0: Sabbo tiicceso saddo sare pare kvaci cakāraṃ pappoti. Tīti niddesato akatayakārassevāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:130_1: vidhi, itarathā kvaciggahaṇassa ca “atissa cantassā”tisuttassa ca niratthakatā siyā.
anya-e0805n0:131: Accantaṃ, accodātā, paccayo, paccāharati, pacceti, iccassa, iccetaṃ, iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:133: “Te na vāivaṇṇe”ti ito “na ivaṇṇe”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:135_0: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare “sabbo caṃ tī”ti vuttarūpaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:135_1: Atissāti atiupasaggānukaraṇametaṃ. Tenevettha vibhattilopābhāvo. Ettha ca antasaddo
anya-e0805n0:135_2: saddavidhinisedhappakaraṇato atisaddantabhūtaṃ tisaddameva vadati, na ivaṇṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:137: Ivaṇṇassa sarūpasmiṃ, yādeso ca na sambhave.
anya-e0805n0:138: Cakāro anuttasamuccayattho, tena itipatīnamantassa ca na hoti. Ati isigaṇo atīsigaṇo, evaṃ atīto, atīritaṃ, itīti, itīdaṃ, patīto.
anya-e0805n0:139: Abhi akkhānaṃ, abhi uggato, abhi okāso itīdha yakāre sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:142: Abhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:146: Adhi agamā, adhi upagato, adhi ogāhetvā itīdha
anya-e0805n0:148: Adhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare ajjhādeso hoti. Ajjhagamā, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā.
anya-e0805n0:152: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete upasaggā ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttarūpā na honti vā. Saralopaparanayanāni. Abhicchitaṃ, adhīritaṃ. Vāti kiṃ? Abbhīritaṃ, ajjhiṇamutto, ajjhiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:155: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakāro hoti. Ekasaddato parassa idhassa dhakārassevāyaṃ, saralopadīghā. Ekamidāhaṃ. Kvacīti kiṃ? Idheva.
anya-e0805n0:156: Casaddena kvaci sādhussa dhassa hakāro, yathā – sāhu dassanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:160: Yathātathādvayaparassedaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Dīghasaramhā parassa evasaddādibhūtassa ekārassa rikāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā. Yathariva, tathariva. Navāti kiṃ? Yatheva, tatheva.
anya-e0805n0:161: Ti antaṃ,ti addhaṃ, aggi agāre, sattamī atthe, pañcamī antaṃ, du aṅgikaṃ, bhikkhu āsane, puthu āsane, sayambhū āsane itīdha yavādesesu sampattesu –
anya-e0805n0:164: Ivaṇṇauvaṇṇaiccete yathākkamaṃ jhalasaññā honti. Vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ savaṇṇaggahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:166: Ākhyāte liṅgamajjhe ca, dviliṅgante ca dassanā.
anya-e0805n0:168: Jhalaiccetesaṃ iyauvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n0:169: Tiyantaṃ, tiyaddhaṃ, aggiyāgāre, sattamiyatthe, pañcamiyantaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, bhikkhuvāsane, puthuvāsane, sayambhuvāsane. Vāti kiṃ? Agyāgāre, sattamīatthe, bhikkhuāsane nisīdati.
anya-e0805n0:173: Goiccetassa okārassa sare pare avādeso hoti samāse. Gavājinaṃ, gaveḷakaṃ. Casaddaggahaṇena uvaṇṇassa uvaavādesā. Yathā – bhuvi, pasavo.
anya-e0805n0:176_0: Puthaiccetassa nipātassa ante kvaci gakārāgamo hoti sare pare. Āgacchatīti āgamo,
anya-e0805n0:176_1: asantuppatti āgamo. Ettha ca “sare”ti nimittāsannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati.
anya-e0805n0:180: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti, pāssa anto ca saro rasso hoti. Pageva vutyassa, pā eva.
anya-e0805n0:182: 34. Yava ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0805n0:183: Sare pare yakārādayo aṭṭha āgamā honti vā. Casaddena gakārāgamo ca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:184_0: Tattha yakārāgamo yathādibho ikārekārādīsu. Yathā idaṃ yathayidaṃ, byañjaneti adhikicca
anya-e0805n0:184_1: “rassa”nti rassattaṃ, yathā idaṃ vā, yathā eva, yathāyeva, yatheva, evaṃ māyidaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:184_2: māyevaṃ, taṃyidaṃ, taṃyeva, nayidaṃ, nayimassa, nayimāni, navayime dhammā, buddhānaṃyeva,
anya-e0805n0:184_3: santiyeva, bodhiyāyeva, satiyeva, pathavīyeva, dhātuyeva, tesuyeva, soyeva, pāṭiyekkaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:185_0: Tathā sare vipariyādito ca. Vi añjanā viyañjanā, byañjanā vā, evaṃ viyākāsi, byākāsi.
anya-e0805n0:185_1: Pariantaṃ pariyantaṃ, evaṃ pariyādānaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, pariyesati, pariyosānamiti
anya-e0805n0:185_2: niccaṃ. Ni āyogo niyāyogo. Idha na bhavati, parikkhato, upaparikkhati.
anya-e0805n0:186: Vakāro tisaddādito avaṇṇukāresu. Ti aṅgulaṃ tivaṅgulaṃ, evaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ, bhūvādayo, migī bhantā vudikkhati, pavuccati, pāguññavujutā.
anya-e0805n0:187_0: Makāro lahuppabhutito sare chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. Lahu essati lahumessati, evaṃ garumessati,
anya-e0805n0:187_1: idhamāhu, kena te idha mijjhati, bhadro kasāmiva, ākāse mabhipūjayi, ekamekassa,
anya-e0805n0:188: Dakāro uupasagga saki kenaci kiñci kismiñci koci sammā yāva tāva puna ya te’tattasādīhi. Uupasaggato niccaṃ, u aggo udaggo, evaṃ udayo, udapādi, udāhaṭaṃ, udito, udīritaṃ, udeti.
anya-e0805n0:189_0: Nipātato ca, saki eva sakideva, evaṃ sakadāgāmi, mahāvuttisuttena ikārassa akāro.
anya-e0805n0:189_1: Tathā kenacideva, kiñcideva, kismiñcideva, kocideva, sammā attho sammadattho, rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:189_2: Evaṃ sammadakkhāto, sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, sammadeva, yāvadatthaṃ, yāvadeva, tāvadeva, punadeva.
anya-e0805n0:190: Nāmato, yadatthaṃ, tadatthaṃ, yadantarā, tadantarā, tadaṅgavimutti, etadatthaṃ, attadatthaṃ, sadatthapasuto siyā. Yatetattasehi samāseyeva.
anya-e0805n0:191: Ādisaddena aññadatthaṃ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, bahudeva rattiṃ, ahudeva bhayaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:192: Vāti kiṃ? Kenaci atthakāmena, sammā aññāya, yāvāhaṃ, tāvāhaṃ, punāparaṃ, attatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:193: Nakāro āyatādimhi. Ito āyati ito nāyati, ciraṃ nāyati.
anya-e0805n0:194: Takāro yasmā tasmā ajjādito ihaggādimhi. Yasmātiha, tasmātiha, ajjatagge.
anya-e0805n0:195_0: Rakāro ni dupātu puna dhī pāta caturādito. Ni antaraṃ nirantaraṃ, evaṃ nirālayo,
anya-e0805n0:195_1: nirindhano, nirīhakaṃ, niruttaro, nirojaṃ. Du atikkamo duratikkamo, durāgataṃ, duruttaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:195_2: Pāturahosi, pāturahesuṃ. Punarāgaccheyya, punaruttaṃ, punareva, punareti. Dhiratthu. Pātarāso.
anya-e0805n0:196: Catusaddādito, caturaṅgikaṃ, caturārakkhā, caturiddhipādapaṭilābho, caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ. Bhatturatthe, vuttiresā, pathavīdhāturevesā.
anya-e0805n0:197: Tathā sarato ivevesu chandānurakkhaṇe. Nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ, vijjurivabbhakūṭe, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āragge, usabhoriva, sabbhireva samāsetha.
anya-e0805n0:199: Lakāro chasaṅkhyāhi. Laḷānamaviseso. Cha abhiññā chaḷabhiññā, chaḷaṅgaṃ, chaḷāsīti, chaḷaṃsā, saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:207: Itthiyaṃ vattamānā akārantato liṅgamhā paro āppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:210_2: nāmaṃ vā’tavetunādīsu cā”ti ettha vaggahaṇena itthippaccayantassāpi nāmabyapadeso.
anya-e0805n0:210_3: Pure viya syādyuppatti, “sesato lopaṃ gasipī”ti silopo. Sā kaññā.
anya-e0805n0:211: Bahuvacane “ālapane si gasañño”ti ito “sañño”, “te itthikhyā po”ti ito “itthikhyā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:213: Liṅgassanto ākāro yadā itthikhyo, tadā ghasañño hotīti ghasaññāyaṃ “ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo”ti vikappena yolopo. Tā kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n0:216: Ghato parassa gassa ekāro hoti, saralopādi. Bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n0:218: Tatiyādīsu “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti ito “āyo, ekavacanāna”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:220_0: Ghasaññato liṅgassākārā paresaṃ nādīnaṃ smiṃpariyantānaṃ ekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:220_1: āyādeso hoti. Saralopaparanayanāni. Kaññāya, kaññāhi kaññābhi, kaññāya, kaññānaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:223: Ghapato parassa smiṃvacanassa yaṃ hoti vā, aññatthāyādeso. Kaññāyaṃ kaññāya, kaññāsu.
anya-e0805n0:225: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā;
anya-e0805n0:226: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0805n0:231: Pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasiṇā pajā;
anya-e0805n0:232: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0805n0:234: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, vacā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0805n0:235: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā;
anya-e0805n0:236: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṃsapā papā.
anya-e0805n0:242: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0805n0:243: Ammādīnaṃ ālapaneva rūpabhedo. Ammā, ammā ammāyo.
anya-e0805n0:246: Ammā annāiccevamādito parassa gassa ālapanekavacanassa na ekārattaṃ hoti. “Ākāro vā”ti rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:247_0: Bhoti amma bhoti ammā, bhotiyo ammā ammāyo. Evaṃ annā, annā annāyo, bhoti anna bhoti
anya-e0805n0:247_1: annā, bhotiyo annā annāyo. Ambā, ambā ambāyo, bhoti amba bhoti ambā, bhotiyo ambā ambāyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:253_0: Itthiyā ākhyā saññā itthikhyā, liṅgassantā te ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā yadā itthikhyā, tadā pasaññā
anya-e0805n0:253_1: hontīti pasaññāyaṃ “ghapato cā”tiādinā yolopo, “yosu kata”iccādinā dīgho. Rattī rattiyo
anya-e0805n0:253_2: ratyo vā, he ratti, he rattī he rattiyo.
anya-e0805n0:257: Pasaññato ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi paresaṃ nādīnamekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ yāādeso hoti. Rattiyā, rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṃ rattinaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:260: Paiccetasmā paresaṃ smiṃ smāiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ aṃ āādesā honti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, tena uvaṇṇantato na honti, ivaṇṇantatopi yathāpayogaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:263_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa yovacanekavacanavibhattīnamādese sare pare yakāro hoti. Ettha
anya-e0805n0:263_1: ca yakārassevādhikārato pasaññaggahaṇena ivaṇṇova gayhati, caggahaṇaṃ “ratto”tiādīsu
anya-e0805n0:263_2: nivattanatthaṃ. Ratyā rattiyā, rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:263_3: rattinaṃ. Smiṃvacane amādesayakārādesā, ratyaṃ. “Ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā”ti yaṃādeso, rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:266: Ādiiccetasmā smiṃvacanassa aṃ oādesā honti vā. Casaddena aññasmāpi ā aṃ oādesā. Ratyā rattiṃ ratto rattiyā, rattīsu rattisu.
anya-e0805n0:268: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti;
anya-e0805n0:269: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0805n0:270: Bhūmi jāti pīti sūti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi;
anya-e0805n0:271: Diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi;
anya-e0805n0:272: Sati mati gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati.
anya-e0805n0:273: Rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli dundubhi doṇi aṭavi chavi ādīni ikārantanāmāni.
anya-e0805n0:278: Nadādito vā anadādito vā itthiyaṃ vattamānā liṅgamhā īppaccayo hoti. Vāggahaṇamanadādisampiṇḍanatthaṃ, tena puthugavādito ca ī.
anya-e0805n0:279_0: Saralope “kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte”ti asavaṇṇe sampatte pakatibhāvo nāmabyapadeso, syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n0:279_1: Itthī, itthī “agho rassa”ntiādinā rassattaṃ, itthiyo. Sambodhane “jhalapā rassa”nti
anya-e0805n0:279_2: rassattaṃ. Bhoti itthi, bhotiyo itthī itthiyo.
anya-e0805n0:280: Dutiyekavacane “ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā”ti ito “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:282_0: Pasaññato īkārato parassa aṃvacanassa yaṃ hoti vā. Itthiyaṃ itthiṃ, itthī itthiyo,
anya-e0805n0:282_1: itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā, itthīnaṃ, itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā,
anya-e0805n0:283_0: Evaṃ nadī, nadī. Yolopābhāve “tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tusaddena yonamokāro ca, “pasaññassa
anya-e0805n0:283_1: cā”ti īkārassa yakāro, “yavataṃ talana”iccādinā dyassa jakāro, dvittaṃ. Najjo sandanti, nadiyo.
anya-e0805n0:284: Ettha cevaṃ sijjhantānaṃ najjoādīnaṃ vuttiyaṃ ānattaggahaṇādinā nipphādanaṃ atraja sugatādīnaṃ viya nipphādanūpāyantaradassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:285: He nadi, he nadī he najjo he nadiyo, nadiyaṃ nadiṃ, nadī najjo nadiyo.
anya-e0805n0:286: Amādisutte ā patoti yogavibhāgena kvaci nāsānañcāttaṃ, tena na jaccā vasalo hoti, pathabyā ekarajjenāti ādi ca sijjhati, pure viya yakārajakārādesadvittāni.
anya-e0805n0:287: Najjā kataṃ nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṃ, najjā nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṃ, najjaṃ nadiyaṃ nadiyā, nadīsu.
anya-e0805n0:289: Mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī;
anya-e0805n0:290: Nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī.
anya-e0805n0:291: Gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī;
anya-e0805n0:292: Vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṃsī kākī ca kukkuṭī –
anya-e0805n0:296: Mātula ayyakavaruṇaiccevamādīnamanto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare, antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, saralopādi. Mātulānī, evaṃ ayyakānī, varuṇānī, sesaṃ itthīsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:297_0: Anadādīsu puthusaddato īppaccayo. “O sare cā”ti ettha casaddena ukārassa avādeso.
anya-e0805n0:297_1: Puthavī, puthaviyo. Sasmā smiṃsu puthabyā puthaviyā, puthabyā puthaviyā, puthabyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:298: Gosaddato “nadādito vā ī”ti īppaccayo. Mahāvuttinā vā “gāva se”ti ettha gāvaiti yogavibhāgena vā okārassa āvādeso. Gāvī, gāvī gāviyo iccādi itthīsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:301: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇantuppaccayantehi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi īppaccayo hoti. Vādhikāro katthaci nivattanattho, saralopādi. Mānavī, evaṃ nāvikī, venateyyī, gotamī.
anya-e0805n0:304: Sabbasseva ntuppaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkārappaccaye pare, aññattha saralopādi. Guṇavatī, guṇavatī guṇavatiyo, guṇavantī, guṇavantī guṇavantiyo iccādi itthīsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:305: Evaṃ kulavatī, sīlavatī, yasavatī, rūpavatī, satimatī, gottamatī.
anya-e0805n0:306: Mahantasaddato “nadādito vā ī”ti īppaccayo, ntubyapadeso vikappena takārādeso. Mahatī mahantī.
anya-e0805n0:309: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare. Sā bhotī, bhotī bhotiyo, he bhoti, he bhotī bhotiyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:312: Pati bhikkhu rāja iccetehi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi inīppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:313: “Saralopo’mādesa”iccādisutte tuggahaṇena kvaci pubbalopassa nisedhanato “vā paro asarūpā”ti saralopo. Bhikkhunī, bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:316: Patisaddassa anto attamāpajjate inīppaccaye pare. Tatheva parasare lutte “pubbo cā”ti dīgho, gahapatānī.
anya-e0805n0:317: Tatheva rājasaddato inī, saralopapakatibhāvā, rājinī. Īkārantesu daṇḍīsaddato inī, saralopādi, daṇḍinī, daṇḍinī daṇḍiniyo, evaṃ hatthinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī, piyabhāṇinī iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:318_1: pokkharaṇī. “Tato yonamo tū”ti sutte tuggahaṇena yonamokāro ca, īkārassa yakāro,
anya-e0805n0:318_2: “yavata”miccādisutte kāraggahaṇena ṇyassa ñakāro, dvittaṃ. Pokkharañño pokkharaṇiyo vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:319: Vādhikāro anuttasamuccayattho, tena vidū yakkhāditopi inī, paracittavidunī, saraloparassattāni, paracittavidunī paracittaviduniyo, yakkhinī yakkhiniyo, sīhinī sīhiniyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:323_0: Yāgu, yāgū yāguyo, he yāgu, he yāgū yāguyo, yāguṃ, yāgū yāguyo, yāguyā, yāgūhi yāgūbhi
anya-e0805n0:323_1: yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ yāgunaṃ, yāguyā, yāgūhi yāgūbhi yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā,
anya-e0805n0:323_2: yāgūnaṃ yāgunaṃ, yāguyaṃ yāguyā, yāgūsu yāgusu.
anya-e0805n0:324: Evaṃ dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kacchu kaṇḍu rajju kareṇu piyaṅgu sassuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:325: Mātusaddassa bhedo. Tassa pitusaddasseva rūpanayo. “Āratta”miti bhāvaniddesena ārādesābhāve “pato yā”ti yādesova viseso.
anya-e0805n0:326_0: Mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṃ, mātare mātaro, mātarā
anya-e0805n0:326_1: mātuyā matyā, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ukāralopo, rassattañca. Mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi
anya-e0805n0:326_2: mātūbhi mātuhi mātubhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā, mātarānaṃ mātānaṃ mātūnaṃ mātunaṃ, mātarā
anya-e0805n0:326_3: mātuyā, mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā, mātarānaṃ mātānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:326_4: mātūnaṃ mātunaṃ, mātari, mātaresu mātūsu mātusu.
anya-e0805n0:327: Evaṃ dhītā, dhītaro, duhitā, duhitaro iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:330: Jambū, jambū jambuyo, he jambu, he jambū jambuyo, jambuṃ, jambū jambuyo iccādi itthīsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:331: Evaṃ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0805n0:336: Kaññā ratti nadī itthī, mātulānī ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0805n0:337: Daṇḍinī yāgu mātā ca, jambū gotitthisaṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:345: Si, aṃiti dvipadamidaṃ. Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi parassa sivacanassa aṃ hoti niccaṃ. Saralopapakatibhāvādi, cittaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:348: Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi yonaṃ niccaṃ ni hoti. “Sabbayonīnamāe”ti nissa vā ākāro. Aññattha “yosu kata”iccādinā dīgho. Cittā cittāni.
anya-e0805n0:351: Ālapane galopo. He citta, he cittā cittāni, dutiyāyaṃ nissa vikappenekāro. Cittaṃ, citte cittāni. Sesaṃ purisasaddena samaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:367: Kammaṃ, kammā kammāni, he kamma, he kammā kammāni, kammaṃ, kamme kammāni.
anya-e0805n0:370_0: Kammasaddantassa ukāra akārādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi. Antaggahaṇena thāmaddhādīnamantassapi
anya-e0805n0:370_1: uttaṃ. Casaddaggahaṇena yuva maghavānamantassa ā hoti kvaci nā suiccetesu. Kammunā
anya-e0805n0:371_0: Sasmāsu “u nāmhi cā”ti ettha casaddena puma kammathāmantassa cukāro vā sasmāsūti
anya-e0805n0:371_1: uttaṃ. Kammuno kammassa, kammānaṃ, kammunā kammā kammamhā kammasmā, kammehi kammebhi,
anya-e0805n0:372: Smiṃvacane “brahmato tu smiṃnī”ti ettha tusaddena kvaci ni hoti. Kammani kamme kammamhi kammasmiṃ, kammesu.
anya-e0805n0:373: Evaṃ thāmunā thāmena thāmasā vā, thāmuno thāmassa, thāmunā thāmā. Addhunā, addhuno iccādi purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:374: Guṇavantu si, “savibhattissa, ntussa, simhī”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:376: Napuṃsake vattamānassa liṅgassa sambandhino ntuppaccayassa savibhattissa aṃ hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavaṃ cittaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:377: Yomhi “ntussanto yosu cā”ti attaṃ, ikāro ca. Guṇavanti, guṇavantāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:378: Gacchanta si, “simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo a”miti aṃ. Gacchaṃ gacchantaṃ, gacchantā gacchantāni.
anya-e0805n0:382: “Samāsassā”ti adhikicca “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti samāsantassa rassattaṃ, samāsattā nāmabyapadeso, syādyuppatti. Sesaṃ cittasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:383: Assaddhaṃ kulaṃ, assaddhā assaddhāni kulāni iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:384: Tathā mukhanāsikāsaddo. Tassa dvandekattā sabbatthekavacanameva. Mukhanāsikaṃ, he mukhanāsika, mukhanāsikaṃ, mukhanāsikena iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:390: Napuṃsakaliṅgehi paresaṃ sabbesaṃ yonaṃ ni hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:391: Aṭṭhīni, aññattha niccaṃ yolopo, dīgho ca, aṭṭhī, tathā he aṭṭhi, he aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhiṃ, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhinā iccādi aggisaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:392: Evaṃ satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi acci iccādīni.
anya-e0805n0:395_0: “Sukhabhārī si” itīdha anapuṃsakattābhāvā sismimpi “agho rassa”miccādinā rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:395_1: silopo. Sukhakāri dānaṃ, sukhakārī sukhakārīni, he sukhakāri, he sukhakārī he sukhakārīni,
anya-e0805n0:398: Ukāranto napuṃsakaliṅgo āyusaddo. Tassa aṭṭhisaddasseva rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n0:399: Āyu, āyū āyūni, he āyu, he āyū he āyūni, āyuṃ, āyū āyūni, āyunā āyusāti manogaṇādittā siddhaṃ. Āyūhi āyūbhi, āyuno āyussa, āyūnamiccādi.
anya-e0805n0:400: Evaṃ cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu hiṅgu siggu vatthu matthu jatu ambu assuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:403_0: Gotrabhū si, napuṃsakattā rassattaṃ, silopo. Gotrabhu cittaṃ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni,
anya-e0805n0:403_1: he gotrabhu, he gotrabhū he gotrabhūni, gotrabhuṃ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni, gotrabhunā
anya-e0805n0:407_0: “Cittā gāvo assa kulassā”ti atthe bahubbīhisamāse kate “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti okārassa
anya-e0805n0:407_1: ṭhānappayatanāsannattā rassattamukāro, syādyuppatti, silopo. Cittagu kulaṃ, cittagū
anya-e0805n0:414_0: Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara,
anya-e0805n0:414_1: dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, eka, ubha, dvi, ti, catu, tumha,
anya-e0805n0:414_2: amha iti sattavīsati sabbanāmāni, tāni sabbanāmattā tiliṅgāni.
anya-e0805n0:415: Tattha sabbasaddo niravasesattho, so yadā pulliṅgavisiṭṭhatthābhidhāyī, tadā rūpanayo. Pure viya syādyuppatti, “so”ti sissa okāro, saralopaparanayanāni. Sabbo jano.
anya-e0805n0:416: Bahuvacane “sabba yo” itīdha “parasamaññā payoge”ti sabbādīnaṃ sabbanāmasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:419: Sabbesaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ nāmāni sabbanāmāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sabbanāmasaññānaṃ liṅgānaṃ akārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate. Sabbe purisā.
anya-e0805n0:421: He sabba sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṃ, sabbe, sabbena, sabbehi sabbebhi.
anya-e0805n0:423: “Ato, ā e, smāsmiṃnaṃ, āya catutthekavacanassā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:425_0: Akārantehi sabbanāmehi paresaṃ smā smiṃ iccetesaṃ, catutthekavacanassa ca ā e āyaiccete
anya-e0805n0:425_1: ādesā neva hontīti āyādesābhāvo. Caggahaṇaṃ katthaci paṭisedhanivattanatthaṃ, tena
anya-e0805n0:425_2: pubbādīhi smā smiṃnaṃ ā e ca honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0805n0:428: Sabbesaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ akāro ettamāpajjate naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:431: Sabbato sabbanāmato parassa naṃvacanassa saṃ sānaṃiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n0:432: Sabbesaṃ sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmā sabbamhā, sabbehi sabbebhi, sabbassa, sabbesaṃ sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmiṃ sabbamhi, sabbesu.
anya-e0805n0:433_0: Itthiyaṃ “itthiyamato āppaccayo”ti āppaccayo. Aññaṃ kaññāsaddasamaṃ aññatra sa naṃ
anya-e0805n0:433_1: smiṃvacanehi. Sabbā pajā, sabbā sabbāyo, he sabbe, he sabbā sabbāyo, sabbaṃ, sabbā
anya-e0805n0:434: Catutthekavacane “sabbanāmato vā”, sabbato koti ito “sabbato”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:436: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṃ saiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ saṃsāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:439: Ghasañño ākāro rassamāpajjate saṃsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu paresu.
anya-e0805n0:442: Saṃ sāiccetesu ekavacanaṭṭhānasambhūtesu vibhattādesesu paresu liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:443: Sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṃ sabbāsānaṃ, sabbāya, sabbāhi sabbābhi, sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṃ sabbāsānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:446: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi parassa smiṃvacanassa neva āya yādesā hontīti āyābhāvo. Vādhikārato kvaci hoti dakkhiṇāya uttarāyāti ādi.
anya-e0805n0:448: Napuṃsake sabbaṃ cittaṃ, sabbāni, he sabba, he sabbāni, sabbaṃ, sabbāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:449: Evaṃ katarādīnaṃ aññatamasaddapariyantānaṃ tīsupi liṅgesu rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n0:457: Dvandasamāsaṭṭhā sabbanāmakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate vā. Kataro ca katamo cāti katarakatame, katarakatamā vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:459: Pubbo kālo. Bahuvacane “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti ettha parāti niddesato pubbādīhi yovacanassa vikappenekāro.
anya-e0805n0:460_0: Pubbe pubbā, he pubba, he pubbe he pubbā, pubbaṃ, pubbe, pubbena, pubbehi pubbebhi,
anya-e0805n0:460_1: pubbassa, pubbesaṃ pubbesānaṃ. “Smāsmiṃnaṃ vā”ti vikappenākārekārā. Pubbā pubbasmā
anya-e0805n0:460_2: pubbamhā, pubbehi pubbebhi, pubbassa, pubbesaṃ pubbesānaṃ, pubbe pubbasmiṃ pubbamhi, pubbesu.
anya-e0805n0:461: Itthiyaṃ pubbā disā, pubbā pubbāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:462: Napuṃsake pubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pubbāni, he pubba, he pubbāni, pubbaṃ, pubbāni, sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ. Evaṃ parāparadakkhiṇuttarādharasaddā.
anya-e0805n0:465_0: Dvandaṭṭhā sabbanāmato parassa yovacanassa ṭhapetvā ettaṃ aññaṃ sabbanāmikaṃ kāriyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:465_1: na hotīti saṃsānamādesābhāvo. Pubbāparānaṃ, pubbuttarānaṃ adharuttarānaṃ, “nāññaṃ
anya-e0805n0:465_2: sabbanāmika”nti vinādhikārena yogena tatiyāsamāsepi. Māsapubbāya, māsapubbānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:468: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmikavidhānaṃ nāññaṃ hoti. Piyapubbāya, piyapubbānaṃ, piyapubbe.
anya-e0805n0:470: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷanti atthe bahubbīhi, dakkhiṇapubbassaṃ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, evaṃ uttarapubbassaṃ, uttarapubbassā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:471: Yatetasaddādīnamālapane rūpaṃ na sambhavati. Yasaddo aniyamattho.
anya-e0805n0:472: Yo puriso, ye purisā, yaṃ, ye. Yā kaññā, yā yāyo, yaṃ, yā yāyo. Yaṃ cittaṃ, yāni, yaṃ, yāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha sabbasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:473: Ta eta ima amu kiṃiccete parammukha samīpa accantasamīpadūra pucchanatthavacanā.
anya-e0805n0:477: Eta taiccetesaṃ anapuṃsakānaṃ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi. So puriso.
anya-e0805n0:480: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṃ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu. Ne te, naṃ taṃ, ne te, nena tena, nehi nebhi tehi tebhi.
anya-e0805n0:483: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sa smā smiṃ saṃ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu. Assa nassa tassa, nesaṃ tesaṃ nesānaṃ tesānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:484: “Smāhismiṃnaṃ mhābhimhi vā”ti ito “smāsmiṃnaṃ, mhāmhī”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:486: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi paresaṃ smāsmiṃnaṃ mhā mhiiccete ādesā na honti.
anya-e0805n0:488: Atha sarānameva sandhikāriye sampatte pakatibhāvo vuccate.
anya-e0805n0:491: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedāsukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne, sandhicchārahitaṭṭhāne ca pakatirūpāni honti, na lopādesavikāramāpajjanteti attho.
anya-e0805n0:492: Tattha pakatiṭṭhānaṃ nāma ālapanantā anitismiṃ acchandānurakkhaṇe asamāse padantadīghā ca ikārukārā ca nāmapadantātītakriyādimhīti evamādi.
anya-e0805n0:493_0: Ālapanantesu tāva – katamā cānanda aniccasaññā, katamā cānanda ādīnavasaññā, sāriputta
anya-e0805n0:493_1: idhekacco, ehi sivika uṭṭhehi, upāsakā idhekacco, bhoti ayye, bhikkhu arogaṃ tava
anya-e0805n0:493_2: sīlaṃ, siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, bhikkhave evaṃ vadāmi, pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā
anya-e0805n0:494: Kvaciggahaṇena itismiṃ chandānurakkhaṇe sandhi hoti, yathā – sakkā devīti, namo te buddha vīratthu.
anya-e0805n0:495: Sareti kiṃ? Sādhu mahārājāti, evaṃ kira bhikkhūti.
anya-e0805n0:496_0: Asamāse padantadīghesu – āyasmā ānando gāthā ajjhabhāsi, devā ābhassarā yathā, tevijjā
anya-e0805n0:496_1: iddhippattā ca, bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā, bhagavā etadavoca, abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0805n0:496_2: gantvā olokento, bhūtavādī atthavādī, yaṃ itthī arahā assa, sāmāvatī āha, pāpakārī
anya-e0805n0:496_3: ubhayattha tappati, nadī ottharati, ye te bhikkhū appicchā, bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhūujjhāyiṃsu,
anya-e0805n0:496_4: bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu, imasmiṃ gāme ārakkhakā, sabbe ime, katame ekādasa, gambhīre odakantike,
anya-e0805n0:496_5: appamādo amatapadaṃ, saṅgho āgacchatu, ko imaṃ pathaviṃ viccessati, āloko udapādi,
anya-e0805n0:497: Nipātesupi – are ahampi, sace imassa kāyassa, no abhikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho āyasmā, atho oṭṭhavacittakā, tato āmantayī satthā.
anya-e0805n0:498_0: Kvaciggahaṇena akāra itīvevetthādīsu sandhipi. Yathā – āgatattha, āgatamhā, katamāssu
anya-e0805n0:498_1: cattāro, appassutāyaṃ puriso, itthīti, ca marīva, sabbeva, sveva, eseva nayo, parisuddhetthāyasmanto,
anya-e0805n0:498_2: nettha, taṃ kutettha labbhā, sacesa brāhmaṇa, tathūpamaṃ, yathāha.
anya-e0805n0:499: Asamāseti kiṃ? Jivhāyatanaṃ, avijjogho, itthindriyaṃ, abhibhāyatanaṃ, bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ. Acchandānurakkhaṇeti kiṃ? Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, yo missaro.
anya-e0805n0:500: Nāmapadantaikārukāresu – gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi, pupphāni āhariṃsu, satthu adāsi.
anya-e0805n0:503_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpā hontīti yebhuyyena dīgharassalopehi vikārābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:503_1: Yathā – accayo, paccayo, bhāsati vā karoti vā, vedanākkhandho, bhāgyavā, bhadro kasāmiva,
anya-e0805n0:509: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṃ pappontīti suttasukhuccāraṇachandānurakkhaṇaṭṭhānesu dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:510_0: Tyassa pahīnā tyāssa pahīnā, svassa svāssa, madhuva maññati bālo madhuvā maññatī
anya-e0805n0:510_1: bālo, tathā evaṃ gāme munī care, khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, na maṅkū bhavissāmi,
anya-e0805n0:510_2: svākkhāto, yvāhaṃ, kāmato jāyatī soko, kāmato jāyatī bhayaṃ, sakko ujū ca suhujū
anya-e0805n0:510_3: ca, anūpaghāto, dūrakkhaṃ, dūramaṃ, sūrakkhaṃ, dūharatā.
anya-e0805n0:512: Yiṭṭhaṃ vā hutaṃ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake, puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:515: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṃ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:516: Chandānurakkhaṇe tāva yiṭṭhaṃva hutaṃva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
anya-e0805n0:518: Saṃyoge parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṃ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:519: Kvacīti kiṃ? Māyidaṃ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ākhyātikaṃ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
anya-e0805n0:520: Eso kho byantiṃ kāhiti, so gacchaṃ na nivattati iccatra –
anya-e0805n0:523: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ papponti, tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo ca hoti. Etatasaddantokārassevāyaṃ lopo.
anya-e0805n0:524: Esa kho byantiṃ kāhiti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati, evaṃ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:525: Kvacīti kiṃ? Eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:526: Casaddena etasaddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. Yathā – esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
anya-e0805n0:529: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. Dvinnaṃ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:530_0: Ettha ca ṭhānaṃ nāma rassākārato paraṃ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi
anya-e0805n0:530_1: su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṃ dvebhāvaṃ, tika taya tiṃsa vatādīnamādi ca,
anya-e0805n0:530_2: vatu vaṭudisādīnamantañca, u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha santasaddādesādiparañca,
anya-e0805n0:533: Chandānurakkhaṇe ca – ghara jhe dhaṃsu bhamādīnamādi ca, rassākārato vaggānaṃ catutthadutiyā ca iccevamādi.
anya-e0805n0:534_0: Tattha pa pati paṭīsu tāva – idha pamādo idhappamādo, evaṃ appamādo, vippayutto,
anya-e0805n0:534_1: suppasanno, sammā padhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ, rassattaṃ, appativattiyo, adhipatippaccayo,
anya-e0805n0:535: Kamādidhātūsu – pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṃ parakkamati, yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:539: Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
anya-e0805n0:541: Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
anya-e0805n0:547: Avissajjento, vissajjento, pariccajanto, upaddavo, upakkiliṭṭho, mittaddu, āyabbayo, udabbahi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:548: Saramhāti kiṃ? Sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṃ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:549: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Mā ca pamādo, patigayhati, vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya, ye pamattā yathā matā, manopakopaṃ rakkheyya, idha modati, pecca modati.
anya-e0805n0:550_0: Tikādīsu – kusalattikaṃ, pītittikaṃ, hetuttikaṃ, vedanāttikaṃ, lokattayaṃ, bodhittayaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:550_1: vatthuttayaṃ. Ekattiṃsa, dvattiṃsa, catuttiṃsa. Sīlabbataṃ, subbato, sappītiko, samannāgato, punappunaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:551: Vatu vaṭu disādīnamante yathā – vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṃ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:552: U du ni upasaggādiparesu – ukaṃso ukkaṃso. Dukaraṃ dukkaraṃ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
anya-e0805n0:553: Evaṃ uggataṃ, duccaritaṃ, nijjaṭaṃ, uññātaṃ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
anya-e0805n0:554: Tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
anya-e0805n0:558: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Nikāyo, nidānaṃ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:559: Yakārādimhi – nīyyati, sūyyati, abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṃ, neyyaṃ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo.
anya-e0805n0:563: Yavatamādese – jāti andho, vipali āso, ani āyo, yadi evaṃ, api ekacce, api ekadā iccatra, ikārassa “ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā”ti yakāre kate –
anya-e0805n0:564: “Sabbassa so dāmhi vā”ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:566: Yakāravantānaṃ talanadakārānaṃ saṃyogabyañjanāni yathākkamaṃ calañajakārattamāpajjante vā.
anya-e0805n0:567: Kāraggahaṇaṃ yavataṃ sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesatthaṃ, tathā yavataṃ ta dha ṇakārānaṃ cha jhañakārādesatthañca, tato yavatamādesassa anena dvibhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:568: Jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṃ, appekacce appekadā.
anya-e0805n0:572: Chandānurakkhaṇe – nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇaṃ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
anya-e0805n0:573: Vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṃyevādhikāre “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:576: Saramhā parabhūtānaṃ vagge ghosāghosānaṃ byañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṃ gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.
anya-e0805n0:577_0: Ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ghosāghosaggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā, itarathā
anya-e0805n0:577_1: aniṭṭhappasaṅgosiyā. Tena “kataññū, tannayo, tammayo”tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṃ satipi
anya-e0805n0:578_0: Gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu tāva – pagharati paggharati, evaṃ uggharati,
anya-e0805n0:578_1: ugghāṭeti, dugghoso, nigghoso, eseva cajjhānaphalo, paṭhamajjhānaṃ, abhijjhāyati,
anya-e0805n0:578_2: ujjhāyati, viddhaṃseti, uddhaṃsito, uddhāro, niddhāro, niddhano, niddhuto, vibbhanto,
anya-e0805n0:578_3: ubbhato, dubbhikkhaṃ, nibbhayaṃ, tabbhāvo, catuddhā, cabhubbhi, chaddhā, saddhammo,
anya-e0805n0:579: Yavata mādesādīsu – bojjhaṅgā, āsabbhaṃ, bujjhitabbaṃ, bujjhati.
anya-e0805n0:580: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṃ, mahādhanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:581_0: Rassākāratoparaṃ vaggadutiyesu – pañca khandhā pañcakkhandhā, evaṃrūpakkhandho, akkhamo,
anya-e0805n0:581_1: abhikkhaṇaṃ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṃ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo. Setachattaṃ setacchattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:581_2: evaṃ sabbacchannaṃ, vicchinnaṃ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo. Tatra ṭhito
anya-e0805n0:581_3: tatraṭṭhito, evaṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ, jalaṭṭhaṃ, adhiṭṭhitaṃ, niṭṭhitaṃ, cattāriṭṭhānāni,
anya-e0805n0:581_4: garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito, suppaṭṭhāno. Yasatthero, yattha, tattha, pattharati, vitthāro,
anya-e0805n0:581_5: abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṃ, catuttho, kuttha. Papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:582: Ākārato – ākhāto ākkhāto, evaṃ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṃ, saññākkhandho, āchādayati, ācchādayati, evaṃ ācchindati, nāvāṭṭhaṃ, āttharati, āpphoṭeti.
anya-e0805n0:583: Saramhāti kiṃ? Saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṃ, taṇṭhānaṃ, santhuto, tamphalaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:584: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Pūvakhajjakaṃ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṃ, kathaṃ, kammaphalaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:585: Nikamati, nipatti, nicayo, nicarati, nitaraṇaṃ iccatra – “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena caggahaṇena yathāpayogaṃ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
anya-e0805n0:586: Yathā – ni upasaggato kamu pada ci cara tarānaṃ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṃ, nikkhamati, nipphatti, nicchayo, niccharati, nittharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:587_0: Tathā bo vassa kuva diva siva vajādīnaṃ dvirūpassāti vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:587_1: yathā – kubbanto, evaṃ kubbāno, kubbanti, sadhātvantayādesassa dvittaṃ. Divati dibbati,
anya-e0805n0:587_2: evaṃ dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati, pabbajanto, nivānaṃ nibbānaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:588: Lo rassa pari taruṇādīnaṃ kvaci. Paripanno palipanno, evaṃ palibodho, pallaṅkaṃ, taruṇo taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo.
anya-e0805n0:589: Ṭo tassa dukkatādīnaṃ kvaci. Yathā – dukkataṃ dukkaṭaṃ, evaṃ sukaṭaṃ, pahaṭo, patthaṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:590: Ko tassa niyatādīnaṃ kvaci. Niyato niyako.
anya-e0805n0:591: Yo jassa nijādissa vā, nijaṃputtaṃ niyaṃputtaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:593: Tathā ṇo nassa pa pariādito. Panidhānaṃ paṇidhānaṃ, evaṃ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, ninnayo niṇṇayo, evaṃ uṇṇato, oṇato iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:596: Patiiccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. Paṭaggi, paṭihaññati.
anya-e0805n0:600: Puthaiccetassa anto saro ukāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṃ. Puthujjano, puthubhūtaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:601: Byañjaneti kiṃ? Putha ayaṃ. “Puthassa a putha”iti samāseneva siddhe puna antaggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṃ sare.
anya-e0805n0:602: Mano aññaṃ manuññaṃ, evaṃ imaṃ evumaṃ, paralopo, iti evaṃ itvevaṃ, ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n0:606: Avaiccetassa upasaggassa okāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. Okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:612: Avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0805n0:613: Tassa viparīto tabbiparīto, upoccāritaṃ padaṃ upapadaṃ, okāraviparītoti ukārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Casaddo katthaci nivattanattho, dvittaṃ. Uggate sūriye, uggacchati, uggahetvā.
anya-e0805n0:617: Byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti atippa parasaddehi okārāgamo “yavamada”iccādisutte casaddena atippato gakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n0:618: Atippago kho tāva, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, ettha “sarā sare lopa”nti pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0805n0:622: Manomayaṃ, ayomayaṃ, evaṃ manoseṭṭhā, ayopatto, tapodhano, tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasiṇaṃ, rajojallaṃ, ahorattaṃ, rahogato.
anya-e0805n0:624: Sīhagatiyā vādhikārato idha na bhavati, manamattena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ, ayakapallaṃ, tamavinodano, manaāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:628: Taṇhaṃ karo, raṇaṃ jaho, saṃ ṭhito, jutiṃ dharo, saṃ mato itīdha “niggahīta”nti adhikāro, “byañjane”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:630_0: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:630_1: ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena “taṇhaṅkaro,
anya-e0805n0:631_0: Taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, taṅkhaṇaṃ taṃkhaṇaṃ, saṅgaho saṃgaho, taṅghataṃ taṃ ghataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:631_1: Dhammañcare dhammaṃ care, tañchannaṃ taṃ channaṃ, tañjātaṃ taṃ jātaṃ, taññāṇaṃ taṃ
anya-e0805n0:631_2: ñāṇaṃ. Taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṇḍahati bhaṃ ḍahati. Tantanoti taṃ tanoti, tanthiraṃ
anya-e0805n0:631_3: taṃ thiraṃ, tandānaṃ taṃ dānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tanniccutaṃ taṃ niccutaṃ. Tampatto
anya-e0805n0:631_4: taṃ patto, tamphalaṃ taṃ phalaṃ, tesambodho tesaṃ bodho, sambhūto saṃbhūto, tammittaṃ
anya-e0805n0:631_5: taṃ mittaṃ. Kiṅkato kiṃ kato, dātuṅgato dātuṃ gatoti evamādīsu vikappena.
anya-e0805n0:632: Idha na bhavati, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
anya-e0805n0:633_0: Sati copari vāggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:633_1: tena niggahītassa saṃupasaggapumantassa le lakāro. Yathā – paṭisaṃlīno paṭisallīno,
anya-e0805n0:633_2: evaṃ paṭisallāṇo, sallakkhaṇā, sallekho, sallāpo, puṃliṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:634: Paccattaṃ eva, taṃ eva, tañhi tassa, evañhi vo itīdha “vā”ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n0:636: Ekārahakāre pare niggahītaṃ kho ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ekāre ñādesassa dvibhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:637: Paccattaññevapaccattaṃ eva, taññeva taṃ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
anya-e0805n0:638: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vāsaddassa evahinipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā – evametaṃ, evaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:639: Saṃyogo, saṃyojanaṃ, saṃyato, saṃyācikāya, yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaṃ yamāhu itīdha “ña”miti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:641: Niggahītaṃ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ñādesassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:642: Saññogo saṃyogo, saññojanaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, saññato saṃyato, saññācikāya saṃyācikāya, yaññadeva yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaññamāhu ānantarikaṃ yamāhu.
anya-e0805n0:643: Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva saṃpadantato ca sabbanāmayakāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. Yathā – etaṃ yojanaṃ, taṃ yānaṃ, saraṇaṃ yanti.
anya-e0805n0:644_0: Ettha ca “saha ye cā”ti vattabbe “sa ye cā”ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti
anya-e0805n0:644_1: daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena paṭisaṅkhāya yoniso paṭisaṅkhā yoniso, sayaṃ abhiññāya sacchikatvā
anya-e0805n0:644_2: sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā, pariyesanāya pariyesanātiādi sijjhati.
anya-e0805n0:645: Taṃ ahaṃ brūmi, yaṃ āhu, dhanaṃ eva, kiṃ etaṃ, nindituṃ arahati, yaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ anattā, etaṃ avoca, etaṃ eva iccatra –
anya-e0805n0:647: Niggahītassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā. Ettha ca vāsaddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā dakāro yatetasaddato parasseva.
anya-e0805n0:648: Tamahaṃ brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṃ, ninditumarahati, yadaniccaṃ, tadanattā, etadavoca, etadeva.
anya-e0805n0:649: Vāti kiṃ? Taṃ ahaṃ, etaṃ eva, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ.
anya-e0805n0:650: Ettha ca madāti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā makāro. Tena “buddhama saraṇama gacchāmī”tiādi sijjhati.
anya-e0805n0:651: Tāsaṃ ahaṃ santike, vidūnaṃ aggaṃ, tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itīdha “sare”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:653: Niggahītaṃ kho sare pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. Pubbassaralopo, parassa asaṃyogantassa dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:654: Tāsāhaṃ santike, vidūnaggaṃ, tassa adāsāhaṃ, tathāgatāhaṃ, evāhaṃ, kyāhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:656: Ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ, saṃratto, saṃrāgo, saṃrambho, avisaṃhāro, ciraṃ pavāsiṃ, gantuṃ kāmo, gantuṃ mano itīdha “kvaci lopa”nti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:658: Niggahītaṃ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. Rakārahakāresu upasaggantassa dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:659: Ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho, avisāhāro, cirappavāsiṃ, dvittaṃ, gantukāmo, gantumano.
anya-e0805n0:661_0: Kataṃ iti, kiṃ iti, abhinanduṃ iti, uttattaṃ iva, cakkaṃ iva, kaliṃ idāni, kiṃ idāni,
anya-e0805n0:661_1: tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api, uttariṃ api, dātuṃ api, sadisaṃ eva itīdha “niggahītamhā, lopa”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:663: Niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:664: Katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttattaṃva, cakkaṃva, kalindāni, kindāni, tvaṃsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṃva.
anya-e0805n0:665: Vāti kiṃ? Kataṃ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṃ eva.
anya-e0805n0:666: Ayampi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. Yathā – ahaṃ ettha, etaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0805n0:667: Evaṃ assa te āsavā, pupphaṃ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena “parasmiṃ, sare, lutte”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:669: Niggahītamhā parasmiṃ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce, visaññogova hotīti saṃyogekadesassa purimabyañjanassa lopo.
anya-e0805n0:670: Dvinnaṃ byañjanānamekatra ṭhiti saññogo, idha pana saṃyujjatīti saññogo, purimo vaṇṇo, vigato saññogo assāti visaññogo, paro.
anya-e0805n0:671: Evaṃ sa te āsavā, pupphaṃsā uppajjati.
anya-e0805n0:673: Casaddena tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ sarūpasaṃyogopi visaññogo hoti. Yathā – agyāgāraṃ, vutyassa.
anya-e0805n0:674: Cakkhu udapādi, ava siro, yāvacidha bhikkhave, aṇuthūlāni, ta sampayuttā ibhīdha “sare, āgamo, kvaci, byañjane”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:676: Niggahītañca āgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā kvaci sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. Niggahītassa rassānugatattā rassatoyevāyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:677: Cakkhuṃ udapādi, avaṃsiro, yāvañcidha bhikkhave, aṇuṃthūlāni, taṃsampayuttā, evaṃ taṅkhaṇe, taṃsabhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:678: Kvacīti kiṃ? Na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0805n0:679: Evaṃ vutte, taṃ sādhu, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, aggiṃva sanamaṃ itīdha lopādesakāriye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavādatthamāha.
anya-e0805n0:681: Niggahītaṃ kho byañjane pare aṃiti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:683: Evaṃ vutte, taṃ sādhu, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, aggiṃva sandhamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:686: Ye idha amhehi visesato na upadiṭṭhā upasagganipātādayo, tesaṃ vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhādīsu vuttanayānusārena rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:687_0: Tena “do dhassa cā”ti sutte casaddena pariyādīnaṃ rahanādivaṇṇassa vipariyayo yavādīhi,
anya-e0805n0:687_1: yathā – pariyudāhāsi payirudāhāsi, ariyassa ayirassa, bahvābādho bavhābādho, na abhineyya anabhineyya.
anya-e0805n0:688: “Taṃ imināpi jānāthā”ti ettha “paro vā saro”ti sare lutte “tatrākāro”ti yogavibhāgena akāro niggahītassa dakāro, tadamināpi jānātha iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:698: Atthābhimukhaṃ namanato, attani catthassa nāmanato nāmaṃ, dabbābhidhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:699: Taṃ pana duvidhaṃ anvattharuḷhīvasena, tividhaṃ pumitthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena. Yathā – rukkho, mālā, dhanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:700: Catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaguṇakriyāyadicchāvasena, yathā – rukkho, nīlo, pācako, sirivaḍḍhotiādi.
anya-e0805n0:703: Tattha paṭhamaṃ akārantamhā pulliṅgā jātinimittā purisasaddā syādivibhattiyo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n0:705_0: Adhikāroyaṃ. Tattha pañca māre jitavāti jino, buddho. Jinassa vacanaṃ jinavacanaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:705_1: tassa jinavacanassa yuttaṃ jinavacanayuttaṃ, tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa māgadhikāya
anya-e0805n0:705_2: sabhāvaniruttiyā yuttaṃ anurūpamevāti idaṃ adhikāratthaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:708: Adhikāro pana tividho sīhagatikamaṇḍūkagatikayathānupubbikavasena, ayaṃ pana sīhagatiko pubbāparavilokanato, yathānupubbikoyeva vā.
anya-e0805n0:711_0: Liṅgaṃpāṭipadikaṃ, yathā yathā jinavacanayuttañhi liṅgaṃ, tathā tathā idha liṅgaṃ
anya-e0805n0:711_1: nipaccate ṭhapīyati. Casaddena dhātavo cāti jinavacanānurūpato “purisa”iti liṅge
anya-e0805n0:711_2: ṭhapite tato tassa dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa atthavato saddassa “parasamaññā
anya-e0805n0:714: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi parā vibhattiyo honti. Casaddaggahaṇena tavetunādipaccayantanipātatopi. Kammādivasena, ekattādivasena ca liṅgatthaṃ vibhajantīti vibhattiyo.
anya-e0805n0:715: Kā ca pana tā vibhattiyo? “Vibhattiyo”ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n0:716: 63. Siyo, aṃyo, nāhi, sanaṃ, smāhi, sanaṃ, smiṃsu.
anya-e0805n0:717_0: Syādayo dvisatta vibhattiyo nāma honti. Tattha si, yo iti paṭhamā, aṃ, yo iti dutiyā,
anya-e0805n0:717_1: nā, hi iti tatiyā, sa, naṃ iti catutthī, smā, hi iti pañcamī, sa, naṃ iti chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0805n0:718_0: Idaṃ pana saññādhikāraparibhāsāvidhisuttesu saññāsuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttañhi vuttiyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:718_1: “vibhattiiccanena kvattho, amhassa mamaṃ savibhattissa se”ti, itarathā purimasuttena
anya-e0805n0:718_2: ekayogo kattabboti. Ettha ca paṭhamādivohāro, ekavacanādivohāro ca anvatthavasena,
anya-e0805n0:719: Ekassa vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ, bahūnaṃ vacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ, dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutiyātiādi, itarathā purimasutte casaddena saññākaraṇe appakataniratthakavidhippasaṅgo siyā.
anya-e0805n0:720: “Jinavacanayuttañhi, liṅgañca nipaccate”ti ca vattate. Idha pana padanipphādanampi jinavacanassāvirodhenāti ñāpetuṃ paribhāsantaramāha.
anya-e0805n0:722_0: Yathā yathā tesaṃ jinavacanānaṃ uparodho na hoti, tathā tathā idha liṅgaṃ, casaddenākhyātañca
anya-e0805n0:722_1: nipaccate, nipphādīyatīti attho. Teneva idha ca ākhyāte ca dvivacanāggahaṇaṃ, sakkatavisadisato
anya-e0805n0:725_0: Liṅgatthābhidhānamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hotīti paṭhamā. Tatthāpi aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasaṅge
anya-e0805n0:725_1: “ekamhī vattabbe ekavacana”nti paribhāsato liṅgatthassekattavacanicchāyaṃ paṭhamekavacanaṃ si.
anya-e0805n0:728: Si, oiti dvipadamidaṃ. Liṅgassa akārato parassa sivacanassa okāro hoti.
anya-e0805n0:729: Suttesu hi paṭhamāniddiṭṭhassa kāriyino chaṭṭhīvipariṇāmena vivaraṇaṃ ādesāpekkhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:730_0: Ettha ca sīti vibhatti gayhate vibhattikāriyavidhippakaraṇato, “tato ca vibhattiyo”ti
anya-e0805n0:730_1: ito vibhattiggahaṇānuvattanato vā, evaṃ sabbattha syādīnaṃ kāriyavidhāne vibhattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:731: “Vā paro asarūpā”ti paralope sampatte tadapavādena pubbalopamāha.
anya-e0805n0:733_0: Pubbassarassa lopo hoti aṃvacane, ādesappaccayādibhūte ca sare pare, saralope kate
anya-e0805n0:733_1: tu parasarassa pakatibhāvo hoti. Ettha ca “saralope”ti punaggahaṇaṃ imināva katasaralopanimitteyeva
anya-e0805n0:733_2: parassa vikāre sampatte pakatibhāvatthaṃ. Parasarassa pakatibhāvavidhānasāmatthiyato
anya-e0805n0:738: Tuggahaṇaṃ bhikkhunīādīsu saralopanivattanatthaṃ, “naye paraṃ yutte”ti paraṃ netabbaṃ. Puriso tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n0:739: Puriso ca puriso cāti purisa purisaiti vattabbe –
anya-e0805n0:741_0: Sarūpānaṃ samānarūpānaṃ padabyañjanānaṃ majjhe ekova sissate, aññe lopamāpajjante
anya-e0805n0:741_1: asakinti ekaseso. Ettha ca “sarūpāna”nti vuttattāva siddhe asakimpayoge punāsakiṃgahaṇaṃ
anya-e0805n0:741_2: ekavibhattivisayānamevāsakimpayoge evāyanti dassanatthaṃ, na ca vicchāpayoge’tippasaṅgo.
anya-e0805n0:744: Tattheva liṅgatthassa bahuttavacanicchāyaṃ “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana”nti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ yo, purisa yo itīdha “ato, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:746_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā paresaṃ sabbesaṃ paṭhamāyonīnaṃ, dutiyāyonīnañca yayākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā
anya-e0805n0:746_1: honti vāti ākāro, sabbaggahaṇaṃ sabbādesatthaṃ, saralopādi purimasadisameva, purisā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n0:747: Vā icceva rūpā rūpāni, aggayo, munayo.
anya-e0805n0:750: Asantaṃ jhe katatte tu, vidhiṃ dīpeti vāsuti.
anya-e0805n0:753: Abhimukhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ ālapanaṃ, sambodhanaṃ. Tasmiṃ ālapanatthādhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Pure viya ekavacanādi.
anya-e0805n0:756: Ālapanatthe vihito si gasañño hotīti gasaññāyaṃ “bho ge tū”ti ito “ge”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:758: Liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ca pitusatthuiccevamādīnamanto ca ākārattamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0805n0:761: Liṅgassa sambandhī ākāro rassamāpajjate ge pare vikappena, adūraṭṭhassālapanevāyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:763_0: “Siṃ, so, syā ca, sakhato gasse vā, ghate cā”ti evamādīhi niddiṭṭhehi añño seso nāma,
anya-e0805n0:763_1: tato sesato liṅgamhā gasiiccete lopamāpajjante. Apiggahaṇaṃ dutiyatthasampiṇḍanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:763_2: ettha ca satipi siggahaṇe vaiti vacanameva ñāpakamaññatthāpi siggahaṇe ālapanāggahaṇassa.
anya-e0805n0:763_3: Keci ālapanābhibyattiyā bhavantasaddaṃ vā hesaddaṃ vā payujjante. Bho purisa tiṭṭha, he purisā vā.
anya-e0805n0:764: Bahuvacane na viseso, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha.
anya-e0805n0:767: Yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kriyānimittaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:769: Kammatthe dutiyāvibhatti hoti. Pure viya dutiyekavacanaṃ aṃ, “saralopo”tiādinā sare lutte “dīgha”nti dīghe sampatte pakatibhāvo ca, purisaṃ passa.
anya-e0805n0:773: Yo attappadhāno kriyaṃ karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n0:776: Kattari ca kārake tatiyāvibhatti hotīti tatiyekavacanaṃ nā.
anya-e0805n0:778: Enāti avibhattikaniddeso. Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti, saralopādi, purisena kataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:781: Su, hiiccetesu vibhattirūpesu paresu liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n0:783: Sabbato liṅgamhā smā hi smiṃiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ mhā, bhi, mhiiccete ādesā honti vā, purisehi, purisebhi kataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:786: Yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:788: Karaṇakārake tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sesaṃ kattusamaṃ, āviṭṭhena purisena so puññaṃ karoti, purisehi, purisebhi.
anya-e0805n0:790: 84. Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:791: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:793: Sampadānakārake catutthīvibhatti hotīti catutthiyā ekavacanaṃ sa.
anya-e0805n0:795: Sabbato liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti se vibhattimhi pare. Purisassa dhanaṃ dadāti.
anya-e0805n0:798: Su naṃ hiiccetesu paresu liṅgassa antabhūtā sabbe rassasarā dīghamāpajjante, caggahaṇamikārukārānaṃ kvaci nivattanatthaṃ. Purisānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:801: Yasmā vā avadhibhūtā apeti, yasmā vā bhayaṃ, yasmā vā ādatte, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:803: Apādānakārake pañcamīvibhatti hotīti pañcamiyā ekavacanaṃ smā.
anya-e0805n0:806: Akārantato liṅgamhā sabbesaṃ smā smiṃiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā honti vā, aññattha mhādeso. Purisā apeti, purisamhā, purisasmā.
anya-e0805n0:807: Bahuvacane sabbattha tatiyāsamaṃ, hissa bhiādeso hoti. Purisehi, purisebhi apeti.
anya-e0805n0:810: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmisaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:812: Sāmismiṃ chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti. Ṭhapetvā āyādesaṃ sabbattha catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ samānaṃ rūpaṃ. Purisassa etaṃ dhanaṃ, purisānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:815: Yo kattukammānaṃ kriyāya ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:817: Okāsakārake sattamīvibhatti hotīti sattamiyā ekavacanaṃ smiṃ, tassa “smāsmiṃnaṃ vā”ti ekāro, mhiādeso ca, purise patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisamhi, purisasmiṃ.
anya-e0805n0:819_0: Puriso, purisā, bho purisa bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā, purisaṃ, purise, purisena,
anya-e0805n0:819_1: purisehi purisebhi, purisassa, purisānaṃ, purisā purisasmā purisamhā, purisehi purisebhi,
anya-e0805n0:819_2: purisassa, purisānaṃ, purise purisasmiṃ purisamhi, purisesu.
anya-e0805n0:820_0: Tathā sugato, sugatā, bho sugata bho sugatā vā, bhavanto sugatā, sugataṃ, sugate,
anya-e0805n0:820_1: sugatena, sugatehi sugatebhi, sugatassa, sugatānaṃ, sugatā sugatasmā sugatamhā, sugatehi
anya-e0805n0:820_2: sugatebhi, sugatassa, sugatānaṃ, sugate sugatasmiṃ sugatamhi, sugatesu.
anya-e0805n0:825: Āloka loka nilayā’nila cāga yogā, vāyāma gāma
anya-e0805n0:828: Sārambha thambha mada māna pamāda makkhā.
anya-e0805n0:834: Manogaṇādissa tu nāsasmāsmiṃsu viseso. Aññattha purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:835: Mano, manā, he mana he manā vā, bhavanto manā, manaṃ, mane.
anya-e0805n0:838: Manopabhuti gaṇo manogaṇo, manogaṇādito smiṃ, nāiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ikārākārādesā honti vā. Ādiggahaṇena bilapadāditopi.
anya-e0805n0:841: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi sare pare sāgamo hoti vā. Manasā, manena.
anya-e0805n0:842: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, tena “mano manā manaṃ mane manaāyatana”ntiādīsu na hoti. “Mānasikaṃ, cetasika”ntiādīsu niccaṃ. Manehi, manebhi.
anya-e0805n0:845: Manogaṇādito parassa sassa vibhattissa okāro hoti vā. Sāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:846: Manaso manassa, manānaṃ, manā manasmā manamhā, manehi manebhi, manaso manassa, manānaṃ, manasi mane manasmiṃ manamhi, manesu.
anya-e0805n0:855: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavā.
anya-e0805n0:858: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti vā yomhi paṭhame, guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n0:861_0: Ntupaccayassa anto ukāro attamāpajjate sunaṃhi yoiccetesu, caggahaṇena aññesu aṃ
anya-e0805n0:861_1: nā smāsmiṃsu ca. Guṇavantā, chaṭṭhiyā siddhepi antādese puna antaggahaṇakaraṇato
anya-e0805n0:864: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṃ avaṇṇaiccete ādesā honti ge pare.
anya-e0805n0:865: Bho guṇavaṃ bho guṇava bho guṇavā, bhavanto guṇavanto guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante.
anya-e0805n0:868: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa toti tāādesā honti vā sasmiṃnāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Guṇavatā guṇavantena, guṇavantehi guṇavantebhi.
anya-e0805n0:870: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassaiccayamādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi. Guṇavantassa guṇavato.
anya-e0805n0:872: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:874: Guṇavatā guṇavantā guṇavantasmā guṇavantamhā, guṇavantehi guṇavantebhi, guṇavantassa guṇavato, guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ, guṇavati guṇavante guṇavantasmiṃ guṇavantamhī, guṇavantesu.
anya-e0805n0:875: Evaṃ gaṇavā kulavā balavā yasavā dhanavā sutavā bhagavā himavā phalavā sīlavā paññavā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:879: Ntupaccayassa anto attaṃ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. Himavanto, himavā, sesaṃ samaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:880: Puna vāggahaṇakaraṇaṃ himavantusaddato aññatra attanisedhanatthaṃ, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena guṇavantādīsu nātippasaṅgo.
anya-e0805n0:881_0: Evaṃ satimā dhitimā gatimā matimā mutimā muttimā jutimā sirimā hirimā thutimā ratimā
anya-e0805n0:881_1: yatimā sucimā kalimā balimā kasimā rucimā buddhimā cakkhumā bandhumā hetumā setumā
anya-e0805n0:881_2: ketumā rāhumā bhāṇumā khāṇumā vijjumā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:882: Tattha satimantu bandhumantusaddānaṃ aṃsesu rūpabhedo. “Attaṃ, ntussā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:884_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṃ hoti vā aṃsaiccetesu. Idhāpi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā
anya-e0805n0:884_1: nātippasaṅgo. Satimaṃ satimantaṃ, bandhumaṃ bandhumantaṃ, satimassa satimato satimantassa,
anya-e0805n0:888: Gacchanticcevamādīnaṃ antappaccayantānaṃ ntasaddo aṃrūpaṃ āpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi. Saralopasilopā, so gacchaṃ, gacchanto vā gaṇhāti.
anya-e0805n0:891: Gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo ntupaccayova daṭṭhabbo sesesu vibhattippaccayesu, asmimhi kāriyātidesoyaṃ. Sesaṃ guṇavantusamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:892_0: Te gacchanto gacchantā, bho gacchaṃ bho gaccha bho gacchā, bhavanto gacchanto gacchantā,
anya-e0805n0:892_1: [gacchaṃ] gacchantaṃ, gacchante, gacchatā gacchantena, gacchantehi gacchantebhi,
anya-e0805n0:892_2: gacchato gacchantassa, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, gacchatā gacchantasmā gacchantamhā,
anya-e0805n0:892_3: gacchantehi gacchantebhi, gacchato gacchantassa, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, gacchati
anya-e0805n0:893: Evaṃ mahaṃ caraṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, dadaṃ bhuñjaṃ suṇaṃ pacaṃ;
anya-e0805n0:894: Jayaṃ jīraṃ cavaṃ mīyaṃ, saraṃ kubbaṃ japaṃ vajaṃ –
anya-e0805n0:896: Bhavantasaddassa ga yo nā savacanesu viseso. So bhavaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:899: Bhavantaiccetassa vakārassa obhāvo hoti kvaci yoiccetesu. Te bhonto bhavanto bhavantā.
anya-e0805n0:902: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bho hoti ge pare. Tusaddena bhante, bhontādi ca, galopo, bho bhante bhonta bhontā, bhonto bhavanto bhavantā, bhavantaṃ, bhonte bhavante.
anya-e0805n0:904: Bhotā bhavatā bhavantena, bhoto bhavato bhavantassa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:906: Sabbasseva bhadantasaddassa bhaddanta bhanteiccete ādesā honti kvaci ge pare yosu ca. Bho bhaddanta bhante, bhadanta bhadantā vā iccādi purisasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:908: Sabbasseva santasaddassa sasaddādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:909: Casaddaggahaṇena abhakārepi samāse kvaci sakārādeso. Sabbhi.
anya-e0805n0:911: Atthi rāja brahma atta sakhasaddādīnaṃ bhedo, tatheva syādyuppatti, “rāja si”iti ṭhite –
anya-e0805n0:914: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ākāro hoti. Ādisaddena ātumādisaddato ca. Saralopādi. Rājā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n0:916: Brahmattasakharājādito yonaṃ ānoādeso hoti. Rājāno tiṭṭhanti, bho rāja bho rājā, bhavanto rājāno.
anya-e0805n0:919: Brahmādīhi parassa aṃvacanassa ānaṃ hoti vā. Rājānaṃ passa rājaṃ vā, rājāno.
anya-e0805n0:922: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi. Raññā kataṃ rājena vā.
anya-e0805n0:924: Sabbassa rājasaddassa rājuādeso hoti su naṃ hiiccetesu vacanesu. Casaddo vikappanattho, “sunaṃhisu cā”ti dīgho, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi vā.
anya-e0805n0:927: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi. Rañño, rājino deti.
anya-e0805n0:930: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Raññaṃ rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:933: Amhatumhanturājabrahmattasakhasatthupituiccevamādīhi smāvacanaṃ nāva daṭṭhabbanti smāvacanassa nābhāvātideso. Atideso pana chabbidho.
anya-e0805n0:937: Tatrāyaṃ brahmattasakhādīsu pāṭhasāmatthiyato rūpātideso. Sesaṃ tatiyāsamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:938: Raññā apeti, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi, rañño, rājino santakaṃ, raññaṃ rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:941: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. Raññe, rājini patiṭṭhitaṃ, rājūsu rājesu.
anya-e0805n0:942: Brahmasaddassa ca ga nā sa smiṃsu viseso. Brahmā, brahmāno.
anya-e0805n0:945: Brahmasaddato gassa ca ekāro hoti, caggahaṇaṃ eggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ, bho brahme, bhavanto brahmāno, brahmānaṃ brahmaṃ, brahmāno.
anya-e0805n0:948: Brahmasaddassa anto uttamāpajjate sa nāiccetesu vacanesu. Uttamiti bhāvaniddeso katthaci abhāvadassanattho. Brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi.
anya-e0805n0:951: Jhalasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi parassa saiccetassa vacanassa noiccādeso hoti vā. Brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā, uttamiti yogavibhāgena aññatthāpi uttaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:952: Pañcamiyaṃ nābhāvātideso. Brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n0:954: Brahmasaddato smiṃvacanassa ni hoti. Tusaddena kammacammamuddhādito ca kvaci. Brahmani, brahmesu.
anya-e0805n0:956: Attā, attāno, bho atta bho attā, bhavanto attāno, attānaṃ attaṃ, attāno.
anya-e0805n0:957: Nāmhi “akammantassa cā”ti ettha casaddena attantassa attaṃ vā. Attanā attena vā.
anya-e0805n0:959: Attasaddassa anto anattamāpajjate hismiṃ pare. Attanehi attanebhi.
anya-e0805n0:962: Tato attasaddato sassa vibhattissa no hoti. Attano, attānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:964: Tato attasaddato smāvacanassa nā hoti. Attanā apeti.
anya-e0805n0:965_0: Nābhāvātideseneva siddhepi uttarasuttena ekayogamakatvā bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:965_1: tena attantatakārassa rakāro jakāre kvaci. Atrajo attajo vā. Attanehi attanebhi, attano, attānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:968: Tato attasaddato smiṃvacanassa ni hoti. Attani, attesu.
anya-e0805n0:972: Sakhasaddato yonaṃ āyo noādesā ca honti. Sakhāyo.
anya-e0805n0:974: Sakhasaddantassa ikārādeso hoti nonānaṃsaiccetesu paresu. Sakhino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n0:977: Sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāraekārādesā honti. Vāsaddena aññasmāpi kvaci ekāro. Yathā – bhaddante ise iti.
anya-e0805n0:978: A ca ā ca i ca ī ca e cātipi e, pubbassarānaṃ kamena lopo.
anya-e0805n0:979: Bho sakha bho sakhā bho sakhi bho sakhī bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino.
anya-e0805n0:982: Sakhantassa āro bhoti vā sunaṃ aṃiccetesu paresu. Sakhāraṃ sakhānaṃ sakhaṃ, sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino, sakhinā.
anya-e0805n0:985: Sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi sakhārebhi, sakhehi sakhebhi.
anya-e0805n0:986: Ikārādese “jhalato sassa no vā”ti no. Sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṃ sakhīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:987: Smāvacanassa nābhāvo. Sakhinā, sakhārehi sakhārebhi sakhehi sakhebhi, sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṃ sakhīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:990: Sakhato smiṃvacanassa ekāro hoti. Niccatthoyamārambho. Sakhe, sakhāresu sakhesu.
anya-e0805n0:991: Ātumasaddassa paṭhamādutiyāsu attasaddasseva rūpanayo. Ātumā, ātumāno, bho ātuma bho ātumā, bhavanto ātumāno, ātumānaṃ ātumaṃ, ātumāno, ātumena iccādi purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:995: Pumasaddassa savibhattissa ākārādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Antaggahaṇena maghavayuvādīnamantassa ca. Pumā.
anya-e0805n0:998: Pumantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu. Pumāno.
anya-e0805n0:1000: Pumantassa savibhattissa aṃ hoti ālapanekavacane pare. He pumaṃ, he pumāno, pumaṃ, pumāno.
anya-e0805n0:1003: Pumantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi. Casaddena pumakammathāmantassa cu’kāro vā sasmāsu. Pumānā pumunā pumena vā.
anya-e0805n0:1006: Pumantassa hivibhattimhī ca āneādeso hoti. Vibhattiggahaṇaṃ savibhattiggahaṇanivattanatthaṃ. Pumānehi pumānebhi.
anya-e0805n0:1007_0: Casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa vā ānādeso hoti sabbavibhattīsu. “U nāmhi cā”ti
anya-e0805n0:1007_1: ettha casaddena pumantassukāro vā sasmāsu vibhattīsu. “Jhalato sassa no vā”ti no.
anya-e0805n0:1010: Jhalaiccetehi smāvacanassa nā hoti. Caggahaṇaṃ kvaci nivattanatthaṃ. Pumānā pumunā pumā pumasmā pumamhā, pumānehi pumānebhi pumehi pumebhi, pumuno pumassa, pumānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1012: Pumantassa savibhattissa āneādeso hoti vā smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. Pumāne pume pumasmiṃ pumamhi.
anya-e0805n0:1014: Pumantassa suiccetasmiṃ pare āādeso hoti vā. Pumāsu pumesu.
anya-e0805n0:1016: “Pumantassā simhī”ti ettha antaggahaṇena ākāro, “hivibhattimhi cā”ti sutte casaddena ānādeso ca.
anya-e0805n0:1017: Yuvā yuvāno, yuvānā yuvā, he yuva he yuvā he yuvāna he yuvānā, bhavanto yuvānā, yuvānaṃ yuvaṃ, yuvāne yuve.
anya-e0805n0:1018: “Akammantassa cā”ti ettha casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa ā hoti vā nāsuiccetesūti āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1019_0: Yuvānā yuvena yuvānena vā, yuvānehi yuvānebhi yuvehi yuvebhi, yuvānassa yuvassa,
anya-e0805n0:1019_1: yuvānānaṃ yuvānaṃ, yuvānā yuvānasmā yuvānamhā, yuvānehi yuvānebhi yuvehi yuvebhi,
anya-e0805n0:1019_2: yuvānassa yuvassa, yuvānānaṃ yuvānaṃ, yuvāne yuvānasmiṃ yuvānamhi yuve yuvamhi yuvasmiṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1020: Evaṃ maghavā maghavāno, maghavānā iccādi yuvasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1026: Ghasaññakaākāravajjito liṅgassanto saro rassamāpajjate ekavacanesu yosu ca paresūti rassattaṃ. Apiggahaṇaṃ simhi nivattanatthaṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1027: Sā tiṭṭhanti, he sa he sā, he sā, saṃ, se, sena, sāhi sābhi, sassa sāya, sānaṃ, sā sasmā samhā, sāhi sābhi, sassa, sānaṃ, se sasmiṃ samhi, sāsu.
anya-e0805n0:1030: Ikāranto pulliṅgo aggisaddo. Syādyuppatti, aggi si,
anya-e0805n0:1033: Aggissa anto ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. “Sesato lopaṃ gasipī”ti silopo. Aggini aggi.
anya-e0805n0:1037: Ghapasaññehi itthivācakehi ākārivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi, jhalasaññehi ca paresaṃ yovacanānaṃ lopo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsāyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1039: Liṅgassantabhūtā sabbe rassasarā yosu katanikāralopesu dīghamāpajjante. Katā nikāralopā yesaṃ te katanikāralopā. Aggī.
anya-e0805n0:1042: Yosu paresu akatarasso jho attamāpajjate. Aggayo.
anya-e0805n0:1044: Ālapanepevaṃ. He aggi, he aggī he aggayo.
anya-e0805n0:1047: Jhalapaiccetehi parassa aṃvacanassa, makārassa ca niggahītaṃ ādeso hoti. Aggiṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1048: Aggī aggayo, agginā, aggīhi aggībhi, “sunaṃhisu cā”ti ettha caggahaṇena katthaci dīghābhāvo. Aggihi aggibhi.
anya-e0805n0:1049: “Jhalato sassa no vā”ti no. Aggino aggissa, aggīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1050: “Smā nā”ti vattamāne “jhalato cā”ti vikappena nā. Agginā aggismā aggimhā, aggīhi aggībhi aggihi aggibhi, aggino aggissa, aggīnaṃ agginaṃ, aggimhi aggismiṃ, aggīsu aggisu.
anya-e0805n0:1052: Joti pāṇi gaṇṭhi muṭṭhi, kucchi vatthi sāli vīhi;
anya-e0805n0:1053: Byādhi odhi bodhi sandhi, rāsi kesi sāti dīpi.
anya-e0805n0:1054: Isi muni maṇi dhani yati giri ravi kavi,
anya-e0805n0:1055: Kapi asi masi nidhi vidhi ahi kimi pati;
anya-e0805n0:1056: Hari ari timi kali bali jaladhi gahapati,
anya-e0805n0:1062: “Agho rassamekavacanayosvapi cā”ti rassatte sampatte etthevāpiggahaṇena sismiṃ tadabhāve siddhe niyamatthamāha.
anya-e0805n0:1065: Sismiṃ napuṃsakavajjitāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjanteti rassattābhāvo, silopo. Daṇḍī tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n0:1074: Sabbesaṃ yonaṃ sālapanānaṃ jhato katarassā paresaṃ noiccādeso hoti. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n0:1082: Jhalapaiccete rassamāpajjante ge pare. Bho daṇḍi.
anya-e0805n0:1083: “Agho rassa”ntiādināva siddhepi rassatte punārambho niyamattho, tena “bho go”tiādīsu na bhavati. Daṇḍī daṇḍino.
anya-e0805n0:1084: Dutiyāyaṃ rassatte kate “a”miti vattate, “ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā”ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:1086: Jhato katarassā parassa aṃvacanassa naṃ hoti vā. Daṇḍinaṃ daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍī daṇḍino, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1087: “Jhalato cā”ti nā. Daṇḍinā daṇḍismā daṇḍimhā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1088: “Jhato, katarassā”ti ca vattate, pure viya “vā”ti ca.
anya-e0805n0:1090: Jhato katarassā parassa smiṃvacanassa niiccādeso hoti vā. Daṇḍini daṇḍismiṃ daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu.
anya-e0805n0:1092: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī hatthī, cakkī pakkhī dāṭhī raṭṭhī;
anya-e0805n0:1093: Chattī mālī vammī yogī, bhāgī bhogī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0805n0:1094: Dhajī gaṇī sasī kuṭṭhī, jaṭī yānī sukhī sikhī;
anya-e0805n0:1095: Dantī mantī karī cāgī, kusalī musalī balī.
anya-e0805n0:1100: Gāmaṇī, gāmaṇī gāmaṇino, bho gāmaṇi, bhonto gāmaṇī bhonto gāmaṇino, gāmaṇinaṃ gāmaṇiṃ, gāmaṇī gāmaṇino.
anya-e0805n0:1101: Sesaṃ daṇḍīsamaṃ. Niādesābhāvova viseso. Evaṃ senānī sudhīppabhutayo.
anya-e0805n0:1104: Tatheva bhikkhusaddato si, silopo. So bhikkhu.
anya-e0805n0:1105: Bahuvacane “ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo”ti yolopo, “yosu kata”iccādinā dīgho. Te bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n0:1108_0: Lasaññato paresaṃ yovacanānaṃ vokārādeso hoti vā. Kāraggahaṇena yonaṃ no ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1108_1: Casaddaggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ. Atha vā caggahaṇaṃ noggahaṇānuvattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1108_2: tena jantusabbaññūādito yonaṃ no ca hoti. Vāsaddo vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n0:1110: Vibhāsā na ca vo no ca, amuppabhutito bhave.
anya-e0805n0:1113: Ve voiccetesu ca paresu akatarasso lo attamāpajjate. Bhikkhavo, bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n0:1116: Akatarassā lato parassa ālapane vihitassa yoiccetassa ve voādesā honti. Attaṃ. Bhavanto bhikkhave bhikkhavo. “Aṃ mo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti niggahītaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1117_0: Bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhū bhikkhavo, bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi bhikkhūbhi bhikkhuhi bhikkhubhi,
anya-e0805n0:1117_1: bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunaṃ, bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā bhikkhumhā, bhikkhūhi
anya-e0805n0:1117_2: bhikkhūbhi bhikkhuhi bhikkhubhi, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunaṃ, bhikkhumhi
anya-e0805n0:1118: Evaṃ setu ketu rāhu bhānu paṅgu ucchu veḷu maccu sindhu bandhu neru meru sattu kāru hetu jantu ruru paṭu iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:1120: Hetu, hetū hetavo hetuyo, bho hetu, bhonto hetū hetave hetavo, hetuṃ, hetū hetavo hetuyo. Sesaṃ bhikkhusamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1121: Jantu, jantū jantavo. Kāraggahaṇena yonaṃ no ca hoti. Jantuno jantuyo, bho jantu, jantū jantave jantavo, jantuṃ, jantū jantavo jantuno jantuyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1125: Satthu pitu mātu bhātu dhītu kattuiccevamādīnamanto āttamāpajjate sismiṃ, silopo ca hoti. Satthā.
anya-e0805n0:1128: Satthu pitādīnamanto sivacanato aññesu vacanesu ārattamāpajjate. Ārattamitibhāvaniddesena katthaci aniyamaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0805n0:1131: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṃ yonaṃ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1132: Tuggahaṇena aññehipi catuubhanadīgavādīhi yonamokāro hoti, saralopādi. Satthāro.
anya-e0805n0:1133: Ālapane “akārapitādyantānamā”ti āttaṃ. “Ge rassa”nti adhikicca “ākāro vā”ti vikappena rassattaṃ, valopo. Bho sattha bho satthā, bhavanto satthāro, satthāraṃ, satthāre satthāro.
anya-e0805n0:1136: Tato ārādesato nāvacanassa ākārādeso hoti. Satthārā, satthunāti ārattamitibhāvaniddesena siddhaṃ. Satthārehi satthārebhi.
anya-e0805n0:1139: Satthu pituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṃ hoti vā sasmiṃ, salopo ca hoti. Ārādesāpavādoyaṃ. Satthu, aññattha bhāvaniddesenārābhāvo. Satthussa satthuno.
anya-e0805n0:1142: Satthu pituādīnamanto ārattamāpajjate vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Satthārānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1145: Satthusaddantassa, pitādīnamantassa ca attaṃ hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi, puna satthuggahaṇaṃ satthuno niccavidhānatthaṃ. Satthānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1146: “Amhatumhanturājabrahmattasakhasatthupitādīhi smā nāvā”ti smāvacanassanābhāvo. Satthārā, satthārehi satthārebhi, satthu satthuno satthussa, satthārānaṃ satthānaṃ.
