anya-e0805n0:1149: Tato ārādesato smiṃvacanassa ikārādeso hoti. Puna tatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṃvacanassa ikāro. Yathā – bhuvi, divi.
anya-e0805n0:1151: Ārādeso rassamāpajjate ikāre pare, satthari, satthāresu.
anya-e0805n0:1152_0: Evaṃ kattā, kattāro, bho katta bho kattā, bhavanto kattāro, kattāraṃ, kattāre kattāro,
anya-e0805n0:1152_1: kattārā, kattārehi kattārebhi. “U sasmiṃ salopo cā”ti uttaṃ, salopo ca. Kattu kattuno
anya-e0805n0:1152_2: kattussa, kattārānaṃ kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ kattunaṃ, kattārā, kattārehi kattārebhi, kattu
anya-e0805n0:1152_3: kattuno kattussa, kattārānaṃ kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ kattunaṃ, kattari, kattāresu, ārābhāve kattūsu kattusu.
anya-e0805n0:1154: Bhattu vattu netu sotu, ñātu jetu chettu bhettu. Dātu dhātu nattu boddhu, viññāpetu ādayopi.
anya-e0805n0:1157: Sakamandhātuiccevamādīnamanto ca uttamāpajjate sasmiṃ, salopo ca, niccaṃ punabbidhānā. Sakamandhātu viya assa rājino vibhavo, sesaṃ samaṃ. Evaṃ mahāmandhātuppabhutayo.
anya-e0805n0:1158: Pitusaddassa bhedo. Simhi āttaṃ, silopo, pitā.
anya-e0805n0:1161_0: Pitādīnamārādeso rassamāpajjate asimhi vibhattimhi. Sismiṃ ārādesābhāvepi asimhīti
anya-e0805n0:1161_1: adhikavacanamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ, tena toādimhi pitādīnamikāro ca. Yathā – pitito,
anya-e0805n0:1162_0: Pitaro, sesaṃ kattusamaṃ. Bho pita bho pitā, bhavanto pitaro, pitaraṃ, pitare pitaro,
anya-e0805n0:1162_1: pitarā pitunā, pitarehi pitarebhi. Bhāvaniddesena ārādesābhāve pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi
anya-e0805n0:1162_2: pitubhi, pitu pituno pitussa, pitarānaṃ pitānaṃ pitūnaṃ, dīghābhāve pitunaṃ vā, pitarā,
anya-e0805n0:1162_3: pitarehi pitarebhi pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi, pitu pituno pitussa, pitarānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1162_4: pitānaṃ pitūnaṃ pitunaṃ, pitari, pitaresu pitūsu pitusu.
anya-e0805n0:1166: Tatheva syādyuppatti, silopo. So abhibhū, yolope kate te abhibhū.
anya-e0805n0:1167: “Agho rassa”ntiādinā rassattaṃ, vokāro. Katarassattā attābhāvo. Abhibhuvo, bho abhibhu, bhavanto abhibhū abhibhuvo.
anya-e0805n0:1168: Katarassattā veādeso na hoti. Sesaṃ bhikkhusaddasamaṃ, rassattameva viseso. Abhibhuṃ, abhibhū abhibhuvo, abhibhunā, abhibhūhi abhibhūbhi, abhibhuno abhibhussa, abhibhūnaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1169: Evaṃ sayambhū, vessabhū, parābhibhū, sahabhūādayo. Sahabhūsaddassa yonaṃ noādesova viseso. Sahabhū, sahabhū sahabhuvo sahabhuno iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1170_0: Tathā sabbaññūsaddassa yosveva viseso. So sabbaññū te sabbaññū, yolopābhāve rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1170_1: “lato vokāro cā”ti ettha kāraggahaṇena yonaṃ noādeso. Vādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā
anya-e0805n0:1170_2: na ca vokāro. Sabbaññuno, bho sabbaññu, bhonto sabbaññū sabbaññuno, sabbaññuṃ, sabbaññū sabbaññuno iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1171: Evaṃ maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū kataññū tathaññū viññū vidū vedagū pāragū iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:1178: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti yosu. Casaddena nā smā smiṃsuiccetesu ca. “Tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tuggahaṇena yonamokāro, saralopādi. Gāvo tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n0:1180: Goiccetassa okārassa āva avaiccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Seddena yo nā sa smāsmiṃsuiccetesu ca avādeso hoti. Gavo gacchanti, he go, he gāvo he gavo.
anya-e0805n0:1183: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa antasarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Āvassa a āva, tassa āvasaddantassa. “Aṃmo”tiādinā niggahītaṃ. Gāvuṃ gāvaṃ gavaṃ, gāvo gavo.
anya-e0805n0:1186: Su hi nāiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā. Casaddena sesesu ca. Goṇo, goṇā, he goṇa he goṇā, goṇaṃ, goṇe, goṇena, goṇehi goṇebhi, goṇassa.
anya-e0805n0:1188: Sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Goṇānaṃ, goṇā goṇasmā goṇamhā, goṇehi goṇebhi, goṇassa, goṇānaṃ, goṇe goṇasmiṃ goṇamhi, goṇesu.
anya-e0805n0:1191: “Go āva se”iti tipadamidaṃ. Gossa o go, gosaddokārassa āvādeso hoti se vibhattimhi. Gāvassa gavassa.
anya-e0805n0:1194: Tato gosaddato parassa naṃvacanassa aṃādeso hoti, gosaddokārassa avādeso ca patimhi pare alutte ca samāse. Casaddena asamāsepi aṃ avādesā. Gavaṃpatissa therassa, gavaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1195: “Suhināsu cā”ti ettha casaddena naṃmhi guādeso. “No ca dvādito naṃmhī”ti sutte casaddena nakārāgamo ca. Gunnaṃgonaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n0:1196: Gāvā gāvamhā gāvasmā gavā gavamhā gavasmā, gohi gobhi, gāvassa gavassa, gavaṃ gunnaṃ gonaṃ, gāve gāvamhi gāvasmiṃ gave gavamhi gavasmiṃ, gāvesu gavesu gosu.
anya-e0805n0:1198: Puriso guṇavā rājā, sā’ggi daṇḍī ca bhikkhu ca;
anya-e0805n0:1201: Asmā nasmā tasmā namhā tamhā, nehi nebhi tehi tebhi, assa nassa tassa, nesaṃ tesaṃ nesānaṃ tesānaṃ, asmiṃ nasmiṃ tasmiṃ namhi tamhi, nesu tesu.
anya-e0805n0:1202: Itthiyaṃ “tā si” itīdha sādesasilopā. Sā kaññā, nattaṃ. Nā tā nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ, nā tā nāyo tāyo, nāya tāya, nāhi tāhi nābhi tābhi.
anya-e0805n0:1203: “Etimāsamī”ti ito etimāggahaṇañca “tassā vā”ti ito taggahaṇañca pañcamiyantavasena vattate “vā”ti ca.
anya-e0805n0:1205: Tato tā etā imāto parassa sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:1208: Tāiccetassa itthiyaṃ vattamānassa antassa ikāro hoti vā saṃ sāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu. Tissāya tassāya assāya nassāya assā nassā tissā tassā nāya tāya, nāsaṃ tāsaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1209: Pañcamīchaṭṭhīsu tatiyācatutthīsamaṃ. Sattamiyaṃ assaṃ nassaṃ tissaṃ tassaṃ nāyaṃ tāyaṃ, nāsu tāsu.
anya-e0805n0:1210: Napuṃsake simhisādesābhāvā nattaṃ. Naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni, naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni, nena tena iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1211: Eta si, “etatesaṃ to”ti sakārādeso. Eso puriso, ete, etaṃ, ete iccādi sabbasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1212: Itthiyaṃ etā si, sādeso. Esā kaññā, etā etāyo, etaṃ, etā etāyo, etāya, etāhi etābhi.
anya-e0805n0:1215: Antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, etā imāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṃsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu. Sādesagatikattā ssāyādesepi. Casaddādhikārato aññekāsaddādīnamantassa ca.
anya-e0805n0:1216: Etissāya etissā etāya, etāsaṃ etāsānaṃ, etāya, etāhi etābhi, etissāya etissā etāya, etāsaṃ etāsānaṃ, etissaṃ etāyaṃ, etāsu.
anya-e0805n0:1217: Casaddato aññissā aññāya, aññissaṃ aññāyaṃ. Ekissā ekāya, ekissaṃ ekāyaṃ. Itarissā itarāya, itarissaṃ itarāyaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1218: Napuṃsake etaṃ, etāni, etaṃ, etāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1222: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṃsakassa ayaṃādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi, silopo. Ayaṃ puriso, ime, imaṃ, ime.
anya-e0805n0:1224: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi. Anitthiliṅgassevetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Anena iminā.
anya-e0805n0:1227: Sabbassa imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā su naṃ hiiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n0:1233: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sa smā smiṃsaṃ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0805n0:1234: Assa imassa, esaṃ esānaṃ imesaṃ imesānaṃ, asmā imasmā imamhā, ehi ebhi imehi imebhi, assa imassa, esaṃ esānaṃ imesaṃ imesānaṃ, asmiṃ imasmiṃ imamhi, esu imesu.
anya-e0805n0:1236_0: Ayaṃ kaññā, imā imāyo, imaṃ, imā imāyo, imāya, imāhi imābhi. Catutthiyaṃ attaṃ, ikāra-
anya-e0805n0:1236_1: ssāyādesā ca, assāya imissāya assā imissā imāya, imāsaṃ imāsānaṃ. Sattamiyaṃ assaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1236_2: imissaṃ imissā vā, “tesu vuddhilopā”dinā smiṃvacanassa vā sādeso. Imāyaṃ, imāsu. Sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1237: Napuṃsake ima si, “savibhattissa, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:1239: Napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṃ hoti vā aṃ sisu paresu.
anya-e0805n0:1240: Idaṃ cittaṃ virocati, imaṃ, imāni, idaṃ pupphaṃ passasi, imaṃ, imāni, anena iminā, ehi ebhi imehi imebhi iccādi pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1244: Anapuṃsakassa amusaddassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi pare. Asu rājā.
anya-e0805n0:1247: Sabbato sabbanāmato paro kaiccayamāgamo hoti vā. Puna sabbatoggahaṇena hīnāditopi ko. “Amussa mo sa”nti vinādhikārena yogena kakārepi sādeso.
anya-e0805n0:1248: Asuko, asukā, asukaṃ. Sādesābhāve amuko, amukā, amukaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1249: Bahuvacane “lato vokāro cā”ti sutte anuvattamānavāggahaṇena vokāro na hoti, niccaṃ yolopo, dīgho ca.
anya-e0805n0:1250_0: Amū purisā, amuṃ, amū, amunā, amūhi amūbhi amuhi amubhi, amussa. “Amussādu”nti vinādhikārena
anya-e0805n0:1250_1: yogena aduṃādeso, adussa, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ amusaṃ amusānaṃ, amusmā amumhā, amūhi amūbhi
anya-e0805n0:1250_2: amuhi amubhi, amussa adussa, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ amusaṃ amusānaṃ, amusmiṃ amumhi, amūsu amusu.
anya-e0805n0:1252_0: Asu kaññā asukā amukā vā, amū amuyo, amuṃ, amū amuyo, amuyā, amūhi amūbhi, amussā
anya-e0805n0:1252_1: amuyā, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ, amuyā, amūhi amūbhi, amussā amuyā, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ, amussaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1253: Napuṃsake amusi. “Savibhattissa”, imassidamiccādito “aṃsisu napuṃsake”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:1255: Napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṃ hoti aṃsisu paresu. Aduṃ pupphaṃ, amū amūni, aduṃ, amū amūni, amunā iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1257: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti ito “kissa, ka”iti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:1259_0: Kimiccetassa kasaddo ādeso hoti vappaccayato sesesu vibhattibhedesu. Ettha ca “kissa
anya-e0805n0:1259_1: ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena vappaccayāvasiṭṭha thamādippaccayānaṃ gahitattā sesaggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:1259_2: vibhattiyova gayhante. Caggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ, tena “kissa, kismi”ntiādi
anya-e0805n0:1260: Ko eso, ke, kaṃ, ke, kena, kehi kebhi, kassa kissa, niggahītalopādi, kesaṃ kesānaṃ, kasmā kamhā, kehi kebhi, kassa kissa, kesaṃ kesānaṃ, kasmiṃ kismiṃ kamhi kimhi, kesu.
anya-e0805n0:1261: Itthiyaṃ “kiṃ si”itīdha “sesesu cā”ti vibhattiyaṃ parāyaṃ kādese kate “itthiyamato āppaccayo”ti majjhe āppaccayo, silopo.
anya-e0805n0:1262: Kā esā kaññā, kā kāyo, kaṃ, kā kāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1263: Napuṃsake kiṃ si, lopavidhissa balavatarattā paṭhamaṃ silope kate puna vibhattiparattābhāvā, “tadanuparodhenā”ti paribhāsato vā kādesābhāvo. Kiṃ etaṃ, kāni.
anya-e0805n0:1264: Dutiyekavacane “kvaci lopa”nti niggahītalope kate “aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti niggahītaṃ. Kiṃ, kāni iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1265: Ekasaddo saṅkhyātulyāsahāyaññavacano. Yadā saṅkhyāvacano, tadā sabbatthekavacanantova, aññattha bahuvacanantopi. Eko, ekā, ekaṃ iccādi sabbattha sabbasaddasamaṃ. Saṃsāsveva viseso.
anya-e0805n0:1267_0: “Ubha yo” itīdha “tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tuggahaṇena kvaci yonamokāro. Ubho purisāubhe
anya-e0805n0:1267_1: vā, ubho purise ubhe. Su hisu “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā kvaci ekārassokāro. Ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi.
anya-e0805n0:1270: Ubhinnaṃ, ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi, ubhinnaṃ, ubhosu ubhesu.
anya-e0805n0:1271: Dviādayo saṅkhyāsaṅkhyeyyavacanā, bahūnaṃ vācitattā sadā bahuvacanantāva.
anya-e0805n0:1274_0: Dviiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānassa savibhattissa dveiccādeso
anya-e0805n0:1274_1: hoti yosu paresu. Casaddena duve ca, kvaci duvi ca naṃmhi. Bahuvacanuccāraṇaṃ dvisaddato
anya-e0805n0:1274_2: bahuvacanameva hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ. Dve dhammā, dve itthiyo, dve rūpāni, duve vā,
anya-e0805n0:1277_0: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Casaddaggahaṇena itthiyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1277_1: ti ca tusaddato ssañcāgamo naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Dvinnaṃ duvinnaṃ vā, dvīhi dvībhi,
anya-e0805n0:1281: 230. Ti catunnaṃ tisso catasso tayocattārotīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0805n0:1282_0: Ti catunnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1282_1: tisso catasso tayo cattārotīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yosu paresu. Tayo purisā,
anya-e0805n0:1285: Tiiccetasmā saṅkhyāsaddā parassa naṃvacanassa iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃiccete ādesā honti, saralopādi. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīhi tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0805n0:1286: Itthiyaṃ tisso itthiyo, tisso, tīhi tībhi, naṃmhi ssañcāgamo, tissannaṃ, ssaṃbyavadhānato iṇṇābhāvo, sesaṃ samaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1288_0: Tathā catusaddassapi yosu “ticatunna”ntiādinā yathāvuttādeso, “tato yonamo tū”ti
anya-e0805n0:1288_1: ettha tusaddena kvaci okāro ca. Cattāro caturo vā, cattāro caturo, catūhi catūbhi
anya-e0805n0:1288_2: catubbhi, catunnaṃ, nakārāgamo. Catūhi catūbhi catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūsu.
anya-e0805n0:1289: Itthiyaṃ catasso, catasso, naṃmhi ssañcāgamo, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā caturukārassa akāro. Catassannaṃ. Sesaṃ samaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1302: Tesaṃ panāliṅgattā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpaṃ. “Tumhamha”iti ṭhite syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n0:1305_0: Sabbesaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tvaṃahaṃiccete ādesā honti simhi
anya-e0805n0:1305_1: vibhattimhi. Casaddena tumhassa tuvañca hoti. Tvaṃ pumā, tvaṃ itthī, tvaṃ napuṃsakaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1305_2: tuvaṃ satthā vā. Ahaṃ pumā, ahaṃ itthī, ahaṃ napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1306: Bahuvacane “sabbanāmakārate paṭhamo”ti ekāro. Tumhe tiṭṭhatha, bhiyyo amhe mahemase.
anya-e0805n0:1309: Sabbassa amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṃādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame. Mayaṃ gacchāma.
anya-e0805n0:1310: Ettha ca ekasmimpi gāravabahumānena bahuttasamāropā bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1313: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavaṃ mamaṃiccete ādesā honti navā yathākkamaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Tavaṃ, mamaṃ passa.
anya-e0805n0:1315: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ maṃiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Taṃ, maṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1317: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃiccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Tuvaṃ tvaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1320: Tumhamhehi paro appaṭhamo yo ākaṃ hoti vā. Tumhākaṃ passāmi, tumhe passāmi, amhākaṃ passasi, amhe passasi.
anya-e0805n0:1322: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:1324: Tayā tayiiccetesaṃ takāro tvattamāpajjate vā. Tvayā tayā, mayā, tumhehi tumhebhi, amhehi amhebhi.
anya-e0805n0:1327: Tumhamhehi sassa vibhattissa amādeso hoti vā. Tumhaṃ, amhaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0805n0:1329: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi, vikappenāyaṃ vijjhantarassa vijjamānattā.
anya-e0805n0:1332: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tuyhaṃmayhaṃiccete ādesā ca honti se vibhattimhi. Tava, mama tuyhaṃ, mayhaṃ vā dīyate.
anya-e0805n0:1334: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṃādeso hoti se vibhattimhi. Mamaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0805n0:1337: Tumhamhehi parassa naṃvacanassa ākamiccādeso hoti, añca. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā amhassa kvaci asmādeso. Tumhaṃ tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ amhākaṃ asmākaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n0:1338_0: Pañcamiyaṃ “amhatumhanturāja”iccādinā smāvacanassa nābhāvātideso. Tayā, mayā apeti,
anya-e0805n0:1338_1: tumhehi, amhehi tumhebhi amhebhi, tumhaṃ amhaṃ tava mama, tuyhaṃ, mayhaṃ mamaṃ pariggaho,
anya-e0805n0:1338_2: tumhaṃ tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ amhākaṃ asmākaṃ dhammatā.
anya-e0805n0:1341: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayi mayiiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. Takārassa tvattaṃ. Tvayi tayi mayi, tumhesu amhesu.
anya-e0805n0:1342: Tesaṃ eva tumha amhasaddānaṃ padato paresaṃ kvaci ādesantaravidhāne rūpabhedo.
anya-e0805n0:1345_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ vo noādesā honti yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1345_1: dutiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsu bahuvacanesu navā. Ettha ca “ekavacanesū”ti vakkhamānattā
anya-e0805n0:1345_2: “bahuvacanesū”ti laddhaṃ. Pahāya vo gamissāmi, mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, dhammaṃ vo
anya-e0805n0:1345_3: bhikkhave desissāmi, saṃvibhajetha no rajjena, tuṭṭhosmi vo pakatiyā, satthā no bhagavā anuppatto.
anya-e0805n0:1346: Navāti kiṃ? Bhayaṃ tumhāka no siyā, eso amhākaṃ satthā.
anya-e0805n0:1349_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te meādesā honti yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1349_1: catutthīchaṭṭhīsu ekavacanesu navā. Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dadāhi me gāmavaraṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1349_2: idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, ayaṃ me putto.
anya-e0805n0:1350: Navāti kiṃ? Idaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammi, suṇātha vacanaṃ mama.
anya-e0805n0:1352: Vo no te meti ye ime;
anya-e0805n0:1356: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava;
anya-e0805n0:1358: Evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcāti.
anya-e0805n0:1359: Padatoti kiṃ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0805n0:1362: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te meādesā na honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ ārogyaṃ. So mamabravīti.
anya-e0805n0:1365_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te me ādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1365_1: tatiyekavacane pare. Kataṃ te pāpaṃ, kataṃ tayā pāpaṃ, kataṃ me puññaṃ, kataṃ mayā puññaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1368: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ vo noādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ tatiyābahuvacane pare. Kataṃ vo kammaṃ, kataṃ no kammaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1369: Bahuvacananiddesena kvaci yomhi paṭhame ca vo no honti. Gāmaṃ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0805n0:1370: Tathā pañcādīnamaṭṭhārasantānaṃ, katisaddassa cāliṅgattā tiliṅgepi samānarūpaṃ, aliṅgattā eva pañcādito itthippaccayābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:1372: “Yosu dvinnaṃ dve cā”ti ito “yosū”ti vattate, “itthipumanapuṃsakasaṅkhya”nti ca.
anya-e0805n0:1374_0: Antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, pañcādīnaṃ aṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānamantassa
anya-e0805n0:1374_1: savibhattissa akāro hoti yosu paresu. Ā eādesāpavādoyaṃ, pañcakkhandhā, pañca gatiyo,
anya-e0805n0:1377_0: Pañcādīnamaṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānamanto attamāpajjate su naṃ hiiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0805n0:1377_1: Ettadīghāpavādoyaṃ. Pañcahi pañcabhi, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi pañcabhi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu.
anya-e0805n0:1377_2: Evaṃ cha sa tta aṭṭhanava dasasaddā.
anya-e0805n0:1378: “Ekañca dasa cā”ti atthe dvandasamāse, “ekena adhikā dasā”ti atthe tappurise vā kate
anya-e0805n0:1381: Dviekaaṭṭhaiccetesamanto ākāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne uttarapade pare. Vavatthitavibhāsāyaṃ. Ekādasa, dvādasa, aṭṭhārasa.
anya-e0805n0:1385: Ekādito saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ādissa dassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Sesaṃ samaṃ. Ekārasa, ekādasa.
anya-e0805n0:1386: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti dvidasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:1389: Vīsati dasaiccetesu paresu dvisaddassa bā hoti vā. Tusaddena tiṃsāyampi. Rakāro, āttañca. Bārasa, dvādasa.
anya-e0805n0:1390: Tayo ca dasa ca, tīhi vā adhikā dasāti terasa. Ettha “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā tisaddassa teādeso ānavutiyā.
anya-e0805n0:1391: Cattāro ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra –
anya-e0805n0:1393: 256. Catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cu copi navā.
anya-e0805n0:1394: Gaṇane dasassādimhi ṭhitassa catuiccetassa upapadassa tusaddo lopo hoti, uttarapadādimhi ṭhitassa catūpapadassa cakārassa cu coādesā honti navā. Cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa.
anya-e0805n0:1395: Apiggahaṇena anupapadassāpi gaṇane padādicakārassa lopo, cu co honti navā. Yathā – tālīsaṃ, cuttālīsaṃ, cottālīsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1396: Pañca ca dasa ca, pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe pañcadasa. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsatīsu kvaci pannapaṇṇaādesā. Pannarasa, paṇṇarasa.
anya-e0805n0:1397: Cha ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe chadasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:1400: Chaiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa niccaṃ so hoti dase pare.
anya-e0805n0:1404: Laḷānamaviseso. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, tena “soḷasa” iti niccaṃ, “teḷasa, terasa, cattālīsaṃ, cattārīsa”miti vibhāsā, dasa pannarasādīsu na ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1405: Satta ca dasa ca, sattahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe sattarasa, sattadasa.
anya-e0805n0:1406: Aṭṭha ca dasa ca, aṭṭhahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe aṭṭhadasa itīdha ātte kate –
anya-e0805n0:1409: Aṭṭhādito ca dasasaddassa dakārassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa.
anya-e0805n0:1412: Niccaṃ yolopādi, rassattaṃ, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passasi, katihi katibhi, katinaṃ, katihi katibhi, katinaṃ, katisu.
anya-e0805n0:1416: Tesaṃ panāliṅgattā, nipātattā ca tiliṅge, vacanadvaye ca samānaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1419: Sabbasmā suddhanāmato, sabbanāmato ca liṅgamhā kvaci topaccayo hoti pañcamyatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1421: Toādi yesaṃ dānipariyantānaṃ paccayānaṃ te honti paccayā tvādayo, te paccayā vibhattisaññā honti. Tena tadantānampi vibhatyantapadattaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1422_0: Purisato, evaṃ rājato vā, corato vā, aggito vā, gahapatito vā, hatthito, hetuto,
anya-e0805n0:1422_1: sabbaññuto, kaññato, yuttito, itthito, bhikkhunito, ettha ca “kvacādimajjhuttarānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1422_2: dīgharassāpaccayesu cā”ti topaccaye rassattaṃ. Yāguto, jambuto, cittato, āyuto iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1423: Sabbanāmato sabbasmā, sabbehīti vā atthe sabbato, evaṃ yato, tato, katarato, katamato, itarato, aññato, ekato, ubhayato, pubbato, parato, aparato, dakkhiṇato, uttarato, amuto.
anya-e0805n0:1426: Kimiccetassa ku hoti trato thaiccetesu ca paresu. Kasmā, kehīti vā kuto.
anya-e0805n0:1429: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Etasmā, etehīti vā ato.
anya-e0805n0:1432: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Dvittaṃ, etto.
anya-e0805n0:1435: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṃdānihatodhaiccetesu ca. Imasmāti ito.
anya-e0805n0:1436_0: “Kvaci to”ti yogavibhāgena ādippabhutīhi to sattamiyatthe. Aniccādīhi tatiyatthe
anya-e0805n0:1436_1: ca. Yathā – ādimhībhi atthe ādito. Evaṃ majjhato, ekato, purato, pacchato, passato,
anya-e0805n0:1436_2: piṭṭhito, pādato, sīsato, aggato, mūlato, parato iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:1437: Tatiyatthe aniccenāti aniccato, aniccato sammasati. Evaṃ dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:1440_0: Sabbanāmehi parā tra thaiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbasmiṃ, sabbesu
anya-e0805n0:1440_1: cāti sabbatra sabbattha. Evaṃ yatra yattha, tatra tattha, itaratra itarattha, aññatra
anya-e0805n0:1440_2: aññattha, ubhayatra ubhayattha, paratra parattha, kutra kuttha, “tratothesu cā”ti
anya-e0805n0:1440_3: kuttaṃ. “Kissa ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena kādeso. Kattha, amutra amuttha.
anya-e0805n0:1443: Sabbasseva etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṃ tre pare. Atra. “Sabbassetassākāro vā”ti attaṃ, “e tothesu cā”ti ekāro, attha, ettha.
anya-e0805n0:1444: “Kvaci, atthe, sattamiyā”ti ca adhikāro, sabbasminti atthe –
anya-e0805n0:1446: Sabbaiccetasmā dhippaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi.
anya-e0805n0:1450: Kimiccetassa kasaddo ādeso hoti vappaccayepare. Caggahaṇena thahamādiavappaccayepi. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā kakāre akārassa lopo ca vamhi. Kva gatosi tvaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1453: Kimiccetasmā hiṃ haṃ hiñcanaṃiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1456: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṃ haṃ iccetesu. Caggahaṇena hiñcanaṃdācanamiccādīsupi. Kisminti kuhiṃ, kuhaṃ, kuhiñcanaṃ, kahaṃ kādeso.
anya-e0805n0:1459: Taiccetasmā ca sabbanāmato hiṃhaṃpaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasminti tahiṃ, tahaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1461: Imasaddato hadhappaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. “Imassi tha”ntiādinā ikāro. Imasminti iha, idha.
anya-e0805n0:1463: Yaiccetasmā sabbanāmato hiṃpaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Yasminti yahiṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1467: Kiṃ sabbaaññaekayaiccetehi sabbanāmehi dāpaccayo hoti. Kuiccetasmā dācanañca kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1468: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena kādeso, kadā.
anya-e0805n0:1470: Sabbaiccetassa saddassa sasaddādeso hoti vā dāpaccaye pare. Sabbasmiṃ kāleti sadā, sabbadā.
anya-e0805n0:1471: Evaṃ aññadā, ekadā, yadā, kasmiṃ kāleti kudācanaṃ, “ku hiṃhaṃsu cā”ti sutte casaddena kuttaṃ, “ku”iti nipātanena vā.
anya-e0805n0:1474: Taiccetasmā sabbanāmato dānidāpaccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasmiṃ kāleti tadāni, tadā.
anya-e0805n0:1476: Imasaddato rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1479: Sabbassa imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare. Imasmiṃ kāleti etarahi.
anya-e0805n0:1481: Sabbasseva imasaddassa akāro hoti dhunāpaccaye pare. Adhunā, imasaddassa ikāro. Imasmiṃ kāleti idāni.
anya-e0805n0:1485: Pa parā ni nī u du saṃ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa iti pīsati upasaggā.
anya-e0805n0:1486_0: Tattha pasaddo pakārā’dikamma padhāni’ssariya’ntobhāvaviyoga tappara bhusattha sambhavatitti
anya-e0805n0:1486_1: anāvila patthanādīsu. Paiti ayamupasaggo etesu pakārādīsu atthesu vattati, yathā
anya-e0805n0:1486_2: – pakāre paññā, ādikamme vippakataṃ, padhāne paṇītaṃ, padhānaṃ padhānattaṃ, issariye
anya-e0805n0:1486_3: pabhū ayaṃ desassa, antobhāve pakkhittaṃ, viyoge pavāsī, tappare pācariyo, bhusatthe
anya-e0805n0:1486_4: pavuddhakāyo, sambhave himavatā gaṅgā pabhavati, tittiyaṃ pahūtamannaṃ, anāvile pasannamudakaṃ, patthane paṇihitaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1487: Parāiti parihāni parājaya gativikkamā’masanādīsu. Yathā – parihāniyaṃ parābhavo, parājaye parājito, gatiyaṃ parāyanaṃ. Vikkame parakkamati, āmasane aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1488_0: Niiti nissesa niggata nīharaṇa’ntopavesanā’bhāvanisedha nikkhanta pātubhāvā’vadhāraṇa
anya-e0805n0:1488_1: vibhajana upamū’padhāraṇā’vasānachekādīsu. Nissese nirutti, niravasesaṃ deti, niggate
anya-e0805n0:1488_2: nikkileso, niyyāti, nīharaṇe niddhāraṇaṃ, antopavesane nikhāto, abhāve nimmakkhikaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1488_3: nisedhe nivāreti, nikkhante nibbāno, nibbānaṃ, pātubhāve nimmitaṃ, avadhāraṇe nicchayo,
anya-e0805n0:1488_4: vibhajane niddeso, upamāyaṃ nidassanaṃ, upadhāraṇe nisāmanaṃ, avasāne niṭṭhitaṃ, cheke nipuṇo.
anya-e0805n0:1489: Nīiti nīharaṇā’varaṇādīsu. Nīharaṇe nīharati, āvaraṇe nīvaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1490_0: Uiti uggatu’ddhakamma padhāna viyoga sambhava atthalābhasatti sarūpakathanādīsu.
anya-e0805n0:1490_1: Uggate uggacchati, uddhakamme āsanā uṭṭhito, ukkhepo, padhāne uttamo, lokuttaro,
anya-e0805n0:1490_2: viyoge ubbāsito, sambhave ubbhūto, atthalābhe uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, sattiyaṃ ussahati gantuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1491_0: Duiti asobhanā’bhāvakucchitā’samiddhi kiccha virūpatādīsu. Asobhane duggandho, abhāve
anya-e0805n0:1491_1: dubbhikkhaṃ, kucchite dukkaṭaṃ, asamiddhiyaṃ dussassaṃ, kicche dukkaraṃ, virūpatāyaṃ dubbaṇṇo, dummukho.
anya-e0805n0:1492_0: Saṃiti samodhāna sammāsama samantabhāvasaṅgata saṅkhepabhusattha sahattha appattha
anya-e0805n0:1492_1: pabhavā’bhimukhabhāva saṅgaha pidhāna punappunakaraṇa samiddhādīsu. Samodhāne sandhi,
anya-e0805n0:1492_2: sammāsamesu samādhi, sampayutto, samantabhāve saṃkiṇṇā samullapanā, saṅgate saṅgamo,
anya-e0805n0:1492_3: saṅkhepe samāso, bhusatthe sāratto, sahatthe saṃvāso, appatthe samaggho. Pabhave
anya-e0805n0:1492_4: sambhavo, abhimukhabhāve sammukhaṃ, saṅgahe saṅgaṇhāti, pidhāne saṃvutaṃ, punappunakaraṇe
anya-e0805n0:1493: Viiti visesa vividha viruddha vigata viyoga virūpatādīsu. Visese vimutti visiṭṭho, vividhe vimati vicitraṃ, viruddhe vivādo, vigate vimalaṃ, viyoge vippayutto, virūpatāyaṃ virūpo.
anya-e0805n0:1494_0: Avaiti adhobhāga viyoga paribhava jānana suddhi nicchayadesa theyyādīsu. Adhobhāge
anya-e0805n0:1494_1: avakkhittacakkhu, viyoge omukkaupāhano avakokilaṃ vanaṃ, paribhave avajānanaṃ avamaññati,
anya-e0805n0:1494_2: jānane avagacchati, suddhiyaṃ vodānaṃ, nicchaye avadhāraṇaṃ, dese avakāso, theyye avahāro.
anya-e0805n0:1495_0: Anuiti anugatā’nupacchinna pacchattha bhusattha sādissa hīnatatiyattha lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna
anya-e0805n0:1495_1: bhāga vicchādīsu. Anugate anveti, anupacchinne anusayo, pacchāsaddatthe anurathaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1495_2: bhusatthe anuratto, sādisse anurūpaṃ. Hīne anusāriputtaṃ paññavanto, tatiyatthe nadimanvavasitā
anya-e0805n0:1495_3: senā, lakkhaṇe rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate vijju, itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ
anya-e0805n0:1495_4: anu, bhāge yadettha maṃ anusiyā taṃ dīyatu, vicchāyaṃ rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando.
anya-e0805n0:1496_0: Pariiti samantatobhāva pariccheda vajjanā’liṅgana nivāsanapūjābhojanā’vajānana dosakkhāna
anya-e0805n0:1496_1: lakkhaṇādīsu. Samantatobhāve parivuto, paricchede pariññeyyaṃ, vajjane pariharati,
anya-e0805n0:1496_2: āliṅgane parissajati, nivāsane vatthaṃ paridhassati, pūjāyaṃ pāricariyā, bhojane
anya-e0805n0:1496_3: bhikkhuṃ parivisati. Avajānane paribhavati, dosakkhāne paribhāsati, lakkhaṇādīsu
anya-e0805n0:1497_1: Adhike adhisīlaṃ, issare adhipati, adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, uparibhāve adhirohati,
anya-e0805n0:1497_2: pathaviṃ adhisessati, adhibhavane adhibhavati, ajjhāyane byākaraṇamadhīte, adhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0805n0:1497_3: bhūmikampādiṃ adhiṭṭhāti, nicchaye adhimokkho, pāpuṇane bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
anya-e0805n0:1498_0: Abhiiti abhimukhabhāva visiṭṭhā’dhi ku’ddhakamma kula sāruppavandana lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna
anya-e0805n0:1498_1: vicchādīsu. Abhimukhabhāve abhimukho abhikkamati, visiṭṭhe abhidhammo, adhike abhivassati,
anya-e0805n0:1498_2: uddhakamme abhiruhati, kule abhijāto, sāruppe abhirūpo, vandane abhivādeti, lakkhaṇādīsu purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1499_0: Patiiti patigata paṭilomapatinidhi patidāna nisedhanivattana sādissa patikaraṇā’dāna
anya-e0805n0:1499_1: patibodha paṭicca lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna bhāgavicchādīsu. Patigate paccakkhaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1499_2: paṭilome patisotaṃ, patinidhimhi ācariyato pati sisso, patidāne telatthikassa ghataṃ
anya-e0805n0:1499_3: pati dadāti, nisedhe paṭisedhanaṃ, nivattane paṭikkamati, sādisse patirūpakaṃ, patikaraṇe
anya-e0805n0:1499_4: patikāro, ādāne patiggaṇhāti, patibodhe paṭivedho, paṭicce paccayo, lakkhaṇādīsu purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1500: Suiti sobhana suṭṭhusammā samiddhi sukhatthādīsu. Sobhane sugandho, suṭṭhusammādatthesu suṭṭhu gato sugato, sammā gatotipi sugato, samiddhiyaṃ subhikkhaṃ, sukhatthe sukaro.
anya-e0805n0:1501_1: nivāsa samīpa’vhānādīsu. Abhimukhabhāve āgacchati, uddhakamme ārohati, mariyādāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1501_2: āpabbatā khettaṃ, abhividhimhi ākumāraṃ yaso kaccāyanassa, pattiyaṃ āpattimāpanno,
anya-e0805n0:1501_3: icchāyaṃ ākaṅkhā, parissajane āliṅganaṃ, ādikamme ārambho, gahaṇe ādīyati ālambati,
anya-e0805n0:1501_4: nivāse āvasatho, samīpe āsannaṃ, avhāne āmantesi.
anya-e0805n0:1502: Atiiti abhikkamanā’tikkantā’tisaya bhusatthādīsu. Atikkamane atirocati amhehi, atīto, atikkante accantaṃ, atisaye atikusalo, bhusatthe atikkodho ativuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:1503_0: Apiiti sambhāvanā’pekkhā samuccaya garaha pañhādīsu. Sambhāvanāyaṃ api dibbesu kāmesu,
anya-e0805n0:1503_1: merumpi vinivijjhitvā gaccheyya, apekkhāyaṃ ayampi dhammo aniyato, samuccaye itipi
anya-e0805n0:1503_2: arahaṃ, antampi antaguṇampi ādāya, garahe api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka, pañhe api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha.
anya-e0805n0:1504: Apaiti apagata garaha vajjana pūjā padussanādīsu. Apagate apamāno apeto, garahe apagabbho, vajjane apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, pūjāyaṃ vuddhāpacāyī, padussane aparajjhati.
anya-e0805n0:1505_0: Upaiti upagamana samīpū’papatti sādissā’dhikū’paribhāvā’nasana dosakkhāna saññā pubbakamma
anya-e0805n0:1505_1: pūjā gayhākāra bhusatthādīsu. Upagamane nisinnaṃ vā upanisīdeyya, samīpe upanagaraṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1505_2: upapattiyaṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati, atha vā upapatti yutti, yathā – upapattito ikkhatīti
anya-e0805n0:1505_3: upekkhā, sādisse upamānaṃ upamā, adhike upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, uparibhāve upasampanno,
anya-e0805n0:1505_4: anasane upavāso, dosakkhāne paraṃ upapadati, saññāyaṃ upadhā upasaggo, pubbakamme
anya-e0805n0:1505_5: upakkamo upakāro, pūjāyaṃ buddhupaṭṭhāko, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, gayhākāre soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1505_6: bhusatthe upādānaṃ, upāyāso, upanissayoti. Iti anekatthā hi upasaggā.
anya-e0805n0:1507: “Upasagga nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
anya-e0805n0:1509: Tattha upasaggānaṃ nāmākhyātavisesakattā liṅgasaññāyaṃ aniyamena syādimhi sampatte tesaṃ saṅkhyākammādibhedābhāvā tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:1512_0: Āvusosaddato, upasagganipātehi ca sabbāsaṃ parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. Ādisaddena
anya-e0805n0:1512_1: kvaci suttapadādīhi ca. Ettha ca āvusotimassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ sasaṅkhyattadīpanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1515_0: Paharaṇaṃ pahāro, evaṃ parābhavo, nivāso, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṃhāro, vihāro,
anya-e0805n0:1515_1: avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro,
anya-e0805n0:1515_2: apihāro, apahāro, upahāro. Paharati, parābhavati, nivasati, nīharati, uddharati iccādi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1523: Na no mā a alaṃ halaṃ iccete paṭisedhanatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1526: Tattha atha khalu vata vatha atho assu yagghe hi carahi naṃ taṃ vā ca tuva vo pana have kīva ha tato yathā sudaṃ kho ve haṃ enaṃ seyyathidaṃ iccevamādīni padapūraṇāni.
anya-e0805n0:1539: Āvuso ambho hambho re are hare jeiccete āmantane.
anya-e0805n0:1540: Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāyaṃ, dutiyāyañca.
anya-e0805n0:1541: Sayaṃ sāmaṃ saṃ sammā kinti iccete tatiyatthe, soto dhāpaccayantā ca. Suttaso padaso aniccato dukkhato ekadhā dvidhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1542: Tave tuṃpaccayantā catutthiyā, kātave dātave kātuṃ kāretuṃ dātuṃ dāpetuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1543: So topaccayantā pañcamiyatthe, dīghaso oraso rājato vā corato vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1544: To sattamyatthepi, trathādipaccayantā ca. Ekato purato pacchato passato piṭṭhito pādato sīsato aggato mūlato yatra yattha yahiṃ tatra tattha tahiṃ tahaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1545_0: Samantā sāmantā parito abhito samantato ekajjhaṃ ekamantaṃ heṭṭhā upari uddhaṃ adho
anya-e0805n0:1545_1: tiriyaṃ sammukhā parammukhā āvi raho tiro uccaṃ nīcaṃ anto antarā ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā
anya-e0805n0:1545_2: bāhirā bāhiraṃ bahi oraṃ pāraṃ ārā ārakā pacchā pure huraṃ pecca iccete sattamiyā.
anya-e0805n0:1546_0: Sampati āyati ajja aparajju parajja suve sve parasuve hiyyo pare sajju sāyaṃ pāto
anya-e0805n0:1546_1: kālaṃ kallaṃ divā nattaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ muhuṃ muhuttaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1546_2: purā yadā tadā kadā iccādayo kālasattamiyā. Iti vibhattiyuttāni.
anya-e0805n0:1547: Avibhattiyuttesu ca appeva appevanāma nu iccete saṃsayatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1548: Addhā aññadatthu taggha jātu kāmaṃ sasakkaṃiccete ekaṃsatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1553: Yāva tāva yāvatā tāvatā kittāvatā ettāvatā kīva iccete paricchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1554: Evaṃ sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ āma sādhu iti sampaṭicchanatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1555_0: Yathā tathā yatheva tatheva evaṃ evameva evamevaṃ evampi yathāpi seyyathāpi seyyathāpināma
anya-e0805n0:1555_1: viya iva yathariva tathariva yathānāma tathānāma yathāhi tathāhi yathācatathāca iccete paṭibhāgatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1560: Nāmaiti garaha pasaṃsana saññā pañhesu ca.
anya-e0805n0:1567: Yasmā tasmā tathāhi tena iccete kāraṇacchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1578: Khippaṃ araṃ lahu āsuṃ tuṇṇaṃ aciraṃ sīghatthe.
anya-e0805n0:1588_0: Yathā – passituna passiya passitvāna passitvā disvā disvānadassetvā dātuna datvāna
anya-e0805n0:1588_1: datvā upādāya dāpetvā viññāpetvā viceyya vineyya nihacca samecca apecca upecca ārabbha āgamma iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1589: Evaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggavinimuttaṃ yadabyayalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nipātapadanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1592: Nepātikanti taṃ vuttaṃ, yaṃ abyaya salakkhaṇa”nti.
anya-e0805n0:1599: Tattha ekampi atthaṃ kammādivasena, ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo. Tā pana paṭhamādibhedena sattavidhā.
anya-e0805n0:1603_0: Liṅgassa attho liṅgattho. Ettha ca līnaṃ aṅganti liṅgaṃ, apākaṭo avayavo, purisotiādīnañhi
anya-e0805n0:1603_2: paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pakatirūpaṃ apākaṭattā, avayavattā ca liṅganti vuccati. Atha
anya-e0805n0:1603_4: ca līnassa gamanato, liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā “dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1603_5: liṅga”nti vacanato parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṃ syādivibhatyantapadapakatirūpameva
anya-e0805n0:1604_0: Liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno
anya-e0805n0:1605_0: So pana kammādisaṃsaṭṭho, suddho cāti duvidho. Tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṃ vidhīyamānattā
anya-e0805n0:1605_2: ca suddho saddattho idha liṅgattho nāma.
anya-e0805n0:1606_0: Yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṃsaṭṭho attho, sopi dutiyādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1606_1: puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā, liṅgatthamattassa sambhavato
anya-e0805n0:1610: Saliṅge tāva – eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṃ cittaṃ, etāni cittāni.
anya-e0805n0:1613: Liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte – ca vā ha ahaṃ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1614: “Liṅgatthe paṭhamā”ti adhikicca “ālapane cā”ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā, abhimukhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ ālapanaṃ, āmantanaṃ avhānanti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1615_0: Ettha ca āmantanaṃ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ, katābhimukho
anya-e0805n0:1615_1: pana “gacchā”tiādinā nayena kriyāya yojīyati, tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato
anya-e0805n0:1619: Bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
anya-e0805n0:1623: Anabhihite evāyaṃ, “kammani dutiyāyaṃ tto”ti vacanañcettha ñāpakaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1625: “Yena vā kayirate taṃ karaṇa”nti ito “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:1627: Yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1628_0: Idha liṅgakālavacanamatantaṃ. Karīyatīti kammaṃ. Tattha kārakaṃ, sādhakaṃ kriyānipphattiyā
anya-e0805n0:1628_1: kāraṇamuccate, taṃ pana kārakaṃ chabbidhaṃ kammaṃ kattā karaṇaṃ sampadānamapādānamokāso
anya-e0805n0:1628_2: cāti. Tattha sabhāvato, parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1629_0: Taṃ pana kammaṃ tividhaṃ nibbattanīyaṃ vikaraṇīyaṃ pāpaṇīyañcāti. Yathā – mātā puttaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1629_1: vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṃ janayati. Ghaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ karoti,
anya-e0805n0:1629_2: suvaṇṇaṃ keyūraṃ, kaṭakaṃ vā karoti, vīhayo lunāti. Devadatto nivesanaṃ pavisati,
anya-e0805n0:1629_3: ādiccaṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, paṇḍite payirupāsati.
anya-e0805n0:1633_1: karoti taṃ kamma”nti vuttattā, atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1634: Tattha anicchitakammaṃ yathā – kaṇṭakaṃ maddati, visaṃ gilati, gāmaṃ gacchanto rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0805n0:1635_0: Akathitakammaṃ yathā – yaññadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate brāhmaṇo. Ettha hi “kambala”miti
anya-e0805n0:1635_2: akathitakammaṃ. Tathā samiddhaṃ dhanaṃ bhikkhate, ajaṃ gāmaṃ nayati, parābhavantaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1635_3: purisaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1636: Abhihitakamme pana na hoti, yathā – kaṭo karīyate devadattena, sugatena desito dhammo, yaññadatto kambalaṃ yācīyate brāhmaṇena iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1638: 286. Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṃ kārite vā.
anya-e0805n0:1639_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, budha bodhane, budha avagamane vā, bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu,
anya-e0805n0:1639_1: paṭha byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, hara haraṇe, kara karaṇe, si saye iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1639_2: payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā. Niccasampatte
anya-e0805n0:1639_3: vikappatthoyaṃ, tena tassa pakkhe tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1640_0: Yo koci puriso gāmaṃ gacchati, tamañño payojayati. Puriso purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati,
anya-e0805n0:1640_1: purisena vā gāmaṃ gamayati. Evaṃ sissaṃ dhammaṃ bodheti ācariyo, mātā puttaṃ bhojanaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1640_2: bhojayati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ pāṭheti ācariyo, puriso purisaṃ bhāraṃ hāreti, tathā puriso
anya-e0805n0:1640_3: purisaṃ kammaṃ kārayati, purisena vā kammaṃ kārāpayati, puriso purisaṃ sayāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:1642: Abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṃ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṃ bodhīyate iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1644: Accantaṃ nirantaraṃ saṃyogoaccantasaṃyogo. Kāladdhānaṃ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṃyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1645: Kāle tāva – sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ, māsaṃ maṃsodanaṃ, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nandanaṃ, māsaṃ sajjhāyati, tayo māse abhidhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0805n0:1646: Addhāne – yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0805n0:1647: Accantasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0805n0:1649: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1650: Kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yesaṃ te kammappavacanīyā, parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.
anya-e0805n0:1651_0: Tattha anusaddassa lakkhaṇe, sahatthe, hīne ca kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Yathā
anya-e0805n0:1651_1: – pabbajitamanu pabbajiṃsu, nadimanvavasitā bārāṇasī, nadiyā saha avabaddhāti attho,
anya-e0805n0:1652: Lakkhaṇādīsu “lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo”ti pati pari anūnaṃ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
anya-e0805n0:1653: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṃ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ anu.
anya-e0805n0:1654: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, mātaraṃ pari, mātaraṃ anu.
anya-e0805n0:1655: Bhāge yadettha maṃ pati siyā, maṃ pari, maṃ anu, taṃ dīyatu.
anya-e0805n0:1656: Vicchāyoge atthamatthaṃ pati saddo nivisati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu.
anya-e0805n0:1657: “Abhirabhāge”ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu lakkhaṇādīsu kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ abhi.
anya-e0805n0:1660_0: Chaṭṭhīnaṃ atthe kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti. Antarāabhito parito pati paṭibhātiyoge
anya-e0805n0:1660_1: ayaṃ. Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno, rājagahassa
anya-e0805n0:1660_2: ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho. Abhito gāmaṃ vasati, parito gāmaṃ vasati, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ
anya-e0805n0:1660_3: pati, nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpeti attho. Paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā, upamā maṃ
anya-e0805n0:1663: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1664: Tatiyatthe sace maṃ nālapissati, tvañca maṃ nābhibhāsasi, vinā saddhammaṃ kuto sukhaṃ, upāyamantarena na atthasiddhi.
anya-e0805n0:1665: Sattamiyatthe – kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṃ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
anya-e0805n0:1666: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā. Imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāno.
anya-e0805n0:1667_0: Upādipubbassa vasadhātussa payoge – gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, vihāraṃ adhivasati,
anya-e0805n0:1667_1: gāmaṃ āvasati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. Tathā pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṃ ajjhāvasati.
anya-e0805n0:1668: Tappānacāresu – nadiṃ pivati, gāmaṃ carati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1674: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṃ abyavadhānena karoti, yena vā vikaroti, yena vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1675: Karīyate anenāti karaṇaṃ, ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṃ kriyāsādhakatte “yena vā kayirate”ti visesetvā vacanaṃ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1678: Sambhāvīyati taṃ vuttaṃ, karaṇaṃ nāma kāraka”nti.
anya-e0805n0:1680: Yathā – hatthena kammaṃ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, manasā dhammaṃ viññāya. Dattena vīhayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti.
anya-e0805n0:1683_0: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Caggahaṇena itthambhūtalakkhaṇe,
anya-e0805n0:1683_1: kriyāpavagge, pubbasadisasamūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sakhilatthādiyoge, kāladdhānesu,
anya-e0805n0:1686: Yo kriyaṃ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1687_0: So tividho suddhakattā hetukattā kammakattāti. Tattha yo sayameva kriyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0805n0:1687_1: so suddhakattā. Yo aññaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ akarontaṃ kammaṃ niyojeti, so hetukattā,
anya-e0805n0:1687_2: yathā – gantuṃ samattho devadatto, tamañño payojeti “gamayati devadatta”nti.
anya-e0805n0:1688_0: Yaṃ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tamañño payojayati “gamayati devadatta”nti
anya-e0805n0:1688_1: hetvatthanidassanaṃ, tampi sāmatthiyadassanavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā yadi
anya-e0805n0:1688_2: sayameva gacchati, kiṃ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṃ balena kārayati, pāsāṇaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1692: Yo kattāraṃ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
anya-e0805n0:1693: Yo pana parassa kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so kammakattā nāma, yathā – sayaṃ karīyate kaṭo, sayameva paccate odanoti.
anya-e0805n0:1696: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0805n0:1701_0: Nanu ca “saṃyogo jāyate”tiādīsu kathaṃ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti?
anya-e0805n0:1701_1: Vuccate – lokasaṅketasiddho hi saddappayogo, avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya
anya-e0805n0:1701_2: vijjamānaṃ viya gahetvā voharati, vikappabuddhigahitākāroyeva hi saddenābhidhīyate,
anya-e0805n0:1701_3: na tu vatthusabhāvo, aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo
anya-e0805n0:1701_4: ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā, tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi
anya-e0805n0:1701_5: saddappavatti hotīti asato saṃyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
anya-e0805n0:1705: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṃyogo jāyate iti;
anya-e0805n0:1707: Tatra tatiyā jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kārito vihāro.
anya-e0805n0:1708: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
anya-e0805n0:1709_0: Itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe – sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1709_1: ujjhāpesi, ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi.
anya-e0805n0:1710: Apavagge – ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāyāsi, navahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesi, yojanena adhītaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, kriyāpavaggoti kriyāya āsuṃ pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1711_0: Pubbādiyoge – māsena pubbo, pitarā sadiso, mātarā samo, kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo,
anya-e0805n0:1711_1: asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, vācāya nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṃ, tilena missakaṃ, vācāya
anya-e0805n0:1711_2: sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, pitarā tulyo.
anya-e0805n0:1717: Saha saddhiṃ samaṃ nānā vinā alaṃ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena sahatthepi.
anya-e0805n0:1718_0: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. Yathā – vitakkena saha
anya-e0805n0:1718_1: vattati, puttena saha thūlo, antevāsikasaddhivihārikehi saha ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ lābho,
anya-e0805n0:1718_2: nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṃ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi
anya-e0805n0:1718_3: nānābhāvo vinābhāvo, saṅgho vināpi gaggena uposathaṃ kareyya, alaṃ te idha vāsena,
anya-e0805n0:1718_4: kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇena, purisena thāmadassinā, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā.
anya-e0805n0:1719: Sahatthe – devadatto rājagahaṃ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṃvāso.
anya-e0805n0:1721: Yogaggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1722: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetu, soyeva attho, tasmiṃ hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati.
anya-e0805n0:1728: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0805n0:1729: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0805n0:1730: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
anya-e0805n0:1733_0: Kāladdhānadisādesādīsu cāyaṃ. Tena samayena, tena kālena, kālena dhammassavaṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1733_1: so vo mamaccayena satthā, māsena bhuñjati, yojanena dhāvati. Puratthimena dhataraṭṭho,
anya-e0805n0:1733_2: dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, pacchimena virūpakkho, uttarena kasivanto janoghamaparena ca,
anya-e0805n0:1735: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate, tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṃ, sarīraṃ. Akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
anya-e0805n0:1737: Visesīyati visesitabbaṃ anenāti visesanaṃ, gottādi. Tasmiṃ gottanāmajātisippavayoguṇasaṅkhāte visesanatthe tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena pakatiādīhi ca. Gottena gotamo nātho.
anya-e0805n0:1738: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
anya-e0805n0:1742: Sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṃso vayasā, vijjāya sādhu, paññāya sādhu, tapasā uttamo, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo.
anya-e0805n0:1743: Pakatiādīsu – pakatiyā abhirūpo, yebhuyyena mattikā, samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti, sahassena assake kiṇāti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1748: 302. Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1749: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti. Sammā padīyate assāti sampadānaṃ, paṭiggāhako.
anya-e0805n0:1750_0: Taṃ pana tividhaṃ diyyamānassānivāraṇajjhesanānumativasena. Yathā – buddhassa pupphaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1750_1: yajati, bodhirukkhassa jalaṃ dadāti. Ajjhesane – yācakānaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti. Anumatiyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1753: Sampadānaṃ tidhā vuttaṃ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo”ti.
anya-e0805n0:1755: Rocanādīsu pana – samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ, māyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, yassāyasmato khamati, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṃ dhārayate yaññadatto.
anya-e0805n0:1757_0: 303. Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha
anya-e0805n0:1757_1: tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0805n0:1758_0: Catuppadamidaṃ. Silāgha katthane, hanu apanayane, ṭhā gatinivattimhi, sapa akkose,
anya-e0805n0:1758_1: dhara dhāraṇe, piha icchāyaṃ iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge, kudha kope, duha jighaṃsāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1758_2: issa issāyaṃ, usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṃ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṃ payoge ca rādha
anya-e0805n0:1758_3: hiṃsāsaṃrādhesu, ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṃ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti
anya-e0805n0:1758_4: imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe,
anya-e0805n0:1758_5: tumatthe, alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṃ kammani
anya-e0805n0:1758_6: ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṃ kammādikārakaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1758_7: sampadānasaññaṃ hoti, casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu
anya-e0805n0:1759: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1760: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1761: Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, ettha ca upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma upagamanaṃ. Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n0:1762: Tuyhaṃ sapate, mayhaṃ sapate, ettha ca sapanaṃ nāma saccakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1763: Dhārayatippayoge dhanikoyeva sampadānaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ te dhārayate, iṇaṃ dhārayatīti attho. Tassa rañño mayaṃ nāgaṃ dhārayāma.
anya-e0805n0:1764: Pihappayoge icchitoyeva, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, devāpi tesaṃ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ, patthentīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1765: Kodhādiatthānaṃ payoge yaṃ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1766: Duhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhati.
anya-e0805n0:1768: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1769_0: Rādhikkhappayoge yassa vipucchanaṃ kammavikhyāpanatthaṃ, vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Ārādho
anya-e0805n0:1769_1: me rañño, rañño aparajjhati, rājānaṃ vā aparajjhati, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi,
anya-e0805n0:1770: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n0:1771_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge, giṇassa ca anupatiyoge
anya-e0805n0:1771_1: pubbassa kammuno yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti. Yathā – bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca,
anya-e0805n0:1771_3: kattā bhagavā. Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū, tathā bhikkhu
anya-e0805n0:1771_4: janaṃ dhammaṃ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti,
anya-e0805n0:1772: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṃ kammanti vuccati;
anya-e0805n0:1774_0: Ārocanatthappayoge yassa āroceti, taṃ sampadānaṃ. Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi
anya-e0805n0:1774_1: vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmāti vā. Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa
anya-e0805n0:1774_2: kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī. Dhammaṃ vo desessāmi, desetu
anya-e0805n0:1774_3: bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṃ te pavakkhāmi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1778: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n0:1779_0: Buddhassatthāya dhammassatthāya saṅghassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi
anya-e0805n0:1779_1: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0805n0:1780: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.
anya-e0805n0:1781: Alaṃsaddassa atthā arahapaṭikkhepā. Arahatthe – alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo nālaṃ dārabharaṇāya, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
anya-e0805n0:1782: Paṭikkhepe – alaṃ te idha vāsena, alaṃ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena, kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇena, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ tettha catumaṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n0:1783: Maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini kammaniyeva – kaṭṭhassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaḷiṅgarassa tuvaṃ maññe, jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññamāno.
anya-e0805n0:1784: Anādareti kiṃ? Suvaṇṇaṃ taṃ maññe. Appāṇinīti kiṃ? Gadrabhaṃ tuvaṃ maññe.
anya-e0805n0:1785: Gatyatthakammani vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Appo saggāya gacchati, appo saggaṃ gacchati, nibbānāya vajantiyā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mūlaṃ paṭikasseyya.
anya-e0805n0:1786_0: Āsīsanatthe āyubhaddakusalādiyogeyeva, āyasmato dīghāyu hotu, “totitā sasmiṃnāsū”ti
anya-e0805n0:1786_1: ntussa savibhattissa to ādeso. Bhaddaṃ bhavato hotu, kusalaṃ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1786_2: bhavato hotu, sukhaṃ bhavato hotu, atthaṃ bhavato hotu, hitaṃ bhavato hotu, svāgataṃ
anya-e0805n0:1787: Sammutippayoge – sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
anya-e0805n0:1789: Sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanādiyoge – tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.
anya-e0805n0:1790_0: Casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇādikriyāyoge, phāsuādināmapayoge ca – tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1790_1: dūtaṃ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṃ āyogo, ekassa dinnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, upamaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1790_2: te karissāmi, añjaliṃ te paggaṇhāmi. Tathā tassa phāsu hoti, lokassattho, maṇinā
anya-e0805n0:1790_3: me attho, seyyo me attho iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1793_0: Namosaddayoge, sotthisvāgatādīhi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti. Namo te
anya-e0805n0:1793_1: buddha vīratthu, namo karohi nāgassa, namatthu buddhānaṃ, namatthu bodhiyā, sotthi
anya-e0805n0:1793_2: pajānaṃ, svāgataṃ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1796: Bhāvavācimhi catutthīvibhatti hoti bhavissatikāle. Bhavanaṃ bhāvo. Paccissate, pacanaṃ vā pāko, pākāya vajati, pacituṃ gacchatīti attho. Evaṃ bhogāya vajati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1801: Yasmā vā avadhito apeti, yasmā vā bhayahetuto bhayaṃ bhavati, yasmā vā akkhātārā vijjaṃ ādadāti, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti. Apanetvā ito ādadātīti apādānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1802: Taṃ pana tividhaṃ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ, upāttavisayaṃ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
anya-e0805n0:1803: Apādānasaññāvisayassa kriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ. Yathā – gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0805n0:1804: Ettha ca “pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye, pāpā nivārentī”tiādīsu yadipi kāyasaṃyogapubbakāpagamanaṃ natthi, tathāpi cittasaṃyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:1805_0: Yattha pana apagamanakriyaṃ upāttaṃ ajjhāhaṭaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattati, taṃ upāttavisayaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1805_1: Yathā – valāhakā vijjotate vijju, kusūlato pacatīti. Ettha ca “valāhakā nikkhamma,
anya-e0805n0:1806: Anumeyyavisayaṃ yathā – māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpā. Ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṃsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso. Idha pana dūrantikādisutte vibhattaggahaṇena apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:1811: Calaṃ yathā – dhāvatā hatthimhā patito aṅkusadhārī.
anya-e0805n0:1813: Bhayahetumhi – corā bhayaṃ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṃ, pāpato uttasati, akkhātari – upajjhāyā sikkhaṃ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīte, ācariyato suṇāti.
anya-e0805n0:1816: Dhātavo ca nāmāni ca dhātunāmāni, tesaṃ avihitalakkhaṇānaṃ dhātunāmānaṃ payoge, upasaggayoge ca ādisaddena nipātayoge ca taṃyuttaṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1817_0: Dhātuppayoge tāva – parājiyoge yo asayho, pabhūyoge pabhavo, janiyoge jāyamānassa
anya-e0805n0:1817_1: pakati ca. Yathā – buddhasmā parājenti aññatitthiyā. Himavatā pabhavanti pañca mahānadiyo,
anya-e0805n0:1817_2: anavatattamhā mahāsarā pabhavanti, aciravatiyā pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Kāmato jāyatī
anya-e0805n0:1817_3: soko, yasmā so jāyate gini, urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṃ indriyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1818: Nāmappayoge aññatthitarādīhi yutte – nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhati, tato aññena kammena, tato itaraṃ, ubhato sujāto putto iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1819_0: Upasaggayuttesu apaparīhi vajjanatthehi yoge, mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge patinā
anya-e0805n0:1819_1: patinidhipatidānatthena yoge ca. Yathā – apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṃ vajjetvāti
anya-e0805n0:1819_2: attho. Tathā paripabbatā devo vassati, pabbataṃ vajjetvāti attho. Mariyādāyaṃ – āpabbatā
anya-e0805n0:1819_3: khettaṃ. Abhividhimhi – ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati, brahmalokaṃ abhibyāpetvāti
anya-e0805n0:1819_4: attho. Patinidhimhi – buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṃ. Patidāne
anya-e0805n0:1819_5: – ghatamassa telasmā pati dadāti, kanakamassa hiraññasmā pati dadāti.
anya-e0805n0:1820_0: Nipātayuttesu rite nānā vinādīhi yoge – rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṃ labhati. Te bhikkhū
anya-e0805n0:1820_1: nānākulā pabbajitā. Vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati. Ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1821_0: Apiggahaṇena kammāpādānakārakamajjhepi pañcamī kāladdhānehi, pakkhasmā vijjhati migaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1821_1: luddako, ito pakkhasmā migaṃ vijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1822_0: Casaddaggahaṇena pabhutyādiatthe, tadatthappayoge ca – yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā
anya-e0805n0:1822_1: jāto, yato sarāmi attānaṃ, yato pattosmi viññutaṃ, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ, yato pabhuti,
anya-e0805n0:1824_0: Rakkhaṇatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti, cakārādhikārato
anya-e0805n0:1824_1: anicchitañca. Rakkhaṇañcettha nivāraṇaṃ, tāyanañca. Kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
anya-e0805n0:1825: Anicchitaṃ yathā – pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye, pāpānivārenti, rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0805n0:1828: Yena adassanamicchitaṃ antaradhāyantena, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti vā, antaradhānevāyaṃ. Upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sisso, nilīyatīti attho. Mātāpitūhi antaradhāyati putto.
anya-e0805n0:1829: Vāti kiṃ? Jetavane antarahito. Yenāti kiṃ? Yakkho tattheva antaradhāyati.
anya-e0805n0:1830: 312. Dūrantikaddhakālanimmānatvālopadisāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayoga bandhana guṇavacana pañha kathanathokākattūsu ca.
anya-e0805n0:1831_0: Dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, āratippayoge,
anya-e0805n0:1831_2: pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge, guṇavacane, pañhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari ca
anya-e0805n0:1831_3: yadavadhibhūtaṃ, hetukammādibhūtañca, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti, casaddena yathāyogaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1832: Ettha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti dūrantikanti sarūpekasesaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena dūrantikatthappayoge, tadatthe ca apādānasañño hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1833_0: Dūratthappayoge tāva – kīvadūro ito naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, gāmato
anya-e0805n0:1833_1: nātidūre. Ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā. Dūratthe
anya-e0805n0:1834: Antikatthappayoge – antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1835_0: Dutiyā, tatiyā ca, dūraṃ gāmaṃ āgato, dūrena gāmena āgato, dūrato gāmā āgatoti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1835_1: Dūraṃ gāmena vā. Antikaṃ gāmaṃ āgato, antikaṃ gāmena vā, āsannaṃ gāmaṃ, āsannaṃ gāmena vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1836: Addhakālanimmāne nimmānaṃ nāma parimāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ gamyamāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi.
anya-e0805n0:1837: Kālanimmāne – ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
anya-e0805n0:1838_0: Tvāpaccayantassa lopo nāma tadatthasambhavepi avijjamānatā, tasmiṃ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu
anya-e0805n0:1838_1: – pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā saṅkameyyāti attho. Tathā hatthikkhandhā
anya-e0805n0:1838_2: saṅkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā vā, abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1838_3: paṭhitvā vā, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya, āsane nisīditvā vā.
anya-e0805n0:1839_0: Disatthavācīhi yoge, disatthe ca – ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, ito
anya-e0805n0:1839_1: sā pacchimā disā, ito sā uttarā disā, avīcito uparibhavaggā, uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho
anya-e0805n0:1839_2: kesamatthakā iccādi. Disatthe – puratthimato dakkhiṇatotiādi. Ettha pana sattamiyatthe
anya-e0805n0:1840_0: Vibhattaṃ nāma sayaṃ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṃ, tasmiṃ vibhatte –
anya-e0805n0:1840_1: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṃ. Kiñcāpi dānato sīlameva
anya-e0805n0:1840_2: varaṃ, tato mayā sutā assutameva bahutaraṃ, sīlameva sutā seyyo. Chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1841: Āratippayogo nāma viramaṇatthasaddappayogo. Tattha – asaddhammā ārati, virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭivirato musāvādā.
anya-e0805n0:1842: Suddhatthappayoge – lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho asaṃsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
anya-e0805n0:1843: Pamocanatthappayoge – parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, muttohaṃ sabbapāsehi.
anya-e0805n0:1844_0: Hetvatthe, sarūpekasesassa gahitattā hetvatthappayoge ca sabbanāmato – kasmā nu tumhaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1844_1: daharā na mīyare, kasmā idheva maraṇaṃ bhavissati, kasmā hetunā, yasmā ca kammāni
anya-e0805n0:1844_2: karonti, yasmā tiha bhikkhave, tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, tasmā buddhosmi
anya-e0805n0:1844_3: brāhmaṇa, yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā, kiṃ kāraṇā. Dutiyā, chaṭṭhī ca, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1844_4: taṃ kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
anya-e0805n0:1845: Kena hetunā, kena kāraṇena, yena midhekacce sattā, tena nimittena, tena vuttamiccādīsu “hetvatthe cā”ti tatiyā.
anya-e0805n0:1846: Vivittaṃ nāma vivecanaṃ, tadatthappayoge – vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
anya-e0805n0:1847: Pamāṇatthe tatiyā ca, āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṃ, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṃ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṃ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo majjhimapadeso.
anya-e0805n0:1848: Dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
anya-e0805n0:1849: Ettha ca “smāhismiṃna”miccādito “smā”ti ca “so, vā”ti ca vattamāne
anya-e0805n0:1851: Dīgha oraicceteti smāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:1852: Dīghaso, dīghamhā vā, [oraso, oramhā vā] tatiyā ca, yojanaṃ āyāmena, yojanaṃ vitthārena, yojanaṃ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi.
anya-e0805n0:1853_0: Paṭhamatthavācakena pubbasaddena yogo pubbayogo, ettha ca pubbaggahaṇaṃ adisatthavuttino
anya-e0805n0:1853_1: pubbādiggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena parādiyogepi. Yathā – pubbeva me
anya-e0805n0:1853_2: bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbenāhosi, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, dhātuliṅgehi
anya-e0805n0:1853_3: parā paccayā, tato aparena samayena, tato uttarimpi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1854: Bandhanatthappayoge bandhanahetumhi iṇe pañcamī, tatiyā ca hoti, satasmā baddho naro raññā, satena vā baddho naro.
anya-e0805n0:1855_0: Phalasādhanahetubhūtassa guṇassa vacanaṃ guṇavacanaṃ, tasmiṃ guṇavacane pañcamī,
anya-e0805n0:1855_1: tatiyā ca, issariyā janaṃ rakkhati rājā, issariyena vā, sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti, sīlena
anya-e0805n0:1856: Pañhakathanesu – kutosi tvaṃ, kuto bhavaṃ, pāṭaliputtato. Ettha ca kathanaṃ nāma vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1857: Thokatthe asatvavacane karaṇe tatiyā ca, thokā muccati, thokena muccati vā, appamattakā muccati, appamattakena vā, kicchā muccati, kicchena vā.
anya-e0805n0:1858_0: Akattari akārake ñāpakahetumhi – kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā
anya-e0805n0:1858_1: uppannaṃ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa, na tāvidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca
anya-e0805n0:1863_0: Karoti attano phalanti kāraṇaṃ, kārakahetu [janakahetu], tasmiṃ kāraṇatthe ca pañcamīvibhatti
anya-e0805n0:1863_1: hoti, vikappenāyaṃ, hetvatthe tatiyāya ca vihitattā, ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1863_2: ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1863_3: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā
anya-e0805n0:1868: Pariggayhatīti pariggaho, yo yassa pariggaho āyatto sambandhī, taṃ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti. Vāggahaṇena sāmitabba rujādiyogepi.
anya-e0805n0:1869_0: Ettha ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati. Sāmibhāvo hi kriyākārakabhāvassa
anya-e0805n0:1869_1: phalabhāvena gahito, tathā hi “rañño puriso”ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso ca
anya-e0805n0:1869_2: patiggaṇhāti, tasmā “rājapuriso”ti viññāyati. Evaṃ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena
anya-e0805n0:1869_3: vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyaavatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena
anya-e0805n0:1869_4: vā, tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi
anya-e0805n0:1879_0: Visesanato tāva – rañño purisoti, ettha ca rājā purisaṃ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti
anya-e0805n0:1879_1: visesanaṃ, puriso tena visesīyatīti visesitabbo, evaṃ sabbattha visesitabbayoge visesanatova chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0805n0:1880: Bhaṇḍena sambandhe – pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1883: Avayavasambandhe – manussasseva te sīsaṃ, rukkhassa sākhā.
anya-e0805n0:1885: Kāriyasambandhe – yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko.
anya-e0805n0:1886: Avatthāsambandhe – khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṃ jarā, khandhānaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0805n0:1888_0: Guṇasambandhe – suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa, buddhassa guṇaghoso,
anya-e0805n0:1888_1: pupphānaṃ gandho, phalānaṃ raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, tilānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1888_2: muṭṭhi, tesaṃ samāyogo, sandhino vimokkho, tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha, pubbacariyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1888_3: vā, sukhaṃ te, dukkhaṃ te, cetaso parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa
anya-e0805n0:1889_0: Kriyāsambandhe – pādassa ukkhipanaṃ, pādassa avakkhepanaṃ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1889_1: pādānaṃ pasāraṇaṃ, dhātūnaṃ gamanaṃ, dhātūnaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ, nisajjā, sayanaṃ vā. Tathā
anya-e0805n0:1889_2: tassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṃ, tassa mātāpitaro, tassa purato pāturahosi, tassa
anya-e0805n0:1889_3: pacchato, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṃ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā, kuverassa bali iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1893: Tabba rujādiyoge – mahāsenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ vikanditabbaṃ viravitabbaṃ, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati, rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1897: Yajassa karaṇe – pupphassa buddhaṃ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṃ juhoti.
anya-e0805n0:1898: Suhitatthayoge – pattaṃ odanassa pūretvā, odanenāti attho. Imameva kāyaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
anya-e0805n0:1899: Tulyatthakimalamādiyoge – pitussa tulyo, pitarā vā tulyo, mātu sadiso, mātarā sadiso vā, kiṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa, kiṃ tena tuṭṭhenāti attho. Alaṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n0:1900_0: Kattari kitappaccayayoge – sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati, kaccāyanena vā, rañño sammato,
anya-e0805n0:1900_1: raññā vā, evaṃ rañño pūjito, rañño sakkato, rañño apacito, rañño mānito, amataṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1900_2: bhikkhave aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1901_0: Sattamiyatthe kusalādiyoge – kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo, kusalo tvaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1901_1: rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante uḷārā
anya-e0805n0:1901_2: yakkhā bhagavato pasannā, divasassa tikkhattuṃ, divase tikkhattuṃ vā, māsassa dvikkhattuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1905_0: Dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge – tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro,
anya-e0805n0:1905_1: amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, sahitānaṃ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa
anya-e0805n0:1905_2: kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṃvādako lokassa, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1905_3: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, acchariyo arajakena vatthānaṃ rāgo, acchariyo
anya-e0805n0:1906: Tathā saricchādīnaṃ kammani – mātu sarati, mātaraṃ sarati, na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammappaccayā, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
anya-e0805n0:1907: Karotissa patiyatane ca – patiyatanaṃ abhisaṅkhāro, udakassa patikurute, udakaṃ patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, kaṇḍaṃ patikurute.
anya-e0805n0:1908_0: Pañcamiyatthe parihānibhayatthayoge – assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, kiṃ nu kho
anya-e0805n0:1908_1: ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto
anya-e0805n0:1909: Kvacīti kiṃ? Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti, paresaṃ puññāni anumoditā, bujjhitā saccāni, kaṭaṃ kārako, pasavo ghātako.
anya-e0805n0:1910: Tathā na niṭṭhādīsu ca – sukhakāmī vihāraṃ kato, rathaṃ katavanto, rathaṃ katāvī, kaṭaṃ katvā, kaṭaṃ karonto, kaṭaṃ karāno, kaṭaṃ kurumāno iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1916: Ādhārīyati asminti ādhāro, adhikaraṇaṃ. Kattukammasamavetānaṃ nisajjapacanādikriyānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena yo ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1917: Kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati. Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṃ kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇato taṃsamavetaṃ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṃ kriyaṃ dhāreti nāma.
anya-e0805n0:1918: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
anya-e0805n0:1919_0: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti, yasmiñca
anya-e0805n0:1919_1: ādheyyabhūtaṃ kiñci byāpetvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā – tilesu telaṃ atthi, khīlesu jalaṃ, dadhimhi sappīti.
anya-e0805n0:1920_0: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṃ bhāvānaṃ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti, yasmiñca
anya-e0805n0:1920_1: ādheyyo upasilissati allīyitvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā – āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1920_2: odanaṃ pacati, ghaṭesu udakaṃ atthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhitoti.
anya-e0805n0:1921_0: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṃ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvo
anya-e0805n0:1921_1: vikappīyati, taṃ yathā – gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso vasati, gaṅgāya samīpe vajo vasatīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1921_2: Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane, sāvatthiyā samīpeti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1922_0: Vesayiko nāma yattha aññatthābhāvavasena, desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhārabhāvo
anya-e0805n0:1922_1: parikappo, taṃ yathā – ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti, bhūmīsu manussā caranti, jalesu macchā,
anya-e0805n0:1922_2: pādesu patito, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye
anya-e0805n0:1922_3: nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1923: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n0:1935: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Ubhayatthaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1936_0: Gavaṃ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gavaṃ issaro, gosu issaro, gavaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati,
anya-e0805n0:1936_1: gavaṃ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gavaṃ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gavaṃ patibhū, gosu patibhū,
anya-e0805n0:1936_2: gavaṃ pasūto, gosu pasūto, gavaṃ kusalo, gosu kusalo.
anya-e0805n0:1938_0: Nīharitvā dhāraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ, jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1938_1: tasmiṃ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n0:1939_0: Manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo, kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā,
anya-e0805n0:1939_1: kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā, addhikānaṃ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto
anya-e0805n0:1939_2: sīghatamo, āyasmā ānando arahataṃ aññataro ahosi, arahantesu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:1941: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu pabbaji.
anya-e0805n0:1948: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
anya-e0805n0:1949: Karaṇatthe – hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
anya-e0805n0:1950: Nimittatthe – dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ, musāvādanimittaṃ musāvādappaccayāti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1953: Sampadānatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0805n0:1954: Yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
anya-e0805n0:1957: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
anya-e0805n0:1959_0: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko, bhāvo nāma kriyā, sā cettha kriyantarūpalakkhaṇāva
anya-e0805n0:1959_1: adhippetā, tasmiṃ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1960: Kāle – pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassati, phussamāsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākhamāso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumā.
anya-e0805n0:1961_0: Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe – bhikkhusaṅghesu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato, gosu duyhamānāsu
anya-e0805n0:1961_1: gato, duddhāsu āgato, jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu
anya-e0805n0:1966: Dvipadamidaṃ. Adhikatthe, issaratthe ca vattamānehi upaadhiiccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:1967_0: Adhikavacane – upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikoti attho. Tathā upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:1967_1: adhi devesu buddho, sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū
anya-e0805n0:1968: Issaravacane – adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1970_0: Maṇḍitaussukkaiccetesvatthesu gamyamānesu liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n0:1970_1: Maṇḍitasaddo panettha pasannatthavācako, ussukkasaddo saīhattho. Ñāṇena pasanno,
anya-e0805n0:1970_2: ñāṇasmiṃ pasanno, ñāṇena ussukko, ñāṇasmiṃ ussukko sappuriso.
anya-e0805n0:1972: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṃ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0805n0:1973: Karaṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti, sampadānaṃ tidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0805n0:1975: Vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. Yathāha
anya-e0805n0:1981: Atha nāmameva aññamaññasambandhīnaṃ samāsoti nāmanissitattā, sayañca nāmikattā nāmānantaraṃ samāso vuccate.
anya-e0805n0:1982: So ca saññāvasena chabbidho abyayībhāvo kammadhārayo digu tappuriso bahubbīhi dvando cāti.
anya-e0805n0:1986_1: cā”ti lopo, nagarasaddato chaṭṭhekavacanaṃ sa, nagarassa samīpanti aññapadena viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:1989_0: Upasaggapubbako, nipātapubbako ca nāmiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipātehi
anya-e0805n0:1989_1: saha niccaṃ samasīyate, so ca samāso abyayībhāvasañño hoti. Idha abyayībhāvādisaññāvidhāyakasuttāneva
anya-e0805n0:1990_0: Tattha abyayamiti upasagganipātānaṃ saññā, liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā, abyayānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:1990_1: atthaṃ vibhāvayatīti abyayībhāvo abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā, anabyayaṃ abyayaṃ bhavatīti
anya-e0805n0:1990_2: vā abyayībhāvo. Pubbapadatthappadhāno hi abyayībhāvo, ettha ca “upasagganipātapubbako”ti
anya-e0805n0:1992: Tesaṃ nāmānaṃ payujjamānapadatthānaṃ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti, tadaññaṃ vākyamiti ruḷhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:1993: Nāmāni syādivibhatyantāni, samassateti samāso, saṅkhipiyatīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:1997_1: paripuṇṇameva labbhati. Aluttasamāse pana atthasamasanameva vibhattilopābhāvato,
anya-e0805n0:1997_2: tatthāpi vā ekapadattūpagamanato duvidhampi labbhateva. Dve hi samāsassa payojanāni
anya-e0805n0:1998_0: Yutto attho yuttatto, atha vā yutto saṅgato, sambandho vā attho yassa soyaṃ yuttattho,
anya-e0805n0:1998_1: etena saṅgatatthena yuttatthavacanena bhinnatthānaṃ ekatthībhāvo samāsalakkhaṇanti
anya-e0805n0:1998_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca “nāmāna”nti vacanena “devadatto pacatī”tiādīsu ākhyātena samāso
anya-e0805n0:1998_3: na hotīti dasseti. Sambandhatthena pana yuttatthaggahaṇena “bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā”tiādīsu
anya-e0805n0:1998_4: aññamaññānapekkhesu, “devadattassa kaṇhā dantā”tiādīsu ca aññasāpekkhesu ayuttatthatāya
anya-e0805n0:2001_0: Idha padantarena vā taddhitappaccayehi vā āyādippaccayehi vā ekatthībhūtā yuttatthā
anya-e0805n0:2001_1: nāma, tena “tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ, taddhitāyādippaccayantānañca vibhattiyo
anya-e0805n0:2001_2: lopanīyā hontī”ti attho. Samāsaggahaṇādhikāre pana sati tesaṃgahaṇena vā taddhitāyādippaccayanta
anya-e0805n0:2004_0: Luttāsu vibhattīsu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhūtassa tividhassapi liṅgassa pakatibhāvo
anya-e0805n0:2004_1: hoti. Casaddena kiṃsamudaya idappaccayatādīsu niggahītantassapi. Nimittābhāve nemittakābhāvassa
anya-e0805n0:2005: Sakatthavirahenidha samāsassa ca liṅgabhāvābhāvā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṃ nāmabyapadesātidesamāha.
anya-e0805n0:2007_0: Taddhitantā, kitantā, samāsā ca nāmamiva daṭṭhabbā tavetuna tvāna tvādippaccayante
anya-e0805n0:2007_2: Idha samāsaggahaṇaṃ atthavataṃ samudāyānaṃ nāmabyapadeso samāsassevāti niyamatthanti apare.
anya-e0805n0:2010_0: So abyayībhāvasamāso napuṃsakaliṅgova daṭṭhabboti napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ. Ettha hi satipi
anya-e0805n0:2010_2: “tipañña”ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na cāyaṃ atideso, sutte atidesaliṅgassa ivasaddassa
anya-e0805n0:2013: Tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ kvaci aṃ hoti, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2014: Taṃ upanagaraṃ, nagarassa samīpaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho. Tāni upanagaraṃ, ālapanepevaṃ, taṃ upanagaraṃ passa, tāni upanagaraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2017_0: Tena upanagaraṃ kataṃ, upanagarena vā, tehi upanagaraṃ, upanagarehi vā, tassa upanagaraṃ
anya-e0805n0:2017_1: dehi, tesaṃ upanagaraṃ, upanagarā ānaya, upanagaramhā upanagarasmā, upanagarehi,
anya-e0805n0:2017_2: upanagaraṃ santakaṃ, upanagarassa vā, tesaṃ upanagaraṃ, upanagarānaṃ vā, upanagaraṃ
anya-e0805n0:2017_3: nidhehi, upanagaramhi upanagarasmiṃ, upanagaraṃ upanagaresu vā. Evaṃ upakumbhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2021: Vicchāyaṃ – attānamattānaṃ pati paccattaṃ, addhamāsaṃ addhamāsaṃ anu anvaddhamāsaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2023: Paṭilome – sotassa paṭilomaṃ paṭisotaṃ, paṭipathaṃ, pativātaṃ, attānaṃ adhikicca pavattā ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2024: Pariyādābhividhīsu āpāṇakoṭiyā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ, “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti kappaccayo, ākumārehi yaso kaccāyanassa ākumāraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2025: Samiddhiyaṃ – bhikkhāya samiddhīti atthe samāseva napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate –
anya-e0805n0:2028_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsassa anto saro rasso hoti. Ettha ca abyayībhāvaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2028_1: nānuvattetabbaṃ, tena digudvandabahubbīhīsupi napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsantassarassa
anya-e0805n0:2028_2: rassattaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. “Aṃ vibhattīna”miccādinā amādeso, subhikkhaṃ. Gaṅgāya samīpe
anya-e0805n0:2032_0: Akārantato aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo ca hoti. Adhitti, itthīsu
anya-e0805n0:2032_1: adhikicca kathā pavattatīti attho. Adhitthi passa, adhitthi kataṃ iccādi, evaṃ adhikumāri,
anya-e0805n0:2032_2: vadhuyā samīpaṃ upavadhu, gunnaṃ samīpaṃ upagu, okārassa rassattaṃ ukāro. Evaṃ upasaggapubbako.
anya-e0805n0:2033_0: Nipātapubbako yathā – vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭipāṭi, ye ye vuḍḍhā vā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, padatthānatikkame
anya-e0805n0:2033_1: – yathākkamaṃ, yathāsatti, yathābalaṃ karoti, balamanatikkamitvā karotīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:2033_2: Jīvassa yattako paricchedo yāvajīvaṃ, yāvatāyukaṃ, kappaccayo. Yattakena attho yāvadatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2033_3: pabbatassa parabhāgo tiropabbataṃ, tiropākāraṃ, tirokuṭṭaṃ, pāsādassa anto antopāsādaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2033_4: antonagaraṃ, antovassaṃ, nagarassa bahi bahinagaraṃ, pāsādassa upari uparipāsādaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2033_5: uparimañcaṃ, mañcassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāmañcaṃ, heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ, bhattassa pure purebhattaṃ, evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2034: Sākallatthe – saha makkhikāya samakkhikaṃ bhuñjati, na kiñci parivajjetīti attho. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā sahasaddassa sādeso. Gaṅgāya oraṃ oragaṅgamiccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2038: So ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado avadhāraṇapubbapado nanipātapubbapado kupubbapado pādipubbapado cāti.
anya-e0805n0:2039: Tattha visesanapubbapado tāva – “mahanta purisa”itīdha ubhayattha paṭhamekavacanaṃ si, tulyādhikaraṇabhāvappasiddhatthaṃ casadda tasaddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2040: Ito paraṃ “vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa”iccādito “vibhāsā”ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2042: Dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante, tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2043_0: Dve padāni dvipadaṃ, tulyaṃ samānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attho yassa padadvayassa taṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2043_1: tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe. Bhinnappavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena
anya-e0805n0:2043_2: ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā. Kammamiva dvayaṃ dhārayatīti kammadhārayo.
