anya-e0805n0:2043_3: Yathā hi kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ dhārayati, kamme sati kriyāya, payojanassa
anya-e0805n0:2043_4: ca sambhavato, tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati, tasmiṃ samāse
anya-e0805n0:2044: Pure viya samāsasaññāvibhattilopapakatibhāvā, samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa vuttattā “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti casadda tasaddānamappayogo.
anya-e0805n0:2046_0: Mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare. Mahatanti bahuvacanaggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:2046_1: kvaci mahaādeso ca, ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa
anya-e0805n0:2050_0: Tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya tappurisoti
anya-e0805n0:2050_1: vutto. Yathā hi tappurisasaddo guṇamativatto, tathā ayaṃ samāsopi. Uttarapadatthappadhāno
anya-e0805n0:2050_2: hi tappurisoti. Tato nāmabyapadeso syādyuppatti. Ayaṃ pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, paraliṅgo ca.
anya-e0805n0:2051_0: Mahāpuriso, mahāpurisā iccādi purisasaddasamaṃ, evaṃ mahāvīro, mahāmuni, mahantañca
anya-e0805n0:2051_1: taṃ balañcāti mahābalaṃ, mahabbhayaṃ, mahaādeso. Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
anya-e0805n0:2051_2: “santasaddassa so bhe bo cante”ti ettha casaddena santasaddassa samāse abhakārepi
anya-e0805n0:2051_3: sādeso, tathā pubbapuriso, parapuriso, paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso,
anya-e0805n0:2051_4: dantapuriso, paramapuriso, vīrapuriso, setahatthī, kaṇhasappo, nīluppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2052: Kvaci vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā – puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
anya-e0805n0:2053: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate –
anya-e0805n0:2056: Pumaiccetassa anto akāro lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu, “aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti makārassa niggahītaṃ. Puṅkokilo. Evaṃ punnāgo.
anya-e0805n0:2057: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate –
anya-e0805n0:2058: “Tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2060_0: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto
anya-e0805n0:2060_1: itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2061: Khattiyakaññā, khattiyakaññāyo iccādi. Evaṃ rattalatā, dutiyabhikkhā, brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, nāgamāṇavikā.
anya-e0805n0:2062: Pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena “khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī”tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2064: Bhāsitapumāti kiṃ? Gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu. “Nandāpokkharaṇī, nandādevī”tiādīsu pana saññāsaddattā na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2065_0: Tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo, ettha ca kāyekadeso kāyasaddo. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2065_1: pacchimakāyo, heṭṭhimakāyo, uparimakāyo, sabbakāyo, purāṇavihāro, navāvāso, kataranikāyo,
anya-e0805n0:2065_2: katamanikāyo, hetuppaccayo, abahulaṃ bahulaṃ katanti bahulīkataṃ, jīvitappadhānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2066_0: Visesanuttarapade jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṃ parañca bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2066_1: Yathā – sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero. Evaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero, mahākassapatthero,
anya-e0805n0:2066_2: buddhaghosācariyo, dhammapālācariyo, ācariyaguttiloti vā, mahosadho ca so paṇḍito
anya-e0805n0:2067_0: Visesanobhayapado yathā – sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti sītuṇhaṃ, siniddho ca so uṇho cāti
anya-e0805n0:2067_1: siniddhuṇho, māso. Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. Evaṃ andhabadhiro, katākataṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2068_0: Upamānuttarapade abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṃ visesanaṃ paraṃ bhavati. Yathā
anya-e0805n0:2068_1: – sīho viya sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. Evaṃ munivasabho, munipuṅgavo, buddhanāgo,
anya-e0805n0:2068_2: buddhādicco, raṃsi viya raṃsi, saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi. Evaṃ vinayasāgaro,
anya-e0805n0:2068_3: puṇḍarīkamiva puṇḍarīko, samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko, samaṇapadumo.
anya-e0805n0:2068_4: Cando viya cando, mukhañca taṃ cando cāti mukhacando. Evaṃ mukhapadumaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2069_0: Sambhāvanāpubbapado yathā – dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. Evaṃ dhammasaññā, dhammasaṅkhāto,
anya-e0805n0:2069_1: dhammasammato, pāṇasaññitā, asubhasaññā, aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, dhātusaññā, dhītusaññā,
anya-e0805n0:2070_0: Avadhāraṇapubbapado yathā – guṇo eva dhanaṃ guṇadhanaṃ. Evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2070_1: paññādhanaṃ, cakkhu eva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ. Evaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhudhātu,
anya-e0805n0:2071: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – na brāhmaṇoti atthe kammadhārayasamāse, vibhattilopādimhi ca kate –
anya-e0805n0:2074: Nassa nipātapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva attaṃ hoti. Tappurisekadesattā tappuriso, abrāhmaṇo.
anya-e0805n0:2082_0: Tattha yo “asūriyapassā rājadārā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathā abhāvaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2082_1: dīpeti, so pasajjappaṭisedhavācī nāma. Yo pana “abrāhmaṇa amanussā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2082_2: pariyudāsitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati, so pariyudāsavācī nāma.
anya-e0805n0:2087_1: brāhmaṇādisaddā hi kevalābrāhmaṇādiatthesveva pākaṭā, bhūsaddo viyasattāyaṃ, yadā
anya-e0805n0:2087_2: te pana aññena sadisādivācakena naiti nipātena yujjanti, tadā taṃsadisatadaññatabbiruddhatadabhāvesupi
anya-e0805n0:2087_3: vattanti, bhūsaddo viya anvabhiyādiyoge anubhavanaabhibhavanādīsu, tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha
anya-e0805n0:2087_4: naiti nipātoti na doso, tena abrāhmaṇoti brāhmaṇasadisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ amanusso, assamaṇo.
anya-e0805n0:2088: Aññatthe – na byākatā abyākatā, asaṃkiliṭṭhā, apariyāpannā.
anya-e0805n0:2089: Viruddhatthe – na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti attho. Evaṃ alobho, amitto.
anya-e0805n0:2090: Pasajjappaṭisedhe – na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṃ akaronto.
anya-e0805n0:2093: Naiccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ana hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n0:2094: Na asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. Evaṃ anissaro, aniṭṭho, anupavādo, na ādāya anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2095: Kupubbapado yathā – kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate –
anya-e0805n0:2098: Kuiccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade kada hoti sare pare. Kadannaṃ. Evaṃ kadasanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2099: Sareti kiṃ? Kudārā, kuputtā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:2102_0: Kuiccetassa appatthe vattamānassa kā hoti tappurise uttarapade pare. Bahuvacanuccāraṇato
anya-e0805n0:2102_1: kucchitatthe ca kvaci tappurise. Appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ. Evaṃ kāpupphaṃ, kucchito
anya-e0805n0:2103_0: Pādipubbapado ca niccasamāsova, padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, bhusaṃ vaddhaṃ pavaddhaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2103_1: sarīraṃ, samaṃ, sammā vā ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ, vividhā mati vimati, vividho kappo vikappo,
anya-e0805n0:2103_2: visiṭṭho vā kappo vikappo, adhiko devo atidevo. Evaṃ adhidevo, adhisīlaṃ, sundaro
anya-e0805n0:2103_3: gandho sugandho, kucchito gandho duggandho, sobhanaṃ kataṃ sukataṃ, asobhanaṃ kataṃ dukkaṭaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2104_0: Ye idha avihitalakkhaṇā nāmanipātopasaggā, tesaṃ “nāmānaṃ samāso”ti yogavibhāgena
anya-e0805n0:2104_1: samāso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā – apunageyyā gāthā, acandamullokikāni mukhāni, assaddhabhojī,
anya-e0805n0:2105_0: Tathā diṭṭho pubbanti diṭṭhapubbo tathāgataṃ. Evaṃ sutapubbo dhammaṃ, gatapubbo maggaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2105_1: kammani diṭṭhā pubbanti diṭṭhapubbā devā tena. Evaṃ sutapubbā dhammā, gatapubbā disā,
anya-e0805n0:2105_2: pahāro, parābhavo, vihāro, āhāro, upahāro iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2109: Tayo lokā samāhaṭā cittena sampiṇḍitā, tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n0:2110: “Nāmānaṃ samāso yuttattho”ti vattamāne “dvipade”tiādinā kammadhārayasamāso, tato samāsasaññāyaṃ, vibhattilope, pakatibhāve ca kate –
anya-e0805n0:2114_0: Dve gāvo digu, digusadisattā ayampi samāso digūti vutto. Atha vā saṅkhyāpubbattanapuṃsakekattasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0805n0:2114_1: dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gato avagatoti digūti vuccati, dvīhi vā lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0805n0:2114_2: digu. Ettha ca “saṅkhyāpubbo”ti vuttattā saṅkhyāsaddasseva pubbanipāto, “ubhe tappurisā”ti tappurisasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:2118: Samāhāradigussetaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tattha sabbatthekavacanameva hoti, aññatra pana bahuvacanampi, nāmabyapadesasyādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n0:2119: Tilokaṃ, he tiloka, tilokaṃ, tilokena, tilokassa, tilokā tilokasmā tilokamhā, tilokassa, tiloke tilokamhi tilokasmiṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2120_0: Evaṃ tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṃ, tīṇi malāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṃ malānaṃ samāhāroti vā timalaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2120_1: tilakkhaṇaṃ, catussaccaṃ, catasso disā catuddisaṃ, “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2120_2: pañcasikkhāpadaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, sattāhaṃ, aṭṭhasīlaṃ, navalokuttaraṃ, dasasīlaṃ, satayojanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2121: Tathā – dve rattiyo dvirattaṃ, tisso rattiyo tirattaṃ, dve aṅguliyo dvaṅgulaṃ, satta godāvariyo, tāsaṃ samāhāroti vā sattagodāvaraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2124_0: Rājādigaṇassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tena samāsantagatānaṃ rājādīnaṃ nāmānaṃ anto kvaci akāro
anya-e0805n0:2124_1: hotīti attho. Kāraggahaṇena bahubbīhādimhi samāsante kvaci kappaccayo hoti, surabhi
anya-e0805n0:2125_0: Atha vā a ca ko ca akā, rakāro padasandhikaro, tena kvaci samāsantagatānamanto hutvā
anya-e0805n0:2125_1: a ka iccete paccayā hontīti attho. Tena pañca gāvo samāhaṭāti atthe samāsādiṃ katvā
anya-e0805n0:2125_2: samāsante appaccaye, “o sare cā”ti avādese ca kate “pañcagava”ntiādi ca sijjhati.
anya-e0805n0:2126: Asamāhāradigu yathā – eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. Evaṃ ekadhammo, ekaputto, tayo bhavā tibhavā, catasso disā catuddisā, dasasahassacakkavāḷāni iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2130: So pana dutiyādīsu chasu vibhattīsu bhāvato chabbidho. Tattha dutiyātappuriso gatanissitātītātikkantappattāpannādīhi bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2134: Amādivibhatyantāni yuttatthāni pubbapadāni nāmehi parapadebhi saha vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso tappurisasañño hoti. Ayañca tappuriso abhidheyyavacanaliṅgo.
anya-e0805n0:2135_0: Gatādisaddā kitantattā tiliṅgā, vibhattilopādi sabbaṃ pubbasamaṃ. So saraṇagato,
anya-e0805n0:2135_1: te saraṇagatā. Sā saraṇagatā, tā saraṇagatāyo. Taṃ kulaṃ saraṇagataṃ, tāni kulāni
anya-e0805n0:2136_0: Evaṃ araññagato, bhūmigato, dhammaṃ nissito dhammanissito, atthanissito, bhavaṃ atīto
anya-e0805n0:2136_1: bhavātīto, kālātīto, pamāṇaṃ atikkantaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Lokātikkantaṃ, sukhaṃ patto
anya-e0805n0:2136_2: sukhappatto, dukkhappatto, sotaṃ āpanno sotāpanno, nirodhasamāpanno, rathaṃ āruḷho
anya-e0805n0:2137_0: Upapadasamāse pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattā. Yathā – kammaṃ karotīti kammakāro, kumbhakāro,
anya-e0805n0:2137_1: atthaṃ kāmetīti atthakāmo, dhammakāmo, dhammaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo, vinayadharo,
anya-e0805n0:2138_0: Tavantumānantādikitantehi vākyameva vavatthitavibhāsādhikārato. Yathā – odanaṃ bhuttavā,
anya-e0805n0:2138_1: dhammaṃ suṇamāno, dhammaṃ suṇanto, kaṭaṃ karāno, anabhidhānato vā, abhidhānalakkhaṇā
anya-e0805n0:2140: Tatiyā kitaka pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missasakhilādīhi.
anya-e0805n0:2141_0: Buddhena bhāsito buddhabhāsito, dhammo. Evaṃ jinadesito, satthārā vaṇṇito satthuvaṇṇito,
anya-e0805n0:2141_1: viññūhi garahito viññugarahito, viññuppasattho, issarakataṃ, sayaṃkataṃ, sukehi āhaṭaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2141_2: sukāhataṃ, raññā hato rājahato, rogapīḷito, aggidaḍḍho, sappadaṭṭho, sallena viddho
anya-e0805n0:2141_3: sallaviddho, icchāya apakato icchāpakato, sīlena sampanno sīlasampanno. Evaṃ sukhasahagataṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2141_4: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, mittasaṃsaggo, piyavippayogo, jātitthaddho, guṇahīno, guṇavuḍḍho,
anya-e0805n0:2141_5: catuvaggakaraṇīyaṃ, catuvaggādikattabbaṃ, kākehi peyyā kākapeyyā, nadī.
anya-e0805n0:2142: Kvaci vuttiyeva, urena gacchatīti urago, pādena pivatīti pādapo. Kvaci vākyameva, parasunā chinnavā, kākehi pātabbā, dassanena pahātabbā.
anya-e0805n0:2143_0: Pubbādiyoge – māsena pubbo māsapubbo. Evaṃ mātusadiso, pitusamo, ekūnavīsati, sīlavikalo,
anya-e0805n0:2143_1: asikalaho, vācānipuṇo, yāvakālikasaṃmissaṃ, vācāsakhilo, satthārā sadiso satthukappo,
anya-e0805n0:2143_2: puññena atthiko puññatthiko, guṇādhiko, guḷena saṃsaṭṭho odano guḷodano, khīrodano,
anya-e0805n0:2143_3: assena yutto ratho assaratho, maggacittaṃ, jambuyā paññāto lakkhito dīpo jambudīpo,
anya-e0805n0:2143_4: ekena adhikā dasa ekādasa, jātiyā andho jaccandho, pakatiyā medhāvī pakatimedhāvī iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2146_0: Tadatthe – kathinassa dussaṃ kathinadussaṃ, kathinacīvaratthāyāti attho. Evaṃ cīvaradussaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2146_1: cīvaramūlyaṃ, yāguyā atthāya taṇḍulā yāgutaṇḍulā, bhattataṇḍulā, saṅghassatthāya
anya-e0805n0:2146_2: bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ, āgantukānamatthāya bhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ. Evaṃ gamikabhattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2147_0: Atthe bhikkhusaṅghassatthāya vihāro bhikkhusaṅghattho vihāro, bhikkhusaṅghatthā yāgu,
anya-e0805n0:2147_1: bhikkhusaṅghatthaṃ cīvaraṃ. Yassatthāya yadattho, yadatthā, yadatthaṃ. Evaṃ tadattho,
anya-e0805n0:2147_2: tadatthā. Tadatthaṃ. Etadattho vāyāmo, etadatthā kathā, etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2147_3: Kimatthaṃ, attatthaṃ, paratthaṃ, vinayo saṃvaratthāya, sukhaṃ samādhatthāya, nibbidā
anya-e0805n0:2147_4: virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya. Tathā lokassa hito lokahito, buddhassa deyyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2147_5: buddhadeyyaṃ, pupphaṃ. Saṅghadeyyaṃ, cīvaraṃ. Idha na bhavati, saṅghassa dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2150_0: Methunasmā apeto methunāpeto. Evaṃ palāpāpagato, nagaraniggato, piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto.
anya-e0805n0:2150_1: Gāmato nikkhantaṃ gāmanikkhantaṃ, rukkhaggā patito rukkhaggapatito, sāsanacuto, āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2151_0: Bhayatthādiyoge yathā – rājato bhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ, corehi bhayaṃ corabhayaṃ, amanussehi
anya-e0805n0:2151_1: bhayaṃ amanussabhayaṃ, aggito bhayaṃ aggibhayaṃ. Pāpato bhīto pāpabhīto, pāpabhīruko,
anya-e0805n0:2151_2: akattabbato virati akattabbavirati. Evaṃ kāyaduccaritavirati, vacīduccaritavirati,
anya-e0805n0:2151_3: bandhanā mutto bandhanamutto, vanamutto, bandhanamokkho, kammato samuṭṭhitaṃ kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2152: Kvaci vuttiyeva, kammato jātaṃ kammajaṃ. Evaṃ cittajaṃ, utujaṃ, āhārajaṃ. Idha na bhavati, pāsādā patito.
anya-e0805n0:2154_0: Chaṭṭhī rañño putto rājaputto. Evaṃ rājapuriso, ācariyapūjako, buddhasāvako, buddharūpaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2154_1: jinavacanaṃ, samuddaghoso, dhaññānaṃ rāsi dhaññarāsi, pupphagandho, phalaraso, kāyassa
anya-e0805n0:2154_2: lahutā kāyalahutā, maraṇassati, rukkhamūlaṃ, ayassa patto ayopatto, evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2155_0: “Devānaṃ rājā”ti atthe samāsādimhi kate “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti akāro,
anya-e0805n0:2155_1: tato “syā cā”ti āttaṃ na bhavati. Devarājo, devarājā, devarājaṃ, devarāje iccādi
anya-e0805n0:2155_2: purisasaddasamaṃ. Attābhāve so devarājā, te devarājāno iccādi rājasaddasamaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0805n0:2155_3: devānaṃ sakhā devasakho, devasakhā, so devasakhā, te devasakhāno iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2156: Pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ. Evaṃ pumbhāvo, pumantalopādi.
anya-e0805n0:2157: Hatthipadaṃ, itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhunisaṅgho, jambusākhā, ettha ca “kvacādimajjhuttarāna”ntiādinā majjhe īkārūkārānaṃ rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2158: Vibhāsādhikārato kvaci vākyameva, sahasā kammassa kattāro, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, kappassa tatiyo bhāgo, yā ca pakkhassa aṭṭhamī, manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0805n0:2159_0: Yuttattho icceva? “Bhaṭo rañño puriso devadattassā”ti ettha “bhaṭasambandhe chaṭṭhī”ti
anya-e0805n0:2159_1: aññamaññānapekkhatāya ayuttatthabhāvato samāso na bhavati, “kosalassa rañño putto”tiādīsu
anya-e0805n0:2159_2: pana sāpekkhatāya asamatthattā na bhavati, sambandhīsaddānaṃ pana niccaṃ sāpekkhattepi
anya-e0805n0:2159_3: gamakattā samāso, yathā – devadattassa gurukulaṃ, bhagavato sāvakasaṅghotiādi.
anya-e0805n0:2161_0: Sattamī rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, evaṃ rūpasañcetanā, saṃsāradukkhaṃ, cakkhumhi sannissitaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2161_1: viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, dhamme rato dhammarato, dhammābhirati, dhammaruci, dhammagāravo,
anya-e0805n0:2161_2: dhammesu nirutti dhammanirutti, dānādhimutti, bhavantarakataṃ, dassane assādo dassanassādo,
anya-e0805n0:2161_3: araññe vāso araññavāso, vikāle bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ, kāle vassaṃ kālavassaṃ, vane
anya-e0805n0:2161_4: pupphaṃ vanapupphaṃ. Evaṃ vanamahiso, gāmasūkaro, samuddamaccho, āvāṭakacchapo, āvāṭamaṇḍūko,
anya-e0805n0:2161_5: kūpamaṇḍūko, titthanāvā, itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto chāyāya sukkho chāyāsukkho, aṅgārapakkaṃ, cārakabaddho.
anya-e0805n0:2162_0: Idha vuttiyeva, yathā – vane caratīti vanacaro, kucchimhi sayatīti kucchisayo, thale
anya-e0805n0:2162_1: tiṭṭhatīti thalaṭṭho. Evaṃ jalaṭṭho, pabbataṭṭho, maggaṭṭho, paṅke jātaṃ paṅkajaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2163: Idha na bhavati, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2165: “Tadanuparodhenā”ti vuttattā yathābhidhānaṃ tappurise kvaci accantādīsu amādivibhatyantaṃ pubbapadaṃ paraṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2166_0: Yathā – antaṃ atikkantaṃ accantaṃ, accantāni, velaṃ atikkanto ativelo, rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2166_1: Evaṃ mālaṃ atīto atimālo, pattajīviko, āpannajīviko, akkhaṃ patigataṃ nissitanti
anya-e0805n0:2166_2: paccakkhaṃ dassanaṃ, paccakkho attabhāvo, paccakkhā buddhi, atthaṃ anugataṃ anvatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2166_3: kokilāya avakuṭṭhaṃ avakokilaṃ vanaṃ, pariccattanti attho. Avamayūraṃ, ajjhayanāya
anya-e0805n0:2166_4: parigilāno pariyajjhayano, kammassa alaṃ samatthoti alaṃkammo, vacanāya alanti alaṃvacano,
anya-e0805n0:2166_5: vānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ, kilesehi nikkhanto nikkileso, niraṅgaṇo, kosambiyā nikkhanto
anya-e0805n0:2166_6: nikkosambī, vanato niyyāto nibbano, ācariyato paro pācariyo. Evaṃ payyako, parahiyyo,
anya-e0805n0:2166_7: gaṅgāya upari uparigaṅgaṃ. Evaṃ heṭṭhānadī, antosamāpatti, haṃsānaṃ rājā rājahaṃso,
anya-e0805n0:2166_8: haṃsarājā vā, māsassa addhaṃ addhamāsaṃ, māsaddhaṃ vā, āmalakassa addhaṃ addhāmalakaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2166_9: āmalakaddhaṃ vā, kahāpaṇassa aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍhakahāpaṇaṃ, aḍḍhamāsakaṃ, rattiyā aḍḍhaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2166_10: aḍḍharattaṃ, rattiyā pubbaṃ pubbarattaṃ, rattiyā pacchā pacchārattaṃ. Ettha ca “kvaci
anya-e0805n0:2166_11: samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti rattisaddantassa attaṃ, ahassa pubbaṃ pubbanhaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2169_0: Yathā – pabhaṃ karotīti atthe “amādayo parapadebhī”ti samāso, “nāmānaṃ samāso yuttattho”ti
anya-e0805n0:2169_1: samāsasaññā, tato “tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā”ti vibhattilope sampatte tattheva caggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:2169_2: pubbapade vibhattilopābhāvo. Sesaṃ samaṃ. Pabhaṅkaro, amataṃ dadātīti amatandado,
anya-e0805n0:2169_3: raṇaṃ jahātīti raṇañjaho, jutiṃ dhāretīti jutindharo, tathā sahasākataṃ, parassapadaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2169_4: Attanopadaṃ, bhayato upaṭṭhānaṃ bhayatūpaṭṭhānaṃ, paratoghoso, gavaṃpatitthero, manasikāro,
anya-e0805n0:2169_5: pubbenivāso, pubbenivāsānussati, majjhekalyāṇaṃ, antevāsī, antevāsiko, janesuto,
anya-e0805n0:2174: So ca navavidho dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo, dvipado bhinnādhikaraṇo, tipado nanipātapubbapado, sahapubbapado upamānapubbapado saṅkhyobhayapado disantarāḷattho byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
anya-e0805n0:2175: Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo bahubbīhi kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2176: Tattha dutiyatthe tāva – “āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāma”nti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2178: Samasyamānapadato aññesaṃ paṭhamadutiyādivibhatyantānaṃ padānamatthesu yuttatthāni nāmāni vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso bahubbīhisañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2179: Bahavo vīhayo yassa so bahubbīhi, bahubbīhisadisattā ayampisamāso anvatthasaññāvasena bahubbīhīti vutto, aññapadatthappadhāno hi bahubbīhi.
anya-e0805n0:2180: Duvidho cāyaṃ bahubbīhi tagguṇasaṃviññāṇātagguṇasaṃviññāṇavasena, tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati, so tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yathā – lambakaṇṇamānayāti.
anya-e0805n0:2181: Yattha pana na gayhati, so atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yathā – bahudhanamānayāti.
anya-e0805n0:2182: Idha bahubbīhisadde viya visesanassa pubbanipāto, sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2183_0: Āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo. Ettha ca āgatasaddo, samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā
anya-e0805n0:2183_2: tadanantaraṃ “saṅghārāmo”ti padantaraṃ payujjati, tato samāseneva kammatthassa abhihitattā
anya-e0805n0:2183_3: puna dutiyā na hoti. Idaṃsaddassa ca appayogo, evaṃ sabbattha. Bahubbīhi cāyaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgavacano.
anya-e0805n0:2184_0: Tathā āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ, paṭipannā addhikā yaṃ pathaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2184_1: soyaṃ paṭipannaddhiko patho, abhiruḷhā vāṇijā yaṃ nāvaṃ sā abhiruḷhavāṇijā nāvā.
anya-e0805n0:2185_0: Tatiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – jitāni indriyāni yena samaṇena soyaṃ jitindriyo samaṇo.
anya-e0805n0:2185_1: Evaṃ diṭṭhadhammo, pattadhammo, katakicco, jitā mārā anenāti jitamāro bhagavā, paṭividdhasabbadhammo.
anya-e0805n0:2186: Catutthiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko rājā, upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ assa samaṇassāti upanītabhojano samaṇo, upahaṭo bali assāti upahaṭabali yakkho.
anya-e0805n0:2187_0: Pañcamiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṃ niggatajano gāmo, niggato
anya-e0805n0:2187_1: ayo asmāti nirayo, niggatā kilesā etasmāti nikkileso, apetaṃ viññāṇaṃ asmāti apetaviññāṇo
anya-e0805n0:2187_2: matakāyo, apagataṃ bhayabheravaṃ asmāti apagatabhayabheravo arahā.
anya-e0805n0:2188_0: Chaṭṭhiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – chinnā hatthā yassa purisassa soyaṃ chinnahattho
anya-e0805n0:2188_1: puriso. Evaṃ paripuṇṇasaṅkappo, khīṇāsavo, vīto rāgo assāti vītarāgo, dve padāni
anya-e0805n0:2188_2: assāti dvipado, dvihattho paṭo, tevijjo, catuppado, pañca cakkhūni assāti pañcacakkhu
anya-e0805n0:2188_3: bhagavā, chaḷabhiñño, rassattaṃ, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ, dasabalo, anantañāṇo, tīṇi
anya-e0805n0:2188_4: dasa parimāṇametesanti tidasā devā, samāsantassa attaṃ, idha parimāṇasaddassa sannidhānato
anya-e0805n0:2188_5: dasasaddo saṅkhyāne vattate, ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā, ko pabhavo assāti
anya-e0805n0:2188_6: kiṃpabhavo ayaṃ kāyo, vigataṃ malamassāti vimalo, sundaro gandho assāti sugandhaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2188_7: candanaṃ. Evaṃ susīlo, sumukho, kucchito gandho assāti duggandhaṃ kuṇapaṃ, duṭṭhu
anya-e0805n0:2188_8: mano assāti dummano. Evaṃ dussīlo, dummukho, tapo eva dhanaṃ assāti tapodhano, khantisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2188_9: balaṃ assāti khantibalo, indoti nāmaṃ etassāti indanāmo.
anya-e0805n0:2189_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṃ yathicchitattā ubhayaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā
anya-e0805n0:2189_1: – chando jāto assāti chandajāto, jāto chando assātipi jātachando. Evaṃ sañjātapītisomanasso,
anya-e0805n0:2193_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe pade pare pubbe bhāsitapumā itthivācako saddo atthi
anya-e0805n0:2193_1: ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayābhāvo, bahubbīhivisayoyaṃ, upari
anya-e0805n0:2195: Kvaci taddhitasamāsanāmopasaggādīsu padesu ādimajjhuttarabhūtānaṃ sarānaṃ jinavacanānuparodhena dīgharassā honti paccayesu, apaccayesu paresu, aparabhūtesu ca.
anya-e0805n0:2198: Rassattaṃ ajjave itthi- rūpādo ca ka, tādisūti.
anya-e0805n0:2199_0: Bahubbīhisamāse sati pulliṅge uttarapadantassa rassattaṃ. Dīghajaṅgho puriso, tathā
anya-e0805n0:2199_1: pahūtā jivhā assāti pahūtajivho bhagavā. Mahatī paññā assāti mahāpañño. “Mahataṃ
anya-e0805n0:2200_0: Itthiyamiti kiṃ? Khamādhano. Bhāsitapumāti kiṃ? Saddhādhuro, saddhāpakatiko, paññāpakatiko,
anya-e0805n0:2200_1: paññāvisuddhiko, ettha ca “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti kappaccayo. Tulyādhikaraṇe
anya-e0805n0:2201: Pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena idha na bhavati. Bahudāsiko puriso. Bahukumārikaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2204: Tipadamidaṃ. Kvacisamāsantagatā dhanusaddā āpaccayo hoti, casaddena dhammādito ca, “vamodudantāna”nti vakāro, gāṇṭhivadhanvā. Evaṃ paccakkhadhammā.
anya-e0805n0:2206_0: Nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu iccatra – nānappakārā dumā nānādumā, nānādumehi patitāni
anya-e0805n0:2206_1: nānādumapatitāni, nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni cāti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0805n0:2206_2: tehi vāsitā nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā, nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatassa
anya-e0805n0:2206_3: soyaṃ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu pabbato. Ayaṃ pana kammadhārayatappurisagabbho
anya-e0805n0:2207_0: Tathā byālambo ambudharo byālambambudharo, tassa bindūni byālambambudharabindūni,
anya-e0805n0:2207_1: tehi cumbito byālambambudharabinducumbito, tādiso kūṭo yassa soyaṃ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2208_0: Sattamiyatthe bahubbīhi yathā – sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso
anya-e0805n0:2208_1: janapado, sulabho piṇḍo imasminti sulabhapiṇḍo deso. Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṃ rājadhāniyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2208_2: sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī, bahavo tāpasā etasminti bahutāpaso assamo, upacitaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2208_3: asminti upacitamaṃsalohitaṃ sarīraṃ, bahavo sāmino asminti bahussāmikaṃ nagaraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2212_0: Samāsantagatā nadimhā kappaccayo hoti, casaddena tuantā ca. Niccatthaṃ vacanaṃ. Nadīti
anya-e0805n0:2212_2: nadisaññassa kappaccaye rassattaṃ, bahunadiko janapado. Evaṃ bahujambukaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2212_3: Bahunārikoti chaṭṭhībahubbīhinā siddhaṃ. Bahavo kattāro asmiṃ, assāti vā bahukattuko
anya-e0805n0:2213_0: Bhinnādhikaraṇo yathā – ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena janena saddhiṃ
anya-e0805n0:2213_1: vāso assāti samānavāso puriso. Ubhato byañjanamassa atthīti ubhabhobyañjanako, chattaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2213_2: pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi puriso. Evaṃ daṇḍapāṇi, satthapāṇi, vajirapāṇi, khaggahattho,
anya-e0805n0:2213_3: satthahattho, dāne ajjhāsayo assāti dānajjhāsayo, dānādhimuttiko, buddhabhattiko,
anya-e0805n0:2214_0: Tipado yathā – parakkamenādhigatā sampadā yehi te bhavanti parakkamādhigatasampadā
anya-e0805n0:2214_1: mahāpurisā. Evaṃ dhammādhigatabhogā, oṇīto pattato pāṇi yena soyaṃ oṇītapattapāṇi,
anya-e0805n0:2214_2: sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti
anya-e0805n0:2215_0: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – natthi etassa samoti asamo bhagavā. Idha “attaṃ nassa tappurise”ti
anya-e0805n0:2215_1: sutte “attaṃ nassā”ti yogavibhāgena nassa attaṃ. Evaṃ appaṭipuggalo, aputtako, ahetuko,
anya-e0805n0:2215_2: “kvaci samāsanta”iccādinā kappaccayo, natthi saṃvāso etesanti asaṃvāsā, na vijjate
anya-e0805n0:2215_3: vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado, abhikkhuko vihāro, natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro,
anya-e0805n0:2215_4: “sare ana”ti ana, tappurisaggahaṇamupalakkhaṇaṃ, athavā “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā nassa
anya-e0805n0:2215_5: ana. Evaṃ natthi anto assāti anantaṃ, na vijjanti āsavā etesanti anāsavā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2216_0: Paṭhamāyatthe sahapubbapado yathā – saha hetunā yo vattateti sahetuko, sahetu vā,
anya-e0805n0:2216_1: “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā sahasaddassa sādeso, “kvaci samāsanta”iccādinā kappaccayo ca,
anya-e0805n0:2216_2: saha pītiyā ime vattantīti sappītikā. Evaṃ saha paccayehi vattantīti sappaccayā,
anya-e0805n0:2216_3: sakileso, saupādāno, saparivāro, saha mūlena uddhato samūluddhato rukkho.
anya-e0805n0:2217_1: kāyabyāmānaṃ samappamāṇatāya nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṃnigrodhaparimaṇḍalo
anya-e0805n0:2217_2: rājakumāro. “Vuttatthānamappayogo”ti ivasaddassa appayogo, saṅkho viya paṇḍaro ayanti
anya-e0805n0:2217_3: saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko viya sūro ayanti kākasūro, cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṃ paramatthadassanatoti
anya-e0805n0:2217_4: cakkhubhūto bhagavā. Evaṃ atthabhūto. Dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, andho viya bhūto
anya-e0805n0:2217_5: ayanti andhabhūto bālo. Muñjapabbajamiva bhūtā ayanti muñjapabbajabhūtā kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:2218_0: Chaṭṭhiyatthe – suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā. Uttarapadalopo,
anya-e0805n0:2218_1: nāgassa viya assa gatīti nāgagati. Evaṃ sīhagati, nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo, sīhahanu,
anya-e0805n0:2218_2: eṇissa viya assa jaṅghāti eṇijaṅgho, sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya assa kāyoti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n0:2218_3: brahmuno viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro assāti brahmassaro.
anya-e0805n0:2219_0: Vāsaddatthe saṅkhyobhayapado yathā – dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā, “dvekaṭṭhānamākāro
anya-e0805n0:2219_1: vā”ti dvisaddantassa āttaṃ, rassattaṃ, dvīhaṃ vā tīhaṃ vā dvīhatīhaṃ, cha vā pañca
anya-e0805n0:2219_2: vā vācā chappañcavācā. Evaṃ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni.
anya-e0805n0:2220_0: Disantarāḷattho yathā – pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṃ sāyaṃ pubbadakkhiṇā
anya-e0805n0:2220_2: disantarāḷatthe pubbapadassa rassattaṃ. Evaṃ pubbuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, pacchimuttarā.
anya-e0805n0:2220_3: Yadā pana dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti kammadhārayasamāso hoti, tadā pumbhāvātideso
anya-e0805n0:2220_4: uttarapadatthappadhānattā, sabbanāmikavidhānampi niccaṃ bhavatiyeva, yathā – dakkhiṇapubbassā,
anya-e0805n0:2221_0: Byatihāralakkhaṇo yathā – kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti kesākesi,
anya-e0805n0:2221_1: daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi, “kvacādimajjhuttarāna”ntiādinā
anya-e0805n0:2227: Tattha itarītarayoge tāva – “sāriputtamoggallāna”itīdha ubhayatthāpi paṭhamekavacanaṃ, samuccayajotanatthaṃ casaddappayogo ca.
anya-e0805n0:2230: Nānānāmānameva ekavibhattikānaṃ yuttatthānaṃ yo samuccayo, so vibhāsā samāso bhavati, dvandasañño ca.
anya-e0805n0:2231: Ettha ca samuccayo nāma sampiṇḍanaṃ, so pana atthavasena kevalasamuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro cāti catubbidho.
anya-e0805n0:2232_0: Tattha kevalasamuccaye, anvācaye ca samāso na bhavati, kriyāsāpekkhatāya nāmānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2232_1: aññamaññaṃ ayuttatthabhāvato, yathā – cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātañca paccayaṃ sayanāsanaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0805n0:2232_2: dānañca dehi, sīlañca rakkhāhi. Itarītarayoge, samāhāre ca samāso bhavati, tattha
anya-e0805n0:2233: Dve dve padāni dvandā, dvandaṭṭhā vā dvandā, dvandasadisattā ayaṃ samāsopi anvatthasaññāya dvandoti vuccati, ubhayapadatthappadhāno hi dvando.
anya-e0805n0:2234_0: Nanu ca ubhayapadatthappadhānatte sati dvande kathamekatthībhāvo siyāti? Vuccate
anya-e0805n0:2234_2: na virodho, tañca dvandavisayameva, tesamatthadvayadīpakattā. Yathā hi bhūsaddo anubhavaabhibhavādike
anya-e0805n0:2234_3: atthe anvabhiādiupasaggasahitova dīpeti, na kevalo, evaṃ “gavassaka”ntiādīsu gavādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2234_4: assādisaddantarasahitānameva atthadvayadīpanaṃ, na kevalānanti tañca dvandavisayameva,
anya-e0805n0:2234_5: na sabbatthāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā dvinnampi yathāvuttasamuccayadīpakattā atthi dvandepekatthitāti
anya-e0805n0:2234_6: na koci virodho, tato samāsasaññāvibhattilopādi vuttanayameva, samāseneva catthassa
anya-e0805n0:2235: Idha dvande accitataraṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, parasseva liṅgañca. Itarītarayogassa avayavappadhānattā sabbattha bahuvacanameva.
anya-e0805n0:2236_0: Sāriputtamoggallānā, sāriputtamoggallāne, sāriputtamoggallānehi iccādi, samaṇo ca
anya-e0805n0:2236_1: brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Evaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikā, khattiyabrāhmaṇā, devamanussā,
anya-e0805n0:2236_2: candimasūriyā, mātā ca pitā ca mātāpitaro, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā dvande mātuādipubbapadukārassa
anya-e0805n0:2240: Jāyāsaddassa tudaṃ jāniiccete ādesā honti patisadde pare kvaci. Tudaṃpati, jānipati, jayampatikā. Ettha niggahītāgamo, “kvacā”dinā rassattañca.
anya-e0805n0:2241_0: Kvaci appasaraṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā – cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā, nigamā ca
anya-e0805n0:2241_1: janapadā ca nigamajanapadā, surā ca asurā ca garuḷā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā
anya-e0805n0:2242: Kvaci ivaṇṇuvaṇṇantānaṃ pubbanipāto, yathā – aggi ca dhūmo ca aggidhūmā. Evaṃ gatibuddhibhujapaṭhaharakarasayā, dhātavo ca liṅgāni ca dhātuliṅgāni.
anya-e0805n0:2243: Kvaci sarādiakārantānaṃ pubbanipāto, yathā – attho ca dhammo ca atthadhammā. Evaṃ atthasaddā, saddatthā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2244: Samāhāre pana – “cakkhu ca sotañcā”ti atthe “nāmānaṃ samuccayo dvando”ti dvandasamāsaṃ katvā vibhattilopādimhi kate –
anya-e0805n0:2246: 359. Tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0805n0:2247: Yathā digusamāse, tathā samāhāradvandasamāsepi pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgatthānaṃ, khuddajantukavividha viruddhavisabhāgatthaiccevamādīnañca ekattaṃ hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca.
anya-e0805n0:2248_0: Pāṇino ca tūriyāni ca yoggāni ca senā cāti pāṇitūriya yoggasenā, tāsamaṅgāni pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni,
anya-e0805n0:2248_1: dvandato parattā aṅgasaddo paccekamabhisambajjhate. Khuddā ca te jantukā ceti khuddajantukā,
anya-e0805n0:2248_2: vividhenākārena viruddhā vividhaviruddhā, niccavirodhino. Samāno bhāgo yesaṃ te sabhāgā,
anya-e0805n0:2248_3: “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā samānassa saādeso, vividhā ca te lakkhaṇato sabhāgā ca kiccatoti
anya-e0805n0:2248_4: visabhāgā. Pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni ca khuddajantukā ca vividhaviruddhā ca visabhāgā
anya-e0805n0:2248_5: cāti dvando, idha bahuttā pubbanipātassa aniyamo, te atthā yesaṃ te pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgakhuddajantukavividhaviruddhavisabhāgatthā,
anya-e0805n0:2249_1: dvande ekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca, iti pāṇyaṅgatthabhāvato cakkhusotasaddānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2249_2: iminā ekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca katvā samāsattā nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n0:2250_0: Cakkhusotaṃ, he cakkhusota, cakkhusotaṃ, cakkhusotena. Evaṃ sabbatthekavacanameva.
anya-e0805n0:2250_1: Mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti antassa rassattaṃ, hanu
anya-e0805n0:2250_2: ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṃ. Evaṃ kaṇṇanāsaṃ, pāṇipādaṃ, chavimaṃsalohitaṃ. Hatthapādā maṃsalohitānītiādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2251_0: Tūriyaṅgatthe gītañca vāditañca gītavāditaṃ, sammañca tāḷañca sammatāḷaṃ, sammanti
anya-e0805n0:2251_1: kaṃsatāḷaṃ. Tāḷanti hatthatāḷaṃ. Saṅkhe ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca, saṅkhā ca paṇavā
anya-e0805n0:2251_2: ca ḍaṃṇḍimā cāti vā saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṃ, paṇavādayo dvepi bheriviseso.
anya-e0805n0:2252: Yoggaṅgatthe yathā – phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2253_0: Senaṅgatthe hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ, rathā ca pattikā ca rathapattikaṃ, asi
anya-e0805n0:2253_1: ca cammañca asicammaṃ, cammanti saravāraṇaphalakaṃ. Dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ, kalāpoti tūṇīraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2254: Khuddajantukatthe ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ. Evaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ, kīṭapaṭaṅgaṃ, kīṭasarīsapaṃ. Tattha kunthā sukhumakipillikā, kīṭā kapālapiṭṭhikapāṇā.
anya-e0805n0:2255: Vividhaviruddhatthe ahi ca nakulo ca, ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṃ. Evaṃ biḷāramūsikaṃ, antassa rassattaṃ, kākolūkaṃ, sappamaṇḍūkaṃ, garuḷasappaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2256_0: Visabhāgatthe sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2256_1: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, hirottappaṃ. Satisampajaññaṃ, lobhamohaṃ, dosamohaṃ, ahirikānottappaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2256_3: niddesadassanato katthaci napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena ādhipaccaparivāro
anya-e0805n0:2257: Aññoññaliṅgavisesitānaṃ dvande dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṃ, “kvacādī”tiādinā majjhe rassattaṃ. Evaṃ itthipumaṃ, pattacīvaraṃ, sākhāpalāsamiccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2258_0: Saṅkhyāparimāṇatthānaṃ dvande ekakañca dukañca ekakadukaṃ, saṅkhyādvande appasaṅkhyā
anya-e0805n0:2258_1: pubbaṃ nipatati. Evaṃ dukatikaṃ, tikacatukkaṃ, catukkapañcakaṃ, dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2259_0: Pacanacaṇḍālatthānaṃ dvande orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ. Evaṃ sākuṇikamāgavikaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2259_1: sapāko ca caṇḍālo ca sapākacaṇḍālaṃ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṃ, venarathakāraṃ. Tattha
anya-e0805n0:2260_0: Disatthānaṃ dvande pubbā ca aparā cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ, vibhattilopañca katvā
anya-e0805n0:2260_1: idhādiggahaṇena ekatte, napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2260_2: pubbāparaṃ, he pubbāpara, pubbāparaṃ, pubbāparena, pubbāparassa iccādi. Evaṃ puratthimapacchimaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2262: 360. Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0805n0:2263: Rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnamekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca vibhāsā hoti dvande samāse. Ekattābhāve bahuvacanaṃ, parasseva liṅgañca.
anya-e0805n0:2264_0: Tattha rukkhānaṃ dvande assatthā ca kapitthā cāti atthe samāhāre dvandasamāsādimhi
anya-e0805n0:2264_1: kate iminā vikappenekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca. Assatthakapitthaṃ, assatthakapitthā
anya-e0805n0:2264_2: vā. Evaṃ ambapanasaṃ, ambapanasā vā, khadirapalāsaṃ, khadirapalāsā vā, dhavassakaṇṇakaṃ, dhavassakaṇṇakā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2265: Tiṇānaṃ dvande usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ, usīrabīraṇāni vā. Evaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā vā, kāsakusaṃ, kāsakusā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2266_0: Pasūnaṃ dvande ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā vā, hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā
anya-e0805n0:2266_2: cā”ti avādeso ca, gomahiṃsaṃ, gomahiṃsā vā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ, eṇeyyavarāhā vā, sīhabyagghataracchaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2267: Dhanānaṃ dvande hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇāni vā. Evaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, jātarūparajatāni vā, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyaṃ, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2268: Dhaññānaṃ dvande sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā vā. Evaṃ tilamuggamāsaṃ, tilamuggamāsā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2269: Janapadānaṃ dvande kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ, kāsikosalā vā, vajjī ca mallā ca vajjimallaṃ, vajjimallā vā, aṅgā ca magadhā ca aṅgamagadhaṃ, aṅgamagadhā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2270_0: Ādiggahaṇena aññoññappaṭipakkhadhammānaṃ, sakuṇatthānañca dvande vibhāsā ekattaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2270_1: hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca. Kusalañca akusalañca kusalākusalaṃ, kusalākusalā vā,
anya-e0805n0:2270_2: evaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ, sāvajjānavajjā vā, hīnappaṇītaṃ, hīnappaṇītā vā, kaṇhasukkaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2270_3: kaṇhasukkā vā, sukhadukkhaṃ, sukhadukkhāni vā, paṭighānunayaṃ, paṭighānunayā vā,
anya-e0805n0:2270_4: chāyātapaṃ, chāyātapā vā, ālokandhakāraṃ, ālokandhakārā vā, ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2270_5: rattindivā vā, ahañca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, ahorattā vā, “kvaci samāsanta”iccādinā ākārikārānamattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2271: Sakuṇānaṃ dvande haṃsā ca bakā ca haṃsabakaṃ, haṃsabakā vā. Evaṃ kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṃ, kāraṇḍavacakkavākā vā, mayūrakoñcaṃ, mayūrakoñcā vā, sukasālikaṃ, sukasālikā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2280: Digu dudhā tappuriso, aṭṭhadhā navadhā bhave;
anya-e0805n0:2286: Atha nāmato eva vibhatyantā apaccādiatthavisese taddhituppattīti nāmato paraṃ taddhitavidhānamārabhīyate.
anya-e0805n0:2287_0: Tattha tasmā tividhaliṅgato paraṃ hutvā hitā sahitāti taddhitā, ṇādipaccayānametaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2287_1: adhivacanaṃ, tesaṃ vā nāmikānaṃ hitā upakārā taddhitāti anvatthabhūtaparasamaññāvasenāpi
anya-e0805n0:2291: Chaṭṭhiyantato liṅgamhā ṇappaccayo hoti vikappena “tassa apacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n0:2294_0: Dhātūhi, liṅgehi ca paccayā parāva hontīti paribhāsato apaccatthasambandhiliṅgato
anya-e0805n0:2294_1: chaṭṭhiyantāyeva paro hoti. Paṭicca etasmā attho etīti paccayo, patīyanti anena atthāti
anya-e0805n0:2294_2: vā paccayo, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti apaccasaddassa appayogo, “tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā
anya-e0805n0:2298_0: Ādisarassa vā ādibyañjanassa vā asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n0:2298_1: Saṃyogo anto assāti saṃyoganto, tadañño asaṃyoganto. Atha vā vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2298_2: vāsaddo, tadā ca pakatibhūte liṅge sarānamādisarassa asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakāre
anya-e0805n0:2305_0: Tesaṃ akāraivaṇṇuvaṇṇānameva yathākkamaṃ ā eoiccete vuddhiyo honti. Casaddaggahaṇamavuddhisampiṇḍanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2305_1: avadhāraṇatthaṃ vā. I ca u ca yu, yu eva vaṇṇā yuvaṇṇā, a ca yuvaṇṇā ca ayuvaṇṇā.
anya-e0805n0:2305_2: Ā ca e ca o ca āyo. Puna vuddhiggahaṇaṃ “negamajānapadā”tiādīsu uttarapadavuddhibhāvatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2306: Yathā hi katavuddhīnaṃ, puna vuddhi na hotiha;
anya-e0805n0:2307: Tathā sabhāvavuddhīnaṃ, āyonaṃ puna vuddhi na.
anya-e0805n0:2308_0: Tato akārassa ākāro vuddhi, “saralopomādesappaccayādimhi saralope tu pakatī”ti saralopapakatibhāvā,
anya-e0805n0:2308_1: “naye paraṃ yutte”ti paranayanaṃ katvā taddhitattā “taddhitasamāsa”iccādinā nāmabyapadese
anya-e0805n0:2309_0: Vāsiṭṭho, vasiṭṭhassa putto vā, vāsiṭṭhā iccādi purisasaddasamaṃ. Tassa nattupanattādayopi
anya-e0805n0:2309_1: tadupacārato vāsiṭṭhāyeva. Evaṃ sabbattha gottataddhite paṭhamappakatitoyeva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2310_0: Itthiyaṃ ṇappaccayantattā “ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntūhī”ti vāsiṭṭhasaddato īpaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:2310_2: kate syādyuppatti, vāsiṭṭhī kaññā, vāsiṭṭhī, vāsiṭṭhiyo iccādi itthisaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2311: Napuṃsake vāsiṭṭhaṃ apaccaṃ, vāsiṭṭhāni apaccāni iccādi cittasaddasamaṃ. Evaṃ uparipi taddhitantassa tiliṅgatā veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:2312_0: Bhāradvājassa putto bhāradvājo, vesāmittassa putto vesāmitto, gotamassa putto gotamo.
anya-e0805n0:2312_1: Ettha ca ayuvaṇṇattābhāvā ākārādīnaṃ na vuddhi hoti. Vasudevassa apaccaṃ vāsudevo,
anya-e0805n0:2312_2: baladevo. “Cittako”tiādīsu pana saṃyogantattā vuddhi na bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2313_0: “Vacchassa apacca”nti viggahe ṇamhi sampatte “vā ṇa’pacce”ti ito vāti taddhitavidhāne
anya-e0805n0:2313_1: sabbattha vattate, tena sabbattha vākyavuttiyo bhavanti. “Apacce”ti padaṃ yāva saṃsaṭṭhaggahaṇāva vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2315_0: Vaccha kaccaiccevamādito chaṭṭhiyantato gottagaṇato ṇāyana ṇānaiccate paccayā honti
anya-e0805n0:2315_1: vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe. Sabbattha ṇakārānubandho vuddhattho, sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2316_0: Vacchāyano vacchāno vacchassa putto vā. Evaṃ kaccassa putto kaccāyano kaccāno, moggallassa
anya-e0805n0:2316_1: putto moggallāyano moggallāno. Evaṃ aggivessāyano aggivessāno, kaṇhāyano kaṇhāno,
anya-e0805n0:2316_2: sākaṭāyano sākaṭāno, muñcāyano muñcāno, kuñjāyano kuñjāno iccādi. Ākatigaṇo’yaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2319: Ādisaddoyaṃ pakāre vattate. Kattikā vinatārohiṇīiccevamādīhi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi ṇeyyappaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n0:2320_0: Vibhattilope “pakati cassa sarantassā”ti pakatibhāvo. Kattikeyyo, kattikāya putto
anya-e0805n0:2320_1: vā. Evaṃ vinatāya apaccaṃ venateyyo, ikārassekāro vuddhi, rohiṇiyā putto rohiṇeyyo,
anya-e0805n0:2320_2: gaṅgāya apaccaṃ gaṅgeyyo, bhaginiyā putto bhāgineyyo, nadiyāputto nādeyyo. Evaṃ anteyyo,
anya-e0805n0:2320_3: āheyyo, kāmeyyo. Suciyā apaccaṃ soceyyo, ettha ukārassokāro vuddhi, bālāya apaccaṃ bāleyyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2323_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā ṇipaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe. Dakkhi, dakkhī,
anya-e0805n0:2323_1: dakkhayo, doṇassa apaccaṃ doṇi. Evaṃ vāsavi, sakyaputti, nāṭaputti, dāsaputti, dāsarathi.
anya-e0805n0:2323_2: Vāruṇi, kaṇḍi, bāladevi, pāvaki, jinadattassa apaccaṃ jenadatti, suddhodani, anuruddhi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2324_0: Puna vāggahaṇena apaccatthe ṇikappaccayo, aditiādito ṇyappaccayo ca. Yathā – sakyaputtassa
anya-e0805n0:2324_1: putto sakyaputtiko, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā kakārassa yakāro, sakyaputtiyo. Evaṃ nāṭaputtiko,
anya-e0805n0:2327_0: Avaṇṇo taddhitabhūte yappaccaye pare lopamāpajjate. Casaddena ivaṇṇopīti ikāralopo,
anya-e0805n0:2327_1: “yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni ca la ña jakāratta”nti tyakārasaṃyogassa cakāro,
anya-e0805n0:2327_2: “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti dvittaṃ, ādicco. Evaṃ ditiyā putto decco.
anya-e0805n0:2331_0: Tesu ādimajjhuttaresu avihitalakkhaṇesu jinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi lopa āgama
anya-e0805n0:2331_1: vikāra viparītaādesā hontīti saṃyogantattepi ādivuddhi, ikāralope nyassañādeso, koṇḍañño,
anya-e0805n0:2331_2: kuruno putto korabyo, etthāpi teneva ukārassa avādeso, bhātuno putto bhātabyo.
anya-e0805n0:2334_0: Upagu manuiccevamādīhi ukārantehi gottagaṇehi ṇavappaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ
anya-e0805n0:2334_1: atthe. Ādisaddassa cettha pakāravācakattā ukārantatoyevāyaṃ. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2334_2: manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, “mānuso”ti ṇappaccaye, sāgame ca kate rūpaṃ, bhagguno apaccaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2334_3: bhaggavo, paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2337_0: Vidhavādito ṇerappaccayo hoti vā apaccatthe. Vigato dhavo pati etissāti vidhavā,
anya-e0805n0:2337_1: vedhavero, bandhukiyā abhisāriṇiyā putto bandhukero, samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto
anya-e0805n0:2341: 373. Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko.
anya-e0805n0:2342_0: Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, yena vā tarati, yena vā carati, yena vā vahati, tato tatiyantato
anya-e0805n0:2342_1: liṅgamhā tesu saṃsaṭṭhādīsvatthesu ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Telikaṃ bhojanaṃ, tilena
anya-e0805n0:2342_2: abhisaṅkhatanti attho. Telikī yāgu. Guḷena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ egāḷikaṃ. Evaṃ ghātikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ, loṇikaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2343_0: Nāvāya taratīti nāviko, uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, vuddhiabhāvapakkhe uḷumpiko.
anya-e0805n0:2343_1: Evaṃ kulliko, gopucchiko. Sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. Evaṃ pādiko, daṇḍiko, dhammena
anya-e0805n0:2343_2: carati pavattatīti dhammiko. Sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, vāggahaṇena īkārassa vuddhi
anya-e0805n0:2343_3: na hoti. Evaṃ aṃsiko, khandhiko, hatthiko, aṅguliko.
anya-e0805n0:2344: Puna vāggahaṇena aññatthesupi ṇikappaccayo, paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, pathaṃ gacchatīti pathiko.
anya-e0805n0:2348_0: Catuppadamidaṃ. Tamadhīteti atthe, tena katādīsvatthesu ca tamhi sannidhāno, tattha
anya-e0805n0:2348_1: niyutto, tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa bhaṇḍaṃ, tamassa jīvikā iccetesvatthesu ca dutiyādivibhatyantehi
anya-e0805n0:2348_2: liṅgehi ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Venayiko. Evaṃ suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
anya-e0805n0:2352: I uiccebhesaṃ ādisarānaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti saṇe, tatreva vuddhi āgamo hoti ca ṭhāneti ekāravuddhāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:2356_0: Veyyākaraṇiko, nyāyamadhīteti neyyāyiko. Evaṃ takkiko, vediko, nemittiko, kāyena
anya-e0805n0:2356_1: kato payogo kāyiko, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyikaṃ, vacasā kataṃ kammaṃ vācasikaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2356_2: mānasikaṃ, ettha ca “sasare vāgamo”ti sutte vavatthitavāsaddena paccaye parepi sāgamo,
anya-e0805n0:2356_3: therehi katā saṅgīti therikā. Evaṃ pañcasatikā, sattasatikā, ettha “ṇavaṇikā”disutte
anya-e0805n0:2357: Sannidhānatthe sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Evaṃ mānasikā, mānasikaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2358_0: Niyuttatthe dvāre niyutto dovāriko, ettha “māyūnamāgamo ṭhāne”ti vakārato pubbeokārāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:2358_1: Evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, nāgariko, navakammiko, vanakammiko, ādikammiko, odariko, rathiko,
anya-e0805n0:2358_2: pathiko, upāye niyutto opāyiko, cetasi niyuttā cetasikā.
anya-e0805n0:2359: Sippatthe vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇā, vīṇā assa sippaṃ veṇiko. Evaṃ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko.
anya-e0805n0:2360: Bhaṇḍatthe gandho assa bhaṇḍanti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko, tambūliko, loṇiko.
anya-e0805n0:2361: Jīvikatthe urabbhaṃ hantvā jīvati, urabbhamassa jīvikāti vā orabbhiko. Evaṃ māgaviko, ettha vakārāgamo. Sūkariko, sākuṇiko, macchiko iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2362_0: “Tena katādī”ti ettha ādiggahaṇena tena hataṃ, tena baddhaṃ, tena kītaṃ, tena dibbati,
anya-e0805n0:2362_1: so assa āvudho, so assa ābādho, tattha pasanno, tassa santakaṃ, tamassa parimāṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2362_2: tassa rāsi, taṃ arahati, tamassa sīlaṃ, tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tatra vidito,
anya-e0805n0:2362_3: tadatthāya saṃvattati, tato āgato, tato sambhūto, tadassa payojananti evamādiatthe
anya-e0805n0:2362_4: ca ṇikappaccayo hoti. Yathā – jālena hato, hanatīti vā jāliko. Evaṃ bāḷisiko, vākariko,
anya-e0805n0:2362_5: suttena baddho suttiko, varattāya baddho vārattiko nāgo.
anya-e0805n0:2363_0: Vatthena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vatthikaṃ. Evaṃ kumbhikaṃ, phālikaṃ, sovaṇṇikaṃ, sātikaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2363_1: Akkhena dibbatīti akkhiko. Evaṃ sālākiko, tindukiko, ambaphaliko. Cāpo assa āvudhoti
anya-e0805n0:2364: Vāto assa ābādhoti vātiko. Evaṃ semhiko, pittiko.
anya-e0805n0:2365: Buddhe pasanno buddhiko. Evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko. Buddhassa santako buddhiko. Evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko vihāro, saṅghikā bhūmi, saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ, puggalikaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2366_0: Kumbho assa parimāṇanti kumbhikaṃ. Evaṃ khārikaṃ, doṇikaṃ. Kumbhassa rāsi kumbhiko.
anya-e0805n0:2366_1: Kumbhaṃ arahatīti kumbhiko. Evaṃ doṇiko, aṭṭhamāsiko, kahāpaṇiko, āsītikā gāthā,
anya-e0805n0:2366_2: nāvutikā, sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ. Sandiṭṭhamarahatīti sandiṭṭhiko, “ehi passā”ti imaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2367: Sīlatthe paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko. Evaṃ tecīvariko, ekāsane bhojanasīlo ekāsaniko, rukkhamūle vasanasīlo rukkhamūliko, tathā āraññiko, sosāniko.
anya-e0805n0:2368_0: Jātatthe apāye jāto āpāyiko. Evaṃ nerayiko, sāmuddiko maccho, vassesu jāto vassiko,
anya-e0805n0:2368_1: vassikā, vassikaṃ pupphaṃ, sāradiko, hemantiko, vāsantiko, cātuddasiko, rājagahe
anya-e0805n0:2368_2: jāto, rājagahe vasatīti vā rājagahiko jano, magadhesu jāto, vasatīti vā māgadhiko,
anya-e0805n0:2368_3: māgadhikā, māgadhikaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ jāto, vasatīti vā sāvatthiko, kāpilavatthiko, vesāliko.
anya-e0805n0:2369: Loke vidito lokiko, lokāya saṃvattatītipi lokiko. Tathā mātito āgataṃ mātikaṃ, pitito āgataṃ pettikaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2370: Sambhūtatthe mātito sambhūtaṃ mattikaṃ. Evaṃ pettikaṃ. Upadhitassa payojanaṃ opadhikaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2371_0: Sakatthepi asaṅkhāroyeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Evaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, nāmameva nāmikaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2371_1: ākhyātikaṃ, opasaggikaṃ, nepātikaṃ, catumahārāje bhatti etesanti cātumahārājikā.
anya-e0805n0:2374: Rāgatthavācakā liṅgamhā “tena ratta”miccetasmiṃ atthe, “tasse”ti chaṭṭhiyantato “ida”miccetasmiṃ atthe ca aññatthesu ca ṇappaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:2375: Kāsāvaṃ vatthaṃ. Evaṃ kāsāyaṃ, kusumbhena rattaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pattaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ, nīlena rattaṃ nīlaṃ. Evaṃ pītaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2376: Idamatthe mahiṃsassa idaṃ māhiṃsaṃ maṃsaṃ, dadhi sappi cammādikaṃ vā, sūkarassa idaṃ sūkaraṃ, kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sogataṃ sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2377: “Isissa ida”nti atthe ṇappaccaye kate vuddhimhi sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:2380: I uiccetesaṃ ādisarānaṃ āttañca hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare, casaddena rikārāgamo ca ṭhāneti ikārassa āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2383: Ārisyaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ, āsabhī vācā.
anya-e0805n0:2384_0: Aññatthaggahaṇena pana avidūrabhavo, tatra bhavo, tatra jāto, tato āgato, so assa
anya-e0805n0:2384_1: nivāso, tassa issaro, kattikādīhi niyutto māso, sāssa devatā, tamaveccādhīte, tassa
anya-e0805n0:2384_2: visayo deso, tasmiṃ dese atthi, tena nibbattaṃ, taṃ arahati, tassa vikāro, tamassa
anya-e0805n0:2384_3: parimāṇanti iccevamādīsvatthesu ca ṇappaccayo. Yathā – vidisāya avidūre bhavo vediso
anya-e0805n0:2384_4: gāmo, udumbarassa avidūre bhavaṃ odumbaraṃ vimānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2385_0: Bhavatthe manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ sukhaṃ, sāgamo. Sare bhavo sāraso sakuṇo, sārasā
anya-e0805n0:2385_1: sakuṇī, sārasaṃ pupphaṃ, urasi bhavo oraso putto, urasi saṃvaḍḍhitattā, mitte bhavā
anya-e0805n0:2385_2: mettā, mettī vā, pure bhavā porī vācā.
anya-e0805n0:2386_0: Jātādīsu pāvuse jāto pāvuso megho, pāvusā ratti, pāvusaṃ abbhaṃ, sarade jāto sārado
anya-e0805n0:2386_1: māso, sāradā ratti, sāradaṃ pupphaṃ. Evaṃ sisiro, hemanto, vasanto, vimho, mathurāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2386_2: jāto māthuro jano, māthurā gaṇikā, māthuraṃ vatthaṃ. Mathurāya āgato māthuro, mathurā
anya-e0805n0:2386_3: assa nivāsoti māthuro, mathurāya issaro māthuro rājā. “Sabbato ko”ti ettha puna sabbatoggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:2386_4: taddhitatopi kvaci sasarakakārāgamo, māthurako vā, rājagahe jāto, rājagahā āgato,
anya-e0805n0:2386_5: rājagaho assa nivāsoti vā, rājagahassa issaroti vā rājagaho, rājagahako vā. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2386_6: sāgalo, sāgalako vā, pāṭaliputto, pāṭaliputtako vā, vesāliyaṃ jātotiādiatthe vesālo,
anya-e0805n0:2386_7: vesālako vā, kusināre jāto kosināro, kosinārako vā. Evaṃ sāketo, sāketako vā, kosambo,
anya-e0805n0:2386_8: kosambako vā, indapatto, indapattako vā, kapillo, kapillako vā, bhārukaccho, bhārukacchako
anya-e0805n0:2386_9: vā, nagare jāto, nagarā āgato, nagare vasatīti vā nāgaro, nāgarako vā. Evaṃ jānapado.
anya-e0805n0:2387_0: Janapadanāmesu pana sabbattha bahuvacanameva bhavati. Yathā – aṅgesu jāto, aṅgehi
anya-e0805n0:2387_1: āgato, aṅgā assa nivāso, aṅgānaṃ issaro vā aṅgo, aṅgako vā, māgadho, māgadhako vā,
anya-e0805n0:2387_2: kosalo, kosalako vā, vedeho, vedehako vā, kambojo, kambojako vā, gandhāro, gandhārako
anya-e0805n0:2387_3: vā, sovīro, sovīrako vā, sindhavo, sindhavako vā, assako, kāliṅgo, pañcālo, sakko,
anya-e0805n0:2387_4: tathā suraṭṭhe jāto, suraṭṭhassa issaro vā soraṭṭho, soraṭṭhako vā. Evaṃ mahāraṭṭho,
anya-e0805n0:2388_0: Nakkhattayoge kattikāya puṇṇacandayuttāya yutto māso kattiko, magasirena candayuttena
anya-e0805n0:2388_1: nakkhattena yutto māso māgasiro. Evaṃ phussena yutto māso phusso, maghāya yutto māso
anya-e0805n0:2388_2: māgho, phagguniyā yutto māso phagguno, cittāya yutto māso citto, visākhāya yutto
anya-e0805n0:2388_3: māso vesākho, jeṭṭhāya yutto māso jeṭṭho, uttarāsāḷhāya yutto māso āsāḷho, āsāḷhī
anya-e0805n0:2388_4: vā, savaṇena yutto māso sāvaṇo, sāvaṇī. Bhaddena yutto māso bhaddo, assayujena yutto
anya-e0805n0:2388_5: māso assayujo, buddho assa devatāti buddho. Evaṃ sogato, māhindo, yāmo, somo.
anya-e0805n0:2389: Byākaraṇaṃ aveccādhīte veyyākaraṇo. Evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, vatthuvijjo. Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto, udumbarā asmiṃ padese santīti odumbaro deso.
anya-e0805n0:2390: Sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā, payasā nibbattaṃ pāyāsaṃ, sahassaṃ arahatīti sāhassī gāthā, ayaso vikāro āyaso. Evaṃ sovaṇṇo, puriso parimāṇamassāti porisaṃ udakaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2391_0: Caggahaṇena tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tassa hitaṃ, taṃ arahatītiādīsu ṇeyyappaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:2391_1: Bārāṇasiyaṃ jāto, vasatīti vā bārāṇaseyyako, pure viya kakārāgamo. Evaṃ campeyyako,
anya-e0805n0:2391_2: sāgaleyyako, mithileyyako jano, gaṅgeyyo maccho, silāya jātaṃ seleyyakaṃ, kule jāto
anya-e0805n0:2391_3: koleyyako sunakho, vane jātaṃ vāneyyaṃ pupphaṃ. Evaṃ pabbateyyo mānuso, pabbateyyā
anya-e0805n0:2391_4: nadī, pabbateyyaṃ osadhaṃ, pathassa hitaṃ pātheyyaṃ, sapatissa hitaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2391_5: padīpeyyaṃ telaṃ, mātu hitaṃ matteyyaṃ. Evaṃ petteyyaṃ. Dakkhiṇamarahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2393: Jātaiccevamādīnaṃ saddānaṃ atthe ima iyaiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:2394: Pacchā jāto pacchimo, pacchimā janatā, pacchimaṃ cittaṃ, ante jāto antimo, antimā, antimaṃ. Evaṃ majjhimo, purimo, uparimo, heṭṭhimo, paccantimo, gopphimo, ganthimo.
anya-e0805n0:2395: Tathā iyappaccaye manussajātiyā jāto manussajātiyo, manussajātiyā, manussajātiyaṃ. Evaṃ assajātiyo, hatthijātiyo, bodhisattajātiyo, dabbajātiyo, samānajātiyo, lokiyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2396_0: Ādiggahaṇena tattha niyutto, tadassa atthi, tattha bhavotiādīsvapi ima iyappaccayā
anya-e0805n0:2396_1: honti, casaddena ikappaccayo ca. Ante niyutto antimo, antiyo, antiko, putto assa
anya-e0805n0:2396_2: atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti puttimo, puttiyo, vuttiko, kappo assa atthīti kappiyo,
anya-e0805n0:2396_3: jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭiyo, hānabhāgo assa atthīti hānabhāgiyo. Evaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyo,
anya-e0805n0:2396_4: bodhissa pakkhe bhavā bodhipakkhiyā, pañcavagge bhavā pañcavaggiyā. Evaṃ chabbaggiyā,
anya-e0805n0:2397: Casaddaggahaṇena kiya yaṇyappaccayā ca. Jātiyā niyutto jātikiyo. Evaṃ andhakiyo, jaccandhe niyutto jaccandhakiyo. Sassa ayanti sakiyo. Evaṃ parakiyo.
anya-e0805n0:2398_0: Yappaccayo sādhuhitabhavajātādiatthesu. Yathā – kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ. Sabhāyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2398_1: sādhu sabbhaṃ, “yavataṃ talanā”dinā ukārādi. Evaṃ medhāya hitaṃ mejjhaṃ ghaṭaṃ. Pādānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2398_2: hitaṃ pajjaṃ telaṃ, rathassa hitā racchā, gāme bhavo gammo, gave bhavaṃ gabyaṃ, “osare
anya-e0805n0:2398_3: cā”ti sutte casaddena yappaccaye parepi avādeso. Kavimhi bhavaṃ kabyaṃ, divi bhavā
anya-e0805n0:2398_4: dibyā, thanato jātaṃ thaññaṃ, dhanāya saṃvattatīti dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2399: Ṇyappaccayo parisāyaṃ sādhu pārisajjo, dakārāgamo, samaṇānaṃ hitā sāmaññā janā, brāhmaṇānaṃ hitā brāhmaññā, arūpe bhavā āruppā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2402_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato “tesaṃ samūho”ti atthe kaṇaṇaiccete paccayā honti. Rājaputtako, rājaputtakaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2402_1: vā, rājaputto. Evaṃ mānussako, mānusso, māthurako, māthuro, porisako, poriso, vuddhānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2402_2: samūho vuddhako, vuddho. Evaṃ māyūrako, māyūro, kāpoto, kokilo, māhiṃsako, māhiṃso,
anya-e0805n0:2402_3: oṭṭhako, orabbhako, aṭṭhannaṃ samūho aṭṭhako, rājānaṃ samūho rājako, bhikkhānaṃ samūho
anya-e0805n0:2402_4: bhikkho, sikkhānaṃ samūho sikkho, dvinnaṃ samūho dvayaṃ, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ikārassa
anya-e0805n0:2402_5: ayādeso. Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samūho tayaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2405_0: Gāmajanabandhusahāyaiccevamādīhi tāpaccayo hoti samūhatthe. Gāmānaṃ samūho gāmatā.
anya-e0805n0:2405_1: Evaṃ janatā, bandhutā, sahāyatā, nāgaratā. “Tā”ti yogavibhāgena sakatthepi devoyeva
anya-e0805n0:2407_0: “Tadassa ṭhāna”miccetasmiṃ atthe chaṭṭhiyantato iyappaccayo hoti. Madanassa ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2407_1: madaniyo, madaniyā, madaniyaṃ, bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhaniyaṃ. Evaṃ mucchaniyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2407_2: Rajaniyaṃ, gamaniyaṃ, dassaniyaṃ, upādāniyaṃ, pasādaniyaṃ. Casaddena hitādiatthepi
anya-e0805n0:2409: Upamatthe upamāvāciliṅgato āyitattappaccayo hoti. Dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṃ. Evaṃ timirāyitattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2412: “Tannissita”nti atthe, “tadassaṭhāna”nti atthe ca lappaccayo hoti. Duṭṭhu nissitaṃ, duṭṭhu ṭhānaṃ vā duṭṭhullaṃ, duṭṭhullā vācā, lassa dvibhāvo. Evaṃ vedallaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2413: “Abhijjhā assa pakati, abhijjhā assa bahulā”ti vā viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2415_0: Paṭhamāvibhatyantato āluppaccayo hoti “tadassa bahula”miccetasmiṃ atthe. Abhijjhālu,
anya-e0805n0:2415_1: abhijjhālū, abhijjhālavo. Evaṃ sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu. “Sabbato ko”ti ettha puna
anya-e0805n0:2415_2: sabbatoggahaṇena kakārāgamo, abhijjhāluko, abhijjhālukā, abhijjhālukaṃ. Evaṃ sītāluko,
anya-e0805n0:2415_3: dayāluko, tathā hīnova hīnako. Evaṃ potako, kumārako, māṇavako, muduko, ujuko, appamattakaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2416_1: kappaccayo. Paṭibhāgatthe hatthino iva hatthikā. Evaṃ assakā. Kucchitatthe kucchito
anya-e0805n0:2416_2: samaṇo samaṇako. Evaṃ brāhmaṇako, muṇḍako, paṇḍitako, veyyākaraṇako. Saññāyaṃ katako,
anya-e0805n0:2417_0: Tathā kiṃyatetato parimāṇatthe ttakavantuppaccayā. Kiṃ parimāṇamassāti kittakaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2417_1: Evaṃ yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ. Vantumhi āttañca, yaṃ parimāṇamassāti yāvā, yāvanto,
anya-e0805n0:2417_2: guṇavantusamaṃ. Evaṃ tāvā, tāvanto. Etāvā, etāvanto iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2420_0: Tappakativacanatthe mayappaccayo hoti, pakarīyatīti pakati, tena pakati tappakati,
anya-e0805n0:2420_1: tappakatiyā vacanaṃ kathanaṃ tappakativacanaṃ. Suvaṇṇamayo ratho, sovaṇṇamayo vā,
anya-e0805n0:2420_2: suvaṇṇamayā bhājanavikati, suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhājanaṃ. Evaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ, rajatamayaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2420_3: jatumayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, iddhiyā nibbattaṃ iddhimayaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2421: Manato nipphannā manomayā, ayasāpakataṃ ayomayaṃ. Ettha ca “manogaṇādīna”nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n0:2423: Etesaṃ manogaṇādīnaṃ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kateti okāro.
anya-e0805n0:2424: Gavena pakataṃ karīsaṃ, goto nibbattanti vā gomayaṃ. “Mayo”tiyogavibhāgena sakatthepi dānameva dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2429_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato ṇyattatāiccete paccayā honti “tassa bhāvo” iccetasmiṃ atthe, tusaddaggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:2429_1: ttanaṇeyyādippaccayā ca. Bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā iti bhāvo, saddappavattinimittaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2429_2: vuccati, vuttañca – “yassa guṇassa hi bhāvā dabbe saddaniveso tadabhidhāneṇyattatādayo”ti.
anya-e0805n0:2429_3: Ṇyattattanantānaṃ niccaṃ napuṃsakattaṃ, tāpaccayantassa sabhāvato niccamitthiliṅgatā.
anya-e0805n0:2429_4: Ṇyappaccayoyaṃ guṇavacane brāhmaṇādīhi, tattha “avaṇṇo ye lopañcā”ti avaṇṇalopo, ādivuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:2430: Ālasyaṃ. Evaṃ ārogyaṃ, udaggassa bhāvo odagyaṃ, sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, aṇaṇassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ, vidhavāya bhāvo vedhabyaṃ, dubbalassa bhāvo dubbalyaṃ, capalassa bhāvo cāpalyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2431: Viyattassa bhāvo veyyattiyaṃ, maccharassa bhāvo macchariyaṃ. Evaṃ issariyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ, muṇḍiyaṃ, mūḷhiyaṃ. Ettha “veyyattiya”ntiādīsu “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā yamhi ikārāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:2432_1: tyakārasaṃyogādīnaṃ calañajakārādesā, dvittaṃ. Paṇḍiccaṃ, bahussutassa bhāvo bāhussaccaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2432_2: “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ukārassa akāro, evaṃ porohiccaṃ, adhipatissa bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2432_3: muṭṭhassatissa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccaṃ, ivaṇṇalopo. Kusalassa bhāvo kosallaṃ. Evaṃ vepullaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2432_4: samānānaṃ bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, gilānassa bhāvo gelaññaṃ, “kvacādimajjhuttarā”disuttena
anya-e0805n0:2433_0: Suhadassa bhāvosohajjaṃ. Evaṃ vesārajjaṃ, kusīdassabhāvokosajjaṃ, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:2433_1: īkārassa akāro. Tathā “purisassa bhāvo porisa”ntiādīsu “yavataṃ talanā”disutte kāraggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:2433_2: yavataṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesā. Sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2433_3: Evaṃ domanassaṃ, sovacassaṃ, dovacassaṃ, ettha sakārāgamo. Tathā nipakassa bhāvo
anya-e0805n0:2433_4: nepakkaṃ, dvittaṃ. Evaṃ ādhikkaṃ, dubhagassa bhāvo dobhaggaṃ, vāṇijassa bhāvo vāṇijjaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2433_5: rājino bhāvo rajjaṃ, “kvacā”dinā rassattaṃ. Sarūpassa bhāvo sāruppaṃ. Evaṃ opammaṃ, sokhummaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2434_0: Tathassa bhāvo tacchaṃ, dummedhassa bhāvo dummejjhaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2434_1: brāhmaññaṃ, nipuṇassa bhāvo nepuññaṃ. “Taccha”ntiādīsupi kāraggahaṇeneva yavataṃ
anya-e0805n0:2435_0: Ttatāpaccayesu – paṃsukūlikassa bhāvo paṃsukūlikattaṃ, paṃsukūlikatā. Evaṃ tecīvarikattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2435_1: tecīvarikatā, odarikattaṃ, odarikatā, manussattaṃ, manussatā jāti, nīlattaṃ, nīlatā
anya-e0805n0:2435_2: guṇo, yācakattaṃ, yācakatā kriyā, daṇḍittaṃ, daṇḍitā dabbaṃ, saccavāditā, pāramitā,
anya-e0805n0:2435_3: kataññutā, sabbaññutā, “kvacā”dinā tāpaccaye rassattaṃ, appicchatā, asaṃsaggatā,
anya-e0805n0:2436: Ttanapaccaye – puthujjanassa bhāvo puthujjanattanaṃ, vedanattanaṃ, jāyattanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2437: Ṇeyye – sucissa bhāvo soceyyaṃ. Evaṃ ādhipabheyyaṃ, kavissa bhāvokāveyyaṃ, thenassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, mahāvuttinā nakārassa lopo.
anya-e0805n0:2438_0: “Ṇyattatā”ti yogavibhāgena kammani, sakatthe ca ṇyādayo, vīrānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā
anya-e0805n0:2438_1: vīriyaṃ, paribhaṭassa kammaṃ pāribhaṭyaṃ, pāribhaṭyassa bhāvo pāribhaṭyatā. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2438_2: sovacassatā, bhisaggassa kammaṃ bhesajjaṃ, byāvaṭassa kammaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ, saṭhassa
anya-e0805n0:2439: Sakatthe pana – yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ, karuṇāyeva kāruññaṃ, pattakālameva pattakallaṃ, ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, kāyapāguññameva kāyapāguññatā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2443_0: Visamaiccevamādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi ṇappaccayo hoti, tta tā ca “tassa bhāvo” iccetasmiṃ
anya-e0805n0:2443_1: atthe. Ākatigaṇoyaṃ. Vesamaṃ, visamattaṃ, visamatā. Sucissa bhāvo socaṃ, sucittaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2443_2: sucitā, garuno bhāvo gāravo, ādivuddhi, “o sare cā”ti sutte casaddaggahaṇena ukārassa
anya-e0805n0:2443_3: ca avādeso. Paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ, paṭuttaṃ, paṭutā.
anya-e0805n0:2444_0: Ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ iccatra “āttañcā”ti ṇamhi ikārukārānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2444_1: āttaṃ, dvibhāvo, saṃyoge ādirassattañca. Ujutā, mudutā. Evaṃ isissa bhāvo ārisyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2444_2: āsabhaṃ, kumārassa bhāvokomāraṃ, yuvassa bhāvo yobbanaṃ, mahāvuttinā nakārāgamo,
anya-e0805n0:2444_3: paramānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī dānādikriyā, “ṇavaṇikā”disuttena īpaccayo, samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.
anya-e0805n0:2446_0: Ramaṇīyaiccevamādito kaṇapaccayo hoti, tta tā ca bhāvatthe. Ramaṇīyassa bhāvo rāmaṇīyakaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2446_1: ramaṇīyattaṃ, ramaṇīyatā. Evaṃ mānuññakaṃ, manuññattaṃ, manuññatā, piyarūpakaṃ, piyarūpattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2446_2: piyarūpatā, kalyāṇakaṃ, kalyāṇattaṃ, kalyāṇatā, corakaṃ, corikā vā, corattaṃ, coratā,
anya-e0805n0:2449: “Sabbe ime pāpā ayamimesaṃ visesena pāpo”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2451_0: Visesatthe tara tama isika iya iṭṭhaiccete paccayā honti. Pāpataro, pāpatarā, pāpataraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2451_1: Tatopi adhiko pāpatamo, pāpatamā, pāpatamaṃ. Pāpisiko, pāpisikā, pāpisikaṃ. Pāpiyo,
anya-e0805n0:2451_2: pāpiyā, pāpiyaṃ. Pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhā, pāpiṭṭhaṃ. Atisayena pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhataro.
anya-e0805n0:2451_3: Evaṃ paṭutaro, paṭutamo, paṭisiko, paṭiyo, paṭiṭṭho. Sabbesaṃ atisayena varo varataro,
anya-e0805n0:2451_4: varatamo, varisiko, variyo, variṭṭho. Evaṃ paṇītataro, paṇītatamo.
anya-e0805n0:2452: “Sabbe ime vuḍḍhā ayamimesaṃ visesena vuḍḍho”ti atthe iyaiṭṭhappaccayā honti.
anya-e0805n0:2454_0: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa jo hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu. Jeyyo, jeṭṭho, ettha
anya-e0805n0:2454_1: ca “saralopādi”sutte tuggahaṇena lopamakatvā “sarā sare lopa”nti pubbasare lutte
anya-e0805n0:2457: Sabbasseva pasatthasaddassa sādeso hoti, jo ca iyiṭṭhesu. Ayañca pasattho ayañca pasattho sabbe ime pasatthā ayamimesaṃ visesena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:2459: Sabbasseva antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:2461: Sabbasseva bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:2463: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena appoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:2466: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ṇakārassa nakāro. Kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:2468_0: Vantumantuvī iccetesaṃ paccayānaṃ lopo hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Sabbe ime guṇavanto ayamimesaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2468_1: visesena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho, visesena satimāti satiyo, satiṭṭho, visesena
anya-e0805n0:2471: “Medhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2473_0: Paṭhamāvibhatyantā “tadassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjati” iccetesvatthesu vīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2473_1: Medhāmāyā saddehi cāyaṃ. Medhāvī, medhāvino. Itthiyaṃ īkārantattā “patibhikkhurājīkārantehi
anya-e0805n0:2473_2: inī”ti inī, medhāvinī, medhāviniyo. Napuṃsake medhāvi kulaṃ. Evaṃ māyāvī, māyāvinī, māyāvi cittaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2474_0: Caggahaṇena so i lava ālādippaccayā ca. Yathā – sumedhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti
anya-e0805n0:2474_1: sumedhaso, rassattaṃ. Evaṃ lomaso. Picchaṃ assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti picchilo.
anya-e0805n0:2474_2: Evaṃ phenilo, tuṇḍilo, jaṭilo. Kesā assa atthīti kesavo, vācālo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2475: “Tapo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2478: Tapaiccevamādito sīpaccayo hoti “tadassatthi” iccetasmiṃ atthe. Sassa dvibhāvo. Tapassī, tapassino, tapassinī, tapassi. Evaṃ tejassī, yasassī, manassī, payassī.
anya-e0805n0:2479: “Daṇḍo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2481_0: Ādisaddoyaṃ pakārattho, daṇḍaiccevamādito avaṇṇantā ika ī iccete paccayā honti “tadassatthi”
anya-e0805n0:2481_1: iccetasmiṃ atthe. Daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍinī. Evaṃ māliko, mālī, mālinī, chattiko,
anya-e0805n0:2481_2: chattī, rūpiko, rūpī, kesiko, kesī, saṅghī, ñāṇī, hatthī iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2483_0: Madhuādito rappaccayo hoti “tadassatthī”ti atthe. Madhu assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti
anya-e0805n0:2483_1: madhuro guḷo, madhurā sakkharā, madhuraṃ khīraṃ, kuñjā hanū etassa santīti kuñjaro,
anya-e0805n0:2483_2: sabbasmiṃ vattabbe mukhamassa atthīti mukharo, susi assa atthīti susiro. Evaṃ ruciro, nagaro.
anya-e0805n0:2484: “Guṇo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2486_0: Guṇaiccevamādito vantuppaccayo hoti “tadassa atthī”ti atthe. Vibhattilope, nāmabyapadese
anya-e0805n0:2486_1: ca kate syādyuppatti. Guṇavantu si, “savibhattissa, ntussā”ti adhikicca “ā simhī”ti
anya-e0805n0:2486_2: āttaṃ, guṇavā puriso, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Evaṃ gaṇavā, kulavā iccādayo. Itthiyaṃ “ṇava
anya-e0805n0:2486_3: ṇika ṇeyyaṇantūhī”ti īpaccayo, “vā”ti vattamāne “ntussa tamīkāre”ti takāro, guṇavatī,
anya-e0805n0:2486_4: guṇavantī iccādi. Napuṃsake “aṃ napuṃsake”ti savibhattissa ntussa amādeso, guṇavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2487: “Sati assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:2490_0: Satiiccevamādīhi avaṇṇantarahitehi paṭhamāvibhatyantehi liṅgehi mantuppaccayo hoti
anya-e0805n0:2490_1: “tadassatthī”ti atthe. Sesaṃ guṇavantusamaṃ. Satimā, satimatī, satimantī, satimaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2493: Āyussa ukāro asa hoti mantumhīti asādeso. Āyasmā, sesaṃ samaṃ. Gāvo assa santīti gomā, gomanto, gomatī, gomantī, gomaṃ kulaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2496_0: Saddhā paññāiccevamādito ṇappaccayo hoti “tadassatthi”iccetasmiṃ atthe. Saddho puriso,
anya-e0805n0:2496_1: saddhā kaññā, saddhaṃ kulaṃ. Evaṃ pañño, amaccharo, tathā buddhaṃ, buddhi assa atthīti buddho iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2501_0: Pūrayati saṅkhyā anenāti pūraṇo, saṅkhyāya pūraṇo saṅkhyāpūraṇo, tasmiṃ saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe
anya-e0805n0:2501_1: chaṭṭhiyantato mappaccayo hoti. Pañcamo, pañcannaṃ pūraṇī pañcamī, “nadādito vā ī”ti
anya-e0805n0:2501_2: īpaccayo. “Itthiyamato āpaccayo”ti āpaccayo, pañcamā vīriyapāramī, pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2501_3: Evaṃ sattamo, sattamī, sattamā, sattamaṃ, aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī, aṭṭhamā, aṭṭhamaṃ, navamo,
anya-e0805n0:2501_4: navamī, navamā, navamaṃ, dasamo, dasamī, dasamā, dasamaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2504_0: Catuchaiccetehi thaṭhaiccete paccayā honti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe. Catunnaṃ pūraṇo catuttho,
anya-e0805n0:2504_1: dvittaṃ, catutthī, catutthā, catutthaṃ, channaṃ pūraṇo chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhā,
anya-e0805n0:2507: Chassa sakārādeso hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Chāhamassa jīvitaṃ sāhaṃ, chāhaṃ vā, saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2510: Dvitiiccetehi tiyappaccayo hoti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe. Vipariṇāmena “dvi tiṇṇa”nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n0:2512_0: Dvitiiccetesaṃ dutaiccādesā honti tiyappaccaye pare. Dutiyo puriso, dutiyā, dutiyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2512_1: Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pūraṇo tatiyo, tatiyā, tatiyaṃ. Apiggahaṇena aññatthāpi dvisaddassa duādeso
anya-e0805n0:2512_2: hoti, casaddena di ca. Dve rattiyo durattaṃ, duvidhaṃ, duvaṅgaṃ, dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ, digu.
anya-e0805n0:2514: Tesaṃ catutthadutiyatatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadena saha aḍḍhuḍḍhadivaḍḍhadiyaḍḍhaaḍḍhatiyādesā honti.
anya-e0805n0:2518: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0805n0:2519: “Ekañca dasa cā”ti atthe dvandasamāse, “ekena adhikā dasā”ti atthe tappurisasamāse vā kate “saṅkhyāne”ti vattamāne “dvekaṭṭhānamākāro vā”ti āttaṃ. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:2526: Tato bahuvacanaṃ yo, “pañcādīnamakāro”ti savibhattissa antassa attaṃ. Ekārasa, ekādasa, liṅgattayepi samānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2529: Ekādito parassa dasassa ante īpaccayo hoti vā pūraṇatthe.
anya-e0805n0:2532: Ekādasannaṃ pūraṇī ekādasī, aññatra ekādasamo, ekādasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2533: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti “dvi dasa”iccatra “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2534: “Vīsati dasesu bā dvissa tū”ti bādeso, dassa rādeso. Bārasa, aññatra āttaṃ, dvādasa. Dvādasannaṃ pūraṇo bārasamo, dvādasamo, dvādasī.
anya-e0805n0:2535: Tayo ca dasa ca, tīhi vā adhikā dasāti terasa, “tesu vuddhi lopā”dinā tissa teādaso ānavutiyā, terasamo, terasī.
anya-e0805n0:2536_0: Cattāro ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra “gaṇane dasassā”ti
anya-e0805n0:2536_1: ca vattamāne “catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cucopi navā”ti tulopo, cuco
anya-e0805n0:2536_2: ca. Cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa. Cuddasamo, catuddasamo, cakuddasī, cātuddasī vā.
anya-e0805n0:2537_0: Pañca ca dasa ca, pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti pañcadasa, “tesu vuddhi lopā”dinā pañcasaddassa
anya-e0805n0:2537_1: dasa vīsesu pannapaṇṇaādesāpi, “aṭṭhādito cā”ti rattaṃ. Pannarasa, pañcadasa. Pannarasamo,
anya-e0805n0:2538_0: “Cha ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasā”ti samāse kate “chassā”ti vattamāne “dase so
anya-e0805n0:2538_1: niccañcā”ti so, “saṅkhyānaṃ, vā”ti ca vattate, “la darāna”nti lattaṃ, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:2539: Ḷo niccaṃ soḷase dassa, cattālīse ca terase;
anya-e0805n0:2541: Laḷānamaviseso kvaci, soḷasa. Teḷasa, cattālīsaṃ, cattārīsaṃ. Soḷasamo, soḷasī.
anya-e0805n0:2542_0: “Vā, dasara saṅkhyāne”ti adhikicca “aṭṭhādito cā”ti rattaṃ. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa,
anya-e0805n0:2542_1: āttaṃ. Aṭṭhārasannaṃ pūraṇo aṭṭhārasamo, aṭṭhādasamo. Evaṃ sattarasa, sattadasa.
anya-e0805n0:2544_0: Ekena ūnā vīsatīti tappuriso, ekūnavīsati. Ekūnavīsatādayo ānavutiyā ekavacanantā,
anya-e0805n0:2544_1: itthiliṅgā ca daṭṭhabbā, te ca saṅkhyāne, saṅkhyeyye ca vattante, yadā saṅkhyāne
anya-e0805n0:2544_2: vattante, tadā bhikkhūnamekūnavīsati tiṭṭhati, bhoti bhikkhūnamekūnavīsati tiṭṭhatu,
anya-e0805n0:2545_0: Saṅkhyeyye pana ekūnavīsati bhikkhavo tiṭṭhanti, bhonto ekūnavīsati bhikkhavo tiṭṭhatha,
anya-e0805n0:2545_1: ekūnavīsatiṃ bhikkhū passa, ekūnavīsatiyā bhikkhūhi kataṃ iccādi. Evaṃ vīsatādīsupi
anya-e0805n0:2546: Dasa ca dasa cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ katvā “dasadasā”ti vattabbe “sarūpānamekasesvasaki”nti ekasese kate dasasaddato paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ yo. “Dasa yo”itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:2547: 413. Gaṇane dasassa dviti catu pañca cha satta aṭṭhanavakānaṃ vīti cattāra paññā cha sattāsa navā yosu yonañcī samāsaṃ ṭhiri tītuti.
anya-e0805n0:2548_0: Gaṇane dasassa sambandhīnaṃ dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakkasattaka aṭṭhaka navakānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2548_1: katekasesānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vīti cattāra paññā cha satta asa nava iccādesā honti yosu
anya-e0805n0:2548_2: paresu, yonañca īsaṃ āsaṃ ṭhi riti īti utiiccete ādesā hontīti dvidasatthavācakassa
anya-e0805n0:2548_3: dasassa vīādeso hoti, yovacanassa īsañca, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n0:2551: Tāsaṃ saṅkhyānamante tikārāgamo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:2554_0: “Byañjane cā”ti niggahītalopo, puna taddhitattā nāmabyapadese syādyuppatti. Bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2554_1: vīsati, vīsaṃ vā, vīsati bhikkhū, vīsaṃ vā iccādi. Vīsatimo. Tathā ekavīsati kusalacittāni,
anya-e0805n0:2554_2: ekavīsaṃ vā. Ekavīsatimo. Bāvīsati, bāvīsaṃ vā. Bāvīsatimo. Dvāvīsati, dvāvīsaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n0:2554_3: Dvāvīsatimo. Tevīsati, tevīsaṃ vā. Tevīsatimo. Catuvīsati, catuvīsaṃ vā. Catuvīsatimo.
anya-e0805n0:2554_4: Paṇṇavīsati, paṇṇavīsaṃ vā. Paṇṇavīsatimo. Pañcavīsati, pañcavīsaṃ vā. Pañcavīsatimo.
anya-e0805n0:2554_5: Chabbīsati, chabbīsaṃ vā. Chabbīsatimo. Sattavīsati, sattavīsaṃ vā. Sattavīsatimo.
anya-e0805n0:2554_6: Aṭṭhavīsati, aṭṭhavīsaṃ vā. Aṭṭhavīsatimo. Ekūnatiṃsati, ekūnatiṃsaṃvā. Ekūnatiṃsatimo.
anya-e0805n0:2555_0: Dasa ca dasa ca dasa cāti “dasa dasa dasā”ti vattabbe ekasese kate “gaṇane dasassā”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:2555_1: tiīsamādesā, “kvacā”dinā rassattaṃ, niggahītāgamo ca, sesaṃ vīsatisamaṃ. Tiṃsati,
anya-e0805n0:2555_2: tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsa vassāni, niggahītalopo, tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsāya iccādi. Ekatiṃsati, ekatiṃsaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2556_0: Catudasatthavācakassa katekasesassa dasassa cattāra, yovacanassa īsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2556_1: “la darāna”nti rassa lattaṃ, tālīsaṃ vā. Cattālīsatimo. Ekacattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2557: Pañcadasatthavācakassa dasassa paññā, yovacanassa āsañca. Paññāsaṃ, “tesu vuddhi lopā”dinā paṇṇādeso, paṇṇāsaṃ vā. Ekapaññāsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvipaññāsaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2558: Chadasatthavācakassa dasassa cha, yovacanassa ṭhiādeso, “sa chassa vā”ti sakārādeso, saṭṭhi, dvāsaṭṭhi, dvesaṭṭhi, dvisaṭṭhi, tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:2559: Sattadasatthavācakassa dasassa satta, yovacanassa ri, ti ca. Sattari, sattati, dvāsattari, dvāsattati, dvisattari, disattati, tesattati, tisattati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2560: Aṭṭhadasatthavācakassa dasassa asa, yovacanassa ītiādeso ca. Asīti, ekāsīti, dveasīti, teasīti, caturāsīti, “kvacā”dinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:2561: Navadasatthavācakassa dasassa nava, yovacanassa uti ca, navuti, dvānavuti, dvenavuti, dvinavuti, tenavuti, tinavuti, catunavuti, channavutiyā, channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2563: 415. Dasadasakaṃ sataṃ dasakānaṃ sataṃ sahassañca yomhi.
anya-e0805n0:2564_0: Gaṇane pariyāpannassa dasadasakatthavācakassa dasasaddassa sataṃ hoti, satadasakatthavācakassa
anya-e0805n0:2564_1: dasassa sahassaṃ hoti yomhi. Iminā nipātanena yolopo, taddhitattā puna nāmabyapadese
anya-e0805n0:2564_2: syādyuppatti, niggahītassa lopo, “si”nti amādeso, yojanānaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ. Sataṃ
anya-e0805n0:2564_3: napuṃsakamekavacanantañca, tathā sahassaṃ, vaggabhede sabbattha bahuvacanampi bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2564_4: Dve vīsatiyo. Evaṃ tiṃsādīsupi, dve satāni, bahūni satāni, dve sahassāni, bahūni sahassāni.
anya-e0805n0:2565_0: Satassa dvikanti atthe chaṭṭhītappurisaṃ katvā “sataṃ dvika”nti vattabbe “dvikādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2565_1: taduttarapadānañca nipaccante”ti vuttiyaṃ vacanato iminā nipātanena uttarapadassa
anya-e0805n0:2565_2: pubbanipāto, kakāralopo ca hoti. Dvisataṃ. Evaṃ satassa tikaṃ tisataṃ, tathā catusataṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2565_3: pañcasataṃ, chasataṃ, sattasataṃ, aṭṭhasataṃ, navasataṃ, dasasataṃ sahassaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2565_4: Atha vā dve satāni dvisatanti digusamāso. Evaṃ tisataṃ, catusataṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2567_0: Yāva tāsaṃ saṅkhyānamuttari, tāva dasaguṇitañca kātabbaṃ, ettha dakāro sandhijo.
anya-e0805n0:2567_1: Yathā – dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ sataṃ hoti, satassa dasaguṇitaṃ sahassaṃ, sahassassa
anya-e0805n0:2567_2: dasaguṇitaṃ dasasahassaṃ, idaṃ nahutantipi vuccati, dasasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ satasahassaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2567_3: taṃ lakkhantipi vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ dasasatasahassaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2570_0: Yāsaṃ pana saṅkhyānaṃ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṃ yāni rūpāni, tāni sakehi nāmehi nipaccante.
anya-e0805n0:2570_1: Satasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭi, itthiliṅgā, ekavacanantā ca, vaggabhede bahuvacanañca
anya-e0805n0:2570_2: bhavati, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭippakoṭi.
anya-e0805n0:2570_3: Evaṃ nahutaṃ, ninnahutaṃ, akkhobhinī, bindu, abbudaṃ, nirabbudaṃ, ahahaṃ, ababaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2570_4: aṭaṭaṃ, sogandhikaṃ, uppalaṃ, kumudaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ, padumaṃ, kathānaṃ, mahākathānaṃ, asaṅkhyeyyanti.
anya-e0805n0:2575_0: Dviiccevamādito gaṇanato kappaccayo hoti anekatthe. Dviko rāsi dvikaṃ. Evaṃ tikaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2575_1: catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, sattakaṃ, aṭṭhakaṃ, navakaṃ, dasakaṃ, paṇṇāsakaṃ, satakaṃ, sahassakaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2580_0: Ekadvitiiccevamādito gaṇanato sakissa ṭhāne vāratthe kkhattuṃpaccayo hoti. Ekakkhattuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2580_1: dvikkhattuṃ bhuñjati, “sabbāsamāvuso”tiādinā silopo. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ, catukkhattuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2580_2: pañcakkhattuṃ, chakkhattuṃ, sattakkhattuṃ, aṭṭhakkhattuṃ, navakkhattuṃ, dasakkhattuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2584_0: Vibhāgatthe ekādisaṅkhyāto dhāpaccayo hoti. Casaddena ekadvito jjha ca, suttādito
anya-e0805n0:2584_1: so ca. Ekadhā. Dvīhi vibhāgehi dvidhā, dudhā vā, dvedhā. Tīhi vibhāgehi tidhā, tedhā
anya-e0805n0:2584_2: vā, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ikārassekāro. Evaṃ catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā, sattadhā,
anya-e0805n0:2584_3: aṭṭhadhā, navadhā, dasadhā, satadhā, sahassadhā, katidhā, bahudhā.
anya-e0805n0:2585: Jjhappaccaye ekadhā karotīti ekajjhaṃ. Evaṃ dvejjhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2586: Sopaccaye suttena vibhāgena suttaso. Evaṃ byañjanaso, padaso, atthaso, bahuso, sabbākārena sabbaso, upāyaso, hetuso, ṭhānaso, yoniso.
anya-e0805n0:2588_0: Sabbanāmehi pakāravacanatthe thāpaccayo hoti, tusaddena thattāpaccayo ca. Sāmaññassa
anya-e0805n0:2588_1: bhedako viseso pakāro, tassābhidhāneti attho, so pakāro tathā, taṃ pakāraṃ tathā,
anya-e0805n0:2588_2: tena pakārena tathā, yena pakārena yathā. Evaṃ sabbathā, aññathā, itarathā, ubhayathā,
anya-e0805n0:2588_3: thattāpaccaye tena pakārena tathattā. Evaṃ yathattā, aññathattā.
anya-e0805n0:2591_0: Kiṃimaiccetehi thaṃpaccayo hoti pakāravacanatthe. “Kissa ka ve cā”ti ettha casaddena
anya-e0805n0:2591_1: kissa kādeso. Kathaṃ, kaṃ pakāraṃ kathaṃ, kena pakārena kathaṃ, ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2591_2: imaṃ pakāraṃ itthaṃ. Anena pakārena itthaṃ, “imassi thaṃ dāniha to dhesu cā”ti imasaddassa
anya-e0805n0:2591_3: ikāro, dvittaṃ. Ettha hi kkhattuṃ ādithaṃpariyosānappaccayantānaṃ abyayataddhitattā
anya-e0805n0:2591_5: to pañcamyatthe”tiādinā vuttatoādippaccayantā ca idheva abyayataddhite saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0805n0:2593: Ye saddā lakkhaṇena anupapannā aniddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā akkharādito, nāmopasagganipātato vā samāsataddhitādito vā, te nipātanā sijjhanti.
anya-e0805n0:2595: Imasmā jja siyā kāle, samānāparato jju ca;
anya-e0805n0:2596: Imasaddassa’kāro ca, samānassa ca so siyā.
anya-e0805n0:2597_0: Imasmiṃ kāle, imasmiṃ divase vā ajja, samāne kāle sajju, aparasmiṃdivase aparajju.
anya-e0805n0:2597_1: Nipātehi bhavatthe tanappaccayo. Ajja bhavaṃ ajjatanaṃ, ajja bhavā ajjatanī, sve
anya-e0805n0:2597_2: bhavaṃ svātanaṃ. Evaṃ purātanaṃ, hiyyo bhavaṃ hiyyattanaṃ, hiyyo bhavā hiyyattanī iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2606: Atha ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.
anya-e0805n0:2607_0: Tattha kriyaṃ ācikkhatīti ākhyātaṃ, kriyāpadaṃ. Vuttañhi “kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2607_1: kriyālakkhaṇamākhyātika”nti. Tattha kāloti atītādayo, kārakamiti kammakattubhāvā,
anya-e0805n0:2607_2: purisāti paṭhamamajjhimuttamā, kriyāti gamanapacanādiko dhātvattho, kriyālakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2611: Kālādivasena dhātvatthaṃ vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, tyādayo, tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n0:2612_0: Kriyaṃ dhārentīti dhātavo, bhūvādayo, khādidhātuppaccayantā ca, te pana atthavasā
anya-e0805n0:2612_1: dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā, akammakā cāti. Tatra sakammakā ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2612_2: kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā – kaṭaṃ karoti, gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacatītiādayo, akammakā
anya-e0805n0:2612_3: ye kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā – acchati, seti, tiṭṭhatītiādayo.
