anya-e0805n0:2613_0: Te pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṃ? Avikaraṇā bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n0:2613_1: Niggahītapubbakaavikaraṇā rudhādayo, yavikaraṇā divādayo, ṇuṇā uṇāvikaraṇā svādayo,
anya-e0805n0:2613_2: nāppaṇhāvikaraṇā kiyādayo, oyiravikaraṇā tanādayo, sakatthe ṇe ṇayantā curādayoti.
anya-e0805n0:2614: Tattha paṭhamaṃ avikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā bhūiccetasmā dhātuto tyādayo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n0:2615: Bhūsattāyaṃ, “bhū”iccayaṃ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
anya-e0805n0:2618: Bhūiccevamādayo ye kriyāvācino saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti. Bhū ādi yesaṃ te bhūvādayo, atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṃ te bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n0:2623: Anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2624: Kvaciggahaṇaṃ “mahīyati samatho”tiādīsu nivattanatthaṃ, iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2626: 426. Vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe.
anya-e0805n0:2627: Tyādayo dvādasa vattamānāsaññā hontīti tyādīnaṃ vattamānatthavisayattā vattamānāsaññā.
anya-e0805n0:2632: Paccuppanne kāle gamyamāne vattamānāvibhatti hoti, kāloti cettha kriyā, karaṇaṃ kāro, rakārassa lakāro, kālo.
anya-e0805n0:2636_1: “paccuppanne”ti viseseti. Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppanno paccuppanno, paṭiladdhasabhāvo,
anya-e0805n0:2639_0: Tasmiṃ paccuppanne vattamānāvibhattiṃ katvā, tassā ṭhānāniyame “dhātuliṅgehi parā
anya-e0805n0:2639_1: paccayā”ti paribhāsato dhātuto paraṃ vattamānappaccaye katvā, tesamaniyamappasaṅgesati
anya-e0805n0:2641_0: Atha taddhitānantaraṃ vuccamānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ vattamānādīnaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2641_1: yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni parassapadasaññāni
anya-e0805n0:2641_2: hontītiādimhi channaṃ parassapadasaññā, parassatthāni padāni parassapadāni, tabbāhullato tabbohāro.
anya-e0805n0:2644: Kattarikārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi parassapadaṃ hotīti parassapadaṃ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge vatticchāvasā –
anya-e0805n0:2647_0: Tāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadāna’mattanopadānañca dve dve vacanāni yathākkamaṃ paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni
anya-e0805n0:2647_1: honti. Taṃ yathā? Ti antiiti paṭhamapurisā, si thaiti majjhimapurisā, mi maiti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0805n0:2647_2: Attanopadesupi te anteiti paṭhamapurisā, se vheiti majjhimapurisā, e mheiti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0805n0:2647_3: Evaṃ sesāsu sattasu vibhattīsupi yojetabbanti. Evaṃ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe
anya-e0805n0:2647_4: ākhyātapade dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā hontīti vattamānaparassapadādimhi
anya-e0805n0:2649_0: Tumhāmhasaddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi
anya-e0805n0:2649_1: dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṃ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa
anya-e0805n0:2649_2: kattuno ekatte vattumicchite “ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ti.
anya-e0805n0:2650: “Paro, paccayo, dhātū”ti ca adhikāro, “yathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2652: Bhūiccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro apaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu. Sabbadhātukamhiyevāyamissate.
anya-e0805n0:2655_0: Kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṃyogantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vuddhi hoti. Caggahaṇena ṇuppaccayassāpi
anya-e0805n0:2655_1: vuddhi hoti. Ettha ca “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti ito vāsaddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. Tena –
anya-e0805n0:2658: Yuvaṇṇānampi ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na;
anya-e0805n0:2663: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti. “Saralopo mādesa”iccādinā saralopādimhi kate “naye paraṃ yutte”ti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2664: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṃ cittaṃ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2668_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṃ bahuttā “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2668_1: anti, pure viya appaccayavuddhiavādesā, saralopādi. Te purisā bhavanti, appayujjamānepi bhavati, bhavanti.
anya-e0805n0:2671_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi majjhimapuriso
anya-e0805n0:2675: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi uttamapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṃ mi, appaccayavuddhiavādesā.
anya-e0805n0:2677: Akāro dīghamāpajjate himimaiccetāsu vibhattīsu. Ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma. Bhavāmi, bhavāma.
anya-e0805n0:2680: Sabbāsaṃ vattamānānaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni hontīti teādīnaṃ attanopadasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:2683_0: Kattari ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti. Caggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2683_1: sesaṃ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2684_0: Paca pāke, dhātusaññāyaṃ dhātvantalopo, vuttanayeneva tyādyuppatti, ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānamabhāvā
anya-e0805n0:2684_1: vuddhiabhāvovettha viseso. So devadatto odanaṃ pacati, pacanti, pacasi, pacatha,
anya-e0805n0:2684_2: pacāmi, pacāma, so odanaṃ pacate, te pacante, tvaṃ pacase, tumhe pacavhe, ahaṃ pace, mayaṃ pacāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2687_0: Sabbesaṃ paṭhamamajjhimānaṃ, paṭhamuttamānaṃ, majjhimuttamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2687_1: ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo. Ekakālānamevābhidhāne cāyaṃ. So ca pacati,
anya-e0805n0:2687_2: tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge tumhe pacathāti bhavati. Evaṃ so ca pacati, ahañca
anya-e0805n0:2687_3: pacāmīti mayaṃ pacāma, tathā tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṃ pacāma, so ca pacati,
anya-e0805n0:2687_4: tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, mayaṃ pacāma. Evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2688: Ekābhidhāneti kimatthaṃ? “So ca pacati, tvañca pacissasi, ahaṃ paciṃ” ettha bhinnakālattā “mayaṃ pacimhā”ti na bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2689: Gamu sappa gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṃ dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0805n0:2692: Gamuiccetassa dhātussanto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, sabbaggahaṇena mānanta ya kāritappaccayesu ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tenāyaṃ –
anya-e0805n0:2693: Vidhiṃ niccañca vāsaddo, māna’ntesu tu kattari;
anya-e0805n0:2695_0: Appaccayaparanayanāni, so puriso gāmaṃ gacchati, te gacchanti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:2695_1: garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa re vā hoti, gacchare. Tvaṃ gacchasi,
anya-e0805n0:2695_2: tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma.
anya-e0805n0:2696: Cchādesābhāve “lopañcettamakāro”ti appaccayassa ekāro. Gameti, gamenti, saralopo. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n0:2697: Attanopadepi so gāmaṃ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2698: “Kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī”tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2701: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2704_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti, casaddena kammakattaripi.
anya-e0805n0:2704_1: Bhavanaṃ bhāvo, so ca kārakantarena asaṃsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho.
anya-e0805n0:2704_2: Karīyatīti kammaṃ. Akammakāpi dhātavo sopasaggā sakammakāpi bhavanti, tasmā kammani
anya-e0805n0:2707: Sabbadhātūhi paro bhāvakammesu yappaccayo hoti. Attanopadavisayevāyamissate, “aññesu cā”ti sutte anuvattitavāggahaṇena yappaccaye vuddhi na bhavati, anubhūyate sukhaṃ devadattena.
anya-e0805n0:2710: Anubhūyante sampattiyo tayā. Anubhūyase tvaṃ devadattena, anubhūyavhe tumhe. Ahaṃ anubhūye tayā, mayaṃ anubhūyāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2713_0: Attanopadāni kvaci parassapadattamāpajjante, akattariyevetaṃ. Yakārassa dvittaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2713_1: anubhūyyati mayā sukhaṃ, anubhūyyate vā, anubhūyyanti. Anubhūyyasi, anubhūyyatha.
anya-e0805n0:2715: Bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva, tañca paṭhamapurisasseva, bhūyate devadattena, devadattena sampati bhavananti attho.
anya-e0805n0:2716: Pacadhātuto kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n0:2719_0: Tassa bhāvakammavisayassa yappaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātvantena
anya-e0805n0:2719_1: saha yathāsambhavaṃ. Ettha ca “ivaṇṇāgamo vā”ti ito sīhagatiyā vāsaddo anuvattetabbo,
anya-e0805n0:2720: Cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṃ, dhātvantānaṃ yavattanaṃ;
anya-e0805n0:2722_0: Dhātvantassa cavaggādittā cakāre kate “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti cakārassa dvittaṃ. Paccate
anya-e0805n0:2722_1: odano devadattena, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa
anya-e0805n0:2722_2: kvaci re hoti. Paccare, paccante. Paccase, paccavhe. Pacce, paccāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2723: Parassapadādese paccati, paccanti. Paccasi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma. Tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. Paccati, paccanti vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2724: Gamito kammani attanopade, yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n0:2727_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṃ bhāvakammavisaye yappaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:2727_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Cchādeso, gacchīyate gāmo devadattena, gacchīyante.
anya-e0805n0:2731_0: Heṭṭhānuttehi parassevedaṃ, tena kaṭapavaggayakāralasanteheva dhātūhi paro yappaccayo
anya-e0805n0:2731_1: pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti makārā parassa yakārassa makāro. Gammate, gamīyate, gammante,
anya-e0805n0:2731_2: gamīyante. Gammase, gamīyase, gammavhe, gamīyavhe. Gamme, gamīye, gammāmhe, gamīyāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2732_0: Parassapadatte – gacchīyyati, gacchīyyanti. Gacchīyati, gacchīyanti vā. Gammati,
anya-e0805n0:2732_1: gammanti. Gamīyati, gamīyanti. Ikārāgame gamiyyati, gamiyyanti. Tathā ghammīyati, ghammīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2734: 450. Pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṃ antaṃ, ssuvho, e āmase.
anya-e0805n0:2737: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe anuttakāle pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2738_1: ca pañcamī. Āṇāpanamāṇatti, āsīsanamāsiṭṭho, so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa atthassa
anya-e0805n0:2738_2: patthanaṃ, tasmiṃ āṇatyāsiṭṭhe. Anu samīpe uttakālo anuttakālo, paccuppannakāloti
anya-e0805n0:2738_3: attho, na uttakāloti vā anuttakālo, tasmiṃ anuttakāle, kālamanāmasitvā hotīti attho.
anya-e0805n0:2739: Tattha āsīsanatthe bhūdhātuto pañcamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ tu, appaccayavuddhiavādesā. So sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0805n0:2742: Akārato paro hivibhatti lopamāpajjate vā. Tvaṃ sukhī bhava, bhavāhi vā, himhi dīgho. Tumhe sukhitā bhavatha. Ahaṃ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṃ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0805n0:2743: Attanopade so sukhī bhavataṃ, te sukhitā bhavantaṃ. Tvaṃ sukhī bhavassu, tumhe sukhitā bhavavho. Ahaṃ sukhī bhave, mayaṃ sukhitā bhavāmase.
anya-e0805n0:2744_0: Kammani anubhūyataṃ tayā, anubhūyantaṃ. Anubhūyassu, anubhūyavho. Anubhūye, anubhūyāmase.
anya-e0805n0:2744_1: Parassapadatte anubhūyyatu, anubhūyyantu. Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu vā, anubhūyyāhi
anya-e0805n0:2745: Āṇattiyaṃ kattari devadatto dāni odanaṃ pacatu, pacantu. Paca, pacāhi, pacatha. Pacāmi, pacāma. Pacataṃ, pacantaṃ. Pacassu, pacavho. Pace, pacāmase.
anya-e0805n0:2746_0: Kammani yappaccayacavaggādi, paccataṃ odano devadattena, paccantaṃ. Paccassu, paccavho.
anya-e0805n0:2746_1: Pacce, paccāmase. Parassapadatte paccatu, paccantu. Pacca, paccāhi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n0:2747_0: Tathā so gāmaṃ gacchatu, gacchantu. Gaccha, gacchāhi, gacchatha. Gacchāmi, gacchāma.
anya-e0805n0:2747_1: Gametu, gamentu. Gama, gamāhi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema. Gacchataṃ, gacchantaṃ. Gacchassu,
anya-e0805n0:2747_2: gacchavho. Gacche, gacchāmase. Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2748: Kammani gacchīyataṃ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṃ, gamīyatu, gammataṃ, gammatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2749: Vidhimhi idha pabbato hotu, ayaṃ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
anya-e0805n0:2750: Nimantane adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṃ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2752: Anumatiyaṃ pucchatu bhavaṃ pañhaṃ, pavisatu bhavaṃ, ettha nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n0:2753: Patthanā yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi.
anya-e0805n0:2754: Pattakāle sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṃ karotu bhavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2756: 453. Sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃeyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2760: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2761_0: Atthaggahaṇena vidhinimantanādīsu ca sattamī. Kattumicchato parassa anujānanaṃ anumati,
anya-e0805n0:2761_1: parikappanaṃ parikappo, “yadi nāma bhaveyyā”ti sallakkhaṇaṃ nirūpanaṃ, hetukriyāya
anya-e0805n0:2762_1: purimasamaṃ, “kvaci dhātu vibhattī”tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṃiccetesaṃ vikappena
anya-e0805n0:2762_2: ekārādeso. So dāni kiṃ nu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya,
anya-e0805n0:2762_3: sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṃ, na nirujjheyyuṃ. Yadi tvaṃ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha.
anya-e0805n0:2762_4: Kathamahaṃ devo bhaveyyāmi, kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ bhaveyyāma. Tathā bhavetha, bhaveraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2763: Patthane tu ahaṃ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṃ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2764_0: Kammani sukhaṃ tayā anubhūyetha, anubhūyeraṃ. Anubhūyetho, anubhūyeyyāvho. Anubhūye,
anya-e0805n0:2764_1: anubhūyeyyaṃ, anubhūyeyyāmhe. Parassapadatte anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṃ. Anubhūyeyyāsi
anya-e0805n0:2765_0: Vidhimhi so odanaṃ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṃ. Tvaṃ pace, paceyyāsi, tumhe paceyyātha.
anya-e0805n0:2765_1: Ahaṃ pace, paceyyāmi, mayaṃ paceyyāma. Pacetha, paceraṃ. Pacetho, paceyyāvho. Pace,
anya-e0805n0:2766: Kammani paccetha, pacceraṃ. Paccetho, pacceyyāvho. Pacce, pacceyyaṃ, pacceyyāmhe. Parassapadatte pacce, pacceyya, pacceyyuṃ. Pacceyyāsi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2767_0: Anumatiyaṃ so gāmaṃ gacche, gaccheyya, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā eyyussa uṃ vā, gacchuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2767_1: gaccheyyuṃ. Tvaṃ gacche, gaccheyyāsi, gaccheyyātha. Gacche, gaccheyyāmi, gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0805n0:2767_2: Game, gameyya, gamuṃ, gameyyuṃ. Game, gameyyāsi, gameyyātha. Game, gameyyāmi, gameyyāma.
anya-e0805n0:2767_3: Gacchetha, gaccheraṃ. Gacchetho, gaccheyyāvho. Gacche, gaccheyyaṃ, gaccheyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2768: Kammani gacchīyetha, gamīyetha, gacchīyeraṃ, gamīyeraṃ iccādi. Parassapadatte gacchīyeyya, gamīyeyya, gammeyya, gammeyyuṃ iccādi. Tathā ghamme, ghammeyya, ghammeyyuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2771: 455. Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, sevhaṃ, iṃmhase.
anya-e0805n0:2775: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā hiyyattanīvibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ā.
anya-e0805n0:2778: Kvaci dhātūnamādimhi akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu. Kathamayamakārāgamo dhātvādimhīti ce?
anya-e0805n0:2782: Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā okārassa aādeso vā, abhava, abhavattha. Abhavaṃ, abhavamhā. Abhavattha, abhavatthuṃ. Abhavase, abhavavhaṃ. Abhaviṃ, abhavamhase.
anya-e0805n0:2783_0: Kammani yappaccayo, tayā sukhamanvabhūyattha, akārāgamābhāve anubhūyattha, “kvaci
anya-e0805n0:2783_1: dhātū”tiādinā tthassa thādeso, anvabhūyatha, anubhūyatha, anvabhūyatthuṃ, anubhūyatthuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2783_2: Anvabhūyase, anubhūyase, anvabhūyavhaṃ, anubhūyavhaṃ. Anvabhūyiṃ, anubhūyiṃ, anvabhūyamhase,
anya-e0805n0:2783_3: anubhūyamhase. Parassapadatte anvabhūyā, anubhūyā iccādi. Bhāve anvabhūyattha.
anya-e0805n0:2784_0: Tathā so odanaṃ apacā, pacā, apacū, pacū. Apaco, paco, apacattha, pacattha. Apacaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2784_1: pacaṃ, apacamhā, pacamhā. Apacattha, pacattha, apacatthu, pacatthuṃ. Apacase, pacase,
anya-e0805n0:2784_2: apacavhaṃ, pacavhaṃ. Apaciṃ, paciṃ, apacamhase, pacamhase.
anya-e0805n0:2785: Kammani apaccatha, apaccattha, apaccatthuṃ. Apaccase, apaccavhaṃ. Apacciṃ, apaccamhase. Apaccā, apaccū iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2786_0: Tathā agacchā, agacchū. Agaccho, agaccha, agacchattha. Agacchaṃ, agacchamhā. Agacchattha,
anya-e0805n0:2786_1: agacchatthuṃ. Agacchase, agacchavhaṃ. Agacchiṃ, agacchamhase. Agamā, agamū. Agamo,
anya-e0805n0:2786_2: agama, agamattha. Agamaṃ, agamamhā. Agamattha, agamatthuṃ. Agamase, agamavhaṃ. Agamiṃ, agamamhase.
anya-e0805n0:2787: Kammani agacchīyattha, gacchīyattha, agamīyattha, gamīyattha, agacchīyatthuṃ, gacchīyatthuṃ, agamīyatthuṃ, gamīyatthuṃ iccādi. Tathā aghammā, aghammū iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2790: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātukasaññā hontīti hiyyattanādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññattā “ikārāgamo asabbadhātukamhī”ti vutto ikārāgamo na bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:2792: 459. Parokkhā a u, e ttha, aṃ mha, ttha re, tho vho, iṃmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2793: Aādayo dvādasa parokkhāsaññā honti. Akkhānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhā, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti parokkhāti vuccati.
anya-e0805n0:2795: Apaccakkhe vattuno indriyāvisayabhūte atīte kāle parokkhāvibhatti hoti. Atikkamma itoti atīto, hutvā atikkantoti attho.
anya-e0805n0:2799: Dhātūnamādibhūtānaṃ vaṇṇānamekassarānaṃ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ kvacisaddo, tena –
anya-e0805n0:2800: Kha cha sesu parokkhāyaṃ, dvebhāvo sabbadhātunaṃ;
anya-e0805n0:2804: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo avayavo, so abbhāsasañño hotīti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:2807: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti vā, akāro ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n0:2814: Abbhāsagatānaṃ dutiyacatutthānaṃ vaggabyañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ paṭhamatatiyā hontīti bhakārassa bakāro.
anya-e0805n0:2816_0: Brūbhūiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti parokkhāvibhattiyanti bhūsaddassa
anya-e0805n0:2816_1: bhūvaādeso, “saralopo mādesappaccayādimhī”tiādinā saralopādi, so kira rājā babhūva,
anya-e0805n0:2816_2: te kira babhūvu. Tvaṃ kira babhūve.
anya-e0805n0:2819: Sabbasmiṃ asabbadhātukamhi pare kvaci dhātūhi paro ikārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:2822_0: Ettha ca “na sabbadhātukaṃ asabbadhātuka”miti katvā “hiyyattanī sattamī pañcamī vattamānā
anya-e0805n0:2822_1: sabbadhātuka”nti hiyyattanīādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññāya vuttattā tadaññā catasso vibhattiyo
anya-e0805n0:2823: Tumhe kira babhūvittha. Ahaṃ kira babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ kira babhūvimha. Attanopade so babhūvittha, babhūvire. Babhūvittho, babhūvivho. Babhūviṃ, babhūvimhe.
anya-e0805n0:2824_0: Kammani attanopade īkārāgamayappaccayikārāgamā, anubabhūvīyittha, yappaccayassa asabbadhātukamhi
anya-e0805n0:2824_1: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā lope kate ivaṇṇāgamo na bhavati, tayā kira anubabhūvittha, anubabhūvire
anya-e0805n0:2825: Tathā papaca, papacū. Papace, papacittha. Papacaṃ, papacimha. Papacittha, papacire. Papacittho, papacivho. Papaciṃ, papacimhe.
anya-e0805n0:2826: Kammani papaccittha, papaccire iccādi. Tathā apacca, apaccū iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2830_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa cavaggo hotīti vakārassa jakāro, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:2830_1: anabbhāsassa paṭhamapurisekavacanamhi dīgho. So gāmaṃ jagāma kira, jagama vā, jagamu.
anya-e0805n0:2830_2: Jagame, jagamittha. Jagamaṃ, jagamimha. Jagamittha, jagamire. Jagamittho, jagamivho. Jagamiṃ, jagamimhe.
anya-e0805n0:2833: 468. Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, amhe.
anya-e0805n0:2834: Īādayo dvādasa ajjatanīsaññā honti. Ajja bhavo ajjatano, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ajjatanīti vuccati.
anya-e0805n0:2837: Samīpe samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanīvibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ī.
anya-e0805n0:2838_0: Pure viya akārāgamo, vuddhādi ca, “kvaci dhātuvibhattī”tiādinā īmhādivibhattīnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2838_1: kvaci rassattaṃ, oāavacanānaṃ itthaamādesā ca, saralopādi, so abhavi, abhavī vā,
anya-e0805n0:2841: Sabbehi dhātūhi uṃvibhattissa iṃsvādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:2842_0: Te abhaviṃsu, bhaviṃsu vā, abhavuṃ, bhavuṃ vā. Tvaṃ abhavi, bhavi vā, abhavo, bhavo
anya-e0805n0:2842_1: vā, tumhe abhavittha, bhavittha vā, ikārāgamo. Ahaṃ abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ vā, mayaṃ abhavimha,
anya-e0805n0:2842_2: bhavimha vā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā. So abhavittha, bhavittha vā, abhavā, bhavā vā,
anya-e0805n0:2842_3: abhavū, bhavū vā. Abhavise, bhavise vā, abhavivhaṃ, bhavivhaṃ vā. Abhavaṃ, bhavaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2842_4: vā, abhava, bhava vā, abhavimhe, bhavimhe vā.
anya-e0805n0:2843_0: Kammani yappaccayalope vuddhiavādesādi, sukhaṃ tayā anubhavittha, anvabhūyittha,
anya-e0805n0:2843_1: anubhūyittha vā iccādi. Parassapadatte tayā anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, anvabhūyī, anubhūyī
anya-e0805n0:2843_2: vā, anvabhūyiṃsu, anubhūyiṃsu, anvabhūyuṃ, anubhūyuṃ. Tvaṃ anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, tumhe
anya-e0805n0:2843_3: anvabhūyittha, anubhūyittha. Ahaṃ anvabhūyiṃ, anubhūyiṃ, mayaṃ anvabhūyimha, anubhūyimha,
anya-e0805n0:2843_4: anvabhūyimhā, anubhūyimhā vā. Bhāve abhavittha, abhūyittha tayā.
anya-e0805n0:2844_0: So apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā, te apaciṃsu, paciṃsu, apacuṃ, pacuṃ. Tvaṃ apaci,
anya-e0805n0:2844_1: paci, apaco, paco vā, tumhe apacittha, pacittha. Ahaṃ apaciṃ, paciṃ, mayaṃ apacimha,
anya-e0805n0:2844_2: pacimha, apacimhā, pacimhā vā. So apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū.
anya-e0805n0:2844_3: Apacise, apacivhaṃ. Apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.
anya-e0805n0:2845_0: Kammani apaccittha, paccittha iccādi. Parassapadatte apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī
anya-e0805n0:2845_1: vā, apacciṃsu, pacciṃsu, apaccuṃ, paccuṃ. Apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā, apaccittha,
anya-e0805n0:2845_2: paccittha. Apacciṃ, pacciṃ, apaccimha, paccimha, apaccimhā, paccimhā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2846_0: So gāmaṃ agacchī, gacchī, agacchi, gacchi vā, te agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu, agacchuṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2846_1: gacchuṃ. Tvaṃ agacchi, gacchi, agaccho, gaccho vā, tumhe agacchittha, gacchittha.
anya-e0805n0:2846_2: Ahaṃ agacchiṃ, gacchiṃ, mayaṃ agacchimha, gacchimha, agacchimhā, gacchimhā vā.
anya-e0805n0:2847_0: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ajjatanimhi gamissa cchassa kvaci ñchādeso, agañchi, gañchi,
anya-e0805n0:2847_1: agañchī, gañchī vā, te agañchiṃsu, gañchiṃsu, agañchuṃ, gañchuṃ. Tvaṃ agañchi, gañchi,
anya-e0805n0:2847_2: agañcho, gañcho vā, tumhe agañchittha, gañchittha. Ahaṃ agañchiṃ, gañchiṃ, mayaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2848_0: Cchādesābhāve so agami, gami, agamī, gamī vā, “karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī”ti ettha
anya-e0805n0:2848_2: byañjanato ākārāgamo, agamāsi, uṃvacanassa kvaci aṃsvādeso, ucāgamo tthamhesu kvaci,
anya-e0805n0:2848_3: agamiṃsu, gamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, gamaṃsu, agamuṃ, gamuṃ, tvaṃ agami, gami, agamo, gamo
anya-e0805n0:2848_4: vā, agamittha, gamittha, agamuttha, gamuttha. Ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, agamimha, gamimha,
anya-e0805n0:2849: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā gamissa ajjatanimhi gādeso ca, so ajjhagā, paralopo, te ajjhaguṃ. Tvaṃ ajjhago, tumhe ajjhaguttha. Ahaṃ ajjhagiṃ, mayaṃ ajjhagumha.
anya-e0805n0:2850_0: Attanopade so agacchittha, gacchittha, agañchittha, gañchittha iccādi. Cchādesābhāve
anya-e0805n0:2850_1: so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, ajjhagū, agū. Tvaṃ agamise,
anya-e0805n0:2850_2: gamise, agamivhaṃ, gamivhaṃ. Ahaṃ agamaṃ, gamaṃ, agama, gama, ajjhagaṃ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.
anya-e0805n0:2851_0: Kamme gāmo agacchīyittha tena, gacchīyittha, agañchiyittha, gañchiyittha, agamīyittha,
anya-e0805n0:2851_1: gamīyittha, agamittha, gamittha iccādi. Parassapadatte agacchīyi, gacchīyi vā, agamīyi,
anya-e0805n0:2851_2: gamīyi vā, agacchīyuṃ, agamīyuṃ vā. Tathā aghammīyi, aghammīyiṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2854_0: Yadāmāyogo, tadā hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo sabbakālepi honti, casaddena pañcamī
anya-e0805n0:2854_1: ca. Mā bhavati, mā bhavā, mā bhavissatīti vā atthe hiyyattanajjatanīpañcamī vibhattiyo,
anya-e0805n0:2854_2: sesaṃ neyyaṃ, so mā bhavā, mā bhavī, mā te bhavantvantarāyā. Mā pacā, mā pacī, mā
anya-e0805n0:2854_3: pacatu. Mā gacchā, mā gacchī, mā gacchatu. Mā kañci pāpamāgamā, mā agami, mā gamā,
anya-e0805n0:2854_4: mā gamī, mā gametu. Tvaṃ mā gaccho, mā gacchi, mā gacchāhi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2856: 472. Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃssāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2857: Ssatyādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ vacanānaṃ bhavissantīsaññā hoti. Bhavissatīti bhavissanto, taṃkāladīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti bhavissantīti vuccati.
anya-e0805n0:2862: Na āgato anāgato, paccayasāmaggiyaṃ sati āyatiṃ uppajjanārahoti attho, ikārāgamo, vuddhiavādesā, saralopādi ca.
anya-e0805n0:2863: Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2864_0: Kamme yappaccayalopo, sukhaṃ tayā anubhavissate, anubhavissante. Anubhavissase, anubhavissavhe.
anya-e0805n0:2864_1: Anubhavissaṃ, anubhavissāmhe. Parassapadatte anubhavissati devadattena, anubhavissanti
anya-e0805n0:2864_2: iccādi. Bhāve bhavissate tena, yappaccayalopābhāve anubhūyissate, anubhūyissante
anya-e0805n0:2865: Tathā pacissati, pacissanti. Pacissasi, pacissatha. Pacissāmi, pacissāma. Pacissate, pacissante. Pacissase, pacissavhe. Pacissaṃ, pacissāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2866: Kamme paccissate odano devadattena, paccissante iccādi. Parassapadatte paccissati, paccissanti. Paccissasi, paccissatha. Paccissāmi, paccissāma.
anya-e0805n0:2867_0: Gacchissati, gacchissanti. Gacchissasi, gacchissatha. Gacchissāmi, gacchissāma. Gacchissate,
anya-e0805n0:2867_1: gacchissante. Gacchissase, gacchissavhe. Gacchissaṃ, gacchissāmhe. So saggaṃ gamissati,
anya-e0805n0:2867_2: gamissanti. Gamissasi, gamissatha. Gamissāmi, gamissāma iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2868_0: Kamme gacchīyissate, gacchīyissante. Gacchīyissati, gacchīyissanti vā, gamīyissate,
anya-e0805n0:2868_1: gamīyissante. Gamīyissati, gamīyissanti vā iccādi. Yappaccayalope gamissate, gamissante.
anya-e0805n0:2868_2: Gamissati, gamissanti vā. Tathā ghammissati, ghammissanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2870: 484. Kālātipatti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃssāmhase.
anya-e0805n0:2871_0: Ssādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ kālātipattisaññā hoti. Kālassa atipatanaṃ kālātipatti, sā pana
anya-e0805n0:2871_1: viruddhapaccayūpanipātato, kāraṇavekallato vā kriyāya anabhinibbatti, taddīpakattā
anya-e0805n0:2873_0: Kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle kālātipattivibhatti hoti. Kriyāya atipatanaṃ kriyātipannaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2873_1: taṃ pana sādhakasattivirahena kriyāya accantānuppatti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi na kriyā
anya-e0805n0:2874: Kālātipattiparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ssā, akārikārāgamā, vuddhiavādesā ca, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ssā ssāmhāvibhattīnaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ, ssevacanassa ca attaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2875_0: So ce paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa, bhavissa, abhavissā, bhavissāvā,
anya-e0805n0:2875_1: te ce taṃ alabhissaṃsu, arahanto abhavissaṃsu, bhavissaṃsu. Evaṃ tvaṃ abhavissa,
anya-e0805n0:2875_2: bhavissa, abhavisse vā, tumhe abhavissatha, bhavissatha. Ahaṃ abhavissaṃ, bhavissaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2875_3: mayaṃ abhavissamha, bhavissamha, abhavissāmhā, bhavissāmhā vā. So abhavissatha, abhavissisu.
anya-e0805n0:2876_0: Kamme anvabhavissatha, anvabhavissisu. Anvabhūyissatha vā iccādi. Parassapadatte
anya-e0805n0:2876_1: anvabhavissa, anvabhavissaṃsu. Anvabhūyissa vā iccādi. Bhāve abhavissatha devadattena, abhūyissatha.
anya-e0805n0:2877_0: Tathā so ce taṃ dhanaṃ alabhissa, odanaṃ apacissa, pacissa, apacissā, pacissā vā,
anya-e0805n0:2877_1: apacissaṃsu, pacissaṃsu. Apacissa, pacissa, apacisse, pacisse vā, apacissatha, pacissatha.
anya-e0805n0:2877_2: Apacissaṃ, pacissaṃ, apacissamha, pacissamha, apacissāmhā, pacissāmhā vā. Apacissatha,
anya-e0805n0:2877_3: pacissatha, apacissisu, pacissisu. Apacissase, pacissase, apacissavhe, pacissavhe.
anya-e0805n0:2878_0: Kamme apacissatha odano devadattena, apacissisu. Yappaccayalopābhāve apacīyissatha
anya-e0805n0:2878_1: iccādi. Parassapadatte apaccissa tena, paccissa, apaccissā, paccissā vā, apaccissaṃsu, paccissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2879_0: So agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchissā, gacchissāvā, agacchissaṃsu, gacchissaṃsu. Tvaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2879_1: agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchisse, gacchisse vā, agacchissatha, gacchissatha. Agacchissaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2879_2: gacchissaṃ, agacchissamha, gacchissamha, agacchissāmhā, gacchissāmhā vā. Agamissa,
anya-e0805n0:2879_3: gamissa, agamissā, gamissā vā, agamissaṃsu, gamissaṃsu. Agamissa, gamissa, agamisse
anya-e0805n0:2879_4: vā, agamissatha, gamissatha. Agamissaṃ, gamissaṃ, agamissamha, gamissamha, agamissāmhā,
anya-e0805n0:2879_5: gamissāmhā vā. Agacchissatha, gacchissatha vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2880: Kamme agacchīyissatha, agamīyissatha, agacchīyissa, agamīyissaiccādi. Tathā aghammissā, aghammissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2886: Isu icchākantīsu, pure viya dhātvantalopo, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n0:2889_0: Isuyamuiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ccho hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, “anto
anya-e0805n0:2889_1: ccho vā”ti yogavibhāgena āsassapi. So saggaṃ icchati, icchanti. Icchasi, icchatha.
anya-e0805n0:2889_2: Icchāmi, icchāma. Cchādesābhāve asaṃyogantattā “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi, esati, esanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2890_0: Kamme attanopadassa yebhuyyena parassapadattameva payojīyati, tena cettha attanopade
anya-e0805n0:2890_1: rūpāni saṅkhipissāma. So icchīyati, esīyati, issate, issati, yakārassa pubbarūpattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2890_2: Tathā icchatu, esatu. Iccheyya, eseyya. Parokkhāhiyyattanīsu pana rūpāni sabbattha
anya-e0805n0:2890_3: payogamanugamma payojetabbāni, icchi, esi. Icchissati, esissati. Icchissā, esissā icchādi.
anya-e0805n0:2891: Yamu uparame, nipubbo, cchādeso ca. Niyacchati, niyacchanti. Niyamati, niyamanti. Saṃpubbo “saye cā”ti ñattaṃ, dvittañca. Saññamati, saññamanti.
anya-e0805n0:2892_0: Kamme niyacchīyati, niyamīyati, niyammati, saññamīyati vā. Tathā niyacchatu, saññamatu.
anya-e0805n0:2892_1: Niyaccheyya, saññameyya. Niyacchī, saññamī. Niyacchissati, saññamissati. Niyacchissa, saññamissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2893_0: Āsa upavesane, yogavibhāgena cchādeso, rassattaṃ. Acchati, acchanti. Acchasi, acchatha.
anya-e0805n0:2893_1: Acchāmi, acchāma. Aññatra upapubbo upāsati, upāsanti. Acchīyati, upāsīyati. Acchatu,
anya-e0805n0:2893_2: upāsatu. Accheyya, upāseyya. Acchī, upāsī. Acchissati, upāsissati. Acchissa, upāsissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2894: Labha lābhe, labhati, labhanti. Labhasi, labhatha. Labhāmi, labhāma. Labhate, labhante. Labhase, labhavhe. Labhe, labhāmhe.
anya-e0805n0:2895: Kamme yakārassa pubbarūpatte kate “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā purimabhakārassa bakāro, labbhate, labbhante. Labbhati, labbhanti. Labbhataṃ, labbhatu. Labbhe, labbheyya.
anya-e0805n0:2898_0: Labhaiccetasmā dhātuto paresaṃ īiṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ttha tthaṃiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n0:2898_1: dhātvantassa lopo ca. Alattha, alabhi, labhi, alabhiṃsu, labhiṃsu. Alabho, labho,
anya-e0805n0:2898_2: alabhi, labhi, alabhittha, labhittha. Alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ, labhiṃ, alabhimha, labhimha iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2899_0: Bhavissantimhi “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti ettha sappaccayaggahaṇena vaca muca
anya-e0805n0:2899_1: bhujādito ssassakhādeso, vasa chida labhādito chādeso ca vā hotīti ssassa chādeso,
anya-e0805n0:2899_2: “byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā”ti dhātvantassa cakāro, lacchati, lacchanti.
anya-e0805n0:2899_3: Lacchasi, lacchatha. Lacchāmi, lacchāma. Chādesābhāve labhissati, labhissanti. Labhissasi,
anya-e0805n0:2899_4: labhissatha. Labhissāmi, labhissāma iccādi. Alabhissa, alabhissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2900: Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi, vacatha. Vacāmi, vacāma.
anya-e0805n0:2903_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakārassa ukāro hoti yappaccaye pare, ādisaddena
anya-e0805n0:2903_1: vaḍḍhassa ca. “Vassa a va”iti samāsena dutiyañcettha vaggahaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tena
anya-e0805n0:2903_2: akārassapi ukāro hoti, purimapakkhe paralopo. “Tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadhātvantassa
anya-e0805n0:2903_3: yakārassa cakāro, dvittaṃ. Uccate, uccante. Vuccate, vuccante. Vuccati, vuccanti
anya-e0805n0:2903_4: vā iccādi. Tathā vacatu, vuccatu. Vaceyya, vucceyya. Avacā, avaccā, avacū, avaccū.
anya-e0805n0:2903_5: Avaca, avaco, avacuttha. Avaca, avacaṃ, avacamhā. Avacuttha iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2905: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi. Avoci, avocuṃ. Avoco, avocuttha. Avociṃ, avocumha, ukārāgamo. Avoca, rassattaṃ, avocu iccādi. Avuccittha.
anya-e0805n0:2906_1: khe cā”ti dhātvantassa kādeso, vakkhati, vakkhanti. Vakkhasi, vakkhatha. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2908: Kamme uttaṃ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. Vasatu. Vaseyya. Avasi, vasi.
anya-e0805n0:2909: Bhavissantiyaṃ ssassa chādeso, dhātvantassa cakāro ca, vacchati, vacchanti. Vacchasi, vacchatha. Vacchāmi, vacchāma. Vasissati, vasissanti. Avasissa, avasissaṃsu.
anya-e0805n0:2910: Tathā ruda assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. Rodissati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2911: Kusa akkose, āpubbo dvittarassattāni, appaccayavuddhiyo ca. Akkosati. Akkosatu. Akkoseyya.
anya-e0805n0:2914: Kusa iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa cchiādeso hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Akkocchi maṃ, akkosi vā. Akkosissati. Akkosissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2919_0: Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yappaccaye pare, yappaccayassa ca lakāro hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:2919_1: vāsaddo, tena “gayhatī”tiādīsu lattaṃ na hoti, nimittabhūtassa yakārassevetaṃ lattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2919_2: “vacavasa”iccādinā uttaṃ. Vuyhati, vulhati, vuyhanti. Vahatu, vuyhatu. Vaheyya, vuyheyya.
anya-e0805n0:2919_3: Avahī, avuyhittha, avahittha. Avahissati, vuyhissati. Avahissa, avuyhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2922: Jaramara iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ jīrajīyyamīyyādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Jīrati, jīranti. Jīyyati, jīyyanti. “Kvacā”disuttena ekayakārassa kvaci lopo hoti. Jīyati, jīyanti.
anya-e0805n0:2923: Kamme jīrīyati, jīrīyanti. Jīyiyyati, jīyiyyanti. Jīratu, jīyyatu. Jīreyya, jīyyeyya. Ajīrī, jīrī, jīyyī. Jīrissati, jīyyissati. Ajīrissa, ajīyyissa.
anya-e0805n0:2924: Mara pāṇacāge, mīyyādeso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. Mīyati, mīyanti vā. Marati, maranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2927: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, tena dissādeso kammani sabbadhātuke eva. Passati, passanti. Dakkhati, dakkhanti.
anya-e0805n0:2928: Kammani yakāralopo, dissate, dissante. Dissati, dissanti. Vipassīyati, dakkhīyati. Passatu, dakkhatu, dissatu. Passeyya, dakkheyya, disseyya.
anya-e0805n0:2929: Hiyyattaniyaṃ “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhātuikārassa attaṃ, addasā, addasa. Kammani adissa.
anya-e0805n0:2930_0: Tathā apassi, passi, apassiṃsu, passiṃsu. Apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha. Apassiṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2930_1: passiṃ, apassimha, passimha. Addasi, dasi, addasaṃsu, dasaṃsu. Kammani adissaṃsu.
anya-e0805n0:2931_0: Passissati, passissanti. “Bhavissantimhi ssassa cā”ti yogavibhāgena ssassa lopo,
anya-e0805n0:2931_1: ikārāgamo ca, dakkhiti, dakkhinti. Lopābhāve dakkhissati, dakkhissanti. Apassissa, adakkhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2935_0: Sadaiccetassa dhātussa sīdādeso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2935_1: Nisīdati, nisīdanti. Bhāve nisajjate, idha kvacādhikārena sīdā-deso na bhavati. Nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n0:2939_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa yakārassa ikārādeso hoti yappaccaye pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n0:2939_1: Ijjate mayā buddho. Tathā yajatu, ijjataṃ. Yaje, ijjetha. Yaji, ijjittha. Yajissati,
anya-e0805n0:2940: Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n0:2943: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu. Vibhatyādhikārattā cettha sabbāsūti atthato siddhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2946: Bhūvādito paro appaccayo ettamāpajjate, lopañca vā. Vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato cettha akāroti appaccayo gayhati.
anya-e0805n0:2949: Appaccayassa ekāro, saralopādi, vajjeti, vadeti, vadati, antimhi –
anya-e0805n0:2951_0: Idha dhātvādhikāre ākhyāte, kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:2953: Āyūnaṃ vā vibhattīnaṃ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā.
anya-e0805n0:2954: Gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā;
anya-e0805n0:2955: Ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṃ yamhi dīghatā.
anya-e0805n0:2957: Okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe.
anya-e0805n0:2958: Tathā brūtoti antīnaṃ, au vāha ca dhātuyā;
anya-e0805n0:2962_0: Ekārato parassa antiakārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti. Vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi,
anya-e0805n0:2962_1: vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha. Vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.
anya-e0805n0:2963_0: Kammani vajjīyati, vajjīyanti. Vajjati, vajjanti. Vadīyati vā. Vajjetu, vadetu, vadatu.
anya-e0805n0:2963_1: Vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya, vajjeyyuṃ, vadeyyuṃ. Vajjeyyāsi, vajjesi, vadeyyāsi.
anya-e0805n0:2963_2: Avadi, vadi, vadiṃsu. Vadissati, vadissanti. Avadissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2964: Kamu padavikkhepe, appaccaye kate “kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṃ dvebhāvo”ti dvittaṃ, kavaggassa cavaggo.
anya-e0805n0:2967: Abbhāsante niggahītañcāgamo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, tena kamādīnamevetaṃ. Caṅkamati, caṅkamanti iccādi. Kamati, kamanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2970: Jhecintāyaṃ, appaccaye “o, sare, e”ti ca adhikicca “te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ekārassa āyādeso, jhāyati, jhāyanti iccādi, visesavidhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2972: Tuda byathane, tyādyuppatti appaccayo, “aññesu cā”ti etthānuvattita vāggahaṇena tudādīnaṃ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti. Tudasi, tudatha. Tudāmi, tudāma.
anya-e0805n0:2973_0: Kamme “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadakārassa yappaccayassa jakāro dvittaṃ, tujjate,
anya-e0805n0:2973_1: tujjante. Tujjati, tujjanti, tujjare vā. Tathā tudatu, tudantu. Tude, tudeyya, tudeyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2973_2: Atudi, tudiṃsu. Atudi, atudittha. Atudiṃ, atudimha. Atujjittha, atujji. Tudissati. Atudissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2974: Visa pavesane papubbo, so gāmaṃ pavisati, pavisanti. Pavisasi, pavisatha. Pavisāmi, pavisāma.
anya-e0805n0:2975_0: Kamme pavisiyyate, pavisiyyante. Pavisiyyati, pavisiyyanti. Pavissate vā. Tathā pavisatu,
anya-e0805n0:2975_1: pavisantu. Paviseyya. Pāvisi, pavisi, pāvekkhi pathaviṃ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ajjatanimhi
anya-e0805n0:2976: Kamme pāvisīyittha, pavisīyittha, pāvisīyi, pavisīyi. Pavisissati, pavisissanti. Pavisīyissate, pavisissate. Pāvisissa. Pāvisīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2982_0: Hū, bhū sattāyaṃ, tyādyuppatti “bhūvādito a”iti appaccayo, “vā”ti adhikicca “lopañcettamakāro”ti
anya-e0805n0:2982_1: bhūvādito parassa appaccayassa lopo, “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi. So hoti, te honti, “kvaci
anya-e0805n0:2982_2: dhātū”tiādinā parasarassa lopo. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyate.
anya-e0805n0:2983: Tathā hotu, hontu. Hohi, anakāraparattā hilopo na bhavati, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:2984: Sattamiyaṃ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṃ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Heyyaṃ vā. Bhāve hūyetha.
anya-e0805n0:2985_0: Hiyyattaniyaṃ appaccayalope “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hūdhātussa ūkārassa uvādeso. Ahuvā,
anya-e0805n0:2985_1: ahuvu, ahuvū. Ahuva, ahuvo, ahuvattha. Ahuvaṃ, ahuvamha. Ahuvattha, ahuvatthuṃ. Ahuvase,
anya-e0805n0:2986_0: Ajjatanimhi “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hūto īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṃ, so ahu, lopābhāve
anya-e0805n0:2986_2: vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṃ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā okārassekāro. Ahavuṃ vā. Ahosi, ahosittha.
anya-e0805n0:2986_3: Ahosiṃ, ahuṃ, parasarassa lopo, rassattañca, ahosimha, ahumha, rassattaṃ. Bhāve ahūyittha.
anya-e0805n0:2987: “Hi lopaṃ vā”ti ito “lopo, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:2989: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro eha oha ettamāpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā. Ikārāgamo, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n0:2990_0: Hehiti, hehinti. Hehisi, hehitha. Hehāmi, hehāma. Lopābhāve – hehissati, hehissanti.
anya-e0805n0:2990_1: Hehissasi, hehissatha. Hehissāmi, hehissāma. Ohādese – hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi, hohitha.
anya-e0805n0:2990_2: Hohāmi, hohāma. Tathā hohissati, hohissanti. Hohissasi, hohissatha. Hohissāmi, hohissāma.
anya-e0805n0:2990_3: Ekārādese – heti, henti. Hesi, hetha. Hemi, hema. Hessati, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha.
anya-e0805n0:2992: Hū, bhū sattāyaṃ, bhū itīdha anupubbo, tyādyuppatti appaccayassa lopavuddhiyo, anubhoti, anubhonti. Anubhosi, anubhotha. Anubhomi, anubhoma.
anya-e0805n0:2993_0: Kamme anubhūyati, anubhūyanti. Tathā anubhotu, anubhontu. Anubhohi, anubhotha. Anubhomi,
anya-e0805n0:2993_1: anubhoma. Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu. Anubhave, anubhaveyya. Anubhūyeyya. Anubhosi,
anya-e0805n0:2993_2: anubhavi. Anubhossati, anubhossanti. Anubhossasi, anubhossatha. Anubhossāmi, anubhossāma.
anya-e0805n0:2993_3: Anubhavissati vā. Anubhossa, anubhavissa vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2994: Sī saye appaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. Sesi, setha. Semi, sema. Sete, sente iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:2998: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti, saralopādi. Sayati, sayanti. Sayasi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma.
anya-e0805n0:2999: Kamme atipubbo, “kvaci dhātvā”dinā yamhi rassasarassa dhātvantassa dīgho, atisīyate, atisīyante. Atisīyati, atisīyanti. Bhāve sīyate.
anya-e0805n0:3000_0: Tathā setu, sentu. Sehi, setha. Semi, sema. Sayatu, sayantu. Saya, sayāhi, sayatha.
anya-e0805n0:3000_1: Sayāmi, sayāma. Sayataṃ, sayantaṃ. Sayassu, sayavho. Saye, sayāmase. Atisīyataṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3001: Saye, sayeyya, sayeyyuṃ. Atisīyeyya. Bhāve sīyetha.
anya-e0805n0:3002: Asayi, sayi, asayiṃsu, sayiṃsu, asayuṃ. Sāgame atisesi, atisesuṃ. Kamme accasīyittha, accasīyi, atisīyi. Bhāve sīyittha.
anya-e0805n0:3003: Sayissati, sayissanti. Ikārāgamābhāve sessati, sessanti. Kamme atisīyissatha, atisīyissati. Bhāve sīyissate.
anya-e0805n0:3005: Nī pāpuṇane, dvikammakoyaṃ, ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, nenti. Nesi, netha. Nemi, nema. Lopābhāve nayati, nayanti iccādi. Kamme nīyate gāmaṃ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante. Nīyati, nīyanti.
anya-e0805n0:3006_0: Tathā netu, nayatu. Nīyataṃ, nīyantaṃ. Naye, nayeyya. Nīyetha, nīyeyya. Anayi, nayi,
anya-e0805n0:3006_1: anayiṃsu, nayiṃsu. Vinesi, vinesuṃ. Anīyittha, nīyittha. Nayissati, nessati. Nayissate,
anya-e0805n0:3009_0: Ṭhāiccetassa dhātussa tiṭṭhādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo, appaccayalopo.
anya-e0805n0:3009_1: Tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti. Ṭhāti, ṭhanti. Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṭhāto hakārāgamo
anya-e0805n0:3009_2: ca rassattaṃ, saṃpubbo saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti. Ette adhiṭṭheti, adhiṭṭhenti.
anya-e0805n0:3011: 493. Yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī.
anya-e0805n0:3012_0: Bhāvakammavisaye yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3012_1: anto īkāramāpajjate, niccatthoyamārambho. Upaṭṭhīyati, upaṭṭhīyanti. Hakārāgame rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3012_2: īkārāgamo ca, patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. Bhāve ṭhīyate.
anya-e0805n0:3013_0: Tathā tiṭṭhatu, tiṭṭhantu. Ṭhātu, ṭhantu. Saṇṭhahatu, saṇṭhahantu. Tiṭṭhe, tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n0:3013_1: Saṇṭhe, saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṃ. Saṇṭhahe, saṇṭhaheyyuṃ. Aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu. Saṇṭhahi,
anya-e0805n0:3013_2: saṇṭhahiṃsu. Pakiṭṭhissati, patiṭṭhissanti. Ṭhassati, ṭhassanti. Patiṭṭhahissati,
anya-e0805n0:3013_3: patiṭṭhahissanti. Patiṭṭhissa, patiṭṭhissaṃsu. Patiṭṭhahissa, patiṭṭhahissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3016: Pāiccetassa dhātussa pibādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:3017_0: Pibati. Pibatu. Pibeyya. “Kvaci dhātvā”dinā bakārassa vakāro, pivati, pivanti. Pāti,
anya-e0805n0:3017_1: pānti, panti vā. Pīyate, pīyante. Pīyati, pīyanti. Pivatu. Piveyya. Apāyi, pivi.
anya-e0805n0:3018: Asa bhuvi, vibhattuppatti, appaccayalopo, asa itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:3021: Asaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa tissa vibhattissa tthittaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthi.
anya-e0805n0:3024: Sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca asaiccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Santi.
anya-e0805n0:3027: Asadhātussa antalopo hoti simhi vibhattimhi ca. Tvaṃ asi.
anya-e0805n0:3029: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa thassa vibhattissa tthattaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Tumhe attha.
anya-e0805n0:3032: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṃ mi maiccetāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ mhimhaiccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Amhi, amha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n0:3034: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthu. Asassādilopo ca, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n0:3035: Sattamiyaṃ asassādilopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asato eyyaeyyuṃ vibhattīnaṃ iyāiyuñca honti. Siyā, siyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3036: Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātvā”dinā asato eyyādīnaṃ sadhātvantānaṃ ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṃ ssāmaādesā honti.
anya-e0805n0:3037: Evamassa vacanīyo, assu. Assa, assatha. Assaṃ, assāma.
anya-e0805n0:3038: Ajjataniyaṃ akārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṃsu, āsuṃ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṃ, āsimha.
anya-e0805n0:3041: Asasseva dhātussa bhūādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavissa, abhavissaṃsu.
anya-e0805n0:3043: Brū viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayalopo ca.
anya-e0805n0:3046_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi kvaci, vuddhiavādesā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n0:3046_1: Bravīti, brūti, “aññesu cā”ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena brūdhātussa byañjane vuddhi
anya-e0805n0:3046_2: na hoti, bahuvacane “jhalānamiyuvā sare vā”ti ūkārassa sare uvādeso, bruvanti. “Kvaci
anya-e0805n0:3046_3: dhātvā”dinā brūto tiantīnaṃ vā a u ādesā brūssa āhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n0:3047_0: Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvavhe. Bruve, brūmhe.
anya-e0805n0:3047_1: Brūtu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ. Bruve, bruveyya,
anya-e0805n0:3047_2: bruveyyuṃ. Bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. Bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. Bruvetha, bruveraṃ. Abruvā, abruvū.
anya-e0805n0:3048: Parokkhāyaṃ “brūbhūnamāhabhūvā parokkhāya”nti brūdhātussa āhaādeso, saralopādi, supine kira māha, tenāhu porāṇā, āhaṃsu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3049: Ajjataniyaṃ abravi, abruvi, abravuṃ. Bravissati. Abravissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3050: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu, timhi kvaci appaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti. Hanasi, hanatha. Hanāmi, hanāma.
anya-e0805n0:3051: Kamme “tassa cavagga”iccādinā ñattaṃ, dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare. Haññati, haññanti. Hanatu, hanantu. Haneyya.
anya-e0805n0:3054_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa vadhādeso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3054_1: vāsaddo. Vadheti. Vadhīyati. Vadhetu. Vadhīyatu. Vadheyya. Avadhi, avadhiṃsu. Ahani,
anya-e0805n0:3054_2: ahaniṃsu. Vadhissati, hanissati. Khādese paṭihaṅkhāmi, paṭihanissāmi. Avadhissa, ahanissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3056: Hu dānādanahabyappadānesu, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca, “kvacādivaṇṇānamekassarānaṃ dvebhāvo”ti dvittaṃ, “pubbobbhāso”ti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:3059: Hakārassa abbhāse vattamānassa jo hoti. “Lopañcetta makāro”ti appaccayalopo, vuddhi. Juhoti.
anya-e0805n0:3062: Jhalasaññānaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārādesā honti sare pareti apadantassa ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n0:3063: Juhvati, juhoti, juhvanti, juhonti. Juhvasi, juhosi, juhvatha, juhotha. Juhvāmi, juhomi, juhvāma, juhoma.
anya-e0805n0:3064: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. Hūyati, hūyanti.
anya-e0805n0:3065_0: Tathā juhotu, juhontu, juhvantu vā. Juhe, juheyya, juheyyuṃ. Ajuhavi, ajuhavuṃ. Ajuhosi,
anya-e0805n0:3065_1: ajuhosuṃ. Ahūyittha aggi. Juhissati, juhissanti. Juhossati, juhossanti vā. Ajuhissa, ajuhissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3066: Hā cāge, pure viya dvebhāvajādesa appaccayalopā.
anya-e0805n0:3070: Jahāti, jahanti. Jahāsi, jahātha. Jahāmi, jahāma.
anya-e0805n0:3071: Kamme “yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpāmahamathādīnamī”ti dhātvantassa īkāro. Hīyate, hīyante, hīyare. Hīyati, hīyanti.
anya-e0805n0:3072_0: Tathā jahātu, jahantu. Jahe, jaheyya, jaheyyuṃ. Hīyetha, hīyeyya. Ajahāsi, ajahiṃsu,
anya-e0805n0:3072_1: ajahāsuṃ. Pajahi, pajahiṃsu, pajahaṃsu, pajahuṃ. Kamme pajahīyittha, pajahīyi. Pajahissati,
anya-e0805n0:3072_2: pajahissanti. Hīyissati, hīyissanti. Pajahissa, pajahissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3073: Dā dāne, tyādyuppatti, dvebhāvarassattāni, appaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0805n0:3076_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo,
anya-e0805n0:3076_1: appaccayalopo. Dajjati, dajjanti. Dajjasi, dajjatha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma. Dajjādesābhāve
anya-e0805n0:3076_2: “lopañcettamakāro”ti appaccayassa ekāro, dānaṃ deti, denti. Desi, detha.
anya-e0805n0:3079: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṃ hoti vā mimaiccetesu paresu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ. Dammi, damma. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n0:3080: Kamme “yamhi dādhā”iccādinā īkāro, dīyate, dīyante. Dīyati, dīyanti. Dīyyate, dīyyante. Dīyyati, dīyyanti vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3081_0: Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadataṃ, dadantaṃ. Dadassu, dadavho.
anya-e0805n0:3081_1: Dade, dadāmase. Dajjatu, dajjantu iccādi. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dema. Kamme
anya-e0805n0:3082: Sattamiyaṃ dade, dadeyya, dadeyyuṃ. Dadeyyāsi, dadeyyātha. Dadeyyāmi, dadeyyāma. Dadetha, daderaṃ. Dadetho, dadeyyāvho. Dadeyyaṃ, dadeyyāmhe. Dajje, dajjeyya.
anya-e0805n0:3083_0: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā eyyassāttañca, dajjā, dajjuṃ, dajjeyyuṃ. Dajjeyyāsi, dajjeyyātha.
anya-e0805n0:3083_1: Dajjaṃ, eyyāmissa amādeso ca, dajjeyyāmi, dajjeyyāma. Dvittābhāve deyya, deyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3084: Hiyyattaniyaṃ adadā, adadū. Adado, adadattha. Adadaṃ, adadamha. Adadattha, adadamhase. Kamme adīyittha.
anya-e0805n0:3085: Ajjatanimhi adadi, adadiṃsu, adaduṃ. Adajji, adajjiṃsu. Adāsi, adaṃsu. Adāsi, ado, adittha. Adāsiṃ, adāsimha, adamha. Adādānaṃ purindado. Kamme adīyittha, adīyyi.
anya-e0805n0:3086_0: Bhavissantiyaṃ ikārāgamo, saralopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. Dajjissati, dajjissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3086_1: Rassattaṃ, dassati, dassanti. Dassasi, dassatha. Dassāmi, dassāma. Dassate. Dīyissate, dīyissati.
anya-e0805n0:3087: Kālātipattiyaṃ adadissa, adajjissa, adajjissā, adassa, adassā, adassaṃsu. Adīyissatha, adīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3088_0: Dhā dhāraṇe, pure viya vibhattuppatti, dvittarassattāni, appaccayalopo ca, “dutiyacatutthānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3088_1: paṭhamatatiyā”ti dhakārassa dakāro, dadhāti, dadhanti. Apipubbo tassa “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:3088_2: akāralopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhakārassa hakāro, rassattañca, dvāraṃ pidahati,
anya-e0805n0:3090: Tathā dadhātu, pidahatu, nidhetu, nidhentu. Dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe, pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya. Dadhāsi, pidahi. Dhassati, pidahissati, paridahessati. Adhassa, pidahissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3092: Avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo;
anya-e0805n0:3096: Rudha āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n0:3099_0: Catuppadamidaṃ. Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato appaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n0:3099_1: niggahītañca tato pubbaṃ hutvā āgamo hoti, tañca niggahītaṃ pakatiyā sarānugatattā
anya-e0805n0:3099_2: dhātussarato paraṃ hoti. Casaddena iīeopaccayā ca, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ. Idha
anya-e0805n0:3099_3: saṃyogantattā na vuddhi hoti, tadāgamassa taggahaṇena gahaṇato.
anya-e0805n0:3100: So maggaṃ rundhati, rundhanti. Rundhasi, rundhatha. Rundhāmi, rundhāma. Rundhate, rundhante iccādi, ikārādippaccayesu pana rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhotītipi hoti.
anya-e0805n0:3101_0: Kamme nipubbo yappaccayassa “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate “vagge
anya-e0805n0:3101_1: ghosā”tiādinā dvittaṃ, maggo nirujjhate tena, nirujjhante. Parassapadatte nirujjhati,
anya-e0805n0:3102_0: Rundhatu, rundhantu. Rundhāhi, rundhatha. Rundhāmi, rundhāma. Rundhataṃ, rundhantaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3102_1: Rundhassu, rundhavho. Rundhe, rundhāmase. Nirujjhataṃ, nirujjhantaṃ. Nirujjhatu,
anya-e0805n0:3102_2: nirujjhantu. Rundhe, rundheyya, rundheyyuṃ. Rundhetha, rundheraṃ. Nirujjhetha, nirujjheyya
anya-e0805n0:3102_3: iccādi. Rundhi, rundhiṃsu. Arundhi, nirujjhittha. Nirujjhi, nirujjhiṃsu. Rundhissati,
anya-e0805n0:3102_4: rundhissanti. Nirujjhissate, nirujjhissante. Nirujjhissati, nirujjhissanti. Arundhissa,
anya-e0805n0:3103_0: Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, chindati, chindanti. Kamme chijjate, chijjante. Chijjati, chijjanti.
anya-e0805n0:3103_1: Tathā chindatu, chindantu. Chijjatu, chijjantu. Chinde, chindeyya. Chijjeyya. Achindi,
anya-e0805n0:3103_2: chindi, chindiṃsu. Achijjittha, chijji. Chindissati, chindissanti. Ssassa chādese
anya-e0805n0:3103_3: – checchati, checchanti. Checchiti vā. Kamme chijjissate, chijjissante. Chijjissati,
anya-e0805n0:3105_0: Yuja yoge, yuñjati, yuñjanti. Yujjate, yujjante. Yujjati, yujjanti. Yuñjatu. Yujjataṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3105_1: Yuñje. Yujjetha. Ayuñji, ayuñjiṃsu. Ayujjittha, ayujji. Yuñjissati, yuñjissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3105_2: Yujjissate, yujjissante. Yujjissati, yujjissanti. Ayuñjissa. Ayujjissatha, ayujjissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3107_0: Bhavissantiyaṃ “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti sutte sappaccayaggahaṇena bhujato ssassa
anya-e0805n0:3107_1: khādeso, “ko khe cā”ti dhātvantassa kakāro, vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhokkhanti. Bhokkhasi,
anya-e0805n0:3107_2: bhokkhatha. Bhokkhāmi, bhokkhāma. Khādesābhāve bhuñjissati, bhuñjissanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3108_0: Muca mocane, muñcati, muñcanti. Muccate, muccante. Muñcatu, muñcantu. Muccataṃ, muccantaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3108_1: Muñce, muñceyya, muñceyyuṃ. Muccetha, mucceraṃ. Amuñci, amuñciṃsu. Amuccittha. Mokkhati,
anya-e0805n0:3108_2: mokkhanti. Muñcissati, muñcissanti. Muccissate, muccissante. Amuñcissa, amuccissatha iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3113: Divādito dhātugaṇato yappaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n0:3114: “Yaggahaṇaṃ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṃ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:3116_0: Yathā bhāvakammesu yappaccayassādeso hoti, tathā kattaripi yappaccayassa sadhātvantassa
anya-e0805n0:3116_1: cavagga yakāravakārādeso, pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa vakārattā saha tena
anya-e0805n0:3116_2: yakārassa vakāre kate dvibhāvo, “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇena “bo vassā”ti vuttattā
anya-e0805n0:3116_3: vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṃ, dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbasi, dibbatha. Dibbāmi, dibbāma.
anya-e0805n0:3117: Kamme dibbate, dibbante. Dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbatu. Dibbataṃ. Dibbe. Dibbetha. Adibbi. Adibbittha. Dibbissati. Dibbissate. Adibbissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3118: Sivu tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. Sibbatu. Sibbeyya. Asibbi, sibbi. Sibbissati. Asibbissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3119: Pada gatimhi, upubbo dvittaṃ, “tathā kattari cā”ti sadhātvantassa yakārassa jakāro, dvittañca.
anya-e0805n0:3121: Kamme paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. Paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. Bhāve uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0805n0:3122: Tathā uppajjatu. Uppajjeyya. Udapajjā. Udapajjatha. Udapādi, uppajjī. Uppajjittha. Uppajjissati. Uppajjissa, uppajjissā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3123: Budha avagamane, yappaccayaparattā na vuddhi, jhakārādesova viseso, dhammaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti. Bujjhate, bujjhante, bujjhare vā.
anya-e0805n0:3124: Kamme bujjhate mayā dhammo, bujjhante. Bujjhati, bujjhanti. Bujjhatu. Bujjheyya. Abujjhi. Abujjhittha. Bujjhissati. Abujjhissa.
anya-e0805n0:3128: Naha bandhane, “ha vipariyayo”ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. Sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3129: Mana ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3130: Dā ādāne, saṃāpubbo “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā yamhi dhātvantassa ikāro, sīlaṃ samādiyati, samādiyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3131: Tusa pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṃ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3134: Janajanane, “janādīnamā timhi cā”ti ettha “janādīnamā”ti yogavibhāgena yamhi dhātvantassa ākāro. Jāyati, jāyanti. Jāyate, jāyante.
anya-e0805n0:3135: Kamme janīyati, janīyanti. Jāyatu. Jāyeyya. Ajāyi, ajani. Jāyissati, janissati. Ajāyissa, ajanissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3140_0: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇāuṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n0:3140_1: “Aññesu cā”ti ettha caggahaṇena ṇuppaccayassa vuddhi. Tatthevānuvattitavāggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:3141: Dhammaṃ suṇoti, saralopādi, suṇanti. Suṇosi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Ṇāpaccaye suṇāti, suṇanti. Suṇāsi, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā rassattaṃ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma.
anya-e0805n0:3142: Kamme yappaccaye “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante. Sūyati, sūyanti. Dvitte rassattaṃ, suyyati, suyyanti. Sūyyati, sūyyanti vā.
anya-e0805n0:3143_0: Suṇotu, suṇantu. Suṇohi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Suṇa, suṇāhi,
anya-e0805n0:3143_1: suṇātha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma. Suṇataṃ, suṇantaṃ. Suṇassu, suṇavho. Suṇe, suṇāmase. Kamme
anya-e0805n0:3144: Suṇe, suṇeyya, suṇeyyuṃ. Suṇeyyāsi, suṇeyyātha. Suṇeyyāmi, suṇeyyāma. Suṇetha, suṇeraṃ. Suṇetho, suṇeyyāvho. Suṇeyyaṃ, suṇeyyāmhe. Sūyetha, sūyeyya.
anya-e0805n0:3145_0: Asuṇi, suṇi, asuṇiṃsu, suṇiṃsu. Asuṇi, asuṇittha. Asuṇiṃ, suṇiṃ, asuṇimha, suṇimha.
anya-e0805n0:3145_1: Asuṇittha, suṇittha. Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sassa dvibhāvo, sāgamo, assosi, assosiṃsu,
anya-e0805n0:3145_2: paccassosuṃ. Assosi, assosittha. Assosiṃ, assosimha, assosimhā vā, assosittha. Asūyittha, assūyi.
anya-e0805n0:3146_0: Saralopādi, suṇissati, suṇissanti. Suṇissasi, suṇissatha. Suṇissāmi, suṇissāma. Suṇissate,
anya-e0805n0:3146_1: suṇissante. Suṇissase, suṇissavhe. Suṇissaṃ, suṇissāmhe. Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sossati,
anya-e0805n0:3146_2: sossanti. Sossasi, sossatha. Sossāmi, sossāma. Sossate. Sūyissate, sūyissati. Asuṇissa. Asūyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3147: Hi gatimhi, papubbo ṇāpaccayo, pahiṇāti, pahiṇati vā, pahiṇanti. Pahiṇātu, pahiṇantu. Pahiṇeyya. Pahiṇi, dūtaṃ pāhesi. Pahiṇissati. Pahiṇissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3149: Mi pakkhepe, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇassa nattaṃ, minoti, minanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3150: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo saralope “dīgha”nti dīgho, uṇāpaccayo, sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti. Pāpuṇāsi, pāpuṇātha. Pāpuṇāmi, pāpuṇāma.
anya-e0805n0:3151: Kamme pāpīyati, pāpīyanti. Tathā pāpuṇātu. Pāpīyatu. Pāpuṇe, pāpuṇeyya. Pāpīyeyya. Pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṃsu. Pāpīyi. Pāpuṇissati. Pāpīyissati. Pāpuṇissa. Pāpīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3152_0: Saka sattimhi, dvibhāvo, sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Bhāve “pubbarūpañcā”ti pubbarūpattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3152_1: sakkate tayā, sakkati vā, sakkuṇātu. Sakkuṇeyya. “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā sakantassa
anya-e0805n0:3152_2: khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi, asakkhiṃsu, sakkhiṃsu. Sakkhissati, sakkhissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3155: Kī dabbavinimaye, vipubbo dvittaṃ, pure viya vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n0:3157: Kīicceva mādito dhātugaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari. Nāparattā na vuddhi, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā kiyādīnaṃ nāmhi rassattaṃ, kīto nāpaccayanakārassa ṇattañca.
anya-e0805n0:3158_0: Bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. Vikkīyati, vikkīyanti. Vikkiṇātu, vikkiṇantu. Vikkīyatu,
anya-e0805n0:3158_1: vikkīyantu. Vikkiṇe, vikkiṇeyya. Vikkīyeyya, vikkīyeyyuṃ. Avikkiṇi, vikkiṇi. Vikkīyittha,
anya-e0805n0:3158_2: vikkīyi. Vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. Vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. Avikkiṇissa, avikkiṇissaṃsu.
anya-e0805n0:3159_0: Ji jaye, kilese jināti, jinanti. Jīyati, jīyanti. Evaṃ jinātu. Jīyatu. Jineyya. Jīyeyya.
anya-e0805n0:3159_1: Ajini, jini, ajiniṃsu, jiniṃsu. Ajesi, ajesuṃ. Ajinittha. Ajīyittha, ajīyi. Jinissati,
anya-e0805n0:3159_2: jinissanti. Vijessati, vijessanti. Jīyissati, jīyissanti. Ajinissa. Ajīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3160: Tathā ci caye, cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3164: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:3165: Jādeso nāmhi jaṃ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha;
anya-e0805n0:3168_0: Kamme viññāyati, viññāyanti. Ivaṇṇāgame pubbalopo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ekāro, dvittañca,
anya-e0805n0:3168_1: ñeyyati, ñeyyanti. Vijānātu, vijānantu, rassattaṃ. Vijāna, vijānāhi, vijānātha. Vijānāmi,
anya-e0805n0:3168_2: vijānāma. Vijānataṃ, vijānantaṃ. Vijānassu. Viññāyatu, viññāyantu.
anya-e0805n0:3170: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāiccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Vijāniyā.
anya-e0805n0:3174: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n0:3179: Niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ, vijaññā, vijāneyya, vijāneyyuṃ. Vijāneyyāsi, vijāneyyātha. Vijāneyyāmi, vijāneyyāma, vijānemu vā. Vijānetha. Viññāyeyya, viññāyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3180_0: Samajāni, sañjāni, sañjāniṃsu. Nālope aññāsi, aññāsuṃ. Vijānittha. Viññāyittha. Paññāyi,
anya-e0805n0:3180_1: paññāyiṃsu. Vijānissati, vijānissanti. Ñassati, ñassanti. Viññāyissate, viññāyissante.
anya-e0805n0:3180_2: Paññāyissati, paññāyissanti. “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ssassa hi ca, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti.
anya-e0805n0:3181: Mā māne, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā māntassa ikāro, mināti, minanti. Kamme mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3182: Lū chedane, nāmhi rassattaṃ, lunāti, lunanti. Lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3183: Dhū kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. Dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3186: Gahaiccevamādito dhātuto ppa ṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari. Ādisaddoyaṃ pakāro.
anya-e0805n0:3189: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare. Sīlaṃ gaṇhāti, rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti. Gaṇhāsi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
anya-e0805n0:3190: Kamme “ye”ti vattamāne “havipariyayo lo vā”ti hakārassa yakārena vipariyayo hoti. Gayhati, gayhanti.
anya-e0805n0:3191_0: Gaṇhātu, gaṇhantu. Gaṇha, gaṇhāhi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma. Gaṇhataṃ, gaṇhantaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3191_1: Gayhataṃ, gayhantaṃ. Gayhatu, gayhantu. Gaṇhe, gaṇheyya, gaṇheyyuṃ. Gayheyya, gayheyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3192: Yadā “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asabbadhātuke vikaraṇapaccayassa lopo, ikārāgamassa ekāro ca, tadā sāgamo.
anya-e0805n0:3193_0: Aggahesi, aggahesuṃ. Aggahi, aggahiṃsu, aggahuṃ. Aggayhittha, aggayhi. Gaṇhissati,
anya-e0805n0:3193_1: gaṇhissanti. Gahessati, gahessanti. Gahīyissate, gahīyissante. Gayhissati, gayhissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3193_2: Aggaṇhissa, aggahissa. Aggaṇhissatha, aggahissatha. Aggayhissatha, aggayhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3196: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gheādeso hoti ppappaccaye pare. Gheppati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3201: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato oyiraiccete paccayā honti kattari. Karatovāyaṃ yirappaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:3202: Dhammaṃ tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma.
anya-e0805n0:3205_0: Tanādito okārappaccayo uttamāpajjate vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Ettha
anya-e0805n0:3205_1: ca vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato “okāro”ti ovikaraṇaṃ gayhati. Tanute, bahuvacane
anya-e0805n0:3205_2: “yavakārā cā”ti vattaṃ, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanumhe.
anya-e0805n0:3206_0: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā tanudhātvantassa yamhi ākāro, patāyate, patāyante. Patāyati,
anya-e0805n0:3206_1: patāyanti. Ākārābhāve pataññati, pataññanti. Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, taneyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3206_2: Atani, ataniṃsu. Atāyittha, patāyi. Tanissati, tanissanti. Patāyissati, patāyissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3211_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa akāro uttamāpajjate vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo,
anya-e0805n0:3211_1: “yavakārā cā”ti apadantassa paraukārassa vakāro, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhāturakārassa
anya-e0805n0:3211_2: vakārasmiṃ lopo, vakārassa dvitte tassa “bbo vvassā”ti bakāradvayaṃ, kubbanti, karonti.
anya-e0805n0:3211_3: Karosi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Tathā kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kubbe,
anya-e0805n0:3211_4: kurumhe. Yirappaccaye rakāralopo, kayirati, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3212_0: Kamme yappaccaye “ivaṇṇāgamo vā”ti īkārāgamo, yakārassa dvittaṃ, karīyyate kaṭo tena,
anya-e0805n0:3212_1: karīyyati, karīyyanti. Karīyati, karīyanti vā. Īkārābhāve “tassa cavagga”iccādinā
anya-e0805n0:3212_2: sadhātvantassa yakārattaṃ, dvittañca. Kayyati, kayyanti. Ikārāgame “kvaci dhātu”iccādisutte
anya-e0805n0:3212_3: caggahaṇena rayānaṃ vipariyayo, kayirati kaṭo tena, kayiranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3213: Tathā kusalaṃ karotu, kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Kurutaṃ, kubbantaṃ. Kurussu, kurassu vā, kuruvho. Kubbe, kubbāmase.
anya-e0805n0:3214: Kamme karīyatu, karīyantu, kayyataṃ, kayirataṃ, kayiratu.
anya-e0805n0:3215: Sattamiyaṃ kare, kareyya, kareyyuṃ. Kareyyāsi, kareyyātha. Kareyyāmi, kareyyāma. Utte kubbe, kubbeyya.
anya-e0805n0:3219_0: Saralopādi, kayirā, kayiruṃ. Kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Attanopade
anya-e0805n0:3219_1: kayirātha dhīro, kubbetha, karetha vā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā kussa kru ca, krubbetha,
anya-e0805n0:3219_2: krubberaṃ. Krubbetho, krubbeyyāvho. Krubbeyyaṃ, krubbeyyāmhe. Kamme karīyeyya, karīyeyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3220: Hiyyattaniyaṃ “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kā hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n0:3221: Akā, akarā, akarū. Akaro, akattha, akarottha. Akaṃ, akaraṃ, akamha, akaramha. Akattha. Akariṃ, akaramhase.
anya-e0805n0:3224_0: Kara iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva kāsattaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare.
anya-e0805n0:3224_1: “Kāsatta”miti bhāvaniddesena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamo. Atha vā yadā karassa kā hoti,
anya-e0805n0:3224_2: sattañcāgamo ajjatanimhi vāti attho, tadā “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi
anya-e0805n0:3224_3: dhātuto sāgamopi sijjhati, “yogavibhāgato iṭṭhappasiddhī”ti yebhuyyena dīghatova
anya-e0805n0:3224_4: hoti, “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kābhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṃ siddho hoti.
anya-e0805n0:3225_0: Akāsi, akāsuṃ. Akāsi, akāsittha. Akāsiṃ, akāsimha. Akāsittha. Kāsattābhāve akari,
anya-e0805n0:3225_1: kari, akariṃsu, kariṃsu, akaṃsu, akaruṃ. Akari, akarittha. Akariṃ, kariṃ, akarimha,
anya-e0805n0:3226: “Vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:3228_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sappaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo
anya-e0805n0:3228_1: hoti. Adhikabhūtasappaccayaggahaṇena vacamucabhujādito ssassa khādeso, vasa chidi
anya-e0805n0:3229_0: Kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Ikārāgame kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3229_1: Kāhābhāve karissati, karissanti. Karissasi, karissatha. Karissāmi, karissāma. Karissate,
anya-e0805n0:3229_2: karissante. Karissase, karissavhe. Karissaṃ, karissāmhe. Karīyissati, karīyissanti.
anya-e0805n0:3230: Yadā saṃpubbo, tadā “purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā”ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi saṃpubbakarotissa kharādeso.
anya-e0805n0:3231_1: Abhisaṅkhareyya. Abhisaṅkhari, khādese abhisaṅkhāsi vā. Abhisaṅkharissati. Abhisaṅkharissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3232: Saka sattimhi, opaccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. Sakkosi, sakkotha. Sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3233: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo, pappoti, papponti. Papposi, pappotha. Pappomi, pappoma. Pappotu, pappontu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3236: Dhura theyye, pure viya dhātvantalopo, vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n0:3237: “Tathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti ca sīhavilokanena bhāvakammaggahaṇāni ca vattante, maṇḍūkagatiyā kāritaggahaṇañca.
anya-e0805n0:3239: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, bhāve ca kammani, vibhattippaccayesu. “Kāritaṃ viya ṇānubandho”ti ṇe ṇayānaṃ kāritabyapadeso.
anya-e0805n0:3243: Asaṃyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:3244_0: Dhanaṃ coreti, corenti. Coresi, coretha. Coremi, corema. Ṇayappaccaye – corayati,
anya-e0805n0:3244_1: corayanti. Corayasi, corayatha. Corayāmi, corayāma. Corayate, corayante. Corayase,
anya-e0805n0:3245: Kamme yappaccaye īkārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3246: Coretu, corentu. Corehi. Corayatu, corayantu. Coraya, corayāhi.
anya-e0805n0:3247_0: Coreyya, coreyyuṃ. Coraye, corayeyyuṃ. Acoresi, coresi, acoresuṃ, coresuṃ. Acorayi,
anya-e0805n0:3247_1: corayi, acorayiṃsu, corayiṃsu, acorayuṃ, corayuṃ. Acoresi, acoresittha. Tvaṃ acorayi,
anya-e0805n0:3247_2: acorayittha. Acoresiṃ, acoresimha. Acorayiṃ, acorayimha. Acorayittha. Acorīyittha, acorīyi.
anya-e0805n0:3248: Corissati, corissanti. Corayissati, corayissanti. Corīyissate, corīyissante. Corīyissati, corīyissanti. Acorissa, acorayissa. Acorīyissatha, acorīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3249: Tathā cinta cintāyaṃ, saṃyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.
anya-e0805n0:3250: Cinteti, cintayati, cintenti, cintayanti. Cintetu, cintayatu. Cinteyya, cintayeyya. Acintesi, cintesi, acintayi, cintayi. Cintessati, cintayissati. Acintissa, acintayissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3251: Manta guttabhāsane, manteti, mantayati iccādi purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3252: Pāla rakkhaṇe, dhammaṃ pāleti, pālayati. Pālīyati. Pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3253: Ghaṭa ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:3255: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3257: Bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā;
anya-e0805n0:3258: Kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā.
anya-e0805n0:3262: Tattha dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhā khādikāritantā paccayā dhātuppaccayā nāma.
anya-e0805n0:3264: “Dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti ito dhātuggahaṇaṃ anuvattate, “parā, paccayā”ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n0:3265: 528. Tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0805n0:3266: Tija gupa kita māna iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:3267: Tijato khantiyaṃ khova, nindāyaṃ gupato tu cho;
anya-e0805n0:3272: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa kakārādeso hoti khappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n0:3276: Dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi khādikāritantehi paccayehi tyādayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0805n0:3277: Ativākyaṃ titikkhati, titikkhanti. Kamme titikkhīyati. Tathā titikkhatu, titikkhantu. Titikkheyya, titikkheyyuṃ. Atitikkhi, atitikkhiṃsu. Titikkhissati. Atitikkhissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3278: Khappaccayābhāve appaccayassa ekāro, tejeti, tejati vā, tejanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3279_0: Gupa gopane, chappaccaye dvibhāvo, “pubbobbhāso”ti abbhāsasaññā, “abbhāsassā”ti vattamāne
anya-e0805n0:3279_1: “antassivaṇṇākāro vā”ti abbhāsantassikāro, “kavaggassa cavaggo”ti abbhāsagakārassa jakāro ca.
anya-e0805n0:3281: Dhātvanthassa byañjanassa cakārādeso hoti chappaccayesu paresu. Tato vibhattiyo, kāyaṃ jigucchati, jigucchanti. Sesaṃ purimasamaṃ. Chābhāve gopeti, gopenti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3285_0: Abbhāsagatānaṃ māna kitaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakāratakārattaṃ hoti vā yathākkamanti
anya-e0805n0:3285_1: takāro, dhātvantassa cakāro, sesaṃ samaṃ. Rogaṃ tikicchati, tikicchanti iccādi. Takārābhāve
anya-e0805n0:3288_0: Tato abbhāsato parāsaṃ pāmānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vāmaṃiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ sappaccaye
anya-e0805n0:3288_1: pare. Sesūti bahuvacananiddeso payogepi vacanavipallāsañāpanatthaṃ. Atthaṃ vīmaṃsati, vīmaṃsanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3292: 534. Bhuja ghasa hara su pādīhi tumicchatthesu.
anya-e0805n0:3293_0: Bhuja ghasa hara su pā iccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu ca kha cha saiccete paccayā
anya-e0805n0:3293_1: honti vā. Tumicchānaṃ, tumantayuttaicchāya vā atthā tumicchatthā, tena tumantarahitesu
anya-e0805n0:3293_3: dvebhāve kate “dutiyacatutthānaṃ paṭhamatatiyā”ti abbhāsabhakārassa bakāro, dhātvantassa
anya-e0805n0:3293_4: “ko khe cā”ti kakāro, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3294: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Bhottumicchati, icchatthesūti kimatthaṃ? Bhottuṃ gacchati.
anya-e0805n0:3295: Ghasa adane, ghasitumicchatīti atthe chappaccayo, dvittaṃ, tatiya cavagga ikāra cakārādesā, jighacchati, jighacchanti.
anya-e0805n0:3298: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gī hoti se paccaye pare. “Gīse”ti yogavibhāgena jissapi, ṭhānūpacārenādesassāpi dhātuvohārattā dvittaṃ, bhikkhaṃ jigīsati, jigīsanti.
anya-e0805n0:3299: Su savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:3300: Pā pāne, pātumicchatīti atthe sappaccayadvittarassattaikārādesā, “tato pāmānānaṃ vāmaṃ sesū”ti vādeso, pivāsati, pivāsanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3302: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n0:3304_0: Ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato āyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe. Upamīyati
anya-e0805n0:3304_1: etenāti upamānaṃ, kattuno upamānaṃ kattupamānaṃ, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti ivasaddanivatti,
anya-e0805n0:3304_2: dhātuppaccayantattā “tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā”ti sutte tesaṃgahaṇena vibhattilopo,
anya-e0805n0:3304_4: vibhattuppatti, pabbatāyati saṅgho, evaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati samuddāyati,
anya-e0805n0:3304_5: cicciṭamiva attānamācarati cicciṭāyati saddo. Evaṃ dhūmāyati.
anya-e0805n0:3307_0: Upamānabhūtā nāmato īyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe. Puna upamānaggahaṇaṃ kattuggahaṇanivattanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3307_1: tena kammatopi sijjhati, sesaṃ samaṃ. Achattaṃ chattamivācarati chattīyati, aputtaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3308: Upamānāti kiṃ? Dhammamācarati, ācāreti kiṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati.
anya-e0805n0:3311: Nāmamhā attano icchatthe īyappaccayo hoti. Attano pattamicchati pattīyati, evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, paṭīyati, dhanīyati, puttīyati.
anya-e0805n0:3316_0: Dhātuyā rūpe nipphādetabbe, “taṃ karoti, tena atikkamati”iccādike payujjitabbe vā
anya-e0805n0:3316_1: sati nāmamhā ṇayappaccayo hoti, kāritasaññā ca. Ṇalope, vibhattilopasaralopādīsu
anya-e0805n0:3316_2: katesu vibhattuppatti, daḷhayati vīriyaṃ, evaṃ pamāṇayati, amissayati, tathā hatthinā
anya-e0805n0:3316_3: atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati,
anya-e0805n0:3317: 540. Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0805n0:3318_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti,
anya-e0805n0:3318_1: te kāritasaññā ca honti. Hetuyeva attho hetvattho, so ca “yo kāreti sa hetū”ti laddhahetusañño
anya-e0805n0:3318_2: suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā, atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
anya-e0805n0:3320: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṃ;
anya-e0805n0:3322: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
anya-e0805n0:3325: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
anya-e0805n0:3328_0: Tattha yo koci bhavati, tamañño “bhavāhi bhavāhi” iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā bhavantaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3328_1: bhavituṃ samatthaṃ payojayati, bhavituṃ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā,
anya-e0805n0:3328_2: kāritasaññā ca, “vuttatthānamappayogo”ti vākyassa appayogo, “kāritānaṃ ṇo lopa”nti
anya-e0805n0:3331_0: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare. “Te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena
anya-e0805n0:3331_1: jheādīnaṃ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso, saralopādi, “dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo”ti tyādayo.
anya-e0805n0:3332: So samādhiṃ bhāveti, bhāvayati, bhāventi, bhāvayanti. Bhāvesi, bhāvayasi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayate, bhāvayante.
anya-e0805n0:3333: Kamme attanopadayappaccayaīkārāgamā, saralopādi ca, tena bhāvīyate samādhi, bhāvīyante. Bhāvīyati, bhāvīyanti.
anya-e0805n0:3334: Tathā bhāvetu, bhāvayatu, bhāventu, bhāvayantu. Bhāvehi, bhāvaya, bhāvayāhi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. Bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. Bhāvayataṃ, bhāvayantaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3336_0: Bhāveyya, bhāvaye, bhāvayeyya, bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyyuṃ. Bhāveyyāsi, bhāvayeyyāsi,
anya-e0805n0:3336_1: bhāveyyātha, bhāvayeyyātha. Bhāveyyāmi, bhāvayeyyāmi, bhāveyyāma, bhāvayeyyāma. Bhāvetha,
anya-e0805n0:3339_0: Abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, abhāvesuṃ, bhāvesuṃ, abhāvayiṃsu, bhāvayiṃsu,
anya-e0805n0:3339_1: abhāvayuṃ, bhāvayuṃ. Abhāvesi, abhāvayasi, abhāvittha, abhāvayittha. Abhāvesiṃ, bhāvesiṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3341: Bhāvessati, bhāvayissati, bhāvessanti, bhāvayissanti. Bhāvessasi, bhāvayissasi, bhāvissatha, bhāvayissatha. Bhāvessāmi, bhāvayissāmi, bhāvessāma, bhāvayissāma.
anya-e0805n0:3343: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṃsu, abhāvayissaṃsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3344: Tathā yo koci pacati, tamañño “pacāhi pacāhi” iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojeti, pacituṃ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo, akārassākāro vuddhi, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3345_0: So devadattaṃ odanaṃ pāceti, pācenti. Pācesi, pācetha. Pācemi, pācema. Pācayati,
anya-e0805n0:3345_1: pācayanti. Pācayasi, pācayatha. Pācayāmi, pācayāma. Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṃ
anya-e0805n0:3345_2: purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayati, pācāpayanti.
anya-e0805n0:3346: Kamme so odanaṃ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
anya-e0805n0:3347_0: Tathā pācetu, pācayatu, pācāpetu, pācāpayatu. Pācīyataṃ, pācīyatu, pācayīyataṃ, pācayīyatu,
anya-e0805n0:3347_1: pācāpīyataṃ, pācāpīyatu, pācāpayīyataṃ, pācāpayīyatu. Pāceyya, pācayeyya, pācāpeyya,
anya-e0805n0:3347_2: pācāpayeyya. Pācīyeyya, pācīyeyyuṃ. Apācesi, apācayi, apācāpesi, apācāpayi. Pācessati,
anya-e0805n0:3347_3: pācayissati, pācāpessati, pācāpayissati. Apācissa, apācayissa, apācāpissa, apācāpayissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3348: Gacchantaṃ, gantuṃ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṃ sampattāyaṃ –
anya-e0805n0:3351: Ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n0:3352: So taṃ purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti, gamayati, gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. So gāmaṃ gamīyati tena, gamayīyati, gacchāpīyati, gacchāpayīyati iccādi. Sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ uparipi.
anya-e0805n0:3353: Ghaṭa īhāyaṃ, ghaṭantaṃ payojayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭādīnaṃ vāti na vuddhi, ghaṭayati, ghaṭāpeti, ghaṭāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3356: Guhadusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3357: Guha saṃvaraṇe, guhituṃ payojayati gūhayati, gūhayanti. Dusa appītimhi, dussantaṃ payojayati dūsayati, dūsayanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3358_0: Tathā icchantaṃ payojayati icchāpeti, icchāpayati, eseti, esayati. Niyacchantaṃ payojayati
anya-e0805n0:3358_1: niyāmeti, niyāmayati. Āsantaṃ payojayati āseti, āsayati, acchāpeti, acchāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3358_2: Labhantaṃ payojayati lābheti, lābhayati. Vacantaṃ payojayati vāceti, vācayati, vācāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3358_3: vācāpayati. Evaṃ vāseti, vāsayati, vāsāpeti, vāsāpayati. Vāheti, vāhayati, vāhāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3358_4: vāhāpayati. Jīreti, jīrayati, jīrāpeti, jīrāpayati. Māreti, mārayati, mārāpeti, mārāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3359_0: Tathā tudantaṃ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti, todāpayati. Pavisantaṃ payojayati,
anya-e0805n0:3359_1: pavisituṃ vā paveseti, pavesayati, pavesāpeti, pavesāpayati. Uddisantaṃ payojayati
anya-e0805n0:3359_2: uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati. Pahontaṃ payojayati pahāveti, pahāvayati. Sayantaṃ payojayati
anya-e0805n0:3359_3: sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyāpeti, sāyāpayati. Ettha ekārassa āyādeso, sayāpeti, sayāpayati,
anya-e0805n0:3359_4: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇāpeṇāpayesu āyādesassa rassattaṃ. Nayantaṃ payojayati nayāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3359_5: nayāpayati. Patiṭṭhantaṃ payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti, patiṭṭhāpayati, patiṭṭhapeti vā.
anya-e0805n0:3363: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare. Ghāteti, ghātayati, ghātāpeti, ghātāpayati, “vadho vā sabbatthā”ti vadhādese vadheti, vadhāpeti.
anya-e0805n0:3364_0: Juhontaṃ payojayati juhāveti, juhāvayati. Jahantaṃ payojayati jahāpeti, jahāpayati,
anya-e0805n0:3364_1: hāpeti, hāpayati. Dadantaṃ payojayati dāpeti, dāpayati. Pidahantaṃ payojayati pidhāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3365_0: Rundhantaṃ payojayati rodheti, rodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati. Chindantaṃ payojayati
anya-e0805n0:3365_1: chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati. Yuñjantaṃ payojayati yojeti, yojayati,
anya-e0805n0:3365_2: yojāpeti, yojāpayati. Bhuñjantaṃ payojayati bhojeti, bhojayati, bhojāpeti, bhojāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3365_3: Muñcantaṃ payojayati moceti, mocayati, mocāpeti, mocāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3366_0: Dibbantaṃ payojayati deveti, devayati. Uppajjantaṃ payojayati uppādeti, uppādayati.
anya-e0805n0:3366_1: Bujjhantaṃ payojayati bodheti, bodhayati. “Dādhāntato yo kvacī”ti yakārāgamo, bujjhāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3366_2: bujjhāpayati. Tussantaṃ payojayati toseti, tosayati, tosāpeti, tosāpayati. Sammantaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3366_3: payojayati sameti, samayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi. Kuppantaṃ payojayati kopeti, kopayati.
anya-e0805n0:3366_4: Jāyantaṃ payojayati janeti, janayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:3367: Suṇantaṃ payojayati dhammaṃ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṃ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
anya-e0805n0:3368_0: Vikkiṇantaṃ payojayati vikkāyāpeti, vikkāyāpayati. Jinantaṃ payojayati jayāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3368_1: jayāpayati. Jānantaṃ payojayati ñāpeti, ñāpayati. Gaṇhantaṃ payojayati gāheti, gāhayati,
anya-e0805n0:3369: Vitanantaṃ payojayati vitāneti, vitānayati. Yo koci karoti, tamañño “karohi karohi”iccevaṃ bravīti, karontaṃ payojayati, kātuṃ vā kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayati iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3370: Corentaṃ payojayati corāpeti, corāpayati. Cintentaṃ payojayati cintāpeti, cintāpayati, pūjentaṃ payojayati pūjāpeti, pūjāpayati iccādi. Sabbattha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3373_0: Tena titikkhantaṃ payojayati titikkheti, titikkhāpeti. Tikicchantaṃ payojayati tikiccheti,
anya-e0805n0:3373_1: tikicchayati, tikicchāpeti, tikicchāpayati. Evaṃ bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti,
anya-e0805n0:3373_2: bubhukkhāpayati, pabbatāyantaṃ payojayati pabbatāyayati. Puttīyayati iccādipi siddhaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0805n0:3380: Taṃ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṃ rāgādidūsakanti.
anya-e0805n0:3387: Tattha kiccakitakavasena duvidhā hi paccayā, tesu kiccasaññāya paṭhamaṃ vuttattā, kiccānamappakattā ca kiccappaccayā tāva vuccante.
anya-e0805n0:3388: Bhū sattāyaṃ, “bhūyate, abhavittha, bhavissate vā devadattenā”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n0:3389: “Dhātuyā kammādimhi ṇo”ti ito “dhātuyā”ti sabbattha paccayādividhāne vattate, “parā, paccayā”ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n0:3391: Bhāvakammaiccetesvatthesu sabbadhātūhi tabba anīyaiccete paccayā parā honti. Yogavibhāgena aññatthāpi.
anya-e0805n0:3393: Akammakehi dhātūhi, bhāve kiccā bhavanti te;
