anya-e0805n0:3952: Ākatigaṇoyaṃ. Vajaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi paccayādesalopāgamanisedhaliṅgādividhinā yathābhidhānaṃ pabbajjādayo saddā nipaccante.
anya-e0805n0:3953_0: Vaja gatimhi papubbo, paṭhamameva vajitabbanti atthe “bhāvakammesū”ti adhikicca “ṇyocā”ti
anya-e0805n0:3953_1: ṇyappaccayo, ṇalopādi. “Pavvajya”nti rūpe sampatte iminā jjhassa jjādeso, vakāradvayassa
anya-e0805n0:3954_0: Tathā iñja kampane, iñjanaṃ ijjā. Yaja devapūjāyaṃ, yajanaṃ ijjā, “yajassādissī”ti
anya-e0805n0:3954_1: ittaṃ. Añja byattigatīsu saṃpubbo, samañjanaṃ samajjā, ñjhassa jjādeso. Sada visaraṇagatyāvasānesu,
anya-e0805n0:3954_2: nisīdanaṃ nisajjā. Vida ñāṇe, vijānanaṃ, vidatīti vā vijjā. Saja vissagge, vissajjanaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3955_0: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu, hantabbanti atthe ṇyamhi kate “vadho vā sabbatthā”ti hanassa vadhādeso,
anya-e0805n0:3955_1: jhassiminā jjhādeso ca, so vajjho, sā vajjhā. Sī saye, sayanaṃ, sayanti etthāti vā
anya-e0805n0:3955_2: seyyā, vuddhi, yakārassa dvittañca. Dhā dhāraṇe saṃpubbo, sammā cittaṃ nidheti etāya,
anya-e0805n0:3955_3: sayaṃ vā saddahatīti atthe “itthiyamatiyavo vā”ti appaccayo, “sandhā”ti rūpe sampatte
anya-e0805n0:3955_4: iminā nakārassa dakāro, saddhā. Cara caraṇe, caraṇanti atthe ṇyappaccaye, ikārāgame
anya-e0805n0:3956_0: Ruja roge, rujananti atthe iminā chappaccayo, “byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā”ti
anya-e0805n0:3956_1: dhātvantassa cakāro, rucchā, rujāti appaccayena siddhaṃ. Tathā kuca saṅkocane, chappaccayo,
anya-e0805n0:3956_2: kocanaṃ kucchā. Labha lābhe, chamhi cādeso, lacchā. Rada vilekhane, racchā. Muha
anya-e0805n0:3956_3: vecitte, muyhanaṃ mucchā, mucchanaṃ vā mucchā. Vasa nivāse, vacchā. Kaca dittimhi,
anya-e0805n0:3956_4: kacchā. Katha kathane saṃpubbo, saddhiṃ kathananti atthe ṇyappaccayo, iminā thyassa
anya-e0805n0:3956_5: cchādeso, saṃsaddassa sādeso ca, sākacchā. Tuda byathane, tucchā. Pada gatimhi, byāpajjananti
anya-e0805n0:3956_6: atthe ṇyamhi kate “byāpādyā”ti rūpe sampatte iminā nipātanena dyassa jjādeso, rassattañca, byāpajjā.
anya-e0805n0:3957_0: Mara pāṇacāge, marati maraṇanti ca atthe iminā tyatyuppaccayā, dhātvantalopoca, tato
anya-e0805n0:3957_1: “yavata”miccādinā cakāro, macco, maccu. Sata sātacce, iminā yappaccayo, tyassa cakāro,
anya-e0805n0:3957_2: saccaṃ. Tathā nata gattavināme, naccaṃ. Niti nicce, niccaṃ. Mā māne, māyā. Jana janane,
anya-e0805n0:3957_3: jāyā, kana dittikantīsu, nyassa ñattaṃ, dvittañca, kaññā. Dhana dhaññe, dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3958: 661. Ve pu sī davava mu ku dā bhūhvādīhi thuttima ṇimā nibbatte.
anya-e0805n0:3959_0: Vepusīdavavamuiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, ku dā bhūādito, hvādito ca yathākkamaṃ thuttimaṇimaiccete
anya-e0805n0:3959_1: paccayā honti nibbattatthe. Vepu kampane, thuppaccayo, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā akārāgamo,
anya-e0805n0:3959_2: atha vā “athū”ti vattabbe saralopaṃ katvā “thū”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vepena nibbatto
anya-e0805n0:3959_3: vepathu. Sī saye, sayanena nibbatto sayathu. Dava davane, davena nibbatto davathu.
anya-e0805n0:3960_0: Kutti karaṇaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ kuttimaṃ, “ku”iti nipātanato karassa kuttaṃ. Dā dāne,
anya-e0805n0:3960_1: dāti dānaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ dattimaṃ, rassattaṃ. Bhūti bhavanaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ bhottimaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3960_2: Avahuti avahanaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ ohāvimaṃ, ṇalopavuddhiāvādesā.
anya-e0805n0:3962_0: Akkose gammamāne namhi nipāte upapade sati dhātuto ānippaccayo hoti. Na gamitabbo
anya-e0805n0:3962_1: te jamma desoti atthe ānippaccayo, kitakattā nāmamiva katvā simhi kate na gamānīti
anya-e0805n0:3962_2: atthe kammadhārayasamāso, nassa attaṃ, puna samāsattā nāmamiva kate syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n0:3962_3: agamāni te jamma deso. Na kattabbaṃ te jamma kammanti akarāni te jamma kammaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3963: Namhīti kiṃ? Vipatti te. Akkoseti kiṃ? Agati te.
anya-e0805n0:3965_0: Sunaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa sambandhino unasaddassa oṇa vāna uvāna una unakha uṇa
anya-e0805n0:3965_1: ā ānaiccete ādesā honti. Sunassunassa oṇādiādese, paranayane ca kate syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n0:3965_2: soṇo, soṇā, svāno, svānā, suvāno, suvānā, suno, sunā, sunakho, sunakhā, suṇo, suṇā,
anya-e0805n0:3967: Taruṇaiccetassa saddassa susuiccādeso hoti. Casaddo aniyamattho, susu, taruṇo vā.
anya-e0805n0:3969: Yuvaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa uvasaddassa uvauvānaunaūnaiccete ādesā honti. Yuvā tiṭṭhati, yuvāno tiṭṭhati, yuno tiṭṭhati, yūno tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n0:3971_0: Chadaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tatraṇaiccete paccayā honti. Chada apavāraṇe, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:3971_1: dhātvantassa takāro. Ātapaṃ chādetīti chattaṃ, chatraṃ, byañjanattaye sarūpānamekassa lopo.
anya-e0805n0:3972: Cinta cintāyaṃ, cintetīti cittaṃ, nakārassa saṃyogādittā niggahītaṃ, tassa “byañjane cā”ti lopo, citraṃ, “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti na vuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:3973: Su abhisave, “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti tassa dvittaṃ, atthe abhisavetīti suttaṃ, sutraṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3974: Sūda paggharaṇe, atthe sūdetīti suttaṃ, rassattaṃ, bhujādittā dalopo, dvittañca. Su savane, suṇātīti sotaṃ, sotraṃ, vuddhi.
anya-e0805n0:3975: Ni pāpaṇe, netīti nettaṃ, netraṃ. Vida maṅgalle, to dassa, pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ. Pū pavane, punātīti pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ, ikārāgamo, vuddhiavādesā ca.
anya-e0805n0:3976_0: Pata gatimhi, patatīti pattaṃ, patraṃ, patato tāyatīti patto, patro. Tanu vitthāre,
anya-e0805n0:3976_1: taññatīti tantaṃ, tantraṃ. Yata yatane, yattaṃ, yatraṃ. Yā pāpaṇe, yāpanā yatrā.
anya-e0805n0:3976_2: Yamu uparame, yantaṃ, yantraṃ. Ada bhakkhaṇe, adatīti attaṃ, atraṃ. Yuja yoge, yujjatīti
anya-e0805n0:3977_0: Vatu vattane, vattaṃ, vatraṃ. Mida sinehane, mijjatīti mittaṃ, mitraṃ. Mā parimāṇe,
anya-e0805n0:3977_1: mattā parimāṇaṃ, dvittarassattāni. Evaṃ punātīti putto, putro. Kala saṅkhyāne, kalattaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3977_2: kalatraṃ bhariyā. Vara saṃvaraṇe, varattaṃ, varatraṃ cammamayayottaṃ. Vepu kampane,
anya-e0805n0:3978_0: Gupa saṃvaraṇe, gottaṃ, gotraṃ, “gupādīnañcā”ti dhātvantalopo, dvittañca, gattaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3978_1: vā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ukārassa akāro. Dā avakhaṇḍane, dāttaṃ, dātraṃ. Hu havane,
anya-e0805n0:3978_2: aggihuttaṃ. Vaha pāpaṇe, vahittaṃ, vahitraṃ. Cara caraṇe, carittaṃ, caritraṃ. Muca
anya-e0805n0:3978_3: mocane, muttaṃ passāvo. Bhāsa dittimhi, bhastrā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:3980_0: Vada cara varaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇittappaccayo hoti gaṇe gammamāne. Vada viyattiyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3980_1: vācāyaṃ, vaditānaṃ gaṇo vādittaṃ. Cara caraṇe, caritānaṃ gaṇo cārittaṃ. Vara varaṇe,
anya-e0805n0:3980_2: varitānaṃ gaṇo vārittaṃ. Atha vā caranti tasmiṃ paripūrakāritāyāti cārittaṃ. Vāritaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3982_0: Mida pada ranja tanu dhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi yathābhidhānaṃ tti tiiccete paccayā
anya-e0805n0:3982_1: honti. Mijjati siniyhatīti metti, dhātvantalopo. Pajjatīti patti. Ranja rāge, ranjati
anya-e0805n0:3982_2: etthāti ratti. Vitthārīyatīti tanti. Dhāretīti dhāti. Pā rakkhaṇe, pāti. Vasa nivāse, vasati.
anya-e0805n0:3983: 669. Usuranjadaṃsānaṃ daṃsassa daḍḍho ḍha ṭhā ca.
anya-e0805n0:3984_0: Usu ranja daṃsaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ antare daṃsassa daḍḍhādeso hoti, sesehi dhātūhi
anya-e0805n0:3984_1: ḍha ṭhaiccete paccayā honti. Usu dāhe, ranja rāge, ḍha ṭhappaccayā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā
anya-e0805n0:3984_2: dhātvantalopo, dvittaṃ, uḍḍho, raṭṭhaṃ. Daṃsa daṃsane, kvippaccayo, kvilopo, daṃsassa
anya-e0805n0:3986: Sū vu asaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ū u asānaṃ ataiccādeso hoti, ante thappaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n0:3987_0: Sū hiṃsāyaṃ, satthaṃ. Vu saṃvaraṇe, vatthaṃ. Asa bhuvi, attho. Yadā pana sasu hiṃsāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3987_1: vasa acchādane, ara gatimhīti ca dhātu, tadā “samādīhi tha mā”ti thappaccayo, “kvaci
anya-e0805n0:3987_2: dhātū”tiādinā dhātvantalopo, “vagge ghosā”tiādinā dvittaṃ, sasatīti satthaṃ, vasīyatīti
anya-e0805n0:3988: 671. Ranjudādīhi dhadiddakirā kvaci ja da lopo ca.
anya-e0805n0:3989: Ranja udiiccevamādīhi dhātūhi dha da idda ka iraiccete paccayā honti kvaci, dhātvantānaṃ jadānaṃ lopo ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:3990_0: Ranja rāge, dhappaccayo, jalopo ca, randhaṃ. Udi pasavanakledanesu saṃpubbo, dappaccayo,
anya-e0805n0:3990_1: samuddo, uddo. Khuda pipāsāyaṃ, khuddo. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, chiddo. Rudi hiṃsāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3990_2: ruddo, luddo, lo rassa. Bhadi kalyāṇe, bhaddo. Nidi kucchāyaṃ, niddā. Muda hāse,
anya-e0805n0:3991: Susa sosane, suca soke vā, kappaccayo, dhātvantassa kakāro, sukkaṃ. Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vaka ādāne vā, vakkaṃ. Saka sattimhi, sakko. Usu dāhe, ukkā.
anya-e0805n0:3992_0: Vaja gatimhi, irappaccayo, appaṭihataṃ vajatīti vajiraṃ. Mada ummāde, madirā. Evaṃ
anya-e0805n0:3992_1: mandiraṃ, rudhiraṃ, ruhiraṃ, ruciraṃ. Badha bandhane, badhiro, badhirā, badhiraṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3992_2: timiro, timiraṃ, siro. Sara hiṃsāyaṃ, sariraṃ. “Kalilaṃ, salila”ntiādīsu lo rassa.
anya-e0805n0:3994_0: Paṭito parassa hiiccetassa dhātussa heraṇa hīraṇaiccete ādesā honti. Hi gatimhi paṭipubbo,
anya-e0805n0:3994_1: paṭipakkhe madditvā gacchatīti atthe “kvi cā”ti kvippaccayo, kvilopo, iminā heraṇa
anya-e0805n0:3994_2: hīraṇaādesā, ṇalopo, “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā paṭisaddādissa vuddhi, pāṭiheraṃ, pāṭihīraṃ,
anya-e0805n0:3994_3: yadā pana hara haraṇeti dhātu, tadā paṭipakkhe haratīti “pāṭihāriya”miti ṇyenapi siddhaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:3997_0: Kaḍi chedane, kappaccaye kate “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā, “niggahītañcā”ti vā ikārānubandhassa
anya-e0805n0:3997_1: dhātussa niggahītāgamo, kalopo ca, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ, kaṇḍo usu, parimāṇañca.
anya-e0805n0:3997_2: Evaṃ ghaṭi ghaṭṭane, ghaṇṭo, ghaṇṭā vā. Vaṭi āvattane, vaṭi dhāraṇabandhanasaṅghātesu
anya-e0805n0:3997_3: vā, vaṇṭo. Karaḍi bhājanatthe, karaṇḍo. Maḍi maṇḍanatthe, maṇḍo. Saḍi gumbatthe,
anya-e0805n0:3997_4: saṇḍo. Bhaḍi bhaṇḍatthe, bhaṇḍaṃ. Paḍi liṅgavekallatthe, paṇḍo, so eva paṇḍako. Daḍi
anya-e0805n0:3997_5: āṇāyaṃ, daṇḍo. Raḍi hiṃ sāyaṃ, raṇḍo. Taḍi calanatthe, vitaṇḍo. Caḍi caṇḍatthe, caṇḍo.
anya-e0805n0:3997_6: Gaḍi sanniccaye, gaṇḍo. Aḍi aṇḍatthe, aṇḍo. Laḍi jigucchāyaṃ, laṇḍaṃ. Meḍi kuṭilatthe,
anya-e0805n0:3997_7: meṇḍo, meṇḍako vā. Eraḍi hiṃsāyaṃ, eraṇḍo. Khaḍi chedanatthe, khaṇḍo. Madi hāse,
anya-e0805n0:3997_8: mando. Idi paramissariye, indo. Cadi icchākantīsu, cando. Khura chedane, khuro iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:4000_0: Khāda ama gamuiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ khandha andha gandhaiccete ādesā honti, kappaccayo
anya-e0805n0:4000_1: ca hoti. Khāda bhakkhane, jātijarāmaraṇādīhi saṃsāradukkhehi khajjatīti khandho.
anya-e0805n0:4000_2: Ama roge, andho. Gamu, sappa gatimhi, gandho. Kvaciggahaṇena kalopābhāve khandhako,
anya-e0805n0:4000_3: andhako, gandhako. Atha vā rāsaṭṭhena khandho. Gandha sūcane, attano nissayassa gandhanato sūcanato gandho.
anya-e0805n0:4002_0: Paṭaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca alappaccayo hoti. Aṭa, paṭa gatimhi, paṭe
anya-e0805n0:4002_1: alaṃ samatthanti atthe iminā alappaccayo, “si”nti amādeso, paṭalaṃ, paṭalāni. Tathā
anya-e0805n0:4002_2: kala kalale, kalalaṃ. Kusa chedanabhūta dāna sañcayesu, kusalaṃ, yadā pana sala lū
anya-e0805n0:4002_3: lāiti dhātu, tadā kucchitānaṃ salanato, kusānaṃ lavanato, kuso viya lavanato vā kusena
anya-e0805n0:4002_4: lātabbattā kusalanti appaccayena kappaccayena vā rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:4003_0: Kada made, kadalaṃ. Bhaganda secane, bhagandalaṃ. Mekha kaṭivicitte, mekhalaṃ, mekhalā
anya-e0805n0:4003_1: vā. Vakka rukkhatace, vakkalaṃ. Takka rukkhasilese, takkalaṃ. Palla ninnaṭṭhāne,
anya-e0805n0:4003_2: pallalaṃ. Sadda harite, saddalaṃ, paralopo. Mūla patiṭṭhāyaṃ, mulālaṃ, rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:4003_3: Bila nissaye, bilālaṃ. Vida sattāyaṃ, vidālaṃ. Caḍi caṇḍikke, caṇḍālo, dīghattaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:4003_4: Vā gatigandhanesu, vālaṃ. Vasa acchādane, vasalo. Paci vitthāre, pacalo, pañcālo,
anya-e0805n0:4003_5: pañcannaṃ rājūnaṃ alantipi pañcālo. Maca core, macalo. Musa theyye, musalo.
anya-e0805n0:4004: Gotthu vaṃse, gotthulo. Puthu vitthāre, puthulo. Bahu saṅkhyāne, bahulaṃ, paralopo. Yadā pana lā ādāne iti dhātu, tadā gotthuṃ lātīti gotthulo. Evaṃ puthulo, bahulaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:4005_0: Maṅga maṅgalye, maṅgalaṃ. Baha vuddhimhi, bahalaṃ. Kamba sañcalane, kambalaṃ. Sabi
anya-e0805n0:4005_1: maṇḍale, sambalaṃ, niggahītāgamo, sabalo vā. Agga gatikoṭille, aggalaṃ. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ,
anya-e0805n0:4007_0: Puthaiccetassa dhātussa puthu pathaiccete ādesā honti, amappaccayo ca hoti vā, kvacatthoyaṃ
anya-e0805n0:4007_1: vāsaddo. Putha vitthāre, patthaṭāti atthe kvippaccayo, iminā puthassa puthupathādesā,
anya-e0805n0:4007_2: kvilopo. Itthiyaṃ īpaccayo, “o sare cā”ti sutte casaddena avādeso, puthavī, pathavī,
anya-e0805n0:4007_3: padhavī, thassa vattaṃ, amappaccaye pathādeso, pathamo.
anya-e0805n0:4009_0: Sasuiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tu duiccete paccayā honti. Sasu hiṃsāgatīsu, tuppaccayo,
anya-e0805n0:4009_1: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhātvantassa takāro, sattu. Jana janane, jattu. Dada dāne, daddu
anya-e0805n0:4009_2: kuṭṭhaviseso. Ada bhakkhaṇe, addu. Madaummāde, maddu iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:4011: Cipādhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi īvarappaccayo hoti. Ci caye, cīyatīti cīvaraṃ. Pā pāne, pātīti pīvaro pīno. Dhā dhāraṇe, dhīvaro kevaṭṭo.
anya-e0805n0:4013_0: Munādīhi dhātūhi ippaccayo hoti, casaddena pāṭipadikehi ca. Muna ñāṇe, munātīti muni,
anya-e0805n0:4013_1: vādhikārā na vuddhi. Yata yatane, yatatīti yati. Agga gatikoṭille, aggi. Pata gatimhi,
anya-e0805n0:4013_2: pati. Suca socakammani, suci. Ruca dittimhi, ruci. Isa pariyesane, sīlādiguṇe esatīti
anya-e0805n0:4013_3: isi. Ku sadde, kavi, vuddhi, avādeso ca. Ru sadde, ravi, dadhi, kuṭi. Asu khepane,
anya-e0805n0:4013_4: asi. Rāja dittimhi, rāji. Gapu, sappa gatimhi, sappi. Acca pūjāyaṃ, acci. Juta dittimhi,
anya-e0805n0:4013_5: joti, nandi, dīpi, kimi, akārassa ittaṃ. Tamu kaṅkhāyaṃ, timi. Budha bodhane, bujjhatīti
anya-e0805n0:4013_6: bodhi. Kasa vilekhane, kasi. Kapi calane, kapi, kali, bali, masi, dhani, hari, ari, giri iccādayo.
anya-e0805n0:4014: Pāṭipadikato pana mahāli, bhaddāli, maṇi, araṇi, taraṇi, dharaṇi, saraṇi, dhamaṇi, avani, asani, vasani iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:4016_0: Vidaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ūrappaccayo hoti. Vida lābhe, vandituṃ alaṃ anāsannattāti
anya-e0805n0:4016_1: atthe ūrappaccayo. Vidūro, vijjūro vā, vidūre jāto vedūro maṇi. Vala, valla sādhāraṇabandhanesu,
anya-e0805n0:4016_2: vallūro. Masa āmasane, masūro. Sida siṅgāre, sindūro, niggahītāgamo. Du gatimhi,
anya-e0805n0:4016_3: dūro. Ku sadde, kūro. Kapu hiṃsātakkalagandhesu, kappūro, dvittaṃ. Maya gatimhi,
anya-e0805n0:4021: Vuttaniruttilakkhaṇānusārena “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ca rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:4022: Udi pasavanakledanesu, unditumalaṃ samatthoti undūro. Khajja bhakkhaṇe, khādituṃ alanti khajjūro. Kura akkose, akkositumalanti kurūro. Su hiṃsāyaṃ, sūro.
anya-e0805n0:4024_0: Hanaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇu nu tuiccete paccayā honti. Ṇuppaccaye hana hiṃsāgatīsu,
anya-e0805n0:4024_1: hanatīti haṇu. Jana janane, jāyatīti jāṇu, dhātvantalopo, dīgho. Bhā dittimhi, bhātīti
anya-e0805n0:4024_2: bhāṇu. Ri santāne, rayatīti reṇu rajo. Khanu avadāraṇe, khanti, khaññatīti vā khāṇu.
anya-e0805n0:4025: Nuppaccaye – ve tantasantāne, vāyatīti venu, veṇu vā. Dhe pāne, dhāyati vacchaṃ pāyetīti dhenu, bhātīti bhānu.
anya-e0805n0:4026_0: Tuppaccaye – dhā dhāraṇe, kriyaṃ, lakkhaṇaṃ vā dhāretīti dhātu. Si bandhane, sīyati
anya-e0805n0:4026_1: bandhīyatīti setu. Kī dhanaviyoge, ki unnatimhi, uddhaṃ gacchatīti ketu. Hi gatimhi,
anya-e0805n0:4026_2: hinotīti hetu. Jana janane, jāyatīti jantu. Tanu vitthāre, tanotīti tantu. Vasa nivāse,
anya-e0805n0:4026_3: vasati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti vatthu, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā satakārasaṃyogassa tthādeso.
anya-e0805n0:4028_0: Kuṭādīhi dhātūhi ṭhappaccayo hoti. Kuṭa chedane, kuṭati chindatīti kuṭṭho byādhi.
anya-e0805n0:4028_1: Kusa chedanapūraṇagandhesu, kusatīti koṭṭho udaraṃ, dhātvantalopadvittāni. Kaṭamaddane,
anya-e0805n0:4028_2: kaṭati maddatīti kaṭṭhaṃ. Kaṇa nimīlane, kaṇṭho.
anya-e0805n0:4030: Manu pūra suṇaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ussanusaisaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n0:4031: Manu bodhane, ussa nusā, manate jānātīti manusso, mānuso vā, dhātvantassa āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n0:4032: Pūra dānapūraṇesu, pūratīti puriso, rassattaṃ, poso, rakārikārānaṃ lopo, vuddhi ca, pure ucce ṭhāne setīti puriso.
anya-e0805n0:4033_0: Suṇa hiṃsākulasandhānesu, suṇati kulaṃ sandahatīti suṇisā. Ku kucchite, kavīyatīti
anya-e0805n0:4033_1: karīsaṃ malaṃ, kussa karattaṃ, dīgho ca. Su hiṃsāyaṃ, andhakāravidhamanena sattānaṃ
anya-e0805n0:4033_2: bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti sūriyo, rakārāgamo, sakārassa yattañca. Maha pūjāyaṃ, mahatīti mahiso,
anya-e0805n0:4033_3: mahiyaṃ setītipi mahiso. Si bandhane, sīyati bandhīyatīti sīsaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:4035_0: Akkharehi akkharavācakehi vaṇṇehi kārappaccayo hoti. Taddhitādisutte caggahaṇena
anya-e0805n0:4035_1: nāmabyapadese syādyuppatti, akāro, akāraṃ, akārena iccādi, ākāro, okāro, kakāro,
anya-e0805n0:4035_2: yakāro, hakāro, ḷakāro. Evakārādīsu pana karīyati uccārīyatīti kāro saddo, eva ca
anya-e0805n0:4035_3: so kāro cāti evakāro. Evaṃ dhikāro, huṃkāro, sādhukāro.
anya-e0805n0:4039: Tabbādī ṇādayo niṭṭhā, tave tunādayo tathā;
anya-e0805n0:4044: Sandhi nāmaṃ kārakañca, samāso taddhitaṃ tathā;
anya-e0805n0:4046: Tedhā sandhiṃ catuddhā padamapi catudhā pañcadhā nāmikañca,
anya-e0805n0:4048: Ākhyātaṃ aṭṭhadhā chabbidhamapi kitakaṃ paccayānaṃ pabhedā,
anya-e0805n0:4053: Soyaṃ buddhappiyavho yati imamujukaṃ rūpasiddhiṃ akāsi.
